1b1(phal chen): mdo rgyud du
1b2(phal chen): sras 'di dag ni/ bye du de sems
1b3(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chung la 'dug pa ste bcu ga
2a1(phal chen): / zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu spyod cing / 
2a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// 'jig
2a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams tham sa cad snang bar byed cingabyang chub sems
2a4(phal chen): dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'kho // ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar
2b1(phal chen): byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo
2b2(phal chen): rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// de bzhin
2b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'o khri la rnam par lta zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying ngo
2b4(phal chen): byang chub la 'khod do// yid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing / byang chub sems dpa'
2b5(phal chen): rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ji ltar 'thun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing / byang chub
3a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// rdo rje'i snying nge'i ting nge 'dzin rjes
3a2(phal chen): su rtogs par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs
3a3(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag dpar len cing / byang chub
3a4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams snying po bya nga chub la 'khod do// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'thus 'gro ba thams
3a5(phal chen): cad byin gyis rlab cing // byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po
3a6(phal chen): de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems
3b1(phal chen): dpa' rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod nas kyang // ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
3b2(phal chen): bi'i sras de la snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de
3b3(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing // 
3b4(phal chen): kye ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cig rgya/ nyel bar gyur cig ces gsung rjod de// 'di ni // mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o// 
3b5(phal chen): kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgong
3b6(phal chen): pa dang byin gyis rlob bo yang dag par mdzad de// 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub
3b7(phal chen): mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/ byang chub
4a1(phal chen): sems dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par pa ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ste// 'di ni
4a2(phal chen): ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la// 'jig rten
4a3(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad kyi rtsa dang / gel ba dang / sdong po dang // nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod ka lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der
4a4(phal chen): 'dud cing phyag 'tshal te// 'di ni ngo mche// ra rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o// byang chub sem/ sa dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag
4a5(phal chen): par 'da' ba'i tshe yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i
4a6(phal chen): spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te// 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras rgya mtsho mchog gi dam
4a7(phal chen): pa dri ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
4b1(phal chen): kyi sprin chen po kun nas log par 'gyur te/ 'din ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
4b2(phal chen): kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang // rim gror bya ba shin tu chen po rnams// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa tha/ 
4b3(phal chen): cad du 'byung ste// 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ye shes mchog
4b4(phal chen): gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang dpo dang / spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshararmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
4b5(phal chen): snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub semasadapa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba 'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma
4b6(phal chen): thag tu na mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang // dus gsum rgyal bar 'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te// 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras
4b7(phal chen): snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las// dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing // ye shes chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral
4b8(phal chen): ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i/ 
5a1(phal chen): chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go/ kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnams bcu po 'di dag gi
5a2(phal chen): dbang yang dag par mthong nas/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam
5a3(phal chen): klas pa na// 'thab mo dang / g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to// 
5a4(phal chen): yid gnyis dang / the tshom du gyur pa'i mi dang / lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang / the tshom gcad pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// bdud kyi sde yongs su smin par
5a5(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// 'thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang / mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dngakun nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi
5a6(phal chen): phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir 'dud 'dul ba ston to// sems can gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba
5a7(phal chen): ston to// phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// snying po byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam thams cad
5a8(phal chen): las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis nyam smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba brjed pa dang // byams
5b1(phal chen): pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
5b2(phal chen): bdud 'dul ba ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras ngon bcu po dag gi dbang mngon pas na// byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to// kye rgyal ba'i sras bcupo 'di dag ni// byang chub sems dang/ 
5b3(phal chen): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na// kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang / las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad
5b4(phal chen): las 'das shing // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par brtse ba yin/ byang
5b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byam klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin// chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par bsags pa yin// chos snang ba rnam par dpyad
5b6(phal chen): par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam por bye ba yin// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin// sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang / dbyangs su ldan
5b7(phal chen): ba yinabyin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyi rlabs pa yin// 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang // gsungs dang / 
5b8(phal chen): thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin// skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin// shin du rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin// de
6a1(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin zag bzang ba shes pa'i bar gyi stobs
6a2(phal chen): dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan
6a3(phal chen): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
6a4(phal chen): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcur bskor te/ rnam pa bcug zhen 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas shin du sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa
6a5(phal chen): dang tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin du brtags pa/ dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su
6a6(phal chen): song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la yo ba med cing / sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang / sngon gyi snying
6a7(phal chen): rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang / bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chang ba dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub
6a8(phal chen): kyi yan lag dang bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sgo rnam pa
6b1(phal chen): bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnams pa tshad med pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor mo sbyar ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
6b2(phal chen): rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo don sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang / mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di
6b3(phal chen): ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang snying rje chen nga 'byin gyis rlabs dang sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
6b4(phal chen): bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang dus dal bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs dpa'i tshul bzhin du mi 'khrul pa dang / dus gsum
6b5(phal chen): shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang lus kyidabang zil gyi mnon pa dang tshigs ga dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang ye shes kyi dngang
6b6(phal chen): tshig bzhin du khong du chud bar byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
6b7(phal chen): rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang mngon pa med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas
6b8(phal chen): kyi phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen
7a1(phal chen): brgya bcug shena'adi lta sang dag pa ji lta zhin dungadu byed mi rtag pa 'angam su brtan pa dang
7a2(phal chen): sa thams cadas dpatan dum chu bar bstan myang na las 'a phyogs pade ba thobs 'jigs par dag cha pa thams cad dang 'bral bapa yang / 
7a3(phal chen): bar brtan pa dang gzugs kyi lum lazhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang chos kyi tshul yang dag par gyur/ 
7a4(phal chen): bdang rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthu phyir mo ldog pa yongs su bstan pa dang 'du byed thams cang 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang myur du med pa yongs pa
7a5(phal chen): brtan pa dang sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma rnam pa lta bu yongs su bstan padang mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po mapa
7a6(phal chen): mdzags tsham nyid dus dag par bstan pa / kun 'thung zhing 'jigs pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang kye rgyal ba'i thas
7a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis pa de nan sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad dgongs pa pasas
7a8(phal chen): ngasam rdzog na chom thal la ma gan du na 'dul ba mas chad shin tu sa na/ byang chub sem pa' thams cad shin du ma
7b1(phal chen): bstan par 'gyu te mnyam pa med pa 'gro'ang yongs su mya ngan lam 'da' ba chen por mongasas myangan las 'dang/ rtse rgyal pa'i ma mngon 'dubar drug su
7b2(phal chen): ngas par gatshigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa mamatsam pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyam mnyam pa myed pa ga mang sangs sa rgya rnams 'das pachen po mangs/ 
7b3(phal chen): su byon to// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs sa myong ba zhes byang ba chos kyi so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
7b4(phal chen): rgyas mang pos gsungs 'o// den mang mang khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o// mangs pa'i skye dga' bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa
7b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi spyong pa dang smon lam chen po rgyun gyi 'chang bar byed pa'o// sems can gang gis thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa
7b6(phal chen): dang mos par gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 
7b7(phal chen): rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi/ nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis ma
7b8(phal chen): yin no/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po non tan la gnas pas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgong
8a1(phal chen): le'u drang chub sems dpa'i spyong ba dang yon tan gyi 'thung gsas don rnam par gdonam pa pa'i matog chos tsa
8a2(phal chen): thams cad la yang dag par gzhol pa/ ye shes kyi sgol 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi lamathams cad las yang dag par 'das can pos dang / rang sa
8a3(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyilam dang bral ba 'grob thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa chos thams cad kyi sgo sdang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten mas
8a4(phal chen): 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di / rim mor byas te mnyan par bya'o// blangs bar bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o// yongs su
8a5(phal chen): bzung nas kyang nges pas rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang / ba dang smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar brtson pa'i
8a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no// 'jig rten las 'das nga'i chos rgya le'u chos thams cad
8a7(phal chen): sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pasangs rgyas kyi mthung chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzi chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs
8a8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gas ma/ 
8b1(phal chen): bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po lazha la bstan nas gsung brjod pa kye rgyam
8b2(phal chen): ba'i bu leg so leg so/ ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po rnams la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi dz+ha le'u byang chub sems
8b3(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten
8b4(phal chen): gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin/ 
8b5(phal chen): chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan
8b6(phal chen): pa ni rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin du byang ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyis rlabs dang mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
8b7(phal chen): 'di legs par bshad de// nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so// de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so// kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis
8b8(phal chen): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da ltar dang / ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir// nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do// de
9a1(phal chen): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil/ 
9a2(phal chen): 'khor thams cad la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhug
9a3(phal chen): dka' spyad pa// gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras// gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa// dpe zla
9a4(phal chen): med pa de dag rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse cig mnyan par byos// gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mtsho dad kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa// gang dag nyon
9a5(phal chen): mongs bcings pa'i 'gro bathar byed sems can 'du shes mig na sa dang // gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu chol yang yon tan mi gnas pa// de dag 'jig rten
9a6(phal chen): rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya// gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang // gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan
9a7(phal chen): zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po// gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam bzhi zhing rab zhi pa// 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya/ 
9a8(phal chen): gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa// 'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston// sems bskyed gyur ma thag
9b1(phal chen): tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa// de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya// srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye
9b2(phal chen): dang rgabs gzer ba dang / 'chi dang mya ngan dag gis bcas shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun du gzir mthong nas// de dag thar bar bya phyir snying rje rgya chen bskyed nas ye shes mchog 'gror/ 
9b3(phal chen): pa/ de dag yon tan shin du dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse cig mnyan par byos// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par rtsen/ 
9b4(phal chen): shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje ljags dpa'i bsam pa dang // dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhi gtang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa/ 
9b5(phal chen): de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyisade dag nyon// gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir/ bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skems pa// gang rnams byang
9b6(phal chen): chu ba zhi pa tshol zhing srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang // gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba mi tshol ba// byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod
9b7(phal chen): mchog brjod par bya// rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi// de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dum stong du brjod byas kyang // dpe tsam bya bar mi nus
9b8(phal chen): legs par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang go// sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos// gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po/ 
10a1(phal chen): 'phel byed kyang // mtho bar mi sems dma' bar sems med mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong mi 'gyur// 'gro ba kun gnas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen
10a2(phal chen): shes rab shing sdong ste// ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin// byams brlan yin snying rje rtsab dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste// ze ba ye shes drin tshul khrim
10a3(phal chen): bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can// sangs rgyas 'od kyi rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dga' byed pa// de dang de dag pad mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang // sa bon mos
10a4(phal chen): pas gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dang ni rtsa ba ste// sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga// bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen
10a5(phal chen): ye shes 'bras bu ste// chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya'akhod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs// rims gyis dkar yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang
10a6(phal chen): pabaste/ dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge// stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni mig gnyis te// de dag seng ge lta bur bdag med
10a7(phal chen): sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed// 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi bzang 'khyams gyur te// bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin cing gti mug mdongs
10a8(phal chen): gyur pa/ ta lam ni rab stor mi mkhas sems can mthong nas dad dpon mkhas pa de dag ni// lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god// 'gro ba dag ni 'dod
10b1(phal chen): chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nang btab cing // kun ring nas ni 'dus byas drug bsngam dag sa nam ma na drug bsngam sa sa ba// sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa'i nang pa kun gso zhing / 
10b2(phal chen): nang rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam padag kyang ston// rgyal po lta bu de dang de dga'akhor rnams dgar byed 'grol chos ston pa// sdig pa spong la dge la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas yon
10b3(phal chen): tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces// rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba// rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags/ 
10b4(phal chen): ba'i nor// tshul khrims lte ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon// ye shes rno ba'i ga zhu can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa/ 
10b5(phal chen): chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas// bskor ba yin// 'khor lo mchog rnams bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms// ye shes
10b6(phal chen): chu ni zab cing mi zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan// byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par bka'// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha' yas yul
10b7(phal chen): rnams dag cing lhags bsam dge// de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa// bsam gta/ 
10b8(phal chen): mngon shes rab 'phel ye shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi skul ba// gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur// de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan
11a1(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyis bltos// lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog na rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen par
11a2(phal chen): spyod las bsam pa mi phyed de// bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mo bskyod rab brtan pa// de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar bdag las bzlog par byed// byams/ 
11a3(phal chen): pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i klog chen rgyu zhing ldog/ thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog/ tha dad yang dag shes dang tshul khrims yan
11a4(phal chen): lag brgyad ldan chu'i char 'bebs pa// de dag de dag sprin chen de nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags// shes rab dga' dang khrel yong dag ni 'obs
11a5(phal chen): te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo bye dran pa de dag sgo ba yin// bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin du dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul
11a6(phal chen): rab brgyan pa// srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis mi thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan/ 
11a7(phal chen): gshog pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis yin// ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra// srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don
11a8(phal chen): tsang lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god// tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes// 'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'jom
11b1(phal chen): shing srong ba'i rgya mtshor ba tu rnam par byed// rlobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can badz+ra yongs su rgyas byed pa/ de dang de dag snang byed chos kyi nya ma'i khyu mchog 'gro bkun du 'byung / 
11b2(phal chen): chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis bltan mdzes pa ste// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan// sems kyi rgyud rnams mdza / 
11b3(phal chen): nas srong pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston// de dang de dag ye shes zlab 'grol 'chang zhing mkhas pa nam mdza'i mtha'// chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs
11b4(phal chen): dang yon tan dag gis brgyan// ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs da ni mig ste chos la dbang chen sgyur gnas pa/ lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyis blta
11b5(phal chen): ba'i dbang po ste/ chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin// srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun
11b6(phal chen): dbang po/ byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos// srid pa gsum po kun du tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa// de dang de dag tshangs
11b7(phal chen): pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel// 'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang // phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma'
11b8(phal chen): dang tha dad la// chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog mi 'gyur ba// thams cad mkhyen gyi yon tan dbang phyug grags chen de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang na mkha'i mkha'
12a1(phal chen): dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba// 'gro bkun du bya ba nyams lem thu mtshogs la'ang gnas pa med pa ste// 'gro kun tu spyong
12a2(phal chen): padakar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa// de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam kha'i dbyings dang 'dra// de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos
12a3(phal chen): chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon mongs me ni rab tu sel// de dang de dag ye shes mes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bsal// ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid
12a4(phal chen): pa gsum na rab tu rgyu// de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sel// de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid pa gsum na lta ba kun du 'joms// de dang de dag yon tan
12a5(phal chen): kun gyi phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed// stonapa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin// de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang
12a6(phal chen): chub yan lag rtse// phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgo la gnas// de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnams dag dri ni dro rab zhim// de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na
12a7(phal chen): chos dang ye shes kyis ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'dra de dang de dag stobs kyi bla res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed// ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan
12a8(phal chen): snyol// de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba ngan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun du 'phags// gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed// theg pa dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas deng
12b1(phal chen): de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin// de dang de dag rabangul glang po lta bur ming kyis rtag tu dul la gnas// de dang de dag rngu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'// klu dang / 
12b2(phal chen): po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs// de dag 'gro ba kun la ma tog u dum par mtshungs 'dra shin du dkon// dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi
12b3(phal chen): sde rnams 'khrugs// mi ldog 'khor lo lta bu'i de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu bcung // de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can thams cad lam yang ston// de dang / 
12b4(phal chen): de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan nged cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro// de dang de dag bam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro/ dab sgrol// gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye
12b5(phal chen): shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed// de dang de dag mnyan lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god// de dag bskyemos tshal gyi dga' ba rtse zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston/ 
12b6(phal chen): de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa// mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel// sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de
12b7(phal chen): dag ye shes 'byung gnas so// de dag sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel// yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed// 
12b8(phal chen): de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas// de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs// zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas
13a1(phal chen): rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston// de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod yul shes// de dang de dag chad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro bkun
13a2(phal chen): na thub pa med// de dag ye shes mi 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes// gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa// kun
13a3(phal chen): tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin// gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston// de dag mthun
13a4(phal chen): 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam par kun du brjod par mi nus so// 8/ gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos tham rnam da gnas shing // yong dang med pa'i mdud pa thams cad bral ba
13a5(phal chen): mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can// thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min// de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad
13a6(phal chen): par bya// chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben pa lta bur rab rtogs nas// mkhas pas sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed// sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas
13a7(phal chen): khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse cig mnyam pa med pa legs par grags// lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston// sems
13a8(phal chen): ming yid mong sems kyi yul med 'on kyang 'gro ba kun du de dag ston// khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par brjod byed kyang // 'gro ba dag gis sgra skad ji snyed yod par de dag
13b1(phal chen): thams cad rab tu rjod// nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang sgyur te// brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis ni ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston// de nga / 
13b2(phal chen): sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal na mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes// 'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston// de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de
13b3(phal chen): lus kyang de dag ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba gang rgyu mthug nas pa ji snyed pa// thams cad kun du skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med// rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems
13b4(phal chen): can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste// mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing // me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba ngan rgyal mtshan rnams// 
13b5(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing // mkhas pa bsam pa thag pas / sa kyi 'dud byed mchod pa dam pa kun du ston// mkhas pa de dag rgyal
13b6(phal chen): bzhabs kyi drung 'khor rgyal ba thams cad kyi// 'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu ba kun kyang nub byed// chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing // blo gros
13b7(phal chen): ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldang ba ston pa byed kyang zad pa med// 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun
13b8(phal chen): la stonatata sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston// 'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa med// 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag
14a1(phal chen): la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro ba ston// la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston// la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson
14a2(phal chen): 'grus bsam gtan shes rab rnams// la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston// mkhas pa rtog med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston// 
14a3(phal chen): la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig mang po
14a4(phal chen): zhing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las ldog pa med// de dgad la ler lha dbang brgya byin lnga dang bcas pa la lar tshangs dpar 'gyur// de dag la lar lha'i bu mo brgyas bskor la/ 
14a5(phal chen): lar gcig pu spyod pa ston// la lar dge slong rab tu ni zhing yid zhil lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/ lar chos kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs
14a6(phal chen): kyang rab tu ston// la lar bud med sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur// la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed// la
14a7(phal chen): lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe'i sa dang la lar rgan dang byis par ston// de dag spyod pa bsams na skye bo myos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur// la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'am
14a8(phal chen): la lar mngal 'gro gnas pa ston// la lar mnga' zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor// la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu spog// 
14b1(phal chen): la lar dbud med tshogs kyi dpung gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar pad+mo rab 'byung // la la khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bcugs// la lar 'khor lo rab tu
14b2(phal chen): skor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol// la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang // byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las
14b3(phal chen): kyang phyir ldog ma yin no// bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag/ khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston/ 
14b4(phal chen): pa byed/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang rtog dang mi rtog to/ dag pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston// spogs pa med cing phyogs la gnas med spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston// 
14b5(phal chen): gang phyir rgyal ba nyes rgyal de dag nyi tshe'i phyogs med kun na bzhugs pas na// 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul cig steng du mthong // sangs rgyas zhing rnams
14b6(phal chen): bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong // de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul
14b7(phal chen): rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes// sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa'i rnams// de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun du ston pa
14b8(phal chen): byed// bslab pa 'di'i phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed// dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas// 'gro bar bskal pa yod dang
15a1(phal chen): bskal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo bskor ba byed// dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang // dbang po'i dngos po phra da'i
15a2(phal chen): tshul dang gang dag dbang po rdul ba'ang rab tu shes// de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i sems spyod da ltar
15a3(phal chen): byung ba'ang de bzhin te// sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin// ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed// de ltar sems kyi sems
15a4(phal chen): spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs med pa dag/ sems gci gal ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog mkhyen rnam sangs rgya// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phyir
15a5(phal chen): go shes pas rtogs gyur nas// sems kyi tshul shes sems med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god// rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa
15a6(phal chen): kun gyis rab tu 'phags// sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrog mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du'ang 'gro// de ltar ye shes dbang sgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad
15a7(phal chen): byed kyang // skra rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba med// 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang // sgyu ma kun
15a8(phal chen): btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod ma yin par yang dmigs pa med// de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams// sprul pa phun sum tshogs
15b1(phal chen): pas 'jig rten ngal chen khyab par byas shing rab tu ston// nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams// ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin/ 
15b2(phal chen): de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams// 'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin// la la gnyid log
15b3(phal chen): rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed// lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad// de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston
15b4(phal chen): teta ta skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes nga zad mi 'gyur// ri'i dbang po ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra// kun nas sgra'i sgra
15b5(phal chen): brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med// de ban na chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sem/ sa dpa' mkhas pa dag/ rtog pa med par sems can sgra rnams
15b6(phal chen): ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston// dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas// de nas chu rnyed mi 'gyur btung du med cing je bas je skom rnam 'phel ba// de ltar
15b7(phal chen): mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba'i rnams// shes pas rtog nas sems can 'du shes bya med phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel// gzugs ni dbu ba lta bur khyu
15b8(phal chen): mchog ston te tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'dra// 'du shes thams cad mig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra// sems ni sgyu 'dra sgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu
16a1(phal chen): snyan// de ltar phung ba dgod pa ston kyang dbang sgrar dag ni de la gnas pa med// skye ma med stong pa nga bzhin dpang med 'khru 'khor bya ba kun du 'byo byed dag// 
16a2(phal chen): khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston// dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston// de ltar de dag chos chu lo rna mo
16a3(phal chen): dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa med// 'ong ba med cing phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyung du gnas pa med pa yi// nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du// 
16a4(phal chen): rkyen las rag los 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang med las rab tu ra 'dus pa 'o// maung dag don dam dbu ma la mni dngas med la gnas pa rab tu na/ nad cig gcig la ngas
16a5(phal chen): gsum long du chud kyas kyi sna tshogs rnams kyang ston/ 'dod dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston pa byed// sdom pa gsum gyi spyong dang rab tu ldan zhing
16a6(phal chen): thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po par/ 
16a7(phal chen): byin ta khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byod kun du 'gro ba thob gyur ba// mig gi yul grur skyon gyi gnas pa dran ning nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas bdag/ sangs rgyas stobs
16a8(phal chen): bcu ga gis ye she ni spangs kyang stobs lang darigs pa med/ sangs rgyas thams cad rjes srang po'i stong 'gro ba kun du mngon sum chos bzhid de/ nyon mongs pag bldan cig/ 
16b1(phal chen): skyes pa mi mnga'abyang ba'ang brnyes par gyur pa med/ 'byung bathugs su chung pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad// 'di'i gnas la rgyal sras 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang ni bar spyod
16b2(phal chen): pa med/ 'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang mi mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'ang mi mnga' ste/ mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du'ang nyams med
16b3(phal chen): pa/ thams cad mkhyen mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba/ 'gro ba kun gyis mthob byams pa'i chos nyid mi 'phrogs chags pa med bsnyes pa/ 
16b4(phal chen): chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i// mchog/ de dag yon tan mang po ngan gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya/ 
16b5(phal chen): de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad parami nus te/ 'on kyang ji ltar sa las rdula'adra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya// 
16b6(phal chen): rgyas ye shes rten ldan pasam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa'i rnams spyod pa/ mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnams gnon cing / 
16b7(phal chen): tshul khrims mi g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ lung bstan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed/ 
16b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed/ bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan ning mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med/ 
17a1(phal chen): sa// gzungs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dang stongs rnams rdzo cing yang ngadagadon gyis rgyal// bstan par mu sa med sems kyis mangs byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'chang yang rgya// sems kyi stong pa mas
17a2(phal chen): cang bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu spyon pa byed// snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten byang chub dam pa stong bar byed dang ldan// brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mangs shing skyo ba'i pha rol
17a3(phal chen): byin gyur pas// khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya// mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog sngon byed pa// yon tan thob
17a4(phal chen): byed spangs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyugs mchog tu 'gyur// dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyi 'drug sgra stsogs// ye shes mchog dang de bzhin
17a5(phal chen): gshegs sprul sgrub cing byang chub zhi banye bar 'gro// mkhas pa/ de dag bskul pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu thob// zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas
17a6(phal chen): shing nem nur bsal bas mkhas pa'i rnams// ye shes bsom gyis mi khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin// snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad
17a7(phal chen): mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse// rig pa'i snang ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra// gang la dkar
17a8(phal chen): nga'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po// 'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba med// bsam pa shin du shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha
17b1(phal chen): rol phyin 'gyur bas// mkhas pa dag ni dag cing spangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis// 'gro ba dag dang mi mchus zhum med khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra// ye dre/ 
17b2(phal chen): rgya mtsho 'dra dang yon tan mi zad don du spyod pa chen po spyong // de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha dgos pas gnas// shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub pa/ 
17b3(phal chen): med// byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas// sangs rgyas gter mchog mi za' thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o// rtag tu kun/ 
17b4(phal chen): rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkha rnas pa na// zhing rnams kun dang cho ga gi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes rgyud la gnas// lus dang snron
17b5(phal chen): lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te// 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston// mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis
17b6(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par rtse// khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa med// mkhas pa 'jigs pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams
17b7(phal chen): kyis shin du rgyun// sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang ldan// de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin du rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge/ 
17b8(phal chen): de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis rlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed// dam pa de dag sems bskyed cig las sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston// rgyal ba'i dbang po thob/ 
18a1(phal chen): bas rtag tu dbang po ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas// bsam padag cing g.yo sgra rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur// mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pas chos
18a2(phal chen): tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston// ngag chags thams cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin// nan tan byang 'grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// ngasan
18a3(phal chen): ba rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba mchog kyang 'thob// mkhas pa 'di lam shin du bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags// mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan
18a4(phal chen): gnas pa med par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed// ye shedas tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnam das shin du ston// spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa lce
18a5(phal chen): yin snying po ye shes mchog/ snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go/ bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin// shes rab mgo ste chos rtog mig yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin/ 
18a6(phal chen): tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te// spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin// spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas
18a7(phal chen): seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin// tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo// gang gis de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye shes yul
18a8(phal chen): sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings// sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyes pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang // bzod pa mi
18b1(phal chen): 'khrugs brtson 'grus mi ldog dbang sgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin// rgyu ba me cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren// skyo med snying rje rnam dag chos ni
18b2(phal chen): dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las bting yang snyoms// don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos// ye shes tshogs ni ral gri rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste
18b3(phal chen): 'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med// nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams bdul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad // rgyal ba rnams/ 
18b4(phal chen): kyi phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas/ 'dzin// nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spang ste rtag ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed// bdud rnams byin gyis
18b5(phal chen): rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyis rlabs kyis 'phags// chos kyi byin gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lci gnas su 'dong // lha rnams
18b6(phal chen): byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin du phra bar 'gro// skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan chos mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor ba byed// mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bzo
18b7(phal chen): dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston// chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed// stong pa stan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bskye zhing yang dag
18b8(phal chen): bskul ba byed bdud rnams dngul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud/ 
19a1(phal chen): gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'god kyang // rnam pa kun du
19a2(phal chen): sems can mi gnas chos la ma yin spyod la ma yin pa'i// de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin du rgya chen mdor bstan to// de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag
19a3(phal chen): gis rnam par rtse// zhing rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te// lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la'ang ngal dub gang yang med// mkhas
19a4(phal chen): pas khyer nas ji lta'i gan su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa med// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnam sa ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag/ kun kyang baspu gcig
19a5(phal chen): gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston// mkhas// pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho chu rnams ma lus khong chungarab ston kyang // 'phel zhing 'grib med 'gro bdag la gnod
19a6(phal chen): par 'gyur med bya ba de yang ston// khor yug khrag khrig shin du phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing // zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed/ 
19a7(phal chen): zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed de// de 'dra'i rje su dang bzad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do// 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong
19a8(phal chen): rnams ji snyed dang // gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang me'i 'od dang gang rnams lha dbang 'od// mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed// 'jig rten kun
19b1(phal chen): gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston// 'gro ba ma lus sgra'i rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// khyu mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams
19b2(phal chen): thams cad tshangs par brjod// srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur/ 
19b3(phal chen): gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs skal par ston// gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston// khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa
19b4(phal chen): rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed// 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas ba de dag sgra rtse gcig la rab tu 'god// 'das dang ma byon pa drang phyogs bcu kun ni bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa// de dag
19b5(phal chen): thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang sgyur rnam par 'phrul/ pa ston// sprul pa'i byin gyis rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems// de snyed lus rnams
19b6(phal chen): rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med// lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing // brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams
19b7(phal chen): dang de bzhin lha dang mi'i rnams// gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la// sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston// 
19b8(phal chen): 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams// thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston// 'du shes dra ba rnams bsgoms blo
20a1(phal chen): blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang sgyur ba// bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang chub spyod pa ston// de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam
20a2(phal chen): pa gzhan yang ston// de dag gang la 'jig rten sa min pa dang yul min de dag bya ba ston// ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed// de dag sems can rnams
20a3(phal chen): kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug/ lus ni na mkha' lta bu ngag dang yid la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso// tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna
20a4(phal chen): tshogs brgyan// chos kyi go 'phang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste// bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas/ 
20a5(phal chen): pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par/ shes pa mchog/ ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin// spyod pa btsun mo
20a6(phal chen): bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o// thabs la shin du mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sbyar// stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams
20a7(phal chen): dang snying rje'i go cha'o// shes rab ral gri yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin// 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng // 
20a8(phal chen): de dang de dag ba'od pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa pa 'joms// gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lum shes rab shing // me tog byang chub yan lagating
20b1(phal chen): nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan rgyan// sdong ba rnam thar brgyan brdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yin// thar pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni 'dung ba theg pa gsum gyi rje/ 
20b2(phal chen): de dag spong ba de 'dra yid 'ongs khyad par 'dugs te debs gong du mang // gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyob yongasu mi skyebs// ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye
20b3(phal chen): shes mchog la 'god// kha na mtho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed// zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur dwags re re nas kyang bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus 'gyur la// bar snang
20b4(phal chen): mkha' chen 'di yang sba yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de/ da/ skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi/ sangs rgyas sras rnams
20b5(phal chen): spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so// gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang // gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams
20b6(phal chen): las 'gro ba thar byas bde la dgod par 'dod pa dang // gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/ des ni rdo rje lta bu brtan pa'i sems gyis
20b7(phal chen): te yon tan bslab par byos// shin du rgyas pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste// // bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / 
20b8(phal chen): bam po brgyad cu drug pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal// skyabs med pa la zas sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra nga'i nang / pho brang brtsegs pa bkod pa rgya chen
21a1(phal chen): bos nan// byang chub sems dang kun du dbang po dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di la ste// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 
21a2(phal chen): shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang // brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang // chags med dam pa'i ye shes dang // me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang / nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes
21a3(phal chen): dang // zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang // dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang // rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang // rdul med dam pa'i ye shes dang // byang chub sems
21a4(phal chen): dpa' rnam par snang mdzad dam pa'i ye shes dang // byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang // ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang // chags/ 
21a5(phal chen): medang rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri med rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang // rdul meng rgyal mtshan dang / 
21a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gri chen po'i gzi brjid dang // ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / 
21a7(phal chen): dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid dang // chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang // bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang // ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang // kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid
21a8(phal chen): dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang // byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang // byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang
21b1(phal chen): namakha'i snying po dang / 'ad+mo'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / 
21b2(phal chen): gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' pad+mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig dang / rnam par dag pa'i mig dang / dri ma meng pa'i
21b3(phal chen): mig dang chags pa med pa'i mig dang / kun nas ngalta ba'i mig dang / shin du rnam par blta ba'i mig dang / ud pa la'i mig dang / rdo rje'i mig dang / rin po che'i
21b4(phal chen): mig dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mig dang byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang // chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gos cod pan dang / byang chub sems
21b5(phal chen): dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pa/ dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par byung ba'isnying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon
21b6(phal chen): par 'angags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa med pa'i cong ngan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan
21b7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa 'tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug pud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug pung dang
21b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug pung dang byang chub ngam pa'i gtsug pung dang / smon lam rgya mtshomams cad rab tu sgrogs pa'i rin chen rgyal de'i gtsug dung dang / 
22a1(phal chen): na shes ma pa 'a ma pa'i 'a ma me pa na thams ga rdu nga/  mas sa
22a2(phal chen): ba drung nga / de na shegs pa mnas kyi sa tha ga gzubadu dung // nga chu mas 'du ga tham mas na sa
22a3(phal chen): rnam kyi nga / zhiba'i 'ong dang 'od dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'ang dang chub sems dpa
22a4(phal chen): das dang / nam tsha'i dpa la dang / b+h+ya sa mi la dang / mangs pa'i sa yang drang chu sems pa' nanas dang la / 
22a5(phal chen): da mas par rgyas/ rgya mo'i byasabasla byas/ 'ag rten nga sa sa rang rgyam pa ma 'i byas
22b1(phal chen): chos kyi dbyangs kun du rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang // stong rje chen
22b2(phal chen): bo'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrogs pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu'i bar bya bas dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang byang chub sems dpa' chos
22b3(phal chen): kyi 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang grags
22b4(phal chen): pas 'phags pa dang / kun du snang bas 'alags pa dang / byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye shes brgya mchos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin
22b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i brgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang // byang// chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog go/ dpal dang / kun du 'phags pa'i dpal dang / rnam par
22b6(phal chen): snang ba'i dpal dang chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang rin po che'i dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bya
22b7(phal chen): dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs
22b8(phal chen): kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub
23a1(phal chen): sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa med pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / 
23a2(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i sgra dang / na mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrogs pa'i sgra dang
23a3(phal chen): sngon gyi smon lam yongasu skul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom med par byed pa'i sgra dang // byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang
23a4(phal chen): namakha'i blo dang // dri ma med pa'i blo dang / chags pa med pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang // dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang // yangs pa'i blo dang // kun du snang ba'i
23a5(phal chen): blo dang / byang chub sems dang 'chos kyi dbyingasu snang ba'i blo dang / de dag las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i
23a6(phal chen): spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'geng pa chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du'adong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i
23a7(phal chen): byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongasu bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mig gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa// de bzhin
23a8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong ba rgyun mi gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha'
23b1(phal chen): yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa rnam par dag pas/ bskal pa mtha' yas par shin du ston pa mi zad pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongasu ston pas
23b2(phal chen): namakha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang / srog med pa yongasu shes pas rab rib med pa// chos kyi
23b3(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi drabs rgyas par 'gengs pas namakha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// nyan pos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden
23b4(phal chen): nga'i tshul gyis rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dgadag pa'i mngon sum du gyur pa chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa / srid pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin
23b5(phal chen): gshegs pa'i tshog su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / ngag la nyal ba dang / bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten
23b6(phal chen): ban mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas la the tsom dang / nem nur dang yid gnyis yongasu chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha
23b7(phal chen): sdug dang 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mngon du zhugs pa gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes
23b8(phal chen): gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can
24a1(phal chen): thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba
24a2(phal chen): la zhugs pa sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa thams cad mkhyen
24a3(phal chen): pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de dag dang / 'jig
24a4(phal chen): rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang / de bzhin gshe gas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs
24a5(phal chen): pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs/ dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin
24a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'o mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang // de bzhin
24a7(phal chen): gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs par spang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang // dge
24a8(phal chen): gshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dang pa'i tshig yongs su dag pa dang / rgya chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ldog pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / 
24b1(phal chen): bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing yang dag par zhugs pam gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am/ khong du chud ba'am/ yid ches pa'am yongs su shes
24b2(phal chen): pa'am/ rnam par rtogs pa'am// gzung ba'am/ rnam par dpyad pa 'am/ rnam par bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par dbye ba 'am/ rnam par grol ba'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol
24b3(phal chen): gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni mi nus na bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa
24b4(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang brda' sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang sgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas bu/ dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa bsam pa dang
24b5(phal chen): sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can sems dang bsam pa'i// yul gzhan dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan
24b6(phal chen): la mos pa dag la/ sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub
24b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / 
24b8(phal chen): sngon gyi byang chub sems dnga'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grangs sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par sgrub rnam
25a1(phal chen): par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongs su dag par mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang sngon byang / 
25a2(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i dbyung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun
25a3(phal chen): sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang
25a4(phal chen): yang dag par bstan grang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lta yang yang dag par bstan grang
25a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i
25a6(phal chen): thabs kyi sgo lta yang yang dag par bstan grang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs
25a7(phal chen): pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing / rnam par 'phrul pa
25a8(phal chen): mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems
25b1(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang yon ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la
25b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par
25b3(phal chen): bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang / rje su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
25b4(phal chen): thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta yang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi
25b5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'adi dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa/ zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin na mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe med pa/ 
25b6(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i
25b7(phal chen): chos can la mnyam par bzhag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho 'brang brtsegs pa/ rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus med par yangs shing
25b8(phal chen): rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyan mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun du bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sa lims chal par
26a1(phal chen): gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa dang / bai DUr+ya'i kabs mdzes par byas pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu
26a2(phal chen): rnam par phye ba dang rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che// 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu rgyun pa dang / rin po che thams cad las sgro gang dang / rta bangs/ 
26a3(phal chen): dang pu shu dang // skar khung byas shing / khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 
26a4(phal chen): 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam par phye ba dang / nor dbu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdu dgas dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang / sgo dang / rta ngas/ 
26a5(phal chen): thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gangs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang / rol gyi 'khor gyis sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang / 
26a6(phal chen): phyogs kun nas them skas kyi 'phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing / shin du rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad kyang chu zheng ga' par shin du yangs shing / 
26a7(phal chen): rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang chu zhing kun du rgya che zhing
26a8(phal chen): yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs med pan
26b1(phal chen): rabs kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing rta la'i phreng bas mdzes pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad med
26b2(phal chen): bklong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
26b3(phal chen): thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur te// rin po che'i me tog puN+Da ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo// rin po che thams
26b4(phal chen): cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin du 'phags pas mdzes par nga bkod pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs dpa'i phreng ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ nor bu rin po che thams
26b5(phal chen): cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pas/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i dra ba kun du snang bas brgyan zhing mdzes pa dang nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu rin po che thams cad
26b6(phal chen): kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos thams cad kyi ngang kun nas 'byung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang / 
26b7(phal chen): gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal
26b8(phal chen): mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che snang bas kun du rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin
27a1(phal chen): ba co'i rgyal po bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'ang bangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yang ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan
27a2(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan
27a3(phal chen): dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas brgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal gyi namakha'i dbyings thams cad kyang / lha'i gzhal med khang
27a4(phal chen): gi sbyin bsam gyis mi khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas paragyur te/ 'dze tA'i tshal nyid kyang / spos sna tshogs kyi/ shing grangs med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / 
27a5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rgyun sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba brjod du med pa'i sprin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa
27a6(phal chen): thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang / nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du med pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod
27a7(phal chen): du med pa'i steng / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / 
27a8(phal chen): lha'i dbang po brjod du mang ba'i gzugs bstan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar ngo'i dra ba'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan
27b1(phal chen): ba dang / mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu
27b2(phal chen): rgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge pa'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs
27b3(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig 'jig rten
27b4(phal chen): gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul dab bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshe/ dgas pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas
27b5(phal chen): kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol bar/ byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin du phrang
27b6(phal chen): gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston pa mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu
27b7(phal chen): sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ yongs su ston pa mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig
27b8(phal chen): gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi
28a1(phal chen): shAsh+tsa/ khams thams cad kyi rdul shin dutha bsnyed kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa
28a2(phal chen): spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'dze ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
28a3(phal chen): dag pas/ yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang / 
28a4(phal chen): yongs su dag par kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin du sdud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / 'dze ta'i tshal du yang dag par
28a5(phal chen): gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho shin du rnam par gnas pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi
28a6(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang // zhing thams cad
28a7(phal chen): kyi bkod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin du rgyas pa'i lhun
28a8(phal chen): gyis kun du rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang lda ldi dang / 
28b1(phal chen): se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi 'chang bar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / smos sna tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang / na bun gyi char thams
28b2(phal chen): cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i bye ma nib dra'i char rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu 'bab pa dang / 
28b3(phal chen): rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bdan gyi smin lnga'i bu mo'i lag na khyer bA/ nam kha'i dbyings kun du rdzu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang rin po che thams cad kyi rjo
28b4(phal chen): po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can chung 'dzin po dang ldan pa'i leb la rol mo bkod pa dkun nus sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa
28b5(phal chen): dang rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / r-ini dra che seng ge'i dpe sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo nges brgyun par kun nas gnas shong snang bar gyur to//
