28b6(phal chen): de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas
28b7(phal chen): kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal
28b8(phal chen): po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i
29a1(phal chen): rdum shin du ba bskyed du na d+g+ha yos ldan 'das nges pan nas ra gying kyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'gas te/ rnamam sha byas rgyan/ 
29a2(phal chen): ldan du rdzas tug ma ngo pa dang /  sa na ma tu bye dang / 
29a3(phal chen): sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char
29a4(phal chen): mngon par dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gcu/ kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgru pa dang / 'dog/ tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin du phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi
29a5(phal chen): char mngon par dbab pa dang / lnga rdzas kyi rin po che'i mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin nam pa'i dbyings las byin gyirlabs pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sman gyi rgyan yod
29a6(phal chen): du 'ongs pas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas
29a7(phal chen): bas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogasu brtan te khang pa brtsegs pa dang / rgyan kun dang ldan zhing / nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang / 
29a8(phal chen): seng ge'i dri nor bu rin po che dgas rab tu sdang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brtson pa'i byang chub
29b1(phal chen): se sa da smras su smra byas smrasas rtul mo grang ca te 'dod/ byabs 'ang sterten gyi'ams rgya mchos su rgyas pan rjod du med pa'i rnam can du za 'arjod
29b2(phal chen): ba tsha dag na ngas rdon rgyamam man gags de ban pa shegs pa dpa kyi nang ba nanas snang rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas kyin nasabyang chub
29b3(phal chen): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi shugs thug par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas so shing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du bya bskyod dang ldan ci/ 
29b4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'tshadakyil 'khor rgya mtshod nas 'a'ags te/ 'dzi/ rkyen mi khams rgya mtsho thams cad smos kyi lnga ldi dang dra pas
29b5(phal chen): kun du 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sa rba rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po ches tshogs kyi lnga lnga dang / drab chen pos kun du 'brel bar
29b6(phal chen): byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad me tog thams cad kyi lnga lnga dang / phreng ba'i drabs kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'khor
29b7(phal chen): thams cad phreng ba dang / lnga ldi dang se mo do 'dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi 'phreng bas
29b8(phal chen): yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
30a1(phal chen): gos sna tshogs kyi lnga ldis kun nas yongs su blangs shing bzung bar byin gyi brlab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi 'phreng ba dang
30a2(phal chen): lnga ldi mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel par mngon par bsgrub pa dang / zhing thams cad nor bu rin po che dpal gyi 'od zer gyi lda ldi dang 'phreng ba'i dra bas kun nas 'brel par byin gyi brlab pa dang / 
30a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rin po che rnam par snang ba'i lda ldi dang dra bas kun du 'brel par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu rin po che seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i
30a4(phal chen): 'phreng ba dang lnga ldi'i dra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlab dpa byed cing mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na pa der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
30a5(phal chen): dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs su bstan te/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam par snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang / 
30a6(phal chen): seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
30a7(phal chen): lus byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bo snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig
30a8(phal chen): rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam por snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems
30b1(phal chen): dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin du phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ 
30b2(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rje mchod nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug skyes la dog sa tshogs dang / dI snga tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sngon sangs rjes kyi zhing brjod du che
30b3(phal chen): pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul
30b4(phal chen): shin du phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
30b5(phal chen): du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang chos kyi dbyings thams cad spros kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
30b6(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung ba sa thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba'i
30b7(phal chen): ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan
30b8(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi bkod pa dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings
31a1(phal chen): thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi
31a2(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang
31a3(phal chen): pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i rab kyi sngon sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang nam pa'i dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal ba
31a4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis brlabs pa dang sems can gyi
31a5(phal chen): khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu snang ba'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
31a6(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi na mkha' rin po che'i rgyal po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston cing
31a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgra 'byin pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang phyogs bcu thams cad rin
31a8(phal chen): po che'i rgyal po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
31b1(phal chen): byed ces rgyas par 'angs pa ma dzid kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gangan pader thugs sabacom ldan 'das dang na ba dong 'bod da #
31b2(phal chen): bas bcom ldan 'das la drug 'tshal nas chu phyogs brtan te'angs bajigs pa/ smos kyi rgyal po thams cad kyi lhan dang ldan pa mu gadrangs kun nas sgru
31b3(phal chen): dang seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lnga'i dbang po rabatu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi bad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po cheg ser gyi drabs kun nas brgyan pa dang yid bzhin gyi rgyal
31b4(phal chen): be'i tsong ban bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su dkris brnabs nas// skyil mo grang bcas te 'khod do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchos ngas
31b5(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i gos yongs su snang ba zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
31b6(phal chen): dbyings na mnga'i dpal rnam par snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya
31b7(phal chen): mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ na mkha'i dbyings rin po
31b8(phal chen): che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang na mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang / mdog ser
32a1(phal chen): po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byinaHrlab pa dang nam pa'i dbyings rin po che'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bang/ 
32a2(phal chen): pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam kha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / namakha'i dbyings nor bu rin
32a3(phal chen): po che gser gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyis rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / namakha'i dbyings nor ba'i rgyal po rin po che 'bar ba'i gos kyis sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brla
32a4(phal chen): pa dang nam pa'i dbyings rin po che skar ma thams cadakyi gzugs brnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam 'a'i
32a5(phal chen): dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu rin po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang ba'i sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / nam pa'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun
32a6(phal chen): nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang namakha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i
32a7(phal chen): rgyal po snang ba shin tu gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang / namakha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi
32a8(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang
32b1(phal chen): bcas pa bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang seng ge'i khri bai DUr+ya'i pad+mo'i snying po can
32b2(phal chen): dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ga mdzes pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lu su
32b3(phal chen): byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyipha
32b4(phal chen): rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sa chen po thams cad du mdzes pa rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i spyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi
32b5(phal chen): zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su shin tu'aphrul pa'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul
32b6(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nasa'akhor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'phags te 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bum thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
32b7(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig
32b8(phal chen): rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad 'dug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad tsan ngan gyi khang pa brtsegs
33a1(phal chen): pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun
33a2(phal chen): nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
33a3(phal chen): khams rab 'byam thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad gser gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i
33a4(phal chen): sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'dam thams cad gos kyi khang rab brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlabs
33a5(phal chen): pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad pad+mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
33a6(phal chen): na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtsham su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa
33a7(phal chen): brtsegs pa sgo chos kyi dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po spos mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i me
33a8(phal chen): tog gi dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod// 
33b1(phal chen): shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi sprin bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin
33b2(phal chen): gshegs pakru dbang rgyal de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du/ 
33b3(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'phags te/ nam pa'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor/ 
33b4(phal chen): gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sprin gyi kha dog kun tu khyab par bya ba dang 8/ namakha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che kha dog mtha' yas dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya
33b5(phal chen): ba dang na mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs/ pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam pa'i dbyings thams
33b6(phal chen): cang rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun du khyab par bya ba dang / na mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i snying po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya
33b7(phal chen): ba dang / namakha'i dbyings thams cad nor bu'i rgyal po// rin po che'i shing gau yal ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / nam pa'i
33b8(phal chen): dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug ter lta bu'i 'od kyang kyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang / rnam pa'i dbyings thams cad 'jam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi 'dog lta dza/ 
34a1(phal chen): 'od kyi kyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tukhyab par bya ba dang / rnam pa'i dbying sathams cad nyi ma'i mdog la bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya/ 
34a2(phal chen): pa dang / nam pa'i dbyings thams cad zlab dang / ska ma'i tshigs kyi la dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang napa
34a3(phal chen): der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ shang dang lho'i phyogs mtsham su
34a4(phal chen): brtan/ rin po ma rdul dang bral zhing rnam par btsun sumatshogs pa'i me tog lang ba brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che ring gi rdo rje'i darje rnying ba can dag meng
34a5(phal chen): bar sprul nas/ nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa'i byang chub/ sems dpa'i lusu byin gyis brlabs nas skyil mo krung bcas
34a6(phal chen): te 'khong do// lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mchod/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i nyi ma/ 
34a7(phal chen): rab tu snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo ye shes kun tu snang nga'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi 'khor thams
34a8(phal chen): cad rnam par 'thor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra nga snyeng dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das
34b1(phal chen): nges gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin namakha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dbye ba dang / 
34b2(phal chen): ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin na mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/ na mkha'i dbyings ltar
34b3(phal chen): yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gos 'od 'phro ba spos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdug pa'i sprin na mkha'i dbyings
34b4(phal chen): ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas klus rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin / namakha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i
34b5(phal chen): bug thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba 'od 'phro nga sprin/ nam pa'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che gser rab
34b6(phal chen): tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin namakha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i dug thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/ namakha'i dbyings
34b7(phal chen): ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin/ 
34b8(phal chen): nam pa'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ 
35a1(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtsham su brtan te/ nor bu rin po che chen po 'ang zer gyi drab phyogs kun du mngon par gzhol ba'i
35a2(phal chen): thig les chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can ngag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i
35a3(phal chen): rgyal po dri ma med pa'i snying po 'dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po sems can thams cad rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin
35a4(phal chen): gyis brlabs nas sgrol mo krung bcas te 'dod // rlud dang dbyang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis
35a5(phal chen): rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi ri bo kun nas rnam par snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang
35a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' rnam par smon lam yis dpal zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das
35a7(phal chen): nges gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus
35a8(phal chen): gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bo dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus
35b1(phal chen): thams cad nas/ dus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang pe byung bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams cad
35b2(phal chen): dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byang/ 
35b3(phal chen): bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyis gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye
35b4(phal chen): ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po thams cad dang / bsdu sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi
35b5(phal chen): sbyor ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du
35b6(phal chen): byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus
35b7(phal chen): gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang / byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams
35b8(phal chen): cad dang ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan
36a1(phal chen): dang dpe byang bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi lus/ 
36a2(phal chen): kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi
36a3(phal chen): zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye bas skad cig skad cig tu namakha'i dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba
36a4(phal chen): der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshamasu brtan te/ 
36a5(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri rin po che 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+d+harA snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu tig 'od thub pa med
36a6(phal chen): pa'i dra bas yongs su brgyan pa dang / rin po che 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs
36a7(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
36a8(phal chen): snang ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes namakha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad
36b1(phal chen): rnam par 'bor ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par don pa zhes byab/ byang chub sems dpa 'a 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho rjod du med pa'i rdul shin du tha ba sted dang ldan cig tu bcom ldan
36b2(phal chen): des gnang nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'phags to/ baspu'i bug thams cad nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi s+yAd dang / sgra dang / dbyangs dang / nges pa'i tshig
36b3(phal chen): mngon par bsgrubs pa rgya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang / dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub
36b4(phal chen): sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bsgrub dpe'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bklag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'o/ 
36b5(phal chen): dag pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgrarab ratu bsgrags pa dang / byang chub sems dngapa'athams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs
36b6(phal chen): ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
36b7(phal chen): pa thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub pa'i snying por rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs
36b8(phal chen): rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrag pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mdo sde'i tshul dang / ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra skrag pa dang // 'gro
37a1(phal chen): pa 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor los 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrag pa dang / ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ 
37a2(phal chen): smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyad par dang / dus dang / thabs dang / chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der
37a3(phal chen): lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gan ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'og gi phyogasu brtan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs
37a4(phal chen): brnyan du rab tu snang ba'i rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi da khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad+mo'i snying po yongs su gzung ba dag mngon
37a5(phal chen): par sprul nas/ rin po che'i snying po byang chub thams cad kyi garngu gas brnyan rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod pan mgol bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus byin gyis brlabs
37a6(phal chen): nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas
37a7(phal chen): kyi rigs mi zad pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyings kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
37a8(phal chen): dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des
37b1(phal chen): gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mchod nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang / ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang
37b2(phal chen): nying lag thams cad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad dang gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor thams cad dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / 
37b3(phal chen): sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang / phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / ma byon pa thams cad
37b4(phal chen): dang da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'bum thams cad na bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang / len
37b5(phal chen): ba dang / sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mchi/ na dang dpe byad bzang po dang / baspu'i sgo dang / lus thams cad dang / yan lag dang / nying lag dang / tshig gi
37b6(phal chen): lam dang gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu
37b7(phal chen): snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa
37b8(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang / drag shul dang / rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan
38a1(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgyamacho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon mo stor ba rgya mcho ba tu spang bar gyur pa/ 
38a2(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongasu tshol ba dang ldan pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yong su gtong zhing / shin tu
38a3(phal chen): zhenon pa'i lus dang / ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba dang / 
38a4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ra ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / byang
38a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang / rnam par mnan pa dang / rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang
38a6(phal chen): bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sprin gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor brgya
38a7(phal chen): mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasu bstan pa byed cing / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/ 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal
38a8(phal chen): nas/ steng gi phyogs su brtan te// rdo rje dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dang / seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang in dra nI la'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas
38b1(phal chen): nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i dra bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dbyangs su sgrog pa'i phreng ba rab tu 'phyang ba dang mgol/ 
38b2(phal chen): rin po che'i cong pan rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lu su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// / bam po brgyad cu bdun pa/ 
38b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'ang dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhangs
38b4(phal chen): kyi drung nas zhal du lta ba ye shes yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor/ lo dang mdo sde'i tshul gyis gsung rgya mtsho la rnab yongs su
38b5(phal chen): gzhol ba ta byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung
38b6(phal chen): du 'dong ba skad cig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba'i yul dang ldan pa de bzhin
38b7(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lu su mngon par 'thung zhing rnam par snang ba rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khams gcig tu sdang zhing khongs su chud par
38b8(phal chen): yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor/ 
39a1(phal chen): lo'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa sems can gyi khams thams cad sbrum lta bur
39a2(phal chen): yongs su shes pa rab tu thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa srid nga'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bu shes pas byung ba/ las
39a3(phal chen): dang rnam par smin pa thams cad gzugs brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa ye shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mngon par shes pa 'jig rten gyi khams
39a4(phal chen): 'bras klas pa thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / ye shesadakyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jig pa'i khyu mchog dang / 
39a5(phal chen): seng ge'ing ros rnam par gnon pa tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/ mi zad pa'i rgya mtshor zhugs pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho dang / chos kyi
39a6(phal chen): nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa chos thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab
39a7(phal chen): tu thob pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dkrug pa'i brtson 'grus dang
39a8(phal chen): ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob pa/ gnas med pas namakha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa
39b1(phal chen): mas ca na rkyen papasam len pa me pa rnam pa shA kyi rtso grus dang ldan tshang pa thams cad mi migs rapa mi shes kyi stod sum nachos ca ma mam
39b2(phal chen): tshul rgya mtshos rab tu grags pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pami dang da'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa 'jig rten gyi rnams thams cad gcag nas gcig tu bzung ba'i rnam par
39b3(phal chen): 'phrul ma sa kyi rgya sa cad gyes pa'i yum po sa 'grirten gyi sa mas sa mas tha la
39b4(phal chen): yas ngos pa chos la ma /  zlab rgyu chen nga dag par ga sa nga du @
39b5(phal chen): za bar shes pa dang ldan pa sangs rgyas thams cad/ dang sems kyi rkang cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thebapa de bzhin shegs pa thams sa kyi rgyan gyis brlabs kyi ye
39b6(phal chen): ma na pa phyog na mchod nam cad du mo rnaMngs pa mad pa'i 'i shes rab tu thob pa sems kyi na cig gis phyogs rgya mtshamams cad du rnam pas phrul ngas rnam par dgas pa
39b7(phal chen): sho sa dun ci sa kyi ma na med nga ldan pa kyang chu pa gagags sa pa sa
40a1(phal chen): katu'i drung byangs gang gi bral sogs pas 'di te 'tshal na 'dod bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba de dag ma mthongag// sangs rgyas / 
40a2(phal chen): bkod pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul dang / sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po dang / sangs
40a3(phal chen): rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par sprul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa yang ma mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i
40a4(phal chen): yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun de nas 'dus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs
40a5(phal chen): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
40a6(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i seng ge'i khri bkod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i khang pa dang / byang chub
40a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bsgyings pa dang / 
40a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
40b1(phal chen): yongs su smin par gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang / byang chub ses dnga' chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su
40b2(phal chen): rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum
40b3(phal chen): tshogs pa yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la dog mtha' yas pa'i bkod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa dang byang chub
40b4(phal chen): sems dpa' sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa dang / byang chub ra sems dpa' phyogs kyi dra brgyas par 'gengs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa yangs
40b5(phal chen): mchong ci bye nin/ dge pa'i rtsa ma ma rgyasapa du dedag gas na ldan sangs rgyas kyi rnam par/ 'phrul ba mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i chub mi mams/ 
40b6(phal chen): de dag la ni ngasngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag
40b7(phal chen): par bstan pa ma mdzad do// de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag brjod pa ma mdzad do// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ban
40b8(phal chen): 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba ma byas// de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la byang chub tu bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma bya'o// 
41a1(phal chen): de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir zhugs pa ma yin no// de dag ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no// de dag
41a2(phal chen): gis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba ma byaso// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ngan 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi
41a3(phal chen): sa la dmigs pa ma byaso// de dag gis ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa banye bar bsags pam byaso// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das
41a4(phal chen): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrub so// de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par// 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong du ma chung ngu// de dag
41a5(phal chen): gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i mig lam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam
41a6(phal chen): chen po las byung ba khong du ma chud do// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kun gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi mig lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa
41a7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs las byung ba'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyis grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis rlobs pa byang chub sems dpa'i
41a8(phal chen): dga' ba'i shugs chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed pa khong du ma chud ngo // de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
41b1(phal chen): de mi mthong ngo // mi thos so// mi shes so// khong du mi chud ngo // mi rtogs so// mi rig go// yid mi ches so// mi sems so// rnam par mi blta'o// rtogs par mi blta'o// nges par ming lta'o// 
41b2(phal chen): nye bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul te/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po ngag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
41b3(phal chen): 'phrul pa de dag mi mthong ste/ de dag la de dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba med do// de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong du/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par ma dag go// dmigs
41b4(phal chen): pa chu ngal rgya chen po'i byin gyis rlabs kyis 'jug tu ting nge 'dzin de lta bu med do// de dag shes pa dang lta ba'am/ kho du chud par bya ba'am// rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dag
41b5(phal chen): par bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am// rnam par blta ba'am/ nyam su myong bar bya ba'am/ gnan pa 'am// rnam par gnan pa'am/ gzhan gyis thos par bya ba 'am/ bstan par bya
41b6(phal chen): pa'am/ smos par bya ba 'am// yang dag par bstan par bya ba 'am/ bstabs par bya ba 'am/ sbyin par bya ba'am// de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba 'am// sbyar bar bya ba'am// rab
41b7(phal chen): tu dgod par bya ba 'am// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i chos nyid la sems can dgod par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do// de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med do// de lta bu khyu mchog gi mthu med
41b8(phal chen): de lta bu'i stobs med do// de lta bu'i dbang med do// de lta bu'i gnas med do// de lta bu'i 'du shes med do// de lta bu'i mig mthu med do// de lta bu'i ye shes med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni
42a1(phal chen): lta nyan thos kyi khrig par byung ba/ nyan pos kyil mgyis yongs su grub pa// nyan ngos kyi spyong pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa// nyan thos kyi 'bras bul gnas pa// bden pa snang sa/ 
42a2(phal chen): shes pas nges par rtogs pa// yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa// shin tu zhi ba'i mthar thugs pa snying rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa// 'jig rten thams cad la mi lta mi sdod pa// rang gi don grub pa dag ste/ 
42a3(phal chen): de dag ni 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te 'khod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang / g.yas g.yon dang snum logs na/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du lta bar gnas kyang / 'dze ta'i tshal der
42a4(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
42a5(phal chen): yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la smon lam yang dag ma btab
42a6(phal chen): pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su ma bsgoms pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs
42a7(phal chen): pa de dag gis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba 'am/ blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
42a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ nyan thos kyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod/ 
42b1(phal chen): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa'ang mthong / 
42b2(phal chen): bar ma gyur to// de'ang 'di lta ste dper na/ 'gang ga'i chu klung chen po'i ngogs pha rol tshu rol du yi dgas bkres pa dang // skom pas rab tu mnar ba// gcer ba// gos mang ba// lus kyi mdog
42b3(phal chen): dang kha dog tshig cing 'chums pa dang / rlung dang nyi mas bskams pa// bya rog mang pos gtse ba// spyad khyi dang / was thob tsam pa brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang / 'gang ga'i chu klung chen po
42b4(phal chen): mi mthong ste/ sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir/ la los ni skams te chu med par mthong ngo // la las ni thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas
42b5(phal chen): brtan de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang thams cad// mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i ling tog gis mig kun nas khebs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa
42b6(phal chen): nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dun ma chen po 'dus pa'i skye bo
42b7(phal chen): mang po dbus su/ mi la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te log par gyur nas/ de gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du gnas de nyid na/ lha'i grong rdal brgya byin gyi gnas blta na mdzes pa dang / 
42b8(phal chen): ri rab kyi steng shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng gis gang ba// lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa lha'i me
43a1(phal chen): tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / yidi bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gis dang / mu tig gi phreng ba dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / se mo sna tshogs ma
43a2(phal chen): po 'byin pa dang / lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing // sgra dbyangs yid du 'ongs la snyan pa 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang po dang / dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i bkod pa/ rnam pa sna
43a3(phal chen): tshogs mthong bar gyur la/ lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed la/ lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs/ 
43a4(phal chen): pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur kyang / skye de'i tshogs dmang po de dag gis gnas de nyid na 'khod bzhin du mi mthong mi shes khong du mi chung ngo do// de ci'i phyir zhe na// de ni skyes bu gnyid
43a5(phal chen): kyi log pa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ gnas de nyid na 'khod kyang skye bo mang po de dag gis blta ba ma yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang
43a6(phal chen): po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs rgya chen po dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs ma nor bar shin tu bsags pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam shin tu
43a7(phal chen): mngon par bsgrubs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shin tu gnas pa dang / thams
43a8(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi chos nyid dang / yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su
43b1(phal chen): rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su non pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par spyod pa thams cad la rnam par/ 
43b2(phal chen): rtse ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med par rnam par spyod pas/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de dag dang / sangs
43b3(phal chen): rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud la// nyams su myong bar gyur kyang // nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang / bzang po'i zung las sogs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i mig med
43b4(phal chen): pas mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to// 'di lta ste nga dper na/ ri'i rgyal po kha ba can// sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis gang ba la// sngags dang // rig sngags dang / 
43b5(phal chen): sman gyi tshul dang // blang ba'i rgyus shes shing // rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa// sman gyi cho ga thams/ cang shes pa// sman blang ba'i las byed kyang // ri bo'i dbang
43b6(phal chen): po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang // ba lang dang // ra lug 'tsho ba dang // spen pa dang // de ma yin pa'i mi sman gyi tshul mi shes pa gzhan dag gis sman de dag gi cho ga dang / sman gyi ro dang
43b7(phal chen): mthu dang // yon tan dang // byin dang // thabs dang / 'phrod pa mi shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa// byang chub sems/ 
43b8(phal chen): dpa'i rnam par 'phrul ba'i yul gyis byung ba/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mthong yang / nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang bzang po'i
44a1(phal chen): zung las sogs pa rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa// gzhan gyi dgos pa yal bar gzhog pa/ btang snyoms can de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang / 
44a2(phal chen): tshe 'di la bde bar spyod pas// bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las// par de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chung bar// 'di lta ste dper na// sa che
44a3(phal chen): porin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas phun sum tshogs pa// gter brgya stong du mas gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang
44a4(phal chen): gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shing byang ba'i mi rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gi blo shin tu byang ba// gter gyi gtsug lag dang / rgyus dang / ngan rtags bya
44a5(phal chen): nom par lobs pa// bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis bstan pa dag/ de las rin po che ci 'dod par/ blangs shing bdag kyang yongs su tshim par byed/ pha dang
44a6(phal chen): mal yang legs par rim gro byed bu lo smos kyang leg sa par gso bar byed cing // de ma yin pa'i sems can rga ba dang / na ba dang / dbul ba dang / nyam nyes pa dang / kha zas dang / 
44a7(phal chen): gos kyis mi 'byor pa rnams la btud cing khyad par bgo bsha' byed pa// nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs nyams su myong bar byed kyang sems can rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / gter gyi rgyus mi shes
44a8(phal chen): ba/ dmed rnamasas byas pa/ rin po che la shes pa'i mog yongs su ma dag pa de dag de nyid na 'dzi kya // rin pa che'i 'drung gnas dag dang / rin po ma gti re / 
44b1(phal chen): spyod dum chung ma shes ngas don pa yang drang med do/ na ba tsha da sa gyur byed do// de bzhin du byang chub se mas dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gsam gyis ma khyab pa la ye shes
44b2(phal chen): mig shin tu rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de dag 'dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/ 
44b3(phal chen): chos kyi tshul rgya mtshol 'jug cing ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrub ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang / rim gro la brtson zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba
44b4(phal chen): la mngon par brtson te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su sdud kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang / byang chu
44b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i tshogs chen po gni nas 'dus pa de lta bu yang / ma mthong mi shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes/ phul la zhig mig gnyis gos kyis bkab ste/ rin po rje
44b6(phal chen): gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan chun 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang nyal ba byas kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mi mthong ngo / 
44b7(phal chen): rin po che'i shing dang gos kyi rin po che dang / spos kyi rin po che dang rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthong la rin po che de dag gi spyod yul lam/ rin thang ngam/ 
44b8(phal chen): yongs su spyad pa'i rgyus kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rin po che'i don kyang nyams su myong bar mi byed do// gang gi mig la bsgribs pa med pa de dag gis
45a1(phal chen): ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing shes so/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs
45a2(phal chen): be rin po che 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur pa mngon du gyur te/ 'dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su ston pa mthong yang / 
45a3(phal chen): nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag ma mthong ngo // byang chub
45a4(phal chen): sems dngapa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i rin po che'i 'byung gnas chen po yang mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu byung
45a5(phal chen): ba dang / chu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rigs par/ gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bkab pa de dag la/ byang chub
45a6(phal chen): sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu med do// de dag gis chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug pa de lta bu khong du ma chud // 'di lta ste dper na// mig
45a7(phal chen): yongs su dag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab rib dang / mun pa thams cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de// de mi la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ de rdul dang
45a8(phal chen): bral bas rab tu snang ba dang / ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag par gyur pa'i nang na/ sems can byed khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus
45b1(phal chen): pa dang cho ga dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing mun pa'i rab rib kyis mog yongs su 'khrigs par gyur pa'i mi'i khrod na 'dug cing / rnam par rgyu la phan tshul 'gro ba dang // 'greng
45b2(phal chen): ba dang spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyod pa de mi mthong mi shes so// skyes bu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po// spyod lam
45b3(phal chen): dang cho ga sna tshogs kyis rnam par spyod pa// phyogs tha dad du mngon par bltas pa/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa/ kha dog gi rnam pa tha dad pa// dmigs pa'i tshul tha dad pa thams cad
45b4(phal chen): kyang mi mthong ba med do// de bzhin du// de bzhin gshe dgas pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor mnga' ba rnam par dag cing chags pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang ldan pas/ 
45b5(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis
45b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po dag mthong bar ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu yang mthong bar ma gyur to// 
45b7(phal chen): 'di lta ste dper na dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/ chus khyab pa 'am/ mes khyab pa 'am/ rlung gis
45b8(phal chen): khyab pa'am/ sngon pos khyab pa'am/ ser po khyab pa'am/ dmar pos khyab pa 'am/ dkar pos khyab pa'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus
46a1(phal chen): kyis khyab pa'am/ sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na// 'gro ba mang po'i tshigs
46a2(phal chen): de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo // me'i snang ba de yang mi mthong ngo // sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang // dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar du yang mi mthong ste/ ting nge
46a3(phal chen): 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing / rnam par spyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// de bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab/ 
46a4(phal chen): pa de dag yongs su bstan pa mdzad na nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong zhing shes par ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'ade bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis na
46a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo // khong du chud/ do// 'di lta ste dper na slu ba grub pa'i mi ni mig/ gnyis bskus ma thag tu skye bo mang po thams cad kyis
46a6(phal chen): lus mi mthong ngo // des ni 'gro 'am/ 'dug gam// 'grong yang rung ste/ skye bo mang po thams cad mthong ngo // de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa 'gro ba
46a7(phal chen): thams cad kyi yul las yongs su 'das pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul du zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi mig gis shes par bya ba nges 'gro ba thams cad gzigs/ 
46a8(phal chen): kyang / nyan pos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba de dag ma mthong ngo / 'di lta ste dper na/ mi'i tsher 'grogs pa'i lha rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba ni nges mi mthong
46b1(phal chen): yang / mis lha de mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus su
46b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba chen po yongs su bstan pa mdzad kyang nyan thos chen po de dag gis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po dang
46b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta ste dper na/ dge slong sems thams cad la dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 
46b4(phal chen): 'du shes dang // tshor ba 'gogs pa la snyoms par zhugs da pa ni shes pa med la tshor ba med pas dbang po drug gis kyang bya ba gang yang nyams su mi myong ste
46b5(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin la 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad gnas de na yod kyang snyoms par zhugs po de nyid kyi byin gyis rlabs dang mthus nges
46b6(phal chen): mi shes mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal den yang rnam par spyod la// de dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
46b7(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa dang // khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur// shes par ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul
46b8(phal chen): chen po de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud ma mthong ma shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni zab cing yangs la ched med de/ 
47a1(phal chen): blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/ khong du chud par dka' la 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab paste
47a2(phal chen): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi 'dus pa'o// de bas na// nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod cing // bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na spyod kyang // sangs rgyas kyi
47a3(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dag kyang ma mthong ngo // 'dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams mangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i
47a4(phal chen): yon tan dang / dkod pa yongs su 'dus pa de yang ma mtho nga ma shes te// de ni snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzod kyi smon lam gyi
47a5(phal chen): gtsug gi 'od zer rab tu snang bas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ltos shig sems can dam pa yi// sangs rgyas
47a6(phal chen): byang chub bsam mi khyag/ rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ba// 'dze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'di bstan to// rang byung rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs// bzang du med par 'byung ba la/ 
47a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i// 'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so// chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag/ tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab cing // shin tu zab pa 'byung
47a8(phal chen): ba ni/ de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha dog mdog/ mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par klubs// yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi// chos ra
47b1(phal chen): de dag mtshan nyid med// rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus med pa// tshig gi lam gyis brjod dka' ba'i// rnam 'phrul shin tu dang pa dag/ rgyal bas 'dze ta'i tshal du bstan/ 
47b2(phal chen): rgyal sras bdag nyid che ba'i rnams// zhing rnams bsam yas bye ba nas// rgyal ba'i zhal ltar mos dga' ste// kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos// smon lam yongs su phun
47b3(phal chen): sum tshogs// spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa/ de dag bsam pa shes par ni// 'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so// de dag sems dang spyod yul dang // spyod pa dag kyang
47b4(phal chen): nyan thos dang / rang rgyal thams cad yongs kyis kyang / rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i rnams// gzhan gyis thub dka' pham med la// dpa'
47b5(phal chen): pa'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing // ye shes sa la gzhol gyur pa// ting nge 'dzin dpag tu tshad med la// grags/ chen mnyam par bzhag pa rnams// chos dbyings thams cad
47b6(phal chen): rgyas bkang zhing // rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston// de nas byang chub sems dpa'athub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// phyogs bcu
47b7(phal chen): rnam par bltas nas// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bsod nams snying po shes rab che// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing // 'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i// bde gshegs
47b8(phal chen): sku las skyes pa ltos// yid gzungs blo gros mtha' yas shing // shin tu mnyam gzhag sems ldan pa// mtha' dang dpung med zab pa yi// ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can// rgyan rab mang pos mdzes byas
48a1(phal chen): pa'i/ 'dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba// byang chub sems dpa' kun rgyas shig/ bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur par// gnas med mi gnas gyur pa'i rnams// 
48a2(phal chen): phyogs rnams bcu na kun 'dus te// pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag/ rgya mtsho mang la lta bgyis// gnas med len pa med pa'i rnams// spros pa med cing mi rten la// rdul bral chags pa'i sems med/ 
48a3(phal chen): pa/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba dang // ye shes rgyal mtshan rab dpa' ba// rdo rje'i sems ni mi g.yo zhing // grub pa med pa'i chos rnams la/ mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa// phyogs
48a4(phal chen): bcu'i zhing mang byi ba'i rnams// grangs kyis mi chos kun nas 'dus yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lhags// gnyis kyi 'du shes rnam par spangs// rang byung shAkya seng ge yi// rnam par
48a5(phal chen): 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong // de yi byin rlabs dam pa yis// byang / chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags/ sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa med// chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de
48a6(phal chen): bzhin te// spyod pa tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i// pha rol phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras// chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pa'i// mtha' la thugs pa de dag gnas// tshig rnams yongs su pad med pas// chos la dbye ba'ang rab
48a7(phal chen): tu byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ltos shig sems
48a8(phal chen): can dam pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs// dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing // sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// mu stegs ldan pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i// rgol ba
48b1(phal chen): thams cad rab tu 'joms// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston// phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams// sangs rgyas yul gyi rjes mi bzhud// tshang
48b2(phal chen): med pa dang tshad yod las// thub pa chen po 'das pa min// nyi ma mkha' las 'gro ba ni// nyin par 'grangs pa smos pa byed// de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas ston pa// dus gsum chags pa med
48b3(phal chen): pas brjod// zla ba nya ba'i mtshan mo la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang // de bzhin chos dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i/ dgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin// bar snang na mkha'i
48b4(phal chen): dbyings 'di las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rgyu ba ni// gar yang thogs pa med par 'gro/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul de bzhin no// ji ltar na mkha' phyogs rnams kyi// zhing rnams
48b5(phal chen): kun la mi gnas pa// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya// ji ltar sa na 'jig rten na// lus can kun gyi gnas yin pas// 'jig rten
48b6(phal chen): sgron ma'i 'jig rten na// chos kyi 'khor lo de ltar gnas// ji ltar rlung ni chags med par// mkha' la mgyogs par rab rgyu ba// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos nyid kyang // 'jig rten khams su rab
48b7(phal chen): tu rgyutateji ltar chu'i phung po la// zhing rnams 'grangs pa kun gnas pa// de bzhin dus gsum sangs rgyas kyang // ye shes tshogs la rab tu gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi
48b8(phal chen): snying po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// ji ltar rdo rje ri rab drag/ zang yag shin tu
49a1(phal chen): mtho yod pa// de ltar 'jig rten kun skyob pa'i// sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu chen dag/ tshad med rnyog pa med pa ltar// sangs
49a2(phal chen): rgyas mthong ba'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten kun gyi sgom pa gcod// rgya mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi// ri bo ra rab ci 'dra bar// de bzhin 'jig rten sgron ma yang // chos kyi mtsho las
49a3(phal chen): mngon par 'phags// rin chen kun gyi 'byur gnas kyis// rgya mtsho rgyas pa ci bzhin du// rang byung ye shes de bzhin te// mi zad skad cig rab tu mkhyen// mgon po'i ye
49a4(phal chen): shes shin tu zab// tshad med de bzhin bgrang du med// de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med ston// sgyu ma'i mtshon nyid ston pa yi// sgyu mkhan
49a5(phal chen): mkhas pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen dbang yang // / rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu ston// yid bzhin nor bu rnam// dag pa// bsamangon rdzogs byed ji lta ba// de bzhin
49a6(phal chen): bsam pa dag pa la// rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad// 'od snang gsal ba byed pa yi// rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa dag/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa gsal bar
49a7(phal chen): mdzad// ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba'i// rin chen zur brgyad rab gnas pa// de bzhin chags med sgron ma yang // chos dbyings rab tu snang ba mdzad// chu 'dang rin chen 'od gsal ba// ji ltar
49a8(phal chen): dri med chu'adang byed// de bzhin sangs rgyas mthong bas kyang // 'gro ba'i dbang po dag par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su smon lam rab tu 'phrul pa'i zla ba'i rgyal pos// 
49b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// phyogs 'di in dra nI la yis// kha dog mdo ga cig byas pa ltar// sangs
49b2(phal chen): rgyas mthong bas skye dgu rnams// de bzhin byang chub mdog tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston// byang chub sems
49b3(phal chen): dpa' rnam dag mdzad// de ni rmad byung shin tu zab// mtha' yas bsgrub pa dka' ba ste// blo ldan ye shes yul de la// 'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus// byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub
49b4(phal chen): don du// bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang // sangs rgyas// tshul gyis rnam sbyangs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston// sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsam yas pa/ 
49b5(phal chen): blo ldan bskor ba'i sangs rgyas kyis// kun nas gang bar gyur pa yang // rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad// chos kun mnga' sgyur ston pa ste// shAkya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur// 
49b6(phal chen): de'i tshe 'phrul tshad med pa// 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin// brtan pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas// rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa// tshad med gza
49b7(phal chen): can ston pa mdzad// 'jig rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams// chos kyi dbyings la slob pa mdzad// chos rnam thams cad yongs la yang // chags med ye shes spyod yul 'gyur// skyes
49b8(phal chen): bu'i dbang po'i byin rlabs kyis// cho 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhing // 'jig rten thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// sems can gtso bo'i yul la yang // ye shes
50a1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs sbyangs shing // shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams// 'jig rten thams cad 'grel par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi/ 
50a2(phal chen): blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshogs su gcad pa 'di dag smras so// drang srong dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi// dus
50a3(phal chen): gsum nyan thos gang byung ba// de dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi// gshegs thabs 'jogs 'degs mi shes so// dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi// ma nor rang rgyal gang byung ba// 
50a4(phal chen): de dag gis kyang mgon po yi// gshegs thabs 'jog 'degs mi rig go// ma rig mun pas bsgribs pa rnams// khyi ltar ltong la brgyus pa yi// sems can de 'dra kun gyis ni// 
50a5(phal chen): mgon po mi shes smos mi dgos// rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal kha min// de ni shes par mi nus te// sangs rgyas chags med ye shes can// tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das// zla ba
50a6(phal chen): nya rgyas 'od mnga' ba// brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bris// de ni bskal pa dpag yas par// rnam 'phrul thog med spyod pa mdzad// tshul sgo re res sangs rgyas la// shin tu mnyam bzhag
50a7(phal chen): bsams byas kyang // bskal pa bye ba bsam yas pa// brjod du med pa zad 'gyur gyi// rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las// phyogs gcig cha'i mthar mi phyin// sangs rgyas de'i zhal bltas kyang // sangs
50a8(phal chen): rgyas chos ni bsam mi khyab// gang zhig de la smon byed cing // gang zhig yid kyis dga' mos pa// de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i// spyod yul blta dka' 'thob mi 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes
50b1(phal chen): mtha' yas shing // tshogs chen yangs pas rnam gnon la// dri med blo ldan sems gnas pa// de dag 'di'i tshul la 'jug/ de dag smon lam rgya che bas// sems dang sdom pa rgya che ste// rgyal ba'i
50b2(phal chen): spyod yul thob gyur cing // byang chub rgya chen gnon par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par mthong ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal pos// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
50b3(phal chen): kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'itshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras// chags med ye shes sku mnga' bas// rang byung rnams ni sku med de// bsam yas ye shes yul mnga' bas// 
50b4(phal chen): de dag bsam par mi nus so// phrin las dkar po bsam yas dpas// sangs rgyas sku rab bsgrungs pa'i phyir/ dade la 'jig rten gsum mi 'gro// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos
50b5(phal chen): mdzes/ chos kyi dbyings kyis rnam sbyangs pas// 'jig rtenakun tu snang ba mdzad// sang+yas byang chub sgo yin te// ye shes kun gyi gnas chen no// chags pa thams cad rnam spangs
50b6(phal chen): pas // rdul med spros pa mi mnga'o// ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas// 'jig rten kun tu nyi ma 'dra// khams gsum thams cad rnam sbyong bas// srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod// byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa
50b7(phal chen): mdzad// byang chub 'byung gnas de bzhin no// kha dog mtha' yas ston mjed kyang // kha dog kun la gnas pa med// sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'i// kha dog tshad med yongs su ston// skad cig gcig la
50b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub bsam yas sbyangs pas na// de'i ye shes mthar phyin par// brtag par sus kyang ma nus so// ye shes brtan bzad mi shes// rang bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba med// 
51a1(phal chen): de la dus gsum rgyal bdun// skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod// rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste// shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas// sems la sems shes bya
51a2(phal chen): bar yang // de la sems skye med par bsam// gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// de dag brjod pa'i yul ma yin// shin tu bab pas tshig lam spangs// de nas
51a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dran pa rmongs
51a4(phal chen): med dag pa'i rnams// chos 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing / deblo gros bsam gyis mi khyab la// byang chub rgya mtsho mi bad / dpa// de dag yid ni 'di la nges// de dag spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// 
51a5(phal chen): de dag shes pa 'dir mi g.yo// de dag 'di la the tsom 'chad/ de dag skyo bar mi 'gyur te// de dag yid kyang zhum mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar// de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byung
51a6(phal chen): de dag dad pa rting tshugs shing // yang dag 'phags pa rab tu skye// dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi// ye shes 'di la de dag dga'// bskal pa bye bar bsags pa yi// yongs su rdzogs pa dge ba'i chos// ye
51a7(phal chen): shes 'di 'dod mtshungs med pa// de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo// 'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu yang // 'khor ba dag la gnas pa min// sangs rgyas chos rnams rab rtogs pas// sangs rgyas yul la
51a8(phal chen): rab tu rtse// sems can khams na ji snyed du// 'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyu ba// de dag thams cad brtan pas spangs// sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas// sangs rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang / 
51b1(phal chen): 'jig rten don med rab tu gnas// chags med spyod pa de dag ni// rtag tu sems can don la gnas// de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de// lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab// 'jig rten bde ba
51b2(phal chen): kun sems pas// de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog/ 'jig rten kun la snying brtse zhing // byang chub ye shes rnam dag pas// de dag 'jig rten snang bar gyur// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel// 
51b3(phal chen): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i rgyal pos// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// bskal
51b4(phal chen): pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang // sangs rgyas sgra ni rab dkon na/ dathe tsom thams cad gcod pa yi// dam pa mthong ba ci zhig smos// chos kun thugs su chud rtogs pa// 'jig rten gsum
51b5(phal chen): po'i bsod nams stegs// sems can thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// 'jig rten sgron ma mthong gis dga'// sems can gtsu po ma smad pa'i// gzugs kyi sku ni mthong gyur na// bskal pa bye ba
51b6(phal chen): khrag khrig 'angoms shing tshim pa skyer mi btug// mi'i dbang po'i sku gzugs la// rgyal ba'i sras rnams blta blta zhing // rang gi dge ba chags med pa// gzhan don brtson pa byang chub bsngo// thub pa chen po'i gzug
51b7(phal chen): kyi sku/ de las tha dad yang dag shes// chags med ye shes 'byung 'gyur bas// de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sgo// sems can bsam yas tshad med pa// snang bas mdzad de theg chen la// btsud nas thub pa
51b8(phal chen): chen po'i mchog/ byang chub dam par lung yang ston// bsod nams chen po'i rang bzhin zhing // ye shes dkyil 'khor shar cing byung // 'jig rten tshad med kun tu snang // bsod nams phung po rnam 'phel
52a1(phal chen): mdzad// sdug bsngal dra ba rab tu gcod// ye shes phung po rnam par sbyong// gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba// de dag ngan song 'jigs pa med// rkang gnyis dam pa mthong gyur na// shin tu/ 
52a2(phal chen): yangs pa'i sems skye ste// 'od snang gsal ba'i shes rab mthu// grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu'i mchog mthong zhing // byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur
52a3(phal chen): bya zhes// de dag kun kyang nges par sems// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// 
52a4(phal chen): yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa// shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mthong nas// yongs su bsngo ba byed pa'i sems// theg dpa che la rnam par 'dag/ sems can kun gyi don gyi
52a5(phal chen): phyir/ thugs rje che mnga' brtan pa'i rnams// chos kyi 'khoralo bskor mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang // sems can don
52a6(phal chen): la brtson mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams// kun gyis lan glan cis kyang nus// ngan song gsum po mi bzad par// bskal babye bar bcos b+hA yi// chags pa thams cad rlog
52a7(phal chen): mdzad pa'i// ston pa mi mthong ma yin no// sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na// sdug bsngal phung po ci yod pa// ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi// sangs rgyas mi mthong ma yin no// 'jig
52a8(phal chen): rten 'di dag thams cad na// tha dang ngan song rgyud yod pa// de dag yun ring gnas bla yi// sangs rgyas mi thos ma yin no// sems can dmyal ba re rer yang // bskal pa tshad med gnas bla yi// 
52b1(phal chen): mtha' yas rgyal ba bsnyes pa yi// byang chub mchog las ring gnas min// ci zhig phyir ni ngan song du// yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na// rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni// ye shes 'phel ba'i
52b2(phal chen): rgyur 'gyur phyir// rgyal ba 'jig rten mchog mthong na// sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi// ye shes khong du chud pa 'byung // sangs
52b3(phal chen): rgyas mi yi mchog mthong zhing // sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur// byang chub gang gis 'thob pa yi// bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams// 
52b4(phal chen): the tsom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi// bsam pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
52b5(phal chen): bzang pos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la rnam par bltas te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang / 
52b6(phal chen): rgya cher brjod pa dang // gsal bar bya ba dang // rab tu brjod pa dang // yang dag par bstan pa dang // shin tu snang bar bya ba dang / rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang // man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul
52b7(phal chen): na mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dang // chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang // sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang // 'jig rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang // las kyi rgyud thams
52b8(phal chen): cad mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi mos pa mnyam pa nyid dang / chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa nyid dang // sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus mnyan
53a1(phal chen): pa nyid dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po mnyam pa nyid kyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i
53a2(phal chen): tshul bcus yang dag par rab tu ston te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la// sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig
53a3(phal chen): tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang // 'di lta ste/ na mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa
53a4(phal chen): bstan pa dang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang // mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su
53a5(phal chen): brjod cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun
53a6(phal chen): snying po byang chub la mngon du gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang // 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa// baspu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tu dbya zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas
53a7(phal chen): par dgang ba bstan pa dang // 'di lta ste/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho gzhi mnyam par byin gyis brlab cing // lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 
53a8(phal chen): dmigs pa'i gzhi thams cad la// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sprul pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ zhing thams
53b1(phal chen): cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la/ dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad cing bstan pa dang / 'di lta ste/ 
53b2(phal chen): dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad pa spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'byung bstan pa dang // 'di lta ste/ 
53b3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i seng ge'i khri dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems pa'i snying po'i rgyan tha mi dad pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba/ 
53b4(phal chen): phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgying ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la bstan pa bcu po 'di dag la sogs pa shin tu bstan pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
53b5(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed de// kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos// de bzhin
