53b6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'di nyid kyi don gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du blta zhing // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
53b7(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad la rnam par bltas nas// sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te// 'jig
53b8(phal chen): rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab par yang dag par gzhol ba la rnam par bltas nas/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgyu ma'i chos nyid la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyam
54a1(phal chen): pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang nges pa'i tshig dang chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ 
54a2(phal chen): de tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// baspu gcig la rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing // zhing kun shin tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam// de ni sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ 
54a3(phal chen): kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs// spu gcig rtsel zhing mang rgya mtsho'i rnams/ snying po byang chub pad mo'i gdan gnas pas// chos dbyings rgya tshan yongs su rgyas bkang
54a4(phal chen): zhing / shing drung dam pa kun na mgon po snang // zhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang snyed// rgyal ba spu rtsa nga gcig la yongs bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
54a5(phal chen): 'khor gyis yongs su bskor// kun kyang bzang po'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad/ zhing mchog gcig na rgyal/ ba bzhugs gyur kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i sprin mang mi
54a6(phal chen): zad pa// de dag phyogs bcu ma lus thams cad nas// rab 'byam zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong // zhing rnams bye ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho
54a7(phal chen): 'od / phyogs bcu'i chos dbyings rgyas par kun bkang zhing // ston pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldang // zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan rab tu ston// chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i ye shes mtshe// 
54a8(phal chen): de dag kun kyang bzang po'i spyod la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dong // rab 'byam zhing rnams kun na 'khod spyod cing // byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te/ 
54b1(phal chen): cho ba ldan ma na ba na// nang gas tung ngargal babye bar spyod// byang chub sems dang spyad pa spyod pa byed// cho kyigang rkyen mtsho snang rnam par snang // ldan lam
54b2(phal chen): mtshadun larabatu ju// de dag sangs rgyas pa'i spyod yul gnas// rgyal pon ma rnams gzhan dang gan byung // dengag kun tu b.rang ba ba spyong pa shis// mas rgyas yin
54b3(phal chen): legs pa rgya mchod nga/ rnam pa phrul rgya chen ya sal 'gru/ bdeg shegs ches rgya lan tu rgyam pa shig/ zhing rnams kyi rdul ldanang rnyed papa// chubardzun rnam
54b4(phal chen): rtag tu gyi ma cing / chos tsha chis byang chub 'god// ngom po brgyad durgya brgyang pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
54b5(phal chen): semam dpa de dgadangs rgyas gting badzin snye parnamabar bsgyings pa 'di ba la/ debs kyang ngan te/ dgod par mang dang 'don du/ sgomatshams kyi mdzod
54b6(phal chen): nanas chos kyi ngas nod na nas rnam par ri rigs pas// dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'ad sa chen po/ 'od par gyi 'khong sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu bya ba skyed dang ldan
54b7(phal chen): pa ste/ phyog pa 'dub 'jog sa kyi mas rgya na mas ca kyis sa rgyas kyi gang ngam thas pa ma cang nga bar mang ngo // den byang chub ma da 'dzi ba chel du chags pa dag sa
54b8(phal chen): tsha kyi tshungs pa cad du gtan sa ba sangs rgyas kyin rnam pa'i dbyis kyirnams thas parnams cad dang sang sa rgyas kyini rnams cad kyi rdul shi dum pa'i ngas su chung ba'i/ 
55a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ming du bya kha dog sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang / gzhi sna tshogs
55a2(phal chen): dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub tu phyin te// seng ge'i khril 'dug pa 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu
55a3(phal chen): mchod pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mthong ste/ la la na ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
55a4(phal chen): du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na chos kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar mthong ngo // la la
55a5(phal chen): na ni lha'i gnas na 'dug/ la lan ni klu'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni gnod sbyin gyis gnas na 'dugal la na ni lha mo yin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la lan ni na mkha'
55a6(phal chen): lding gi gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'am ci'i gnas na 'dug/ la lan ni lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug/ la lan ni mi'i dbang po'i gnas na 'dugal lan ni mi'i 'jig rten gyi grong dang / 
55a7(phal chen): grong khyer dang // grong rdal dang // ljongs dang // khams dang // rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag na rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / spyod lam sna tshogs dang / lus sna tshogs dang // ting
55a8(phal chen): nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang / rigs dang rgyud sna tshogs su byung ba dang / kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang
55b1(phal chen): 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang 'od zer gyi dra ba dgye ba sna tshogs dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang / gtam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang / bstan pa'i gzhi sna
55b2(phal chen): tshogs dang / tshig dang // nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs na chos ston pa mthong bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams
55b3(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam pa'i mthas gtugs pa/ phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa/ phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas pas 'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtogs pa/ 
55b4(phal chen): chos sna tshogs kyi sgo dang ldan pa phyogs kyi ming du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhorab/ phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/ phyogs
55b5(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba// phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang / lce phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang
55b6(phal chen): byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi zhing
55b7(phal chen): lhun gyi phyogs dang sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang / sems can gyi ming du bya ba'i phyogs/ sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs dang / phyogs bcu da ltar byung ba'i phyogs dang
55b8(phal chen): namakha'i khong thams cad du skra'i rtse mo shin tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang / zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i phyogs la 'jug pa khong du chud par bya
56a1(phal chen): nga'i phyogs dang las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang skra'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam pa'i dbyings kyi ming du
56a2(phal chen): bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khongs su chung ba'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas/ kun tu gtogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la
56a3(phal chen): mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang / 
56a4(phal chen): bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa sems can thams cad kyi lus la mngon par blta ba dmigs par bya bas/ 'khor
56a5(phal chen): dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul dang ldan pa bskal pa thams cad la ye shes tha mi dad pa zhing thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas/ sems can gyi bsam pa
56a6(phal chen): ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa rnam par dmigs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can
56a7(phal chen): thams cad 'dul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ dge ba'i spyod pa bskal ba mnyam pa dang / bsdu ba'i
56a8(phal chen): dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang / mnyan pa dang rjes su dran pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas yongs su smin par byas pa dag go// sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
56b1(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcud pa dag go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa dag ste/ de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa mnyam
56b2(phal chen): pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis yongasu shin tu bzung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyings
56b3(phal chen): ltar yangs shing / nam pa'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthong zhing khong du chud par gyur pa yin te/ la la ni chos kyi sku la 'jug go// la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug
56b4(phal chen): gota la la ni sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsgrubar 'jug po// la la ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jugadago// la la ni spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i
56b5(phal chen): rgyan la 'jug go// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i mam rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni mngon par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni
56b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin tha mi dad pa rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang mi bsnyungs pa la 'jug go// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi tha dad pa
56b7(phal chen): yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtsho la 'jug go// de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho// sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la
56b8(phal chen): 'jug ste/ mos pa sna tshogs dang lam sna tshogs dang sgosna tshogs dang 'jug pa sna tshogs dang 'bab pa sna tshogs dang / tshul sna tshogs dang
57a1(phal chen): rjes su 'brang ba sna tshogs dang / phyogs sna tshogs dang / snod sna tshogs dang / yul sna tshogs dang // 'jig rten sna tshogs dang / khong du chud
57a2(phal chen): pa sna tshogs dang / tshogs sna tshogs dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mchod dag la
57a3(phal chen): 'jug go// ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kun nas brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum thams cad
57a4(phal chen): la thogs pa med par yul snang bar byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha mi dad dpa'i ye shes snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
57a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyings la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin namakha'i dbyings su snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin
57a6(phal chen): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu 'thob pas rnam par 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang // byang chub
57a7(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi glong gi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du thogs pa med par sgra sgrog pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i
57a8(phal chen): zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis rgyan po'i 'od kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
57b1(phal chen): 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams
57b2(phal chen): cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad du tha mi dad pa'i snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin
57b3(phal chen): gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud kyis rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i snying po can dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
57b4(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad kyi gnas la rten pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bzhi la rab tu zhi bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / byang
57b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmigs su med pas kun tu 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad
57b6(phal chen): yongs su 'du ba'i byin gyis rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zhing thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba
57b7(phal chen): thams cad du dbang po kha dog gis rnam par spyod pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par du 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par spyod pa dang
57b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed pa las byung ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la nan tan gyis 'jug pa
58a1(phal chen): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa ma lus pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pas/ phyi ma'i mthar byin gyi rlob pa dang / 
58a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyi ma'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
58a3(phal chen): rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs bcu'i zhing rgya mtsho da ltar byung ba thams cad yongs su dag par mos pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang // byang chub
58a4(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la da sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod cing 'grogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la
58a5(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang
58a6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu thams cad khong du chud / 
58a7(phal chen): pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa'i snying po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi
58a8(phal chen): cha la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas/ khom par gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhing 'byam pa bsgrub pa yongs su
58b1(phal chen): ston pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin spyi'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems
58b2(phal chen): can gyi lus tha mi dad par byin gyis rlabs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi grong thams cad la mngon sum du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
58b3(phal chen): 'dzin chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum sems kyi skad cig la tha mi dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang / 
58b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig tham/ cad chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams
58b5(phal chen): cad kyi rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyis rnam par gnon pa'i seng ge dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad chos kyi dbyings su shes pa'i mig
58b6(phal chen): gi dkyil 'khor dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stongs bcu'i rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad
58b7(phal chen): kun nas mthong ba'i mig gi dkyil 'khor dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kha dog thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'gro ba shin tu mdzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub
58b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin glong mi g.yo ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos cig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
59a1(phal chen): 'dzin chos gcig gi tshig gi lam la nges pa'i ngag gis tshig rab tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
59a2(phal chen): mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston/ 
59a3(phal chen): pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gyi mu la khong mthar thug pa med pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas tha mi dang
59a4(phal chen): pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshul shin tu phra bas stobs bcu khong du chud pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrogs pa'i byang chub
59a5(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du 'char ba'i
59a6(phal chen): sprin dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam par bsgrubs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshor ba thams cad kyis reg
59a7(phal chen): pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mchen dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgyan thams cad du nam mkha'i rgyan mngon par bsgrub pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig
59a8(phal chen): skad cig la 'gro ba snyed kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sgron mngon par bsgrub pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i 'od nam pa ltar rdul dang bral ba dang
59b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa 'a ting nge 'dzin bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par byin gyim rlobs pa dang drang chub sems dang 'a ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad ya dbang ba rgya na rab tu snang ba dang
59b2(phal chen): byang chung sams dpa' ting nga badzin chos thams cad kyidon rnam par byed pa'i sprin ma dang drang chubasems dpa 'a ting 'dzin stongs bcu dkyil 'bor snang ba dang / byang chub sems
59b3(phal chen): dnga'i ting nge dzan dusu gsum gyis sa rgyas dpal sa rgyal mtshan dngo byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pas rgyas thams cad gcig tu 'dres pa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems
59b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cang mthar phyin par byed pa dang / byang chub sems da pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams mi zad pa'i snying po dang // byang chub
59b5(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba'i yul rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu
59b6(phal chen): gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongs su bstan pas/ kun tu rnam par dmigs pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang // byang chub
59b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dus gsum gcig tu sbyong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting
59b8(phal chen): nge 'dzin chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i sa mtshams 'dzin pa dang / 
60a1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang / byang chub sems
60a2(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i chos kyi namakha' la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phyogs gcig tu phyogs bcu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i klong dang / 
60a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos rgya mtsho thams cad dang ldan pa dang / byang chub sems
60a4(phal chen): dnga'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la 'od rab tu 'gyed pas rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon
60a5(phal chen): par shes pa dang smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge/ 'dzin rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par
60a6(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyan cig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs
60a7(phal chen): rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub
60a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cog gis chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings tshul
60b1(phal chen): gcig pas/ chos thams cad tshul gcig par rnam par 'god pa'i 'od dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo gzi brjid byin gyis
60b2(phal chen): rlabs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can gyi khams mig 'phrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam dang / spyod pa byin gyis rlobs pa dang / byang chub
60b3(phal chen): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad tha mi dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin pad mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul pas kun tu rnam par gnon pa dang / byang
60b4(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi lus da kyi rgyud khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin lus sems can thams cad
60b5(phal chen): la mngon du byin gyis rlobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yongs su 'byed pa'i tshul/ 
60b6(phal chen): mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du chud pas mngon par shes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin snying rje chen po
60b7(phal chen): mdzod tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin nyid du rtogs pa'i mtha' la 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin
60b8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brang la rnam par blta bas seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing
61a1(phal chen): brjod du me pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtshod dag la rab
61a2(phal chen): tu 'jug go// sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa yang rjes su dran no// de ltar byang chub sems
61a3(phal chen): dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal du phyin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan ldasngan 'khod pa/ seng ge 'khri rin po chesna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing
61a4(phal chen): bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang mnyam par yangs pa la 'khod pa/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'bru pas byung ba/ ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang / 
61a5(phal chen): ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa ye shes kyi kun tu rnam par spyod pa shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs su byung ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mngon
61a6(phal chen): du gyur pa/ ye shes kyi mig rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang bzhin thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par
61a7(phal chen): rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa/ chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa 'jig rten thams cad shin tu zhi bas gnas tha
61a8(phal chen): ngad pa med par la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa/ gnas med par zhing thams cad du 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas thams cad la rten pa med par chos
61b1(phal chen): thams cad blangs du med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la zhugs pa'o/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa/ ye shes dang rnam par
61b2(phal chen): thar pa shin tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ sring pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa/ 
61b3(phal chen): 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor can/ ting nge 'dzin gangs chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyings la shin tu mnyam par
61b4(phal chen): bzhag cing snying rje chen po rab tu sems pa/ chos kyi tshul dasgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rab tu rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmilam lte bur zhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs
61b5(phal chen): pa mthong ba thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud ba sgra skad dang / dbyangs thams cad sgra brnyan lta burarnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par sgrubs pa'i
61b6(phal chen): shes sprul pa lta ngur rab tu rtogs pa/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu
61b7(phal chen): zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa gzugs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis ngogs pa med par kun nas rab tu gnon pa chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas
61b8(phal chen): kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par spyong pa rab tu thob pa/ shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu
62a1(phal chen): phyin pa'i pha rol tu song ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
62a2(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbang du gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin ci log med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa chos kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas
62a3(phal chen): pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas de pa/ spobs pa'i stobs dang chos kyi sprin zad mi shes pa dang ldan pami 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro 'byin pa gnas med pa'i
62a4(phal chen): chos kyi dga' ba la dga' bas mos pa chos thams cad la rang ring med pa'i mig gis blta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa'i
62a5(phal chen): shes rab kyi dkyil 'khor gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnamapar spyod pa'i 'od zer can ye shes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khar yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba thams cad
62a6(phal chen): las shin tu 'das pa/ chos thams cad la dbang po dang / ye shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa dpa' bo'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu
62a7(phal chen): snyol ba la dpa' ba ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjid can 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib
62a8(phal chen): pa med pa zang pa med pa dang mi zad pa'i mtha'i ye shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par lta
62b1(phal chen): ba'i ye shes kyi mig mngon sum can byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyu la mkhas pa mi gnyis pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams/ 
62b2(phal chen): cad la rnam par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ ye shes kyi dkyil
62b3(phal chen): 'khor mun pa med pa la rab tu zhugs pa phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tu gyur pa/ thos pa dang / mthong ba dang / 
62b4(phal chen): smon lam ngon yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri 'jigarten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tsho gas thams cad tshar gcod pa la shin
62b5(phal chen): tu dpa' bsangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skadadang dbyangs kyi nga re 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong ba mi ngoms pa sangs
62b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang bsgyur ba dang ldan pa 'gro ba gdul ba dang 'thun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad du lus gcig gis rgyas par 'gengs
62b7(phal chen): pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i ye shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad
62b8(phal chen): du lus rab tu snang ba/ ye shes kyi nyi ma 'gro ba thams cad du shar pa/ 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang
63a1(phal chen): po rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du long du chud ba chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rig pa/ zab
63a2(phal chen): dang yangs pa phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dbang bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyis zab mo'i tshul nges par rtogs pa/ don zab mo'i tshig dang yi ge'i tha snyad la mkhas pa/ tshig dang yi ge dang don mi zad pa rab tu
63a3(phal chen): brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtsho thams cad tshig gcig tu chud par rab tu ston pa gzungs dang ye shes kyi lus rgya chen po byin gyis rlob pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs
63a4(phal chen): dang ldan pa'i byin gyi rlabs can/ sems kyi skad cig cig gis bskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can sems kyi skad cig gcig gis dus gsum shes
63a5(phal chen): pas/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes pa/ chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa dran zhing spobs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur
63a6(phal chen): ba'i thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul la ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ gya nom par snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ 
63a7(phal chen): chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pa chos thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba/ dmigs
63a8(phal chen): pa thams cad la rgyan bzang por byin gyis rlob pa/ chos kyi dbyings phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brangs pas rab tu zhugs pa phyogs thams cad rnam par dbye bas chos kyi dbyings las yang dag par
63b1(phal chen): gzhol ba/ shin tu phra ba ste yangs pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgya ba rang bzhin kha dog thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan
63b2(phal chen): dang ye shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan par gyur pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/ bsngags pa/ bkur ba// tshig
63b3(phal chen): dang / yi ge mi zad pas yon tan dang legs pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du 'dug ste 'khor pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs
63b4(phal chen): pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams cad dang / khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa'i longs spyod de dag dang / byang chub sems
63b5(phal chen): dpa'i stan de dag dang / 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang / dga' ba chen po'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab
63b6(phal chen): tu thob pas dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyan mngon par 'thon nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to// 'di lta ste sems kyi
63b7(phal chen): skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dra ba'i sprin shin tu yangs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa mngon par 'thon to// phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// rin po che sna
63b8(phal chen): tshogs kyi dril bu'i sprin mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sprin gyi nga ro rjes su bsgrags pas phyogs bcu rgyas
64a1(phal chen): par khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol mo ts+li na mngon par 'don te/ sems can thams cad kyilas dang rnam par smin pa/ 
64a2(phal chen): rol mo'i sgra snyan par blang bas rjes su sgrog cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa sna tshogs yang
64a3(phal chen): dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu sgrogs pas phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs/ 
64a4(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprin ma dpo mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su brjod cing
64a5(phal chen): phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan/ pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ zhing thams
64a6(phal chen): cad du byung ba'i sangs rgyas skye ba gcig nas skye ba gcig tu brgyud pa rab tu brjod cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
64a7(phal chen): mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyan byung ba yongs su ston cing / phyogs bcu sangs rgyas
64a8(phal chen): par khyab par gyur to// dmigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sprin mang po mngon par mthon nas/ spos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing / phyogs bcu rgyas
64b1(phal chen): par khyab par gyur to// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po lus dang 'dra ba'i sprin mang po mngon par 'thon nas byang chub sems dang 'akun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa byed cing phyogs
64b2(phal chen): bcu rgyam par khyab par gyur to// shing yongs su dag parin po tshathams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi rnon mang po mngon par 'dzin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzar/ 
64b3(phal chen): lo skor ba mngon par sbyin cing / phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dang 'di dag gi rkyen gyi rlangs dang / chos kyi snang ba rgya mtsho bsam gyis ma khyabapa
64b4(phal chen): rab tu thob pa'i chos nyid kyi rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sngon sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu thub steng byung bar gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'am
64b5(phal chen): dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis rnam para'aphrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed cing phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas de'i tshe tshogs su gcang pa 'di
64b6(phal chen): dag smras so// 'dze ta'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs// mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la bltos// dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sngon chen rnams// mngon par 'thon cing phyogs
64b7(phal chen): rnams kun tu khyab// bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan// kha dog mtha' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa// stan dang dmigs pa yongs su bcas pa la// de dag thams cad
64b8(phal chen): gzugs brnyan byung ba snang // rgyan rnams sna tshogs rin chen 'od 'phro'i sprin// bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi spu rtse las// sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrog byed cing // zhing rnam
65a1(phal chen): kun gyi dbyings su khyab par 'gro// tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang // spyod lam rab tu zhi bdag pa'i gzugs// zhing gi me tog kun
65a2(phal chen): las mngon 'thon te// bsam gtan yan lag brjod cing kun tu 'dong // kun tu bzang po 'dra ba'i rgyal ba'i sras// mtshan rab dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i lus// grangs med bsam yas
65a3(phal chen): bde bshegs pa spu las// sprul pa de 'dra thogs pa med par 'byung // bde gshegs sras po dus gsum byung ba'i rnams// yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag/ brgya mtsho che mnyam
65a4(phal chen): rgyan sprin de dag kun// 'dze ta'i tshal na gnas shing rab tu brjod// phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi da las// rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par// 'dze ta'i
65a5(phal chen): tshal gyi shing gi gzugs rnams kyi// gseb nas byung bar gyur pa kun tu grags// dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnams 'phrul pa/ 
65a6(phal chen): zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang // so so dmigs kyis dmigs par gyur pa snang // sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i sprin// spu rtse re rer sna tshogs rnams phye ba'i// sangs rgyas
65a7(phal chen): gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang // de dag la yang sangs rgyas sprin mang bzhugs// 'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing // sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed// 
65a8(phal chen): de dag 'od las spos kyi 'od 'phro dang // me tog phal chen rgya mtsho sprin kyang 'byung // mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang // ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa// de dag thams
65b1(phal chen): ca phyog rnams pa byed/ gang rlung ba byang chub bas na// dum padu byung ba'i rgyal pa'im sa rnams // ngan nga byung pa mas rmu // gang rnams
65b2(phal chen): rnam par dag byas pa'i// rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltar tshad med pa// phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams// bskal pa rgya mtsho chen por rnam sbyangs pa// de dag kun kyang 'jo
65b3(phal chen): ta'i nags tshal gyi// bar snang mkha' la gzugs brnyan tshul du snang // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa de dag las// byang chub sems dpa'
65b4(phal chen): re res kyang // snying rje chen po'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag debs kyang 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / yongs su bsdu
65b5(phal chen): nga'i don du zhugs par gyur te/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi// ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'odazer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed
65b6(phal chen): mngon par 'thon par gyur te 'od zer dag gi sgo re re nas kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul pa'i sprin// 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus dang // 'gro ba thams
65b7(phal chen): cad la mngon par blta ba'i lus dang // sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang // 'phrod pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te// mngon par 'thon nas kyang // phyogs
65b8(phal chen): thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul zhing yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba byed do// lha'i gnas nas shi 'phos pa
66a1(phal chen): yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs
66a2(phal chen): su bstan pa'i sgo dang // rmi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongs su bskul ba byed do// byang chub sems dpa' thams
66a3(phal chen): cad kyi smon lam gyis 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyod pa'i sgo dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang de bzhin gshegs
66a4(phal chen): pa thams cad gyi yon tan dang nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / yan lag dang nying lag gcod dpa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang
66a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa
66a6(phal chen): dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bca
66a7(phal chen): ba'i phyir/ chos kyi tshig dang / yig ge re re'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro zhing chos thams cad yongs su
66a8(phal chen): dri nga'i sgo dang / dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drung du 'gro zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba thob par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho snang ba rnam par dmigs par bya/ 
66b1(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bdud dang pas kyi rgol bas mi tshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i blo dang nga ma thams cad shes
66b2(phal chen): shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes pa'i sa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo nga / 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang sems
66b3(phal chen): can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po la 'jug pa'i thabs kyis nyon mongs pa dang bag chags
66b4(phal chen): sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shes shing mkhas pa ldan ba'i ye shes kyis yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang de dag la sogs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul
66b5(phal chen): ba'i thabs dang / bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la
66b6(phal chen): la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni klu'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni dro za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lha
66b7(phal chen): ma yin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni na mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par gnang ngo // la la ni mi'am ci'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni lto phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la/ 
66b8(phal chen): ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni mi'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni gshin rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo // la la ni yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad du phyin par
67a1(phal chen): snang ngo // la la ni sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo // la la ni yo dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du byin par snang ste// mthong
67a2(phal chen): bas 'dul ba'i sems can dang / thos pas 'dul ba dang rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'dul ba dang / ming gi chu klung gi sgras 'dul ba dang / 'od kyi
67a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye bas 'dul ba dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir
67a4(phal chen): snying rje chen po tha mi dad pa dang smon lam tha mi dang pa dang / ye shes tha mi dad pa dang sems can yongs su bsdub tha mi dang pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' nga dag
67a5(phal chen): badz+ra ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan pa sna tshogs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gas
67a6(phal chen): pa byed par snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo ste la lo ni rang gi gnas dang khang pa brtsegs pa dong stan dang 'khor du bcas pas phyogs bcu rgyas par
67a7(phal chen): byed par snang yangade bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo'o// la la ni sprul pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyed par snang / la la ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don tu gcig pu
67a8(phal chen): gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mo ga yo'o// la la ni sprul pa'i sgon rab tu 'gyed par snang / la la ni sems can yongs su
67b1(phal chen): smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang yang de bzhin gshegs dri 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mi g.yo'o// la la ni dge sbyong gi gzugs/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs/ 
67b2(phal chen): lal ni brtul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang cho ga dang / chu zheng gi gzugs la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la ni tshong pa'i gzugs la la ni nyan pas 'tsha
67b3(phal chen): ba'i gzugs la la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs la la ni lnga khyer ba'i gzugasal la ni bzo thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzugs su grong dang zong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / 
67b4(phal chen): ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor duphyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes su'abrang zhing / ming dang // gzugs dang // lus mngon
67b5(phal chen): babar bsgrub pa tha dad pa dang / lus kyi kha dog dang / dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / skad rnam pa tha dad pa dang spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / 
67b6(phal chen): gnas rnam pa tha dad pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad mig 'phrul lta bur shes pa dang / bzo' 'khor thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi shes pa brjod
67b7(phal chen): pas snang ba'i sgron ma dang bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang / las thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang / phyogs thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu
67b8(phal chen): sbyong ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la spyod cing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du grong dang // grong
68a1(phal chen): khyer dang / grong rdal dang ljongs dang khams dang / rgyal po'i gnas rag tu phyin par snang ngo / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnas pa med
68a2(phal chen): nga'i khang pa brtsegs pa na 'dug 'dug pa las/ bskal pa 'thun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi nyam
68a3(phal chen): blta ba la brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi rigs su gtogs pa'i lha ngag dang sngon gyi smon lam gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang
68a4(phal chen): gis 'gro ba'i ris su gtogs pa'i lha dang chos dmanyan pal mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha ngag dang snying de rje chen po la brtson pa'i lum dang mtsho dang / mtsheru
68a5(phal chen): dang / rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang / chu klung gi lha dag dang shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lhang dag dang rin po che 'acod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha ngag dang / chos
68a6(phal chen): kyi phyogs snang bar khong du chud ba'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan mo'i lha dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson pa'i nyi ma'i lha
68a7(phal chen): ngag dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la brtson pa'i na mkha'i lha dang / 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar brtson pa'i gangs chen mtsho'i lha dag dang / thams
68a8(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags pa la brtson zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus brgyan par
68b1(phal chen): brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dang byin gyi rlabs la smon cing brtson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su bskyang bar brtson pa'i grong gi lha dag
68b2(phal chen): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du smon cing mos pa'i klu'i dbang po dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dag dang sems can thams cad/ 
68b3(phal chen): kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri za'i dbang po dag dang yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson pa'i grul dum gyi dbang po dag dang sems can thams
68b4(phal chen): cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho nas gdon pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i de rnamapa' lding gi dbang po dag dang 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang
68b5(phal chen): stobs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing / lus rab tu 'dud pa'i
68b6(phal chen): lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po dag dang / 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing ngor lta ba'i lha'i dbang po dag dang rim gro chen po rab tu byed cing lus rab tu 'dud pa'i tshangs pa'i dbang po dag dang // 
68b7(phal chen): lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro chen pos mngon par bstod de mchod cing / de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/ bcom
68b8(phal chen): ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya phrag du ma zhig tu byas nasamachod pa rnams pa du mas mchod de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/ lho phyogs su yul
69a1(phal chen): rgyu zhing song // / bam po brgyad cu rtsa dgub// de nas sangs rgyas byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shar da ti'i dus
69a2(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas 'jo ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs logs su 'gro ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du
69a3(phal chen): gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhing 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dge slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te/ rang gi gnas nas byung nas/ 
69a4(phal chen): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la nus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
69a5(phal chen): gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung ste 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na bder
69a6(phal chen): dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa gsar du zhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang legs par byin pa chen po dang / bsod nams kyi 'od
69a7(phal chen): dang bu chen po dang / kun tu khyab sbyin pa dang rnam dag spyod pa dang / lha'i dpal dang dbang po'i blo gros dang tshangs pa'i dam pa dang / dge slong na
69a8(phal chen): ba'i blo gros dang de dag la sogs dge slong drug cu tsam kun kyang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa mos bzab mor gyur pa dad pa'i mig yongs
69b1(phal chen): su ngag pa/ sems rgya chen pos yongs su spyod pa sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par blta ba laM mthu yod pa chos kyang ba nyid dang rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa
69b2(phal chen): gzhan la phan par gyur pa'i blo can de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos bstan pas 'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shing mdun du byas te/ 
69b3(phal chen): sngon du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ de ltar lam du zhugs te 'dod pa'i tshe dge slong de dag
69b4(phal chen): kun la bltas nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus dmatshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan cing yongs su
69b5(phal chen): dag pa/ lha dang mir bcas pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag cing sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang 'od zer gyi dra
69b6(phal chen): ba'i rgyan sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung ba dang / lam gyi rgyan 'gron lam mig mangs
69b7(phal chen): ris su gnas pa dang lam rnam par gnon pa'i rkyen phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang / bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyan g.yas g.yon nas
69b8(phal chen): gter chen po mngon par 'thon pa dang / sngon gyi sangs rgyas la rim gro byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu 'thun pas shing gi bseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang
70a1(phal chen): po thams cad mngon mchod pa'i sprin gyi char mngon par 'bebs shing btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang phyogs bcu nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
70a2(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mang po dkye ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrog cing spyi bor 'char ba la ltos shig ces de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal
70a3(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa 'am du zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag dge slong de dag la yongs su bstan to// brjod do// bshad do// smos so// bkrol lo// rab tu brjod do// rnam par phye'o// 
70a4(phal chen): gsul bar byas so// de lta gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam du dge slong de dag gi sems rnam par dag par gyur to// rab tu dang
70a5(phal chen): par gyur to// dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// chos pa skyes par gyur to// de dag gi sems kyi rgyud las su rung bar gyur to// dbang po rab tu dang par gyur to// yid
70a6(phal chen): bde ba rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// yid mi bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur to// sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to// sgrib pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to// sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos
70a7(phal chen): par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems rab tu gzhol bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i ngad pa'i shugs skyes par gyur to// 
70a8(phal chen): snying rje chen po 'byung bar gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to// snying rje chen po yongs su skyes par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang bar gyur/ 
70b1(phal chen): to// de ltar de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer te/ mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan
70b2(phal chen): ba shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag dang 'grogs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der seng nas 'di skad ces smraso// 'jam dpal dge slong 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag go// de nas/ 
70b3(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ba'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par glang po'i lta stangs kyis gzi dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang de'i
70b4(phal chen): rjes la dge slong de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa
70b5(phal chen): khyod mthong ba dang khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge ba'i rtsaba'adi dang bdag cag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang mkhan pos thugs su chung
70b6(phal chen): pa dang / gang yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gzigs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des khyod ci 'dra bar te rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog shig/ rnam pa
70b7(phal chen): 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang / rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang / 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyod ji lta ba bzhin du thob par shog shig ces dge slong de dag gis de
70b8(phal chen): rkang du smras pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong dag yongs su mi spro ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi phra
71a1(phal chen): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pan byang chub sems dpa'i salta smos kyang ci smos kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yang
71a2(phal chen): gnon par 'gyur ro// bcugang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la sogs yongs
71a3(phal chen): su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir mi ldog cing / yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su skye
71a4(phal chen): pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la yongs su mi skyong sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams
71a5(phal chen): cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skye ba'i sems bskyed pa dang dus gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed
71a6(phal chen): pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya mtsho rgyas par dag zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par
71a7(phal chen): bya ba dang gdul ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang / zhing dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed
71a8(phal chen): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas/ sems can gcig yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul du/ sems can thams cad
71b1(phal chen): yongs su smin par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o// dge slong dag yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu po 'di
71b2(phal chen): ngag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par
71b3(phal chen): 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
71b4(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang dedag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
71b5(phal chen): kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang
71b6(phal chen): dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye
71b7(phal chen): bar 'gyur ro// de nas dge slong dag gis/ chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gis yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par
71b8(phal chen): gyur to// de'i mthus phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams
72a1(phal chen): de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus par mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can rnams kyang ma lus
72a2(phal chen): par mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs su mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed yod pa de dag kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis
72a3(phal chen): rab tu shes par gyur to// sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang longs spyod de dag kyang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho yang thos par gyur to// 
72a4(phal chen): chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshig dang yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig dang skad dang ming dang brdas yongs su shes par gyur to// sems can de dag gi sems dang dbang po dang bsam pa la yang
72a5(phal chen): rnam par lta bar gyur to// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'i tshe rabs bcu yang rjes su dran par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi chos kyi 'khor lo bcu'i nges pa'i tshig
72a6(phal chen): mngon par bsgrub pa la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// bstan pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la
72a7(phal chen): yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su bstan pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs par de dag gi tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par
72a8(phal chen): bsgrub pa bcu la yang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag stong phrag bcu yang yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu
72b1(phal chen): yang yongs su non par gyur to// pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag stong phrag bcu yang dag par gyur te/ snang ba chen po rab tu thob cing shes rab chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis/ 
72b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa bcu rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar mngon par shes pa'i mi gu gzhon zhing shin tu phra ba thob ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyes pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal
72b3(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu bkod do// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas de dag smon
72b4(phal chen): lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs shing mngon par bsgrub par gyur to// // de ltar smon lam chen po rgya mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu thob par
72b5(phal chen): gyur to// lus rnam par dag pas lus yang rab tu thob par gyur to// de ltar lus rnam par dag pa dang / lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shin tu yangs par byed pas
72b6(phal chen): mi nyams shing rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par gyur to// mngon par shes pa de dag thob pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang mi g.yol
72b7(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin las kyi sgron mngon par sgrub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ 
72b8(phal chen): dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod nas mthar gyis yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs skyid pa'i 'byung gnas shes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logs su song
73a1(phal chen): sde phyin nas/ grong rdal chen po sbyang ba'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs logs na nags tshal chen po srul sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyas
73a2(phal chen): bzhugs bzhugs pa'i chod rten sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa zhing mtha' yas par ming gi sgra rjes su grags pa/ sngan chad bcom
73a3(phal chen): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i tshe yongs su btang bar dga' ba dum yongs su btang ste/ sa'i phyogs den lnga dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang lha ma yin dang / 
73a4(phal chen): namanga' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang 8/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod pa da la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der/ 'khor dang bcas te phyin/ 
73a5(phal chen): nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mdo sde chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu 'byung ba bstan to// de bstan pa'i tshe/ 
73a6(phal chen): rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma nye bar lhags te/ de dag gis chos kyi tshul de thos nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam par smod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mos par gyur nas klu'i
73a7(phal chen): rgyud rnam par bzlog ste/ lha dang mir skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur nas der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// chos de bstan pa'i tshe/ 
73a8(phal chen): sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa theg pa gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par dul bar gyur to// de nas sgying pa'i 'byung gnas kyi mi rnams kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
73b1(phal chen): pa'i myong nga'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal du phyin te sbal sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi mchod rten gyi gni 'ang nyid na rnam par spyong do zhes thos nas dge bsnyen tshong dpon shes chen po las sogs pa/ 
73b2(phal chen): dge bsnyen pa dang dge bsnyen ma dang / khye'u dang bu mo mang po dag so so nas 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang bcas te/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas 'jam dpal gzhon
73b3(phal chen): nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong ngo // de la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po na dge bsnyen bzang pos byin lhas byin dang / bsod nams 'ong dang grags pa'i lha dang
73b4(phal chen): grags pas byin dang / zla ba'i dpal dang zla bdaga' po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo mos chen po / sgra gcan pabang po dang / dge bsnyen bzang po'i dpal dang / 
73b5(phal chen): de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang nang/ der dong nas 'jam dngal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa
73b6(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum dung skor ba byas nas phyogs gcig du 'khong ngo // de la dge bsnyen ma shes rab chen mon dge bsnyen ma
73b7(phal chen): 'od babang mo dang / lus bzang mo dang / dge ba yod pa dang / dge ba'i dpal dang zla ba'i 'od dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / dpal bzang mo dang / dge bsnyen ma mig
73b8(phal chen): bzang mo dang de dag la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa
74a1(phal chen): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khong ngo // de la tshong dpon gyi
74a2(phal chen): bu nor pa rangs ni tshong dpon gyi bu brtul zhugs padang po dang / tshul khrims pazang po dang / nga tshul babang po dang / rnam par gnon pa bzang po dang / bsam pa babang pa dang / blo gras
74a3(phal chen): bzang po dang // blo bzang po dang // mig bzang po dang / lag pa bzang po dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'od bzang po dang / de dag la sogs pa tshong dpon gyi bu lnga brgyas bskor cing bdun du byas te/ 
74a4(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
74a5(phal chen): la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dge ba bzang mo ni bu mo bzang mo dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin
74a6(phal chen): dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / dpal bzang mo dang tshangs pas byin pa dang / dpal gyi 'od dang / bu mo 'ong bzang mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor cing bdun du byas te/ 
74a7(phal chen): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dong nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas
74a8(phal chen): nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang // bu mo de dag 'dus te 'khod par shes
74b1(phal chen): nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa'ibyin gyis zil gyis gnan te byams pa chen pa 'dun gyis sim par byas nas snying rje chen po 'dun gyim chos bstan pa mngon par sgrub te ye shes kyi phyir/ 
74b2(phal chen): gyis sems dang bsam pa rnam par phye nas tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos bstan par dga' te tshong dpon gyi bu nor babang la bltas so// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang shes bya ba ci'i phyir nor
74b3(phal chen): babang shes bya'o na tsheng dpon gyi bu na babang shes bya ba thog mama'i mngal du zhugs mthag tu khyim de'i 'khor kun nas rnam par phye ba'i rin po che sna bdun gyi sdong po 'thon par gyur to// ron pa
74b4(phal chen): tshe'i sdong po de dag gi 'og na rin po che'i gter bdun yod de/ dgaser dang / dngul dang / bai dUd+yA dang shel dadang / mu tig dmar po dang / a sma ga rang dang / 
74b5(phal chen): sa ra gal ba dang / rin po cheng bdun gyi rin po che'i sdong ba dadag kyang / gter de dag nas skyes te sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon bar 'thon par gyur to// de yan lag dang nying lag gnyis
74b6(phal chen): thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/ zla ba bcu la na nas bcas pa dang / de'i tshe gter chen po bdun po de dag kyang chu zheng dang rngams su khru bdun tsam du sa'i glengs nas mngon par 'phags te/ 
74b7(phal chen): snang bar drung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to// khyim der rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya yang byung bar gyur te/ 'di ltar mar gyi snod dang til mar gyi snod dang / sbrang rtsi'i snod
74b8(phal chen): dang / mar bsar gyi snod dang / gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang spos kyi snod gos sna
75a1(phal chen): chogs kyis yangs su gang ba dang / man shel gyi sdong 'ams dang spyan garigs sna tshogs mchog tu nim bas 'ongs su gang ba dang / nor du'i snod rin po che sna tshogs
75a2(phal chen): kyis yongs su gang ba dang gser gyi snod dngul sa lams yongs su gang ba dang dngul gyi snod gser phyes yongs su gang ba dang / bra men gyi snod nor bu rin po che bai dUr+yas yongs su gang ba dang / 
75a3(phal chen): shel gyi sdong mus ragal bas yongs su gang ba dang / mu sa ragal ba'i snod rin po che shel gyis yongs su gang ba dang / a sma ga bar snod mu ti ga mar pos yongs su gang ba dang / mu tig
75a4(phal chen): dmar po'i sdeng ma smug rabs yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snong nor bachen po chu'ang gis yongs su gang ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu 'angang / 
75a5(phal chen): snong/ nor ngon pa che na ma'i rgyal mtshan rgyam yongs su gang bdang / de dga' migs pa rin pa cha sdeng lda 'dzin par gyur to// tshong dpon gyi na ba ngas de bcams
75a6(phal chen): zag tu ma dang / ba nga mchod ma cad grung dugs dang gser / rin po nam chags kyin mngo pa bar byung / de 'gram me bsgrum pa dang / 
75a7(phal chen): dang ma dang / gnyen gyi tshogs kyis dzad bcas mthag tun mang baphrin su mtshogs 'byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bangs nor bab sa shes de ltar ming du btags te/ tshong dpon gyi bunar bung bang ma ngon/ 
75a8(phal chen): ma rgyal ngas rgya dum dag/ dge pa rla ba skyed paso// mam rgya na pa dang ldan pa'o// dge pa'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ma pas na// lus dang ga
75b1(phal chen): spyod pa kha na thob med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mos pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du gyur pa'o// bsam
75b2(phal chen): ba'i na mkha' yongs su dag pa'o// byang chub kyi sems chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la bltas te/ dga'
75b3(phal chen): ba'i gtam byas nas de la 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhing 'thob par bya ba las kyang brtsams// sangs
75b4(phal chen): rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad shes sbed par bya ba las kyang brtsams sangs rgyas thams cad
75b5(phal chen): kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyan las kyang brtsams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs
75b6(phal chen): kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byang bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsamasasangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam par/ 
75b7(phal chen): phye ba las kyang brtsams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsamasasangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsams te/ 
75b8(phal chen): chos kyang bstan par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dang skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag chos dang 'thun pa'i gtam gyis bstan te/ yang
76a1(phal chen): dag par skul nas slob bskyed de dga' bar byas nas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems paskyed du bcud de/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rnab
76a2(phal chen): yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi ngasam pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan pas byin gyis brlabs te/ ba bar byas nas de nas song ngo // de
76a3(phal chen): nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las/ rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
76a4(phal chen): byang chub tu mos shing brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/  'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshigs su bcad de mngo nga bar bstod to// blo gros chen po mtha' yas spyod yul
76a5(phal chen): tsan/ khyod kyi mthus ni sems can sman slad du// bdag kyang byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur// de la nges pa gang mchis bdag la gson// dga' ba'i chu
76a6(phal chen): bkang 'ongs kyis kun nas bskor// nga rgyal dreg pa'i rab mtho bar brtsegs// sems can lam brgyad sgo rnams bcud cing gdangs// de 'dra'i khyim ni srid gsum ming ldan che// de
76a7(phal chen): ni gti mug ma rigs gzings pas khebs// 'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tu gdungs// rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du gyur// de la byis pa ma rig rten kyang 'cha'/ 
76a8(phal chen): srid pa'i sgog dang zhags pas shin tu glags// g.yo dang sgyu yi skyon gyis tho brtsams shing // the tsom yid gnyis dag gis mig mdongs pa// 'og pa byin phyogs la ma la rab tu zhugs/ 
76b1(phal chen): pra rog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing bcings// yi dgas byol song sems dmyal mo khom d+hu/ rga shinang dang skyengs rab tu mnar// mgo rmongs lam rgyud 'khor lo kun tu 'khor/ 
76b2(phal chen): de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag pa'i/ dkyil 'khor ye shes 'a mer snang ba mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho rnam par shar ta 'phags// nyim 'dra bas padag la snang ba mdzod// byams pa
76b3(phal chen): bsgoms pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs shing nya// bsod nams zla 'od bang ba'i gser 'gyed pa// sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyis// zla ba nyab lta bus bdag snang mdzod// dkar mthu
76b4(phal chen): thams cad yongs bsags bskor mnga' shing // chos dpyid mkha' la chags pa mi mnga' ba// chos kyi 'khor lo/ rin chen sngon 'dren pas// rgyal por gyur pas bdag
76b5(phal chen): la bstan du gsol/ byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthum par ste/ bsod nams ye shes shin tu yang bsags shing / sems can kun la phan pa'i don bzhugs pa'i/ 
76b6(phal chen): ded dpon chen pos bdag kyang bskyang du gsol// bzod pa brtan zhing sra ba'i go mnabs te// ye shes pa shan mang 'thugs rje'i phyag ring bas// bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon
76b7(phal chen): 'gyur bar// dpa' nga chen pos bdag gi sel yang mdzod// chos kyi ri rab spol brtan bzhugs shing // ting nge 'dzin mchog gi lha mos kun nas bskor// nyon mongs sgra gcan lha
76b8(phal chen): min 'dul mdzangad ba// brgya byin gyur pas bdag kyang gzigs su gsol// byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang pa na// nyon mongs las rnams rnam par ngasal ba mkhyen/ 
77a1(phal chen): rgyu mas dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par// me mar 'drangs padag kyang shul bstan gsol/ ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad cing // bde/ 
77a2(phal chen): bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam skyong ba/ 'jig rten kun gyi lam gyi rlung las 'das/ bdag la'ang mar pa'i sgon bstan du gsol// rtag dang bdag dang bde bar 'du shes ldan// 'og
77a3(phal chen): 'dzin ro'i skyabs kyis bcang gyur gyis// bden pa'i ye shes spyan rno mchog mnga' bas// thar slong dag la'ang myur du dbye bar gsol// yang dag log pa'i lam la mkhas gyur cing / 
77a4(phal chen): lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bsnyengs mi mnga'/ lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chung ba/ bdag la bya nga chub shul ni bstan du gsol// yang dag lta ba'i sa'i thang
77a5(phal chen): la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyis bskrun// sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'thod / ba// byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan tu gsol// rgyal
77a6(phal chen): bgang 'das mabyon gang rnams dang // da ltar byung ba'i rgyal ba snang mdzad pa// sems can gcong legs par gshegs pa'i phyogs// de yang lam ston mdzang pas bdag bstan gsol/ 
77a7(phal chen): las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la mi bsnyengs pa// chos thag shing rta'i 'khrul 'khor mkhyen gyur cing // ye shes theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges pa// byang chub theg pa bdag la bshang du gsol// 
77a8(phal chen): chos shing ldan pa'i 'khor lo su khyung can// bded pa rdo rje rdzing rje mug shing rten// dad pa'i gnya' shing rin chen legs sbas pa'i/ byang chub khrig la bdag kyang bskyon du gsel/ 
77b1(phal chen): gzungs rnams kun gyis rnam dag dkyil 'khor can// byams pa brtsegs pa'i dgab pas rab brgyan pa// tha dad yang dag shes pa'i dril 'phreng can// theg mchog bzang pos bdag
77b2(phal chen): la bsdud du gsol// tshangs pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par rgyan// ting nge 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu// chos kyi rnga'i dbyangs chen rab bsgrags pa// theg pa'i dam pas
77b3(phal chen): bdag la bstabs su gsol// bsdu ba bzhi'i mi zad mdzod ldan pa// ye shes rin chen yon tan phreng gis brgyan// khrel yong dul ba'i 'breng bas mchog bsdams pa'i// theg pa'i
77b4(phal chen): dam pa bdag la bstan tu gsol/ sbyin pa'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor bzang po can// tshul khrims can dan dasnying rje'i drug ldan zhing / bzod pa'i gser gyis mtshams
77b5(phal chen): rnams ngam sbyar ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la myur du bdag banag gsol/ sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldeg pa// bsam gtan ting 'jim pa khyer
77b6(phal chen): mthor smon cing // shes rab thabs gnyis 'byor 'thun 'gro rgyu ba'i// chos kyi theg pa mchog la bdag bzhag gsol// smon lam 'khor los lam gyi 'khor sbyong ba// chos kyi
77b7(phal chen): gzugs dam mthu brtan che ldan zhing / ye shes 'khrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas pa'i// chos kyi theg pa de la bdag bskyon gsol// kun tu bzangs po'i spyod pas rab sbyangs shig/ 
77b8(phal chen): sems can ltabs rgyal mardzogs med pa/ kun tu babang po'i spyod pas brtson 'gyur ba'i// ye shes thegangs bdag la bcung du gsol/ de ni brtan pas rdo rje bzhin gnas so/ 
78a1(phal chen): shes sgyums legs sbyangs legs byas shing // sgribs dang chags pa thams cad gcod pa yi// bzang po'i theg la bdag kyang bskyon par gsol// 'gro
78a2(phal chen): mnyam dri med shin du yangs gyur pa// sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub cing // chos dbyings shin tu rgya chen rnam snang ba'i// byang chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// sdug
78a3(phal chen): bsngal phung po rab 'gyur gcod byed pa// nyon mongs las kyi rdul mang sbyong sel cing // bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'jom pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// gas
78a4(phal chen): rnams kun tu ye shes rab snang ba/ chos dbyings nam pa/ rnam par grub byed cing // sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed cing // chos kyi thegs la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ 
78a5(phal chen): rnam dag mkha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa// sred dang ma rig lta ba'i skyon med cing // sems can kun la phan par rab gnas pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ 
78a6(phal chen): rlung chen langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan pas// smon lam mthu yis 'jig rten kun 'dzin cing // zhi ba'i gnas rab kun sar skyel byed pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol/ 
78a7(phal chen): sa tshan gzhi'i stobs kyi stobs ldan pa// snying rje'i mthu dang shugs kyis khur khyer zhing // ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho ba'i// theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// nyi ma lta
78a8(phal chen): bur 'gro ba nyar 'tsho zhing // bsdu ba rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can// gzungs kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzangs pa'i// ye shes nyi ma bdag la bston tu gsol// bskal
78b1(phal chen): bamang po du mar rab skabs pa// rgyu'i tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa// gang gis 'dus byas grong khyer gzhom 'gyur ba'i// shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la sprul du gsol// 
78b2(phal chen): sangs rgyas legs kun bslab pa phun sum gyis// ye shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la// tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mangs bslabs gyur pa// de legs ci 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal
78b3(phal chen): gsol// gang na yang dag spyan mnga' khyod bzhugs shing // ye shes rgyal po'i cod pan legs brgyan te// chos kyi dbu thong dam pas dbu bcings pa'i// chos kyi rgyal po'i pho brang
78b4(phal chen): bdag kyang ston// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// glang po'i lha sbyangs kyis bltas te// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// 
78b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de// dge pa bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing // byang chub sems
78b6(phal chen): dpa'i lam yongs su rdzogs par 'dod de// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri bar bsam pa legs so leg so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bsten
78b7(phal chen): pa dang // rim gror bya ba 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su grub par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te// 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyis// rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bkur bas yongs su
78b8(phal chen): maskyo bar gyis shog/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa// 'jigs pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par gyi// ji ltar nan tan du bgyi// ji ltar bya
79a1(phal chen): chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams par bgyi// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la spyad par bgyi/
