105b1(phal chen): dpon btang brjod de ltar snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bur gnas par gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom
105b2(phal chen): ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas 'od rnam par dag pa dang bcas
105b3(phal chen): sngon spyod pa la bzhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas smon lam gyi tshogs dang bcasaspyod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa
105b4(phal chen): dang bcas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab yongs su ston pa dang bcasachos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcasasems can yongs su smin
105b5(phal chen): par mdzad pa dang bcas chos kyi mu'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongs su chud cing / 'dus par snang ste de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres pa dang / 
105b6(phal chen): phan tshun mchod pa dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang / tshul sna tshogs su bzhugs pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
105b7(phal chen): du rnam par dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas
105b8(phal chen): kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs su yongs su ston par snang ngo // theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang / smon lam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi
106a1(phal chen): khams la lan ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo // la lan ni dga' ldan gyi po brang nas 'pho ba dang
106a2(phal chen): la lan ni sum gyi spun bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs yongs su ston pa dang la lan ni skye ba dang / la lan ni byis pa'i rtsed mo ston pa mdzad pa dang / la lan ni rkun mo
106a3(phal chen): pa 'tsham rang sa salan nam na par gru malatshan snang ba byang chu chug shegs te rnam par 'phrul ba'i rgyan chen gyis bdu sdibs par mang pa' @
106a4(phal chen): na ni lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri bas yongs su cing mangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol dpa gdab pa dang / la lanani chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba
106a5(phal chen): mdzad pa dang la lan ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang la lan ni yongs su myangan las 'da' bar snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams la lan ni/ 
106a6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyi ring bsrel rnams par 'god par snang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lan ni lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis
106a7(phal chen): grub pa byed par snang ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sems can gyi ris rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi
106a8(phal chen): lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rlung rnam pa tha dad pa dang
106b1(phal chen): semams ca ma rnam ma tha pa dang / sems sa kyilasam pa'i chung mapa la dang ba dang semams kyi mos pa'ichud rnam pa ma dang pa dang semams kya #
106b2(phal chen): rgyud rnam pa pa dad pa dang dus kyi rgyung rnam pa tha dad pa dang sems can gyi las kyi bye drag rnam pa pa dang pa dang sems can gyi las mi mthun pa rnam pa tha dang pa dang
106b3(phal chen): sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pa tha dad padang sems can gyi tshul las dang spyong pa rnam pa pa dang pal rnam par spyong pa dang sems can rgya mchobs ma pa dang
106b4(phal chen): sbyor ba'i rnam pa thangang pa dang / dbang po mo mthun bsnga datshogs rnam par dag pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang ngag dachags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar gyur ba'i sems can 'byam
106b5(phal chen): klas pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang / yum sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang dbyangs kyi yan lag dang
106b6(phal chen): gsung rnam pa sna tshogs su bsgrub pa dang / mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu brjod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i rgyud dang / tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul gyi gzhung
106b7(phal chen): sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang seng ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pa dang / sems
106b8(phal chen): can gyi dge ba'i rtsab sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yongs su bstan pa dang / dran pa sgo sna tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa'i
107a1(phal chen): nga ga de ban ga shes pa rnam kya' rnamapas byung brnas pacwa chogs kyi 'am bya la 'ams 'ad
107a2(phal chen): meng ba/ mtha'amam par rnam pa pa dang ban rung mchong ba dang / rnam par dag pa'i 'kho dkyil 'khor sna tshogs yangs pa dang / 'khor kyang kyim 'tsho shin
107a3(phal chen): babarnas pa dang dngag na gcigs chang tsam da ngag chad bcu'i mang tsam dang / dpag chang ba cu'i chang cam nas/ 'khor kyang kyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sas
107a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tus dbarnyed kyi chung tsam du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / dkris de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsungs dbyangs kyis
107a5(phal chen): lag dang smanang thams cad kyi rjes su 'grengs chos ji snyed du bstan pa de dag thams cad tshod dben gyi no ngas kyim thos so// blangs so// yang / 
107a6(phal chen): bar bzung ngo // bsams so// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba de dag kyang mthong ngo // de nas cho
107a7(phal chen): dpon btang rjong dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs nasatshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
107a8(phal chen): thar pa/ thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongs su blangs shing 'dzin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing
107b1(phal chen): dpyod pa'i tshe/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'jam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i
107b2(phal chen): dbang phyug rgyal po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po las sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu/ 
107b3(phal chen): bcugs pa'ang mig la mdu snang ngo // lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyi shugs dang ldan pan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
107b4(phal chen): rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs/ 
107b5(phal chen): gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
107b6(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar me'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i sems la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / 
107b7(phal chen): thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ngur smig rgyal mtshan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
107b8(phal chen): rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'dul ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa
108a1(phal chen): du rgya marnams kyi ma kham mamaca sa sa nang sa segs pa ma
108a2(phal chen): bang dag par rdzogs 'i sangs rgyum mang migs pa'i spyan rnam parang rigs pa shes byung byang chub sems dnga'ang migs pa med par shin tu stsal pa lamags pa byang
108a3(phal chen): sems dpa' 'khor kyang kyil lakho thams cad dang thab mi gcig tu bzhugs pa yang rlog lam du sna // shar ster phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams smos kyi 'ad per rab tu snang ba ni
108a4(phal chen): de bzhin ga shegs pa gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i de sangs rgyas thos kyi mar mi zhes bya ba byang mu sems dang chos kyi dbyings kyima'i tha dad pa'i dpal gyi rgyal
108a5(phal chen): po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor/ gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bcugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // lho nub kyi phyogs
108a6(phal chen): mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i 'od zer ltar snang ban de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgro gan nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs shes
108a7(phal chen): bya ba byang chub sems dpa' me tog gi 'od kun nas 'gro bar gtsug lung rab tu 'phyang ba la sogs pabyang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thabs
108a8(phal chen): gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig gi lam du snang ngo // nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ongs pa dge ba'i snying po na de bzhin gshegs pa dag
108b1(phal chen): bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshang med pa'i 'od ces bya babyang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'ong zer thogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po zla thos la sogs pa
108b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i seng ge'i snang zhing 'bar ba na/ 
108b3(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'ong 'phro zhing rnam par snang
108b4(phal chen): bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // steng gi
108b5(phal chen): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshan gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par
108b6(phal chen): thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thogs pa med pa'i blo gros la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
108b7(phal chen): 'khor thams cad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa yang mig lam du snang ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs
108b8(phal chen): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir mi byon kho bo yang der 'gro ba
109a1(phal chen): med de/ nam 'dod bden bde pa yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa'od snang mtha' yas bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // 
109a2(phal chen): ngan med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'ong srung rdo rje bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo / rlos du yong ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs/ 
109a3(phal chen): nga'od snang rin cher bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // pang mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung rin chen bang mo bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // gser
109a4(phal chen): yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin nga gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // // mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin
109a5(phal chen): gshegs pa mi sprul pa bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // shin tu btan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // 
109a6(phal chen): long gi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros zla ba bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // rin chen dpal gyi ngang pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi
109a7(phal chen): khams na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa yang mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang
109a8(phal chen): gang gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo // dus gsum gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyong ba
109b1(phal chen): gang nga gang gis de ban du gshegs pa mthong bar 'dong ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba gang dang gang gdon dang sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gdon du de bzhin gshegs pa
109b2(phal chen): gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no// 
109b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa rnams galas kyang byon pa med par shes la gang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
109b4(phal chen): rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam lta bur shes la rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu bar shes pa dang / de bzhin
109b5(phal chen): gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes pa dang / 
109b6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu mas byas pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgyu ma lta bur shes
109b7(phal chen): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung yang sgra brnyan ri'i brag ca lta bur brjod par shes la rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa yang sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas
109b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs las byung ngo zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs shing khong du chud ngo // sangs rgyas kyi
110a1(phal chen): gang yongs smra ga rnams rang ga sems kyi rgyun gyis / byang chub sems dpa spyo pa yang gi sems
110a2(phal chen): tho rlabs so// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyis rlabs so// byang chub sems dnga'i sgron lam mngon par/ 
110a3(phal chen): bsgrubs pa yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba sang rang gi sems kyi byon gyi rlabs so// rnam par thar babasam gyis mi khyab bas
110a4(phal chen): rnam par bye ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so//  sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab sang / rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// cho
110a5(phal chen): dadrangs kun nas 'dus par khyamachog gi mthu 'byung zhing rnam par 'phrul ba yang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// bskal ba thams cad shin tu phra bar bsdu ba'i ye shes kyang ra
110a6(phal chen): gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// zhes bya bar khong du chud cing rjes su rtogs so// rigs kyi bu de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis ni rang gi sems nyid
110a7(phal chen): nye bar brtan par bya'o// chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su brnyan par bya'o// sgrib pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// brtson
110a8(phal chen): 'grus kyis ni rang gi sems nyid brtan par bya'o// bzod pas ni rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o// ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems nyid gzhol bar bya'o// 
110b1(phal chen): shes rab kyis ni rang gi sems nyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// rnam par dbang rnams la ni rang gi sems nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa nyid la ni rang gi sems
110b2(phal chen): nyid rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyas ni rang gi sems nyid snang bar bya'o// snyam mi// rigs kyi bu la bo na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par bar thogs
110b3(phal chen): pa med pa'i rgyan 'di shes te/ blangs shing yongs su 'dzin par mang na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chags med par rnam
110b4(phal chen): par spyod pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ mya ngan las 'da' ba med pa'i
110b5(phal chen): mtha' la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du/ gyur pa/ gzhi kun nas phyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod/ 
110b6(phal chen): yul gyi tshul shes pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul tha mi dang bal rnam par sbyong ba phyogs thams cad du mngon par
110b7(phal chen): phyogs pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ phyin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs cing 'du bar snang yang / de dag la/ 
110b8(phal chen): bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rlung 'di nyid kyi
111a1(phal chen): 'jam bu'i gling gi mgo gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba yod de den dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gas de'i gan
111a2(phal chen): du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyong pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
111a3(phal chen): kyis tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la skyongs phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon btang rjod la lan brgya stong du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas
111a4(phal chen): tshong dpon btang rjod kyi yon tan grangs med pa la snyan par brjod de brtag pa dang / mos par bya ba dang / dmi gtang bar bya ba sems shing ngu ste/ smre sngags bco/ 
111a5(phal chen): nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang / dge
111a6(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang mi 'ga' bar byed pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus par rjes su lta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes
111a7(phal chen): su bsam pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams
111a8(phal chen): gnod pa thams cad yongs su spong bar byed pas ma tsam du semasadage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su skyed pas pa tsam du sems shing tshong dpon btang rjod kyi drung nas song ngo // 
111b1(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bdangs tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing tshong dpon btang brjod kyi gdams ngag la nan tan bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i
111b2(phal chen): rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su dran par bya ba dang chos kyi dbyings la
111b3(phal chen): 'jug cing 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang / de
111b4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su blta bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya
111b5(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rjes su sbyangab dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang
111b6(phal chen): khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa la bsgribs pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang / byang chub
111b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i las la bsam pa shin tu brtan pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i las dang smon lam gyi rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su spyod cing / mthar kyis/ 
111b8(phal chen): 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gebs pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan tshol tshol ba las 'chag pa'i gnas shig gi/ 'chag sa'i
112a1(phal chen): mthar 'dug ste ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhag nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med cing mi g.yol/ byed pa med cing lus drang por
112a2(phal chen): bsrang ste/ dran pa mngon du byas nas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing / g.yas g.yon dang steng logs su lus mtha' yas la/ tshad med cing bsam
112a3(phal chen): gyis mi khyab pa/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/ kha dog du ma'i lus dang ldan pa sems kyi skad cig re re la kha dog rnams pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab
112a4(phal chen): la zhi ste/ g.yo ba med cing dmigs pa med la/ dga' bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa
112a5(phal chen): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'gyed pa byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can thams cad yongs su
112a6(phal chen): smin par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal
112a7(phal chen): gyi phung po rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan song gi lam thams cad yongs su bcang ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs
112a8(phal chen): pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i sgrib pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod pa'i phyir rnam par
112b1(phal chen): 'phrul pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pas chos kyi dbyangs thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur sti dang / 
112b2(phal chen): rim gro sna tshogs byed pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i yul la spyong pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus
112b3(phal chen): shin tu klubs pa/ thor tshugs dang gtsug gi rin po che dang / cod pan sna tshogs thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ byis pa bye ba 'phyes pa'i
112b4(phal chen): 'khor dang ldan par 'byung ba mthong ngo // bram ze dang khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang / ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sbyar ba thams cad dang / rgyan thams cad dang / 
112b5(phal chen): gos thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phreng ba thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang // rin
112b6(phal chen): po che thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / snod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang / yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongs su sdud cing / 'gro ba sdug bsngal
112b7(phal chen): ba rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang / sems can gyi sems tshim par bya ba dang / sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed cing / 
112b8(phal chen): phyogs bcu bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // pus mo'i lha nga gnyis nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzug
113a1(phal chen): dang / bapo m+b+ha tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang mi gro ba'i chung rnam ngas pa'i gzugs dang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das
113a2(phal chen): pa la kyi tshul dang dus la gas lad mangs pa'i gdugs 'jig rte gyi blang nga du bya ba mkhas pa'i gdugs mabyung rnam pa dram dang ldan 'bas
113a3(phal chen): rnam pa du ma dang ldanan yang du bong da'i tshig mang po brjod pas mi mi ba pa'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byed cing chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags
113a4(phal chen): ba dang / drug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams pa bar bya dadang / logs par ltung ba'i sems can rnams mngon dbar gangon pa dang / theg pa 'phrul nyam nyes su zur
113a5(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dazungs pa dang 'gas pa'i sems ca rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang // ba'i chu ba'i sA kun tu grag par bya ba dang / sdig pa las/ 
113a6(phal chen): bzlog pa'i sgra yongs su bsgrags pa dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa la sems can gzung ba dang don spyad pa la sems can dgod pa dang dga' ba'i shugs/ 
113a7(phal chen): yongs su bskyed par snyan par smra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su brjod pa dang 'jig rten langon thun par bsgrub pa ston par byed cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang
113a8(phal chen): ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus dbyangs su 'khong ba lpags pa dang / shun pa'i gos gyon pa ril pardzogs
113b1(phal chen): ba gzugs dang byang nga bas sna tshogs na spyod las rab tu ni bdag byung nas steng gi par snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod cing chos
113b2(phal chen): sna yongs su bsgrag par sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su bsten pa dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su brjod pa
113b3(phal chen): dang / dbang po dben pa la sems can gong pa dang rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang / ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rab tu dgong pa dang / 'jig rten
113b4(phal chen): gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul ngarab tu bstan pa dang / mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems
113b5(phal chen): can rab tu dgod pa byed cing phyogs bcu bkang / ste 'dong ba mthong ngo // rtsib legs gnyis nasaklu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgyu ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa
113b6(phal chen): lus kyi dbyibs pasam gyi mi khyab pa dum dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang / spos kyi sngon gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa na mkha'
113b7(phal chen): dbyings la byin gyis brlab pa dang / me tog gi sprin gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam pa'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyangs thams cad
113b8(phal chen): rnam par grub pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis
114a1(phal chen): mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang rin po che lha'i ba dan gyi smin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang rin po che'i byung bral sna tshogs kyi ston dang char bsam gyis mi khyab
114a2(phal chen): pa'i rgyun dang / nor bu rin po che dam pa'i sprin gyi char 'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun dang rin po che'i sen mong sna tshogs dang mi tog gi sprin gyi bsam gyis mo khyab pa'i rgyan dang
114a3(phal chen): rin po che'i khril dkyil mo dkrung du 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyun lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / 
114a4(phal chen): ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi gru sman pa'o sgrang dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'bengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang rin po che'i pad mo ze ba mthob/ mu tig gi drangs
114a5(phal chen): brgyan pa rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bru'i sprin gyi char rnam par 'thor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che'i cod pan gyi sprin nor bu rin po che
114a6(phal chen): thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa 'od zer gyi sprin mtha' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang lha'i lus kyi sprin gyi me tog dang phreng ba dang / 
114a7(phal chen): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang / lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin thal mo sbyar te/ gser gyi me tog snyim pas 'thor ba/ de bzhin gshegs
114a8(phal chen): pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams cad du bstod pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nam pa'i dbyings la byin gyis rlob cing / spos kyi phung po'i
114b1(phal chen): rnon rin po chernams dang gul dog du dug pa dang / bdug smos kyi nabun dang sgron shin tu rtsa che bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang kyil 'bor la 'a bar mngon par lengs pa
114b2(phal chen): bye ba dang / 'ag rten gyi khams byamams pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad mchong bas/ nang kyi
114b3(phal chen): skad cig tu chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // thong ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
114b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed drung ste/ lha ma yin gyi sgras rnam bar 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing / chu 'dzin chen po yongs su bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten
114b5(phal chen): gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang ri'i rgyal po chen po thams cad 'thab par bya ba dang / lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyob pa dang / bdud kyi dkyil
114b6(phal chen): 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang / nga rgyal dang rlom pa dang / dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang / gnod par sems dpa'i sems
114b7(phal chen): bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang / tho mtshams pa'i sems phyir bzlog par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i ri rnam par
114b8(phal chen): gtor bar bya ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i thab mo shin tu zhi bar bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rnam par rtse ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya bas/ 
115a1(phal chen): sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang / 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyung thams cad nas gyen du bskyong de gnas med pa la rab tu
115a2(phal chen): gnas par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang / 
115a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu dgod par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
115a4(phal chen): tshul snang ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / chos kyi tshul rnam dpar dgod pa sna tshogs kyis/ sems kyi skad cig ra re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong
115a5(phal chen): dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // rgyab kyi gzhung nas/ nyan thos dang // rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyang byung
115a6(phal chen): nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnams la/ bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa yongs su rjod pa byed cing // rtag par
115a7(phal chen): mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dod chags kyi spyod pa can rnams la mi sdug pa dang zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la/ byams pa dang / 
115a8(phal chen): gti mug gi spyod pa rnams la rkyen las 'byung ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung brjod pa dang / cha mnyam pa'i spyod pa can rnams la/ ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par
115b1(phal chen): bstan pa dang yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas med pa rab tu brjod pa dang zhi ba la gnas su sems pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang / phyogs
115b2(phal chen): kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sems can thams cad kyi don du brjod pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
115b3(phal chen): kyis mthong ngo // phrag pa'i lhun gnyis las gnod sbyin dang srin po'i dbang po'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan zhing lus mi sdug pa dang / kha dog dang chu
115b4(phal chen): zheng sna tshogs can spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa sna tshogs la zhon pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongasu bskor ba sems can gyi khams
115b5(phal chen): yongs su bskyang ba la rtson pa 'od sna tshogs kyis snang / bar bya ba la brtson pa dbyangs sna tshogs rab tu sgrog/ pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa rdul shin tu phra ba
115b6(phal chen): snyed byung nas thabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dres pas/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kun gyi na mkha' rgyas par 'gengs shing / dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang // 
115b7(phal chen): 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / lag na rdo rje'i las kyis yang dag par song ba dang / 
115b8(phal chen): yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngan song gi
116a1(phal chen): lam gyi rgyung thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa/ 
116a2(phal chen): sems can gyi don byabs 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / 
116a3(phal chen): pas kyi rgol ba'i 'khor char gcod pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mdun gyi ltonas
116a4(phal chen): mi'am ci'i dbang po// sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skyed// mi 'am ci'i dbang po dbu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa can dang / dri za'i
116a5(phal chen): dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu zla ba steng dri za'i dbang po'i bu mo 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa na dag byung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i snga
116a6(phal chen): snyan pa dang glu'i dbyangs kyis chos kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstod pa brjod pa byed cing / byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa
116a7(phal chen): spyod pa yongs su brjod pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i sgo thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lob sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i
116a8(phal chen): sgo thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang / 
116b1(phal chen): sems can gyi sgo thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang / sgrib
116b2(phal chen): pa'i sgo thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su bskyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong
116b3(phal chen): ngo&/ kha'i sgo nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po/ rin po che bdun dang ldan zhing / stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas// sbyin pa chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyan
116b4(phal chen): rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs dasu gtang ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dang / dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba dang / 
116b5(phal chen): srog gcod pa las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / byams pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dpral ba dang / rgyan gyis shin
116b6(phal chen): tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su gtang ba dang // 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang // tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod pa dang brdzun du smra ba las rnam
116b7(phal chen): par bzlog pa dang / slu ba med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang / phra ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang // gzhan 'dum par brtson pa'i cho ga rab tu brjod pa dang // zhe gcong po'i tshig las
116b8(phal chen): 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang // 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang // gnod pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang rgyal du sgru ba las/ sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / don zab
117a1(phal chen): mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gdon mi za ba las yang dag par dgod pa dang / ngag ginyis pa thams cad las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang / snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig tu brjod
117a2(phal chen): par bya ba dang / 'dzi rten gyi snying gi dri ma yongs su sel cing // 'dod pa chung ba dang // chog shes pa la brtson par sems can rab tu dgod pa dang // chags sems las 'jig rten rnam par brjod/ 
117a3(phal chen): pa dang gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang // lta ba'i dra ba thams cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang // yid gnyis kyi rab thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang / 
117a4(phal chen): choms kyi sgo thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dod // nem nurang som nyi'i rab rib yongs su bskul ba dang // chos rnamadapar dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang / rkyen las byung / 
117a5(phal chen): ba rab tu rjong pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang // sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang // sgrib pa med pa'i tshul la gzung ba dang / 
117a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs brjod pa byed cing // phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mig gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya
117a7(phal chen): stong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing // 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang // sems
117a8(phal chen): can rnams kyi gti mug gi rab rib sel ba dang / grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyi grangs pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang // sa'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams
117b1(phal chen): su 'ong kha dog dkar po can rab tu 'gyed pa dang // gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong bai dUr+ya'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong gser gyi kha dog
117b2(phal chen): can rab tu 'gyed pa dang dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gser gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong shel gyi kha dog can rab tu
117b3(phal chen): 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang asma gar ba'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong gser gyi kha dog
117b4(phal chen): can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / gser gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing / rnams su 'od a sma gar nga'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa'o// // in dra nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i
117b5(phal chen): rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed do// rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i in dra nI la'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang
117b6(phal chen): mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od
117b7(phal chen): gzer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong rin po che sna
117b8(phal chen): tshogs kyi khadog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'ong rin po che gcig gi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
118a1(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // 
118a2(phal chen): smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nasalha'i dbang po thams cad zil gyis gnon cing / 'jig rten thams cad
118a3(phal chen): kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags par byed cing / sems can tshad med pa gdul ba las brtson par phyogs bcu'i
118a4(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // 'phral ba nas tshangs pa chen po spyod lam rab tu zhi ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snad
118a5(phal chen): byung nas tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba byed cing sems can gyi don
118a6(phal chen): tshad med pa la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // mgo nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i
118a7(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs kyis/ brgyan pa'i lus yongs su ston cing / dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa'i lus rab tu bstan pa dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ 
118a8(phal chen): sprin mtha' dang dpung med pa rab tu dgye ba dang // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste// gtong ba dang len pa dang / dngos po yongs su
118b1(phal chen): gtang ba'i rnam pa'i sprin mang po rab tu dgye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang // sbyin pa'i spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang ser sna'i
118b2(phal chen): dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang chags pa thams cad spang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan kyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang / sbyin pa'i
118b3(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung ba'i rgyu ston pa byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub
118b4(phal chen): sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed byung nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas
118b5(phal chen): thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang / semasacan thams cad lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par
118b6(phal chen): byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par smad pa dang / 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling tog rnam par bskul ba dang / log
118b7(phal chen): pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par dgod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul khrims yongs su brjod cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
118b8(phal chen): tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod
119a1(phal chen): cing / rmi lam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir/ yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang / nyon mongs pa la dbang sgyur ba sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa
119a2(phal chen): byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ 'jig rten rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bur mngon par ston cing / khro ba
119a3(phal chen): med pa dang / khrug pa med pa dang / shar gnyer ba med pa dang / zhe sdang ba med pa dang / chung smon pa med pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / byol song
119a4(phal chen): gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i phyir 8/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu
119a5(phal chen): 'gyed cing / bzod pa'i stobs la sems can rab tu dgod/ pa dang / chos la dbang bsgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang bar byed pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs
119a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs mtha' yas pa shin tu ston cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las/ 
119a7(phal chen): phyir mi ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal bas mi skyo bar bya bar yongs su brjod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing rim gro bya ba la sems can rab
119a8(phal chen): gzung ba/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'arlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rab tu dgong ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi rom tshutshun pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi
119b1(phal chen): sbyor ba mang po'i sprin lus thams cad las rab tu 'gyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang / sems rnams kyi le lo'i ri rnam
119b2(phal chen): par gtor ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang las la dbang sgyur ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzung ba dang / rgyun mi chad pa brtson par byed pa mtho
119b3(phal chen): ngota/ yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa'i lam la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod cing sgrib pa dang
119b4(phal chen): bar du gcod pa dang rab rib thams cad rnam par bskul ba dang / rlom pa dang bag med pa thams cad las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang / bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod
119b5(phal chen): pa dang / khengs pa 'gying ba dang nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan rab tu gzhom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyiyan lag rgya mtsho brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams langs/ 
119b6(phal chen): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / sems can la dbang
119b7(phal chen): sgyur ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa byed cing / skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin
119b8(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ ba spu'i bug thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho
120a1(phal chen): sa thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sa sgrog pa dang / yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'byeng ba dang / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi
120a2(phal chen): dbyangs rab tu bsgrag pa dang sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ro'i lhan rab tu gzhog pa dang lta ba thams cad kyi thug rdung byung ba dang / the tsom dang yod gnyis dang nem nur gyi rab
120a3(phal chen): rab rnam par bskul pa dang / ye shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs
120a4(phal chen): rgyas kyo zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu brjod pa byed cing / bcu'i bug thams cad
120a5(phal chen): nas thabs mangs pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i spon rab tu dbye ba dang / 'jig rten rnams la thabs mabs pa' spong bar 'atu brjod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i 'drung
120a6(phal chen): ban pa rtan pa ra brgyas thams ca kya grol 'am yang dag par brtags pa dang / 'phang ba dang / myangan las 'das pam mi pa'i byang chub mas dngab byung pa
120a7(phal chen): su bstan pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / 'jig rten rnams la byang chub sems dpa'o dbang gi kyi
120a8(phal chen): 'barab tu bstan babyed nga sems byed pa re re la chos kyi byung ma rgyas par 'angs pa yong ngo // yang byang chub mas dpa' sangs rgyam gyi nang zangs med pa'i rdum shir byang/ 
120b1(phal chen): bsnyed byung ste ba spu'i bug thams cad nasade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing ba spu'i bug thams cad nas byang chub sems
120b2(phal chen): dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsngags pa dang
120b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang smon lam chen pore shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril ba/ chos thams cad
120b4(phal chen): kyi rjes su 'brang ba nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing smon lam sna tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/ 
120b5(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gangs pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mang ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung ste/ 
120b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang ba bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sgra rab tu byung ba dang // ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin
120b7(phal chen): pa sgrub cing 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dgye ba dang / bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang / khor yug dang rdo rje'i ri thams/ 
120b8(phal chen): cad lus kyi steng du rdib kyang minyam pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang / bskal pas 'tshig pa thams cad kyi me rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa med pa'i stobs yongs
121a1(phal chen): su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis rnam pa'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobs yongs su ston pa byed cing
121a2(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'gengs pa rgyun mi gcod pa mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sted byung nas
121a3(phal chen): sems can rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston cing / ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu/ 
121a4(phal chen): 'gyeng ba dang 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan dang ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang / sangs
121a5(phal chen): rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang / smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan
121a6(phal chen): pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brjod pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis shin tu yangs par
121a7(phal chen): bya ba dang sems can thams cad bdag med pa'i rang bzhin la gzung ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya
121a8(phal chen): mtsho rnam par blta ba mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rab tu brjod pa dang sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
121b1(phal chen): kyis sa dung dbye ba dang semams thams cad kyibasam 'dus chos parnam par blta ba'i ye shes mngon par shes pa nga ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yang ngan par brjod par
121b2(phal chen): rnams can thams cad kyilas rgya mchol 'jug par ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol ba dang sems canathams cad ston mas rgya mchom 'jug pa
121b3(phal chen): shes mngon pa du shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su brgyan pa byed cing sems pa skang cig ra la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tsho dpon gyi bu nor babangs kyis tho // 
121b4(phal chen): gargyan che gyib semamasade bzhin sathus sa rgyam gyon mangs med pa'i'adzum mi tha ste mnan sa pa dab tung pa dang ma
121b5(phal chen): ga ma brgyan ma T+Ta nA sas rdzi ma shi byung bar bldang la la phyogs bcu sa pa me #
121b6(phal chen): chos kyi byung sa chum gyis rnam par 'gengs pa'i byangs ma 'a sas rgyas kyi rnam par 'dus pa mapa' dang drang med pa yongs su ston padang / 'gro ba tha
121b7(phal chen): cangs pa medad par chos kyi sna kyi chang mngon par 'debs pate/ 'di ltar byang ba byang chub mchog tu phrin pa'i byung chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi chu
121b8(phal chen): gzho bye brag mngon sum du shes pa'i smin ces bya ba 'tshas kyi sngon gyi char mngo bar dbab pa dang byang chub poms dpa'adabang gyur thob pa rnams la gzhosu
122a1(phal chen): rten pa'i smon ces bya ba'i chos kyi sngon gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang byang chub sems dang 'chos chen po rgyal chabadu dang bskur brnamapa pa
122a2(phal chen): sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sngon gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbang
122a3(phal chen): pa dang byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang byang chub sems dpa'
122a4(phal chen): lhag pa'i bsam pa dag pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang debazhin gyi bye brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
122a5(phal chen): sngon gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba/ yongs su sdud pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems
122a6(phal chen): dpa' cher skyes pa rnams la dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang byang chub sems dpa
122a7(phal chen): rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
122a8(phal chen): las dang po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thabs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed
122b1(phal chen): pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang byang chub sems dpa' yangs pal mos pa rnams la rnam
122b2(phal chen): par thar pa la rnam par thar pa mi zad pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang gzugs
122b3(phal chen): la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams la tshul rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i
122b4(phal chen): 'brug sgra'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon bar dbab pa dang dbang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byung ba'i chos kyi yo byad mi zad pa'i mdzod
122b5(phal chen): ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag
122b6(phal chen): par bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams la ye shes kyi rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin
122b7(phal chen): gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab
122b8(phal chen): pa dang / mche ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas
123a1(phal chen): dbang po ga de bzhin ga shegs pa banas cad kyi chos yang dag par 'gro bzhes byang 'i chos kyi smin gyim mngan dbang bya nga mam rdzun ma
123a2(phal chen): kyi tshul rje'i kyil 'khar ces bya ba chos kyi sbyichar mngon par dbabapa ngo / rnam pakyang gi dbang ba gnas snang bzhinas shegs pa thams
123a3(phal chen): cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi sbyin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sngon gyim mngon par dpa' ba dang mi'amargyadabang po gnas su chos kyi dz+nyAn yang dag par 'gro ba thamapa
123a4(phal chen): cad kyi dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi smin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang klu'i dbang por gnas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par phrul pa rnaMn cing dza pa'i lam gyi rlungs sa/ 
123a5(phal chen): spyong skyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin mi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lho phye chen po'i dbang po'i gnas su drug 'ab rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos
123a6(phal chen): smin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang pa dang / 
123b1(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab
123b2(phal chen): pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhun ces
123b3(phal chen): bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad
123b4(phal chen): kyi gtong ba'i sems 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / sems can log par lhung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas/ 
123b5(phal chen): dbugs dbyung ba'i dbyangs kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing / chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
123b6(phal chen): mthong ngo // ba spu'i bug thams cad las baspu'i sgor re nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor kha dog dang gzugs kyi glong dang rgyan grangs med pa can// dgos pa sna tshogs
123b7(phal chen): grangs med pa la sta gon du gnas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar ba spu'i sgo'i
123b8(phal chen): 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni sbyin pa'i spyod pa skyon med pas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang dkyil
124a1(phal chen): 'khor la la las nA dmugs sa kyi byang chub sems dpa 'jams sa kyi tshul khrims dang brtus drugapayang yang chu thamamam
124a2(phal chen): nam ma sa ga ya ma mams me byed pa ma pa gyu / thamams ma ma ma @
124a3(phal chen): nas ga sa mas cang pa mam pa che sa pa bya pa gyi ma sa byas gas
124a4(phal chen): thamam tsu chu ma ma rgya gas pa u nas mam mas / 
124b1(phal chen): ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang rgya mtsho yongs su bskyam pa dang sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang / 
124b2(phal chen): mu stegs can thams cad yongs su char gcad pa dang bdud thams cad spa dkong ba dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa
124b3(phal chen): mthong ngo // baspu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod ba rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyed pa dang // lus
124b4(phal chen): nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang / rigs su skye ba yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / gzugs kyi lus yongs dasu grub pa ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes
124b5(phal chen): su bstan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi
124b6(phal chen): yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang 'thun pa'i gtsug lag dang gnas dang gzhal med khang dang yul dang ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su
124b7(phal chen): bsgrub pa'i drang srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang / rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang // brtul zhugs dang / yi dam dang / tshul dang / 
124b8(phal chen): spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
125a1(phal chen): myong pa la rnam par spyod cing chos thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung ba mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig na
125a2(phal chen): don du yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang rim gro dang bkur sti thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes
125a3(phal chen): gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang dad pa dang sri zhus lus rab tu btung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang / chos kyi tshig
125a4(phal chen): gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byung ba'i lus thams cad
125a5(phal chen): kyis yongs su btsal ba de de dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi dru nor bzangs kyis baspu'i sgo'i gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor las mthong ngo // 
125a6(phal chen): baspu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang / dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam
125a7(phal chen): klas pas sems can thams cad yongs su brngu ba'i sbyor ba mthong ngo // sems can re re la yang lus dang spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa/ 
125a8(phal chen): la brtson pa sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa yang baspu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i
125b1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor lal las na sngon gyi bcom ldan 'das kyis brgal bathams cad du sngon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i myong ba dang / sems can thams cad ba/ 
125b2(phal chen): su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa'i snyed pa dang / smon lam thams
125b3(phal chen): cang mngon par bsgrubs pa'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi drung du 'khor ba'i skyon thams cad las 'khor ba'i skyon so so re re'i gnyen por mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad
125b4(phal chen): bde dag thams cad kyang tshong dpon gyi bu nor dbazangs kyis baspu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi du ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo // baM s+phu'i sgrom
125b5(phal chen): 'ong zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo'i 'ong bar gyi
125b6(phal chen): ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las ni ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyub thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can sad par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi spyor/ 
125b7(phal chen): brgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sems shing rtog pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par
125b8(phal chen): thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi tshul
126a1(phal chen): dag par bya dang mngon par 'ang bya na d+hA rgyal mngon du mas pa rdzun po'i rjem su thung nang yong du chun par bya ba dang / 
126a2(phal chen): kyang dngas kyi rgyan rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par byung dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs yang dag par mnod pa'i ye shes de la rab tu brtag pa dod byang chub
126a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs de brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyong pa'i stobs shin tu rgyas par
126a4(phal chen): bya ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no// nyin zhog gnyis dang bdun yang lon no// zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig
126a5(phal chen): dang to zla ba gnyis dang / zla ba drug gi bar dang / nyin/ zhag kyang drug tu dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang / nyin zhag drug
126a6(phal chen): 'das nas// dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// de nas nor bzangs kyis smras pa// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar zab la de ltar rgya che zhing de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i
126a7(phal chen): yul dang ldan pa/ de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang de ltar snang ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dngade ltar mi
126a8(phal chen): 'phrog pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pa dang / de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang de ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don tshad ma
126b1(phal chen): mchis pa rab tu sgrub pa ni ngo mtshar de nas sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po chang ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la stogon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar/ 
126b2(phal chen): dbul ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas so// sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyis rgyud rgyun gcad pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su
126b3(phal chen): bskyab pa dang mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad bcad pa dang mtho ras kyi lam gyi chung tu phyin par bgyi bdong / lha da ma'i dga' ba dang bango 'byung bar bgyi ba dang
126b4(phal chen): bsam gtan gyi yul gyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba da / 'dus byas la spyong ba'i bde ba yongs su 'phel bar bgyi/ dab dang / khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su
126b5(phal chen): bstan pa la sa gon du gnas pa'o// byang chub kyi sems yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par
126b6(phal chen): skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / snying rje chen po'i shugs rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang / smon lam chen po'i stobs yongs su bskyed par bgyi ba dang byang chub
126b7(phal chen): sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu 'thob par bgyi ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang kun
126b8(phal chen): tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing snang bar bgyi ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i sa shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang / spyong
127a1(phal chen): pa dang / 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnan pa la thogs pa ma mchis par bgyi ba sta gon du gnas pa'o// 
127a2(phal chen): 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bgyi smras pa rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yongs su thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin 'dzin
127a3(phal chen): de'i snang ba ste/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phrin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thob pa'i snang ba las skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgo kun nas/ 
127a4(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shin tu bsgoms na sgo kun denas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pating nge 'dzin brgya stong dgrangs med pa phrag bcu chang ba yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// 
127a5(phal chen): smras pa/ 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul de rabasams bsasmras pa/ rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin masnyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs
127a6(phal chen): pa la rdzogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnan pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan
127a7(phal chen): pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams su dag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam
127a8(phal chen): par dmig par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brtag pa la rdzogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba la rdzogs pa med do/ 
127b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug cing khong du chud bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi smon gyi char yongs pa
127b2(phal chen): gzung ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'bor ba ma 'dris pa shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya mtsho la
127b3(phal chen): 'jug cing khong du chung bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// phyogs bcur 'jug cing rjes su bgrang bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su brtag par bya ba la
127b4(phal chen): thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag/ par bya ba la thogs pa med do// snying rje chen po phyogs rnam par mi spang ba la thogs pa med do// byams pas
127b5(phal chen): phyogs rgyas par dgang ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi blta ba'i phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can rgya mtsho thams cad
127b6(phal chen): du 'jug cing khong du chud bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud pa bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang po thams cad
127b7(phal chen): shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod brgya
127b8(phal chen): mtshol zhugs pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul la mo gros rnam par dag pa chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes can blo shin tu yangs pas
128a1(phal chen): tshad med pa'i dum rgyas par sagasum chen snang ba lang bang sgyur ma kya byam la snang bams ca
128a2(phal chen): tu dag pa mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul ba dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa la shin tu 'byung ba tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ @
128a3(phal chen): rnyen pa sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'amayon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul bstan pa'am
128a4(phal chen): yul rab tu brjod pa'am smon lamachen stobs yang dag par bsngags pa'am 'byung pa'i sgra yangs su snang bar bya ba 'am/ yang dag par
128a5(phal chen): bsgrung ba mengon pa rjod pam/ 'am yongs su bstan pa 'amating nge 'dzin gyi rgyun gyirjes su 'brang bar byab 'amasems kyi yum shes
128a6(phal chen): par bya ba'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chung bar bya ba nus ron/ rong rigs kyi bu mi thugs kyi rgyung 'dzi nyid na phyogs kyi sanas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob
128a7(phal chen): zhes bya ba yod de/ den bza' shing gi rab kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba ni/ grong khyer 'di chen po zhes bya ba'i shar phyogs ldegan med de/ den shes las skye
128a8(phal chen): ba'i rgyal po 'od bzangs kyi chung ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis de gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'as byang chub sems
128b1(phal chen): dang ba spyang pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji lta gan tan du bya brjes shigade nas tshong ngongon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' dngas ste mgun nyams bdelachem dang/ 
128b2(phal chen): song pa'i bskyes mdage slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la snying po yongasas grangs te chos kyis nye bar 'tsho bar byas pa ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ 
128b3(phal chen): bathob pa sa shes snang bar gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sdang ba rab tu thob ba mos pa rnam par dag pas khong du chung ba sems can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba rnam
128b4(phal chen): par dag pa'i sgom snang ba dang ldan par gyur ba/ phyogs dmu sa shes kyi snang b.rab tu 'dal bdes/ da slong rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan gyi dang pa gnyis la sgribs bya/ 
128b5(phal chen): 'tshal lan rgya slong du mar g.yas phyogs su 'anor ba byas nas dge slong rgyamatsho mtshan la btung de phyag 'tshal nas yang dang yang
128b6(phal chen): lha zhing yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang rab tu gdung ba dang // gus par bya ba dang / rim mor bya ba dang / yid la bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / 
128b7(phal chen): yongs su bsgom pa dang / legs par brjod pa dang / ngo ma tshar du bya ba dang / yon tan mngon du bya ba dang // rjes su bsngags pa dang / rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang // rjes su dran par
128b8(phal chen): bya ba dang / brtan par bya ba dang / mi gtang ba dang yid la bsam pa dang / rjes su 'drang bar bya ba dang / smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / mthong bar dga' ba dang / dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang ma
129a1(phal chen): kyi rjes su bsam pa dang // ming yongs su gzungs pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ba dang / kha dog dang dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi yul rjes su/ 
129a2(phal chen): bsam pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang / smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / spyod yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang / ye shes kyi snang ba yong
129a3(phal chen): su gzung ba byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu bcu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
129a4(phal chen): bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan gyis ni mgu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du
129a5(phal chen): brlabs/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la ni nan tan du byed dge ba'i bshes gnyen yidadu 'ong ba ni rjes su sems/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs
129a6(phal chen): rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas tsam du lta dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos la
129a7(phal chen): rjes su lta/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni sangs rgyas na mkha' blta ba la mig tsam du lta zhing mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza' shing gir ba kun nas rnam par brgyan
129a8(phal chen): bgang na ba der phyin nas des mthong mthong ba/ bza' shing gir ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa rin po che thams cad kyi rabs kun nas bskor ba rin po che'i shing gi 'phreng ba
129b1(phal chen): spel legs pas yongs su brgya pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi 'phreng ba'i me tog srang du yid du 'ong ba'i rnon rab tu 'phrul bas gni rgyas parin po che thams cad kyi shing gis/ 
129b2(phal chen): yang dag par brgyan pa shing thams cad kyi me tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba spus sna tshogs kyi shing gi 'phreng ba la phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngang zhim pa rin po che
129b3(phal chen): 'phreng ba'i shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba 'byang ba rab tu 'byung zhing char ltar mngon par 'bab pa rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi shing dang
129b4(phal chen): nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis mdzes shing sba la rgya cher brgyanadapa'i gzhi can yid bzhin gyi gos kyi shing thams cad las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam yo
129b5(phal chen): khebs shing mdzes par brgyan pa sil snyan gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i/ sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i dbyangs snyan pa
129b6(phal chen): 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mtho na dman med par gnas pa rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad par rgyun du 'byung zhing 'phyang bas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyan dang
129b7(phal chen): ldan pa mthong ste/ bza' shing gi rab chen po kun nas rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na/ khang pa bye ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang / nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis
129b8(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa dang khang pa brtseg pa brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser las brtsegs pa'i ba dang ldan pa dang / gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu ka gdung rin
130a1(phal chen): rnam par snang ba las bres pa dang / rdzing bub rgya stong brag btsur napa ni thams cad las gadrangs te/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lus su lung byas pa napom
130a2(phal chen): thams cad kyi sem mas btags pa rin po chesna tshogs kyi stegs pus bkor pa lha rdzas kyi chan dan gyi dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba gser gyi byi makun tu tham pagazhon
130a3(phal chen): bu rin po che chu dang kun tu brtsam pa/ phyogs bzhi nas semags rnam par bris pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba dang drar dang rma byadang khu drug dang
130a4(phal chen): khrung khrung dang ka la bing ka dang / kun la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ rin po che'iH la'i 'phreng bas kun nas brgyan pa/ gser gyi dril bu'i dra bas
130a5(phal chen): nas log pa rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung / kha steng nas rin po che'i bla re chen po bris pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing gi rabs yongs su bskor ba/ rin/ 
130a6(phal chen): po che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/ lum brgya stong phrag bcu dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'jam gyis mtha' 'khor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi
130a7(phal chen): dog tu 'dug pa'i pad mos yongs su khyab pa rin po che'i pad mo'i 'od chen pos snang bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yong ba ste bza' shing gir ba de'i dbus na gzhal
130a8(phal chen): med pa chen po rgyal mchan tu tshogs shes bya ba 'anan po che rgyamache lanyung ba la blangs da nor burin po ma ga pa 'am du chu byung ga gser kyi lun / 
130b1(phal chen): bar 'phags pa nor bu rin po che 'tsho bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas brgyan pa gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas bres pa rin po che'i rgyal po cha
130b2(phal chen): 'bam pa'i spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i nga dkun tu ldang rin po che'i rgyal po 'i rnam par gsal bar byed pas/ 
130b3(phal chen): dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs der stan grangs med cing chad med pa bting bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ bang mo'i snying po
130b4(phal chen): can dang nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i pang mo'i snang po can dang nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bang mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po che 'grob
130b5(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba'i pad mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i snying po can dang / nor bu rin po che seng geb shing thags pad mo'i snying po
130b6(phal chen): can dang nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i pad mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'i pang mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i
130b7(phal chen): pad mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po che 'od kyi rgyan gyi pad mo'i srung po can dang / nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa'i rin po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i 'od zer
130b8(phal chen): kun tu 'byung ba'i pang mo'i snying po can dang nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i seng ges gnon pa'i pang mo'i snying po can dag pashams shing bting ba ste/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan
131a1(phal chen): sna tshogs de'i bag ma mang po yang rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par rgyan pa/ kha dog bsam gyi mi khyab
131a2(phal chen): bar mdzes shing gzugs yid du 'ong ba dag go// bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan bde skyeng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag bcus khebs pa ste/ 'di ltar gos kyi bla re dang
131a3(phal chen): 'khri shing gi bla re dang / me tog gi bla re dang 'phreng ba'i ng+ga re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / gser gyi d+ha re dang / rgyan gyi bla re dang // rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i/ 
131a4(phal chen): bla re dang / glang po shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo/ bla re dang / nor bu rin po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i bla re dang / de dag la sogs pa blar brgya stong phrag bcu
131a5(phal chen): kun nas khebs par byas pa'o// rin po che'i drab rgyastong phrag bcu sa kun nas yog paste 'di ltararin po che ngam pa'i dril bu'i dra ba dang / rin po che'i gdus
131a6(phal chen): kyi dra ba dang rin po che'i 'bru'i dra ba dang mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra ba dang nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya sngon po 'dra ba dang / seng ge'i khri shing gi dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che chu
131a7(phal chen): shel gyi dra ba dang spos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che'i cod pan dang / rin po che'i 'phreng nga'i dra ba // de dag la sogs pa rin po che'i dra babargya stong phrag bcus kun nas yo/ 
131a8(phal chen): ba'o// snang ba chen po brgya myong thag bachus kyang kun napa log sa ste/ 'di ltar nor budzin po chen ma'i 'ad ber gyi snang ba dang / nor burin mo che nyima'i chung mob ldang ba dang / nongang
131b1(phal chen): rin po che zla nga'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po tshe sbos kyi drung pa'od 'gronga'i sdang ba dang / nor bu rin po che dngar rgya nang ba'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che bad mo ltung ba'i snang ba/ 
131b2(phal chen): dang / nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che sgron mchen po'i snang ba dang / nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i sdang ba dang / nor bu rin po
131b3(phal chen): zlos kyi rlon chen ma bdang ba dang zlogag 'phreng nga 'byung ba'i snang ba dang / de dag la sogs pa nor burin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus rtag tu snang bar byas pab/ bzar/ 
131b4(phal chen): shing gar bde ni rgyan chen po'i smon ba rgya stong thag bcu rar da'abeb pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste dus dang 'dun dpa'i can ngan gyi snyin ba rgya stong drag bcu'i 'brug sna rab tu 'byung ba/ 
131b5(phal chen): ldardzas las 'das pa'i 'phreng ba dang lda lda sngon chen po tu mched pas rab tu brgya pa lA rnas las 'das pa'i ses sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sngon pa rgya myong zag 'du
