131b6(phal chen): sprin mngon par 'bab pa lnga rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyun gyi sprin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa/ lha'i bu brgya stong zag bsu mthong bar dga' ste 'og tu lha zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char
131b7(phal chen): bzhin du 'bab pa lha mo'i sprin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi stong pa'i skal ba mnyam pas rang rang gi lus 'bul ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon brgya stong phrag bcus
131b8(phal chen): chos mtshan pas nom zhing 'ong ba'i char mngon par 'bab pa ste/ den dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gser gyi stong pa'i khri chen po la 'dug cing mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po 'dra bas brgyan pa'i cong par
132a1(phal chen): thogs pa/ lag pa la lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gser gyi dpung rgyan dang gdu bu thogs pa lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par
132a2(phal chen): mdzes par gyur pa/ rnam rin po che mthon thing dri ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i drabs mdzes par brgyan pa nor bu rin po che seng ge'i gdong gi rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/ 
132a3(phal chen): nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yog cing 'od rab tu 'bar ba/ srog chags bye ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tu
132a4(phal chen): btud de/ phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de'i drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po dbam/ tshangs lha nye phan nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs
132a5(phal chen): pa'am/ dbang byed dam gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa'am rab 'phrul dga' 'am 'phrul dga'i ris su gtogs pa 'am rab dga' ldan nam
132a6(phal chen): dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab mtshe ma'am/ mtshe ma'i ris su gtogs pa 'am/ lha'i dbang po'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ 
132a7(phal chen): gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ dri za'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po'am// grul bum 'am/ klu'i dbang po'am/ klu'am/ lA ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ lha ma yin nam// namakha' lding gi
132a8(phal chen): dbang po'am/ rnam pa 'arjong ngam/ mi 'amatsho'i dbang po'am/ mi 'am tsha'am/ lho 'phye chen po'i dbang polas/ lto 'a bye chen po sa/ ga shin rje'am/ ga shin rje'i bu mo'am/ 
132b1(phal chen): mi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen pongs si dgas sam/ mi'i dbang po ma mi yang rung / sems can chad med grangs med pa dag 'ong ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nung grogs dang / 
132b2(phal chen): byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs
132b3(phal chen): nas kyang / tshangs pa chen po'am/ tshangs lha nye na nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'am/ dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas mi'i dbang po'am ma
132b4(phal chen): par gyi sems can mang po 'ong ba de dag/ nang sna tshogs da shig gis btab bam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs dkyis kun nas 'khor tam lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon pa
132b5(phal chen): zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang de dag gis dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin de mthong ma thag tu nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems kyi nyon
132b6(phal chen): mongs pa'i dri ma dang yang bral bar 'gyuralta ba'i gsal shing yang byin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa'i rithams cad kyang rnam par shigs par 'gyur/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs/ 
132b7(phal chen): pa med pa yang khong du chud par 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor de yong bas na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rab tu byang bar 'gyur dbang po'i myi gu thams cad kyang rnam par 'phel bar gyur/ 
132b8(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par 'gyurating nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / 
133a1(phal chen): tshul rgya mchobams cad kyang mngon sum du 'gyurasmon lam gyi sgo bams sa kyang yang dgu par skye bar gyurastong pa'i skabams cad kyang/ 
133a2(phal chen): tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo thams cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po yang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshul du
133a3(phal chen): 'byung bar 'gyuralus thogs pa med pas kyang thams cad du rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang
133a4(phal chen): du phyin te bltas na dge bsnyen ma yid bzhi mthi babang po la 'dug pa mthong nas de dge bsnyen ma yid de bzhin gang na ba der song ste byin nas/ dge bsnyen ma yong
133a5(phal chen): bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dza na~M/ bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas drogasasu bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces smras so// 
133a6(phal chen): 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba
133a7(phal chen): dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na/ 'phags ma
133a8(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshang du gsol// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mon
133b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mya ngan med pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob paste/ rigs kyi bu kho mon de'i mthus mthong na don yod pa'o// mnyan na don yod pa'o// 
133b2(phal chen): rim tshor byas pa don yod pa'o// gnas gcig na grogs pa don modapa'o// rdzas su dran par byas padon yod pa'o// rigs kyi bu lo mon sems can dge pa'i grub ma bskyed pa
133b3(phal chen): dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyis yongs sum zin pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du bong bar mi 'gyur rigs kyi bum
133b4(phal chen): me mthong btsam gyis ni sems can rnams kyang ra blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam phyir mi ldan/ par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho mo drang
133b5(phal chen): du shar skyegs nasade bzhin gshegs padan byon cing gdan rin po tshol khril 'azhugs nas/ chos ston to// shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du
133b6(phal chen): byem ma bdun kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi pade lta bsan/ khaman de bzhin ga shegs pa mngong bdang mi 'phral ba'o// chom mnyan dang 'bral ba'o// 
133b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu cu bzhi po bza' shing gir bkun nas
133b8(phal chen): rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang / blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gsug go// rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan ga
134a1(phal chen): 'di na gnas pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/ khro
134a2(phal chen): mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go// smras pa// 'phags ma khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yun ji srid cig nas thugs bskyedasmras pa/ 
134a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho mos ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba byung ba de bzhin
134a4(phal chen): gshegs pa de drung na// kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do// de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos mchod do// de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos
134a5(phal chen): bstan pa kho mos yongs su bzung ngo // de'i snga rol// du de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ de'i bstan pa la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo // chos kyi
134a6(phal chen): 'khor lo kho mos bzung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ de yang kho mos bsnyen bkur to// de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab
134a7(phal chen): dpal zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i snying po zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad zhes bya ba byung ngo // 
134a8(phal chen): de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba drung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes bya ba byung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa
134b1(phal chen): rdorje'i gtsug ces bya ba zung ngo // de'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa chu ba'i lha zhes bya babyung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de ltar tshig cig nas gcig tu brgyung pa dang / brtul
134b2(phal chen): pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams mdab chags su bsams te dran par byas na gang kho mos rim gror byas te
134b3(phal chen): bsnyen bkur ba dang / mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / gang gi spyan sngar kho mos chos thos par gyur pa dang gang gi bstan pa la kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad
134b4(phal chen): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung 'ga' 'ga' sum cu rtsa drug/ gi bye ma snyed rjes su dran te/ rigs kyi bu de phan/ cad du kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig bsnyen bkur ba ni/ 
134b5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
134b6(phal chen): rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro ba thams cad chud pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i na tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i
134b7(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zang zad du 'gro bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byams pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ 
134b8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod bas/ zhing thams cad du bskal pa thams cad yongs su sdud pas// byang chub sems dang / 
135a1(phal chen): rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
135a2(phal chen): ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// 
135a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu ye shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing yang dag par 'dzin pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon
135a4(phal chen): bar shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnams bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dra ba'i 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas byang chub sems
135a5(phal chen): dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis tshig gci/ brjod kyang // 'gro ba thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pas/ 
135a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad// rang gi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pas/ byang chub
135a7(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o// nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ci srid cig na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
135a8(phal chen): 'gyurate smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ sems can gcig la dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang smin par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te// 
135b1(phal chen): sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin sems can stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba'i phyir ma yin// sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir
135b2(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi don du/ byang chub sems dpa'
135b3(phal chen): rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yinasems can thams cad kyi phyir ma yin// sems can khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin// sems can gang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
135b4(phal chen): ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyar phyur gyi phyir ma yin sems can byang bying gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyer 'jal gyi phyir ma yin// sems can phyal byol/ 
135b5(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljang ldod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can khyod zim gyi phyir ma yin// sems can phyang phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ 
135b6(phal chen): sems can lham ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can chos ma'i phyir ma yin// sems can khram khrim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nab nub kyi phyir
135b7(phal chen): ma yin sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin// sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bsdu yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
135b8(phal chen): can gzhal brtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lum gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thab thib
136a1(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'grib yol gyi phyir ma yin// sems can them 'phyo'i phyir ma yin// sems can bsam phyod kyi phyir ma yin// sems
136a2(phal chen): can 'dra mnyam gyi phyir ma yin// sems can brang phreng gi phyir ma yin// sems can bgrod yas kyi phyir ma yin// sems can rgyal 'dal gyi phyir ma yin// sems can bsngo yas kyi phyir
136a3(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can zang yag gi phyir ma yin// sems can 'phro bkye'i phyir ma yin// sems can rtse 'byo'i phyir ma yin// sems can yod than gyi phyir ma yin// sems can drug g.yos kyi phyir
136a4(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can sang yal gyi phyir ma yin// sems can thing yul gi phyir ma yin// sems can snang yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nan pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can
136a5(phal chen): yid 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can nab neb kyi phyir ma yin// sems can khrig thams kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
136a6(phal chen): bgrang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thug yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can yang yud kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can po ldog gi phyir ma yin/ sems can brda yas kyi
136a7(phal chen): phyir ma yin/ sems can lhub pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can thag thug gi phyir ma yin/ sems can khrig ge'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rig yas kyi phyir ma yin/ 
136a8(phal chen): sems can snyad med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mchog 'phreng gi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyag 'bru'i phyir ma yin// sems can spu 'phyes kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
136b1(phal chen): can 'bru 'brel gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod pos kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lhong yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod phul gyi phyir ma yin sems can ni sbyang
136b2(phal chen): kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dgazim kyi phyir ma yin sems can 'phyo 'gyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can nyar nyer gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyag phyag gi phyir ma yin/ 
136b3(phal chen): sems can thal zul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can sa la sal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can g.yo ldeg gi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can
136b4(phal chen): brnang ya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can rem 'drol gyi daphyir ma yin/ sems can rdzingad kyi phyir ma yin// sems can rdzi rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phun
136b5(phal chen): yol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'ol 'ol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can da ngad kyi phyir ma yin sems can bgrang brtsi'i phyir ma yin/ sems can zab bgrang
136b6(phal chen): gi phyir ma yin/ sems can dga' rgyang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can grangs mtha'i' phyir ma yin// sems can phyod yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rol phyod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems
136b7(phal chen): can gdab yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gcal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrangs yas kyi phyir ma yin// sems can byim 'phyo'i phyir ma yin/ sems can yam
136b8(phal chen): me'i phyir ma yin/ sems can snyal yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lngab ldeb kyi phyir ma yin// sems can 'ban chad kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phan phung gi phyir ma yin/ 
137a1(phal chen): sems can mtha' rdul gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can rgyud lding gi phyir ma yin// sems can yun babyangs kyi phyir ma yin// sems can mkha' yal gyi phyir/ 
137a2(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can bun lob kyi phyir ma yin// sems can lam lom gyi phyir ma yin// sems can bsnyang yas kyi phyir ma yin// sems can lang ling gi phyir ma yin// sems
137a3(phal chen): can lngab ljid kyi phyir ma yin// sems can mi brtsal gyi phyir ma yin// sems can 'byam yas kyi phyir ma yin// sems can 'grang gi phyir ma yin/ sems can smos yas/ 
137a4(phal chen): gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra tshal gyi phyir ma yin// sems can lo rgyas kyi phyir ma yin// sems can 'bum rdib kyi phyir ma yin// sems can la lo
137a5(phal chen): phyir ma yin// sems can phyam phyam gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bgrang 'byos kyi phyir ma yin// sems can bgrang 'phyos las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin// sems
137a6(phal chen): can dang g.yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can dang g.yas las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin// sems can yal 'phyong gi phyir ma yin// sems can yal 'phyor las bsgres pa'i phyir ma
137a7(phal chen): yin sems can mu yal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mu yal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin// sems can dgrang rol gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bcwa
137a8(phal chen): yal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can mi 'jal las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can pas ma pyod kyi phyir mchin
137b1(phal chen): sems can ngas ma myong las bsgres pa'i phyir mayin sems can mtha' 'a dum gyi phyir yinasems ca mamatha' 'byam las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin sems can da/ 
137b2(phal chen): zag gi phyir ma yin sems can dang ga zag las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin// sems can brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i
137b3(phal chen): ma yin/ sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i phyir ma yin// sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa las bsgres pa'i phyir ma yin/ sems can dza
137b4(phal chen): rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa/ nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'dzi/ rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma/ 
137b5(phal chen): yin gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin/ tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sem sa can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gi 'jig rten
137b6(phal chen): gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi
137b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi
137b8(phal chen): khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ma yin pa nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
138a1(phal chen): snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
138a2(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa/ lhag ma med pa mtha' dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du yongs su smin par bya ba
138a3(phal chen): dang / gdul ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas gcig bsnyen bkur ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror
138a4(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcu bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang // mchod cing rim
138a5(phal chen): gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang badz+ra da du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / 
138a6(phal chen): mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing
138a7(phal chen): mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs/ 
138a8(phal chen): pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba dang / mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// 
138b1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ning gcig yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin// 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
138b2(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
138b3(phal chen): gi bstan pa yongs su gzungs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
138b4(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin// sangs rgya
138b5(phal chen): gcig rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug pa'i/ phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod/ 
138b6(phal chen): du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ sangs rgyas rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
138b7(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ 
138b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sem
139a1(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma minasangs rgyas gcig ga 'a mar kyang kyil 'khor rnam par bye bas 'jug par bya ba 'byor
139a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi/ 'khor gyi
139a3(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam par bye ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phy-ir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu rtsub ma yin de bzhinag shegs gcigag chos kyi 'khor
139a4(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub du skye ba ma yin pa nis/ sang / nas rgyas kyi nang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shi
139a5(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su gzungs pa'i phyibyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ sems
139a6(phal chen): can gyi sems rgya mtsho gcig khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyeb ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du
139a7(phal chen): med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi sems rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyibyang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin sems can
139a8(phal chen): gcig gi dbang po'i 'khor ma yongs su shes par bya 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skyeb ma yin pa nasasangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod / 
139b1(phal chen): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin/ 
139b2(phal chen): sems can gcig gi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
139b3(phal chen): pa'i brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin
139b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig gi bskal pa nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas
139b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir
139b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin// 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bags chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la
139b7(phal chen): 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
139b8(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems
140a1(phal chen): byang chub tu skye ba ma yin 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pargya mtsho thams cad la 'jug
140a2(phal chen): par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig
140a3(phal chen): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin
140a4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya / ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
140a5(phal chen): kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med du/ rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs
140a6(phal chen): pa'i sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma man/ 'jig rten
140a7(phal chen): gyi khams gcig tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi spyong pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bya
140a8(phal chen): chub tu skye ba ma yin pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjo med pa'i yang brjerji med pa'i rdum shin tum pa snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams
140b1(phal chen): kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye ba ma yin gyi sems can gyi khams ma lus pa lhag/ 
140b2(phal chen): mamed bu mtha' dag thams cad yongs su smin par bye ba dang gdul ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams
140b3(phal chen): cad bsnyen bkur zhing mnyes par bya ba da'i/ mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems byang chub tu skye'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa tham
140b4(phal chen): cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyud bsnyen bkur zhing dmanyes par bya ba'i phyir/ mchod cing rim gror bya/ dpa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams smon lam la mngon
140b5(phal chen): bar mos pa yin// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba yin// sangs
140b6(phal chen): rgyas kyi bstan pa ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gzung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba 'byung ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu zhugs pa'i smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa ma lus
140b7(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ sems kyi shugs drag po skye ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan ma lus
140b8(phal chen): pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yi dam brtan pa skye ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par
141a1(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par mos pa 'byung ba yin// 'gro ba'i sems rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ 
141a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam yongs su skye ba yin// sems can gyi dbang po'i 'khor lo ma lus pa thams cad yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon
141a3(phal chen): par 'dod pa skye ba yin// sems can gyi dbang po rgya mtsho ma lus pa thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba skye ba yin// 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
141a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'ju/ ga par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mos pa skye ba yin// sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi
141a5(phal chen): nyon mongs pa'i ngag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yongs su ga cad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus yongs su skye ba yin// sems can ma lus pa thams
141a6(phal chen): cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes chen po'i nyi ma 'char ba yin// sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su
141a7(phal chen): shes par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi snang ba 'byung ba yin// sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi me'i phung po rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
141a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje'i sngon chen po kun nas 'du ba yin// rigs kyi bu mdor ni de dag la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod nga'i tshul dang / sgo grangs med po \u0f7f/ 
141b1(phal chen): stong phrag bcu dag/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bsgrub bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyong ba na ye shes khong du chud par byas
141b2(phal chen): phyirachos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ni yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ zhing thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'o// rigs kyi bu de la
141b3(phal chen): bas na kho mos ni bdag gi smon lam na mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig/ bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du thug
141b4(phal chen): pa de'i mthas klas par shog shig/ bdag gi smon lam sa mas can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba dang // bag la nyal ba'i mtha' gang du drug pa
141b5(phal chen): de'i mthas klas par shog shig ces/ de ltar smon lam btang bo// smras pa/ 'phags ma rnam par thar pa 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ smras pa// rigs kyi bu rnam par thar pa 'di ni nyon mongs pa
141b6(phal chen): med pa te bde ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba ste// rigs kyi bu kho mos kyang // byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de gcig pu shes par zad na// byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag
141b7(phal chen): par 'dzin pa'i phyir// sems rgya mtsho dang ldan pa// lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa'i phyir/ ri rab dang 'dra ba// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu sos par byed pa'i phyir/ sman gyi rgyal po
141b8(phal chen): mthong na legs pa lta bu sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir// nyi mar gyur pa// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i gnas su gyur pas// sa lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa// 'gro ba
142a1(phal chen): thams cad kyidon byed pa'i phying rlung du gyur ba / sems can thams cad la ye shes kyi snang ba byin pa 'phyir mar mer gyur pa zhi ba'i sgras sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi
142a2(phal chen): char yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bebs pa'i phyir sprin du gyur pa// bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa'i phyir/ brgya byin la/ 
142a3(phal chen): bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa smos pa'am// byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi rnam pa mtha' dang // dpung / 
142a4(phal chen): med pa yongs su bstan par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa 'din// yul chub gtsang ma zhes bya ba yod de/ de na drang srong
142a5(phal chen): 'jigs mchog dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gis// de'i gan du song la dris shig/ de rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sem sa dpa'i spyod ba ston par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
142a6(phal chen): bzangs kyis// dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar// g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas// yang dang
142a7(phal chen): yang bltas te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ ngo mchims gang bar ngus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa// rjes su sems shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba dkon par rjes su bsam
142a8(phal chen): pa dang skyes bu dam pa dang 'phrang ba dkon pa rjes su bsam pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thob par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su
142b1(phal chen): dag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang skal ba mnyam pa'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang byang chub du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par mos shas
142b2(phal chen): sems nges par gzhog pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang mi mnyam pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang sems dri ma med cing mi 'gros
142b3(phal chen): pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rjes su bsam pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa byed cing / dge
142b4(phal chen): bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo // de nas cho dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag gi rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ byang
142b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i sems
142b6(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos rab tu snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pa chos kyi gter 'thob par bya la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sems dang
142b7(phal chen): ldan pa smon lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phel ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi
142b8(phal chen): rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i sems dang ldan pasgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa chos kyi dbyings la mun pa med par lta ba'i sems dang
143a1(phal chen): ldan pa rdo rje rin po che mthu bo ches ma tshogs pa lngar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dkar
143a2(phal chen): zhing thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan pa de// mthar gyis yul chub gtsang mag la ba der phyin nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las// de'i tshe drang srong
143a3(phal chen): 'jigs mchog dbyangs// dge ba sbyangs pa'i gnas shing dang shing phran sna tshogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba lo mas rgyas pa'i shing gis kun nas 'grigs pa/ rtag tu me tog
143a4(phal chen): rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu shing tog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing tog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing drung / nor bu rin po che'i spang
143a5(phal chen): leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres pa/ a ga ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing las spos kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brtan pa/ 
143a6(phal chen): phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa n+ya gro da'i shing dbyangs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa// 'dzam bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog smin pa 'brul pa// me tog
143a7(phal chen): gi tshal pad mo dang / ud pa la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig na 'dug 'dug ste// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs// drang srong stong phrag bcus
143a8(phal chen): bskor cing / tsan dan gyi yal ga shin tu 'brel ba'i bya skyibs shig na// thor tshugs kyi cod pan can// lpags pa dang / rtsa'i gos gyon pa shing shun gyi smad g.yogs can// rtswa'i stan la 'dug
143b1(phal chen): pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste// phyin nas yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrang ba'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yang dag par
143b2(phal chen): lam ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
143b3(phal chen): gdams ngag la rag lus par yang dag par lta// stobs bcu'i ye shes// rin po che'i gling du skyel bas// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag
143b4(phal chen): lus par yang dag par lta// stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dag par skyed pas// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par
143b5(phal chen): yang dag par lta// nyam nyes med par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta// 
143b6(phal chen): mnyam pa dang // mi mnyam pa yongs su ston pas// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta// g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa thams cad med par
143b7(phal chen): byed pas// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta// byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis// sim pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir// thams cad
143b8(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni// dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta// snying rje chen po yongs su skyed pas// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po ni// dge
144a1(phal chen): pa'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsal bar mthong ba na/ 
144a2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas// lus thams cad kyis phab ste// phyag byas nas langs ste// drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la/ lan brgya stong du mar skor ba
144a3(phal chen): byas nas// mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas// yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis// yid du 'ong ba'i tshig brjod de// 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang
144a4(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed na// ji daltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa/ de la bslab par bgyi ba dang // ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal
144a5(phal chen): te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdam/ sa ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes thos na'aphags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
144a6(phal chen): dnga'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis// bram ze'i byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag la
144a7(phal chen): bltas te/ 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed de/ sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med pa la
144a8(phal chen): mgron du gnyer to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang // bde ba'i don tu sta gon du gnas pa ste// ye shes rgya mtsho mngon du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
144b1(phal chen): kyi ma ma ma 'o// sa chung rnam tsham ca la 'du pa da shes kyi snang bachen pos gnas par rjod pa la chen pa btsun / 
144b2(phal chen): bar dong po/ chos kyim chen po mngon par ngang bar 'dod pa'o// ye shes chen pa'i zla ba 'jig rten shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung bathams cad rabathunan mo// 
144b3(phal chen): bar 'dod pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i chu ba rnam par sbrel bar 'dod pa'o// de nas bram ze'i byis pa stong drag bcu po de dag gis mitag du nam la yid du
144b4(phal chen): zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos// tshe dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// mngon par phyag 'tshal to// 
144b5(phal chen): rab tu btud de phyag 'tshal nas/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te// tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'ani sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro// 
144b6(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid par 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro// gshin rje'i
144b7(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog par 'gyur ro// mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro// sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skems par 'gyur ro// 
144b8(phal chen): sred pa'i 'ching ba gcod par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi khor yug gis/ 
145a1(phal chen): 'jig rten yongs su bskor bar 'gyur ro// ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs su ston par 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi nyim 'char bar rabargyad
145a2(phal chen): pabar 'gyur ro// chos kyi mig rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rnams la mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa yang dag ston par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog
145a3(phal chen): dbyangs kyis// byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed pa de ni// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/ 
145a4(phal chen): pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu skyed de/ de rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro// // byis pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis ni/ bla na med pa yang
145a5(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ngu sems bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyis yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jig
145a6(phal chen): mchog dbyangs kyis// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o// 
145a7(phal chen): nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas
145a8(phal chen): pa brkyang ste/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mgo la byugs nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo // tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs
145b1(phal chen): kyis lag pa g.yas pas badrung mthagaH/ de mo la// tshong dpon gyi gyi nor ba rangs kyis// phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas
145b2(phal chen): kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi zhabs kyi drung na// bdag nyid 'dug pa shes par gyur to// 
145b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang // rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang ldan par mthong ngo // de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs
145b4(phal chen): can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas
145b5(phal chen): brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo // de dag las kyang tshig dang / yig ge gcig las kyang // phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan pa nyan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de
145b6(phal chen): dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to// chos kyi sgron gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon
145b7(phal chen): lam ta mos pa sna tshogs kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la yang zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdub smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugs so// 
145b8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshim par 'gyur bar rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi dra ba 'dod chags dang bral ba sna tshogs kyis
146a1(phal chen): rnam par rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dag kyang mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dgra la'ang ye shes snang ba bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so// de ltar na
146a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes
146a3(phal chen): mi zad pa'i rnam par thar pa dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi sgo snang ba// phyogs kun kyi dra ba// rab tu thob pa gzungs kyi sgo rdo rje'i snying pos sems rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtsegs pa/ 
146a4(phal chen): rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba rab tu thob pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa/ gzhi kun nas rnam bar brgyan pa'i snying po yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi
146a5(phal chen): snang ba sangs rgyas nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa// ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas
146a6(phal chen): pating nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi ye shes rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des// de bzhin gshegs pa lo la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig lon par shes so// 
146a7(phal chen): la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam// la lar ni zla ba phyed lon pa snyam// la lar ni zla ba gcig lon pa snyam// la lar ni lo gcig lon pa snyam// la lar ni lo brgya lon pasnyam// la lar ni la
146a8(phal chen): stong lon pa snyam// la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam// la lar ni lo bye ba lon pa snyam// la lar ni lo bye ba brgya lon pa snyam// la lar ni lo bye ba stong lon pa snyam// la lar ni lo bye ba
146b1(phal chen): brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam// la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig lon pa snyam// la lar ni bskal pa phyed lon pa snyam// la lar ni bskal pa gcig lon pa snyam// la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa snyam/ 
146b2(phal chen): la lar ni bskal pa stong lon pa snyam// la lar ni bskal pa brgya phrag stong lon bsnyam// la lar ni bskal pa bye ba lon pa snyam// la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam// la lar ni bska
146b3(phal chen): pa bye ba phrag stong lon pa snyam// la lar ni bskal pa bya ba brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam// la lar ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong lon pa snyam byed pa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i
146b4(phal chen): zhabs kyi drung du ni// bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du/ med pa snyed lon par gyur pa snyam byed pa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni// bskal pa 'jam
146b5(phal chen): bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lon pa snyam byed par gyur
146b6(phal chen): totade nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs btang ba dang / des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mtsho dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug par shes par gyur to// de la drang srong
146b7(phal chen): 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu dran mong smras pa// 'phags pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran no// smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bos ni// byang chub sems dpa'i
146b8(phal chen): rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad las/ khyad par du 'phags pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i
147a1(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin thob pa// dus thams cad du 'khor lo sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang ye shes mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba'i
147a2(phal chen): nyi ma la/ rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyan rab tu 'god pa/ dus gsum gyi yul skad cig gcig gis ye shes su yang dag par sdud pa// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du// lus shin tu rnam
147a3(phal chen): pabar bkram pa// chos kyi dbyings thams cad la// ye shes snang ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa// sems
147a4(phal chen): can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa 'dod pa bzhin du kun tu snang zhing dri ma med la/ 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
147a5(phal chen): rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am// yon tan brjod/ pa 'am// smon lam gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ zhing gi/ mngon par 'du bya ba shes pa 'am// ye shes kyi yul la
147a6(phal chen): 'jug par bya ba 'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am// rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'am// rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang // rnam par
147a7(phal chen): rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am// lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba 'am/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod pa 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu bstan par
147a8(phal chen): nus ren na// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de// de na bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ces bya ba 'dug gis// de'i gan
147b1(phal chen): song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji sa nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi du nor bzangs dga' rangs te/ mthu
147b2(phal chen): zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas// drang song 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// drang song 'jig mchog dbyangs la// lan brgya stong du
147b3(phal chen): mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te// drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song ngo // / bam po dgu
147b4(phal chen): bcu rtsa gsum pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyis snang ba
147b5(phal chen): byas pa sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis ma
147b6(phal chen): khyab pa mngon sum gyi ye shes kyis mngon par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa
147b7(phal chen): dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang
147b8(phal chen): par gyur pa 'gro ba thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa/ 
148a1(phal chen): gnyis su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dal ba'i ye shes
148a2(phal chen): snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyan pa thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa/ khong du
148a3(phal chen): chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir
148a4(phal chen): mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan pa stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba'i 'od rab tu thob pa chos kyi dbyings brjod pa la mngon par mos pas// ngoms pa med pa'i sems
148a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par sbyor pa'i spyod yul la 'jug pa khong du chud ba'i sems dang ldan / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan mtha' yas pa ma'o/ 
148a6(phal chen): bar bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang ldan pa// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra ba mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i ye
148a7(phal chen): shes mtha' dang dpung med pa mngon du gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ 
148a8(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten
148b1(phal chen): gyi khams rnam par bye ba sna tshogs mtha'asas pa la yang dag par lta ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang / yangs pa 'i khongs su chud / 
148b2(phal chen): par bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gni mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang // 'jig rten gyi khams su rnam par spyad pa
148b3(phal chen): rnam par gdags pa mtha' yas pa'i kun rdzob rnam pa tha dad pa la yang dag par blta ba dang sems can gyi mos pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang
148b4(phal chen): sems can rnam par phye ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can mtha' deyas pa yongs su smin par bya ba dang / 'dzum pa khong du chud par
148b5(phal chen): bya ba la yang dag par blta ba dang / sems can dang phyog sa dang dus mtha' yas pa'i ming gi rnam pa sna tshogs la yang dag par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen mngon
148b6(phal chen): du bya ba byed cing // mthar gyis yul tshol ba dang ldan pa gang na ba dang // bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched ga la ba der phyin to// de'i tshe bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched thams cad mkhyen
148b7(phal chen): pa nyid bsgrub pa'i gzhir byas shing dka' thub drag po la spyod de/ de'i phyogs bzhi nas me'i phung po ri tsam du che ba bus pa dang / ri shin tu mtho ba'i g.yang sa'i lam gyi rgyud spu gri'i sos gshibs pas
148b8(phal chen): 'khor bar snang ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras/ 
149a1(phal chen): 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du sems bskyed na// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la sbyang ba dang // ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
149a2(phal chen): ma 'tshal te// 'phag pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la// gdams ngag dang // rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na// 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod/ 
149a3(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang // ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol// des smras pa// rigs kyi bu song la spu gri'i so dang ra ba'i ri 'di la 'dzegs te// me'i 'obs 'dir mchongs shig
149a4(phal chen): dang des khyod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dag dpar 'gyur zhes na/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs 'di snyam du sems par gyur te mi khom pa brgyad las
149a5(phal chen): rnam par ldog pa yang shin tu dkon// mir 'gyur te/ khom pa phun sum tshogs shing rnam par dag pa yang shin tu dkon sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang shin tu dkon
149a6(phal chen): dbang po nyams pa med pa yang shin tu dkon sangs rgyas kyi chos thos pa yang shin tu dkon skyes bu dam pa dang phrad pa yang shin tu dkon yang dag pa'i dge ba'i
149a7(phal chen): ba shes gnyen yang shin tu dkon yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pas legs par sdud pa yang shin tu dkon yang dag par 'tsho bar bya ba yang shin tu dkon// mi'i
149a8(phal chen): 'jig rten na chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan byed pa yang shin tu dkon na// de skad zer zhing bdag gi dge ba'i bar chad la zhugs la/ de ltar bdag gi srog gcad par brtson pa 'di bdud dam
149b1(phal chen): cig ma yin nam/ bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'am/ bdud kyi ros bu gtogs pa 'am/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar rdzus pa'am/ byang chub sems dpa' la mi gcags
149b2(phal chen): pabyed pa zhig ma yin grangs/ bdag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gegs byed par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grangabadag lam gol ba ngan par gzhug par 'dod pa zhig ma yin grang // bdag
149b3(phal chen): gis sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la gogs byed pa zhig ma yin grangs snyam nas// de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pa'i cha/ tshangs pa stong phrag bcu steng gi bar
149b4(phal chen): snang la gnas te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i sems brtan par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi dbu 'phags pa 'dzin/ ting nge 'dzin rdo rje 'od 'phro ba'i snang
149b5(phal chen): ba rab tu thob pa ste/ brtson 'grus ldog pa med pa'o// brtsams pa chen po mthar dbyung ba la zhugs pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan bskam pa la mngon par brtson
149b6(phal chen): ba'o// lta ba'i rnam pa dang / dra ba thams cad gtubs pa la brtson pa'o// nyon mongs pa'i lcug lcog thams cad zad par bsreg pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// mi khom mi shes
149b7(phal chen): pa'i bas mtha'i dgon pa thams cad snang bar bya ba la brtson pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi rga shi'i g.yang sa dang / 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa la yi dam brtan pa'o// 
149b8(phal chen): dus gsum gyi mun pa bskul ba la mngon par brtson pa'o// chos thams cad kyi 'od zer dgye ba la zhugs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung
150a1(phal chen): pa mdzad pa'i tshe// tshangs pa ji snyed cig mkhan po dang / dbang sgyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi gtso bor rang rang rlom zhing // sems pa blta ba'i
150a2(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs la// mngon par zhen pa de dag thams cad/ 'phags pa 'di dka' thub dang // brtul zhugs kyi thugs ngam gyi mthus// rang rang gi gnas na bag dga' ba med cing // de dag bsam
150a3(phal chen): gtan gyi ro dga' ba myong ba med pas// 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de dag phyin pa dang // 'phags pa 'di'i rdzu 'phrul gyi byin dang / drag shug kyi dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs kyis
150a4(phal chen): zil gyis mnan te/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam dpar bzlog pa dang // nga rgyal dang // rlom sems rnams cad rab tu spangs pa'i phyir chos ston to// 'gro ba thams cad
150a5(phal chen): la byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos khyab par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi bsam pa brtan par bya ba dang / byang chub tu sem/ sa bskyed pa shin tu yangs par bya ba dang // sangs rgyas thams
150a6(phal chen): cad yang dag par blta ba la mngon par brtson par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor thob par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / thams cad du grag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
150a7(phal chen): dbyangs la thogs pa med cing / bsgribs pa med par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// bdud stong phrag bcu yang steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po chus mngon par
150a8(phal chen): gtor te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'bogs po 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad de'i tshe// 'di 'gro ba'i phung po 'di las snang ba chen po byung zhing / kho bo
150b1(phal chen): gi khyim dang lus dang / rgyan gyi longs spyod thams cad zil gyis gnon to// de'i phyir lo bo cag kyang sosa'i gnas gnas na ngag dga' ba med pas// 'khor dang bcas te// 'phags/ 
150b2(phal chen): pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // kho bo cag 'di'i drung du phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cag la ci nas kyang rang rang gi sems sor chud nas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med
150b3(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba// de lta de lta chos ston to// dang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcus kyang / lha rdzas kyi me tog gis mngon par gtor te
150b4(phal chen): 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di/ dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba byed pa'i che/ kho bo cag/ kyang rang rang gi gnas na dga' ba med de/ de ltar bdag cag
150b5(phal chen): kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor dang bcas te 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag drung du phyin pa dang / 'di ni bdag cag la rang rang na/ sems la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// nyon
150b6(phal chen): mongs pa thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba dang // bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du skye ba la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang
150b7(phal chen): snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba'i rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshal dbang sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// / 
150b8(phal chen): rab 'phrul dga'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu yang // steng gi bar snang la 'khod de/ lha rdzas kyi klu yang dag par sbyar ba'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs bsgrags te/ mchod pa byas nas 'di skad ces
151a1(phal chen): // gis kyi tha gas pa dang/ 'jub lngas songs nu sadu ma 'du ma'ada' ma de da dpa' 'ong na semam ba
151a2(phal chen): med 'ang 'didag rnam par ngas ste/ gzul ba dang 'jo shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro// rgyun 'di dag dang / lha'i bu mo 'di das kyang / rnam par dag cing gsul la 'ong shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro// 
151a3(phal chen): de bas na bdag cas kyang tshwa'i bung l+h+wam la tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas/ 'dod pa la dga' bar tshor ba med / 'dod pa'i bde ba la mngon par dga' ba med pas// lus
151a4(phal chen): dang sems sim par gyur nas// 'phags pa'anga' dru du 'dong ba yin// 'phags pa 'dzin bdag cagadade ltar byin pa rnams la// sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir
151a5(phal chen): chos ston to// sems kyi 'a dang par byang dang / sem ci shin tu dag par bya ba dang / sems las su rung bar byad/ dang / sems kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / skye bar 'as
151a6(phal chen): shes 'thong ba rnam par dag pa chu dang / cho kyi shugs chen pa rnam par 'grol bar byung dang / sas rgyas kyi su nang med pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i byar lus rnam par ngas par bya ba dang / de
151a7(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thob par bya ba 'phyar ngag rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rab duthob par bya bar sems rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos rten to// 
151a8(phal chen): dag lda gyi lnga rgyal ba rgyang phrag 'tshu rna'adum chags kyi'ob nga cas pa khyong slong ga par snang la 'bangs/ dris sna chags / 
151b1(phal chen): phye ma'i sprin gyi char mngon par bab pas mchod pa byas te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'angags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i
151b2(phal chen): bdag cag kyang rang rang gi gnas nas dga' ba med de// de ltar dga' ba med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin pa rnams la// 'phags pa 'di ni yul thams cad la ltos pa med par bya ba'i
151b3(phal chen): phyir chos ston to// chog shes pa'i sems su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bskyod pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rab tu thob par bya ba nas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
151b4(phal chen): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// rab mtshe da ma'i lha'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dag gis kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog man
151b5(phal chen): dar ba'i char mngon par phab te 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i che/ bdag cag kyang lha rdzas kyi glu snyan pa la dga'
151b6(phal chen): ba med deg de lta dga' ba med pas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ste/ bdag cag phyin nas kyang // 'phags pa 'di ni// 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos
151b7(phal chen): thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin stong phrag bcu/ so so nas nye ba'i dbang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / lha'i bu dang / lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pas
151b8(phal chen): lha rdzas kyi gos dang rin po che'i rgyan dang / me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par phab ste 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe// bdag cag kya
152a1(phal chen): brgyadun gyi khang pa dang / bza' shing gi rab dang / rtse ba'i nags tshal dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang // gam yon glu len pa'i longs spyod la
152a2(phal chen): dga' ba med de// de ltar bdag cag dga' bo med pas 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag der phyin nas kyang // 'phags pa 'di ni kho bo cog la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir
152a3(phal chen): chos ston to// 'di dag thams cad ni rtag pa ma yinate// mi brtan zhing 'jig par 'gyur po'i chos canan zhes bya ba'i tshig brjod do// rdeg pa dang / ngag med pa thams cad yongs su
152a4(phal chen): gcang pa dang // bla na med pa'i byang chub tu slob bskyed pa'i phyi chos ston to// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 'dis bltas pa tsam gyis ri rab kyi rtse mo thams cad kyang g.yo bar
152a5(phal chen): 'gyur te// nges bdag cag gshegs pas sems skyong // gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems brtan pasathams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su smon lam mngon par
152a6(phal chen): sgrub bo// klu'i rgyal po shugs ldan dang // dga' bo dang // bsnyen dga' bo las sogs pa klu rgyu stong phrag bcu dag kyang steng gi bar snang la gnas shing / dus dang
152a7(phal chen): 'thun pa'i lha rdzas kyo tsan dan gyi sprin dang / klu'i bu mos glu blangs pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i dbyangs dang / lha rdzas kyi spos chu'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i char mngon par phab ste/ 'di skad ces
152a8(phal chen): 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe// me'i phung po chen po 'di las 'od chen po 'byung ste/ nges klu'i gnas thams cad snang bar
152b1(phal chen): byas nas/ bye ma'i char dang namakha' lding gi 'jigs pa yongs su sel to// khro ba 'byung ba yang zhi bar byas te/ lus sim par byas shing / yid shin tu mos par byed do// 
152b2(phal chen): sems shin tu mos par gyur nas// 'dags pa 'dzin bdag cag la chos ston na// 'di lta b+ha lam gyi rdung ngan pa rnam par smad pa dang // rlob pa'i las thams cad rab dus ba'i
152b3(phal chen): nga 'dugs su bcung cing ldan med pasang dag par rtogs pa'i byang chub chu sems dasteng du bcu de/ rnams ci ma khyen nyid la ma tu med du// nan sbyin gyi dbyu ba c-ing drug brtsos ngas
152b4(phal chen): mnga'i dngangs la 'khod de/ mchod nga rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// bram mi rgyal ba'i dzid kyi skye mched deng stong dpon gyi bu nor bangs la mchod pa byas nas/ 
152b5(phal chen): skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' ju lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ kho bo cagagi 'khor kun kyang / mi rnams la byams pa'i sems skye bar
152b6(phal chen): 'gyur te/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang // grul bum thams cad kyang // byams pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'tsho ba med pa la zhugs pa rnams
152b7(phal chen): kho bo cag gi drung du 'ong ngo // kho bo cag kyang de ltar byams pa'i dbang gis zil gyis non pas// rang rang gi gnas de dang de dag na dga' ba med de// de ltar bdag cag kyang rang rang gi skye bo'i 'khor
152b8(phal chen): dang bcas te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // bdag cag de ltar 'ongs pa rnams la/ 'phags pa 'di'i sku las byung ba'i 'od kyis lus thams cad snang bar byas
153a1(phal chen): shing / debs rgyab par mdza // de lda bdag gsus dang sems 'de ba gyur nas/ 'dags pa 'dzin canas kyang/ bdag cag la gnod sbyin dang / 
153a2(phal chen): chum ma mthong chu ma tsho ston te/ dwab ba bltang phrag sa/ gling gdur snang ma bangs/ bdis
153a3(phal chen): ces 'a// rigs kyi yul ba ca kyang rang rang gi gnas na 'dod pa'i'aphags pa nga / 'thub lngas yongs su gdu bam dpa' mo'i drung ba 'dil ma 'odang byung
153a4(phal chen): bdag cag gi gnas snang bar 'gyur ro// de ltar bdagaca/ 'ad des ngog te/ dade babasam gyis mi rgyab dab dang ldan par gyur pas// 'phags pa'a'i drung du 'dod / 
153a5(phal chen): bdag cas d+hA du dzin nas kya'aphags pa 'dzin pa dgasacinas kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs nga'i byang chub las byi mi ldog par 'gyur ba de ltar tshes sbyin no// 
153a6(phal chen): lA ma yin gyi dbang po stong phrag badrudanag kyang rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par son te/ rnam pa' la bus mo gsas pa'i ljang gtsug to// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces
153a7(phal chen): to/ rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'ad dga'adrub lngas sangs su gdudru ba mdzad pa'ikho ba cag gi lA ma yin gyi 'jig rten rgya mcho dang ra bcas po sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor rab tugs
153a8(phal chen): bar 'gyur te/ bdag cag kun gyi rgyal dang / rlom sems dang / dregs pa thams cad brtul zhugs dang dga' thub kyi zil gyis non te// 'phags pa 'di'i drung bu ro/ 
153b1(phal chen): ngo // der phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la g.yo sgyu thams cad rab tu spang ba dang chos zab mo'i bzod pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid la rab tu dgod pa dang
153b2(phal chen): stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to// na mkha' lding dbang po shugs chen po 'dzin pa la sogs pa na mkha' lding gi dbang po stong phrag bcus kyang bram ze'i
153b3(phal chen): bu shin tu sdug gu'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ me'i phung
153b4(phal chen): po 'di dag las 'od chen po byung ste/ bdag cag gis gnas snang bar byas nas yongs su g.yo bar byedado// des bdag cag kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste// skyo ba'i
153b5(phal chen): yid dang ldan par gyur nas 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // 'phags pa 'di yang bdag cag la chos ston cing byams pa chen po la yang dag par sbyor bar mdzad do// 
153b6(phal chen): snying rje chen po la yang dag par dgod pa mdzad do// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa la yang yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do// 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba'i sems can mngon par gdon par
153b7(phal chen): bya ba la yang yongs su sbyong bar mdzad do// lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo rnam par dag par bya ba la yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// shes rab dang thabs shin tu bskul ba la yang / 
153b8(phal chen): yang dag par sbyor ba mdzad do// rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba la yang rab tu sbyor ba mdzad do// mi 'am ci'i dbang po stong phrag
154a1(phal chen): bcu yang / steng gi bar snang la 'khod do// 'di skad ces 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu 'phags pa 'di dka' thub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad
154a2(phal chen): pa'i tshe kho bo cag gi gnas na 'khod pa'i shing ta la'i phreng ba las dril bu'i dra ba rin po che'i srad bus lnga ldir brgyus pa'i sil snyan dang rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang
154a3(phal chen): khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad las sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'byung ngo // chos kyi sgra dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa'i smon
154a4(phal chen): lam gyi sgra 'byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba che ge mo zhig na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig byang chub tu smon lam 'debs so// 'jig
154a5(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba chege mo zhig na ni/ byang chubasems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ dka' nga yongs su gtong ba byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs
154a6(phal chen): su bya ba cheg mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa' ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyong ba byed do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su
154a7(phal chen): bya ba che ge mo zhig nan byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di zhes bya ba zhig snying po byang chub tu 'gro'o// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya ba cheg mo zhig na ni byang chub sems dpa'
154a8(phal chen): ming 'di zhes byang ba zhig dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i bdung rab tu'am par byas te/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'am chu'o// 'jig ce
154b1(phal chen): khams kyi grangs su byang chege mo nag nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan 'di zhes bya ba zhig chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi grangs su bya che ge mo zhig na ni/ 
154b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ni che ge mo zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las ma lus par mdzad nas phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad do zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ 
154b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtswa dang shing dang yal ga dang / lo ma dang // 'dab ma thams cad rdul shin tu phra ba'i char blags pa'i mur thug par ni rung yang srid kyi/ de bzhin
154b4(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa'/ rnams kyi smon lam dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la 'jug pa'i khyad par gang kho bo cag gi gnas na yod
154b5(phal chen): ba'i shing ta la'i 'phreng ba las rol mo'i yo byad dang / rin po che'i sman dang / khyim gyi longs spyod rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra 'byung zhing / nga ro 'byin pa dang / rna lam du
154b6(phal chen): grag pa'i mtha' ni thug par mi rung ngo // de ltar bdag cag kyang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang // dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa dang / 
154b7(phal chen): mtshan gyi chu klung gi sgras dga' ba chen po'i shugs drag pos/ nyams bde ba skyes te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // de ltar bdag cag phyin par gyur nas kyang // 
154b8(phal chen): 'phags pa 'di ni bdag cag la ci nas kyang / kho bo cag gi 'khor gyi sems can du ma zhig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta bur
155a1(phal chen): chos ston pa mdzad do// 'dod pa la spyong pa'i rtswa'i bu stong phrag dpag tu med pa/ kha don shin tu mdzes padag kyang rnamatha' la 'jod cing / na
155a2(phal chen): kyis sprul pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ 'di skad ces 'dzer to// 'phags pa 'di dka'athub lngas yongs su gdung ba mdzad pa'i tshe/ mo phung po 'di dag las// rnam pa 'di la duH
155a3(phal chen): 'od 'byung ste/ 'od nges mar na mnar med pa yan chad du/ sems can dmyal ba rnams snang bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rje zil bar byas te/ 
155a4(phal chen): 'ong de nyid kyis 'phags pa 'di bdag cag gi mig lam du snang nga bar bstan pas de'i phyir kho bo cag kyang 'dzag ngas pa 'di la sems mos par gyur nas 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i ris
155a5(phal chen): nyams su bde bar skyes so// de ltar bdag cag kyang 'amags pa 'dis mdzad pa la drin du bzo zhing mthong bas mi ngoms pas 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad yongs su spa/ 
155a6(phal chen): te/ 'phags pa 'di'i drung du 'dong ngo // der bdag cag phyin nas kyang / 'phags pa 'di ni ci nas kyang / sems can tshad med pa'i rnams byang chub tu smon lam 'debs par
155a7(phal chen): 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston pa mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ chos kyi tshul rnam pa 'di lta bu thos nas/ dga' rangs te// mgu zhing nyams yid bde ba skyes
155a8(phal chen): bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la yang dag pa'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes bskyed de/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad
155b1(phal chen): ces smras so// 'phags pa de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' dang 'gal bar bgyis pa'i nongs pa la nongs par bshags so// / de nas bram pa rgyal ba'i drang kyi skye mched
155b2(phal chen): kyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig rjes su bstan dang 'thun byed cing // dran pa nye bar bzhag ste bla ma'i ngag
155b3(phal chen): gcig mi byed na/ de byi'i de 'don rnams thams cad 'dun par 'grub par 'gyur/ 'dun pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes byang chub drung du 'chang yang rgya/ de nas tshong dpon gyi thunor bdangs
155b4(phal chen): kyis rigasangasa'i lam du zla chis gshings pa la dgus te/ me'i phung po chen po der mchongs so/ de de ltar mchongs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting
155b5(phal chen): 'dzin shin tu brtan pa zhes bya bathob par gyur to// medas riganas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba'i dad pa mngon par shes pa zhes bya ba thob par gyur nas/ 
155b6(phal chen): des 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa'i me'i phung po la de ltar reg na bde ba dang / ri'i lam spu gris gtams pa 'di yang / de ltar reg na bde ba de ni ngo mtshar che'o// nges
155b7(phal chen): smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa// dkyil 'khor mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu des kho bos ni// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ 
155b8(phal chen): dkyil 'khor yongs su mi zad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' me'i phung po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad du
156a1(phal chen): yongs su zad par bya ba'i smon lam can ru mtshon phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ sems la thub pa med cing / sems dma' ba med pa dang ldan pa/ 
156a2(phal chen): yid zhum pa med pa can rdo rje'i snying po dang ldan pa'i mthu bo che lta bu/ brtsams pa chen po mthar phyin par bya ba la sgying lug pa mang pa sbyor ba lhod pa med pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu 'gro/ 
156a3(phal chen): ba thams cad kyi don du brtson pa brtson 'grus phyir mi ldog pa dang ldan pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha bgos pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs
156a4(phal chen): kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ zong khyer seng ge rnam dpar bsgyings pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po sa dge'i dpal gyi bu mo byams ma zhes bya ba bu mo lnga
156a5(phal chen): brgya'i 'khor dang 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba
156a6(phal chen): dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bram ze rgyal po'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched la/ lan brgya
156a7(phal chen): stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ bram ze rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs// dge ba'i
156a8(phal chen): bshes gnyen la rim gro bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa mos pa rgya chen pos rnam par dag pa theg pa chen po la mngon du phyogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par mos pa// sangs
156b1(phal chen): rgyas chos layang dag pa zhugs pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang bar rlob chos kyi mthol rnam par spyod pa chags pa med pa'i ye shes la mngon du gyur ba yang dag
156b2(phal chen): nga'i mtha' shin tu rtogs pa ye shes kyi mtha' la mi gnas pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ dus gsum skad cigago cha shas la khong du chung par byed pa rnam pa'i mtha' gnyis su ma ngon/ 
156b3(phal chen): du gyur pa mi gnyis pa'i mtha' rnam par gnod ma pa bathob pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' la rnam par mi chog par gnas pa/ bsgribs pa med pa'i mthas gdul ba khong du chung ba
156b4(phal chen): bya ba la zhugs pa chos kyi mtha' dang mi 'gal bar byab la gzhol pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' la mtha' med par khong du chud pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mamal
156b5(phal chen): la rnam par mo rtogs par gnas pa/ sems can thams cad/ kyi 'du shes kyi dra ba rnam par gtor ba'i ye shes la gzhol ba/ zhing la mngon par chags pa thams cad dang bral ba/ 
156b6(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba gnas pa med par spyod pa sems can
156b7(phal chen): thams cad la bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa ska thams cad tshig gi lam lta bur khong du chud ba/ gzugs thams cad gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan
156b8(phal chen): dang mnyam par rnam par rig par bya ba la/ gzhol ba de mthar gyis seng ge rnam par bgyings pa'i grong khyer gang na ba der phyin te/ bu mo byams ma tshol zhing yongs su rmed med pa las// 
157a1(phal chen): rgyal po seng go'i dpal gyi bu mo byams ma 'khor bu mo lnga brgya dang ldan pade yang ba rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i nang na can dan sbrul gyi sring da
157a2(phal chen): rkang pa can gser gyi lcag bod kyi dra bas legs par byas pa lha rdzas kyi stan bting ba la 'dug cing chos ston to zhes thos nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i grong khyer du song ste/ 
157a3(phal chen): rgyal po seng ge'i dpal gyi gnas gang na ba der phyin nas rgyal po'i bya sgo'i'o sgo gang na bu mo byams ma mthong bar dga' ba'i phyir/ stod cing 'dug 'dug ba dang
157a4(phal chen): des der srog chags brgya phrag dum dang srog chags stong phrag du ma dang srog chags pargya stong drag du ma 'dod ba mthong nas// tre gang nas 'ong dgang du ngong nam
157a5(phal chen): dris pa dang / de dag na re ni// du mo byams ma'i drung chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzing ngo zhes nas nges pasam pa 'dir ni su 'gro lang dag pa med lnga zhig snyam ste/ de yang / 
157a6(phal chen): nang du phyin to// de ltar phyin te bltas na/ khang pa rnam par snang ba'i snying po can de yang gzhi shel du 'dug pa'i sa las blangs te/ bai n+d+han+da'i kab bkye brtsig pa rdo rje las byas pa
157a7(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi lhun dang ldan pa pagam brgya drag stong gis brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pas rnam par bris pa/ rin po che stong gi slong po'i ma long gi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu swa
157a8(phal chen): ba byas / na pa che mi du rnam pa can rin mtshig mas med ngas sa ma nos/ gser grongs bung rgyam
157b1(phal chen): 'khrol ba'i sgra snyan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan par 'dug par mthong ngo // bu mo byams ma des yang mig dkar nag 'byes pa/ skra mthon ting du 'dug pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog
157b2(phal chen): ltar 'dug pa mthong nas/ nges de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces
157b3(phal chen): smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang // ji
