157b4(phal chen): ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ma dzad do zhes bdag gis thos na// 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub
157b5(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du dgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ kho mo'i gnas kyi rgyan la ltos
157b6(phal chen): shig ces nas/ des kun tu byung te bltas pa dang / rtsig pa re re dang / ka ba re re dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor re re dang / rnam pa'i bye brag re re dang / dbyibs re re dang / nor bu rin po che re re dang
157b7(phal chen): gser gyi dril bu re re dang / rin po che'i shing re re dang / ba spu'i bu ga re re dang / rin po che'i sen mo do re re dag las kyang // chos kyi dbyings thams cad na// bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa/ thog ma thugs
157b8(phal chen): bskyed pa dang bcas pa/ spyod pa dang / smon lam gyi yul dang bcas pa 'byung ba'i rgyan dang bcas pa/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang bcas pa/ yongs su
158a1(phal chen): mya ngan las 'das bston pa dang bcas par gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du mthong bar 'gyur to// dmigs pa de dag ri rims// ji lta bde bzhin du/ dmigs pa
158a2(phal chen): cad las kyang mthong bar gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na// chus yongs su gang ba'i mchod ngapa zhing rnyog pa med pa la rnam par gsul ba la ni/ nam mkha'i nyi zla dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa
158a3(phal chen): gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du yongs su snang ngo // de bzhin du 'ang ba rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i dmigs pa re re las kyang chos kyi dbyings kun na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
158a4(phal chen): cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang bar gyur to// de ni bu mo dbyams ma'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu'i phyir te/ des de ltar rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'i
158a5(phal chen): rgyan gyi mtshan ma de yongs su bzung ste/ thal mo sbyar nas bu mo byams ma'i gdong du bltas pa dang // des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho ma rna shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
158a6(phal chen): sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba thob pa ste// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud 'di ni// kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa chu klung 'gang 'ga' sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed las yongs su
158a7(phal chen): brtsal ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di/ sgo sna tshogs kyi khong du chud par bya bas rtogs par mdzad de/ 
158a8(phal chen): gcig gis gang du gsungs pa de yang gnyis kyis ma gsungs so// smras pa 'phags ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud kun nas rnam par rgyan pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis
158b1(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi chom tshun pa na'i rgyung kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'dilakham mngon du byed cing sems dpa'adang / rjes du 'drang bar byab
158b2(phal chen): rnam par dpyod pa dang / rjes su sems pa dang / dran pa bya ba dang / sangs su gzung ba dang / rnam par brtags pa dang / mngon par sgrub pa dang / yang dag par rgyan par byung da/ 
158b3(phal chen): rab tu rnam par dbye byed pa'i tshe/ gzungs kun nas skye zhes bya ba yongs sa skye ste/ gardzas kyi dkyil 'khor der ni chos kyi slo bcu sbyong mang sa med pa khrag su yongs su 'du'o// 
158b4(phal chen): su nu pa/ man du 'gyuraro// man par du/ kho san 'amang / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyidang gi sgo dang / sas rgyas kyin dang / chos
158b5(phal chen): sems can su rtswa / 'das pa 'grod / 'am nga nga chu ba na nga/ gnas sa nams nga
158b6(phal chen): shes kyin dang shes kyi chogs pa / snyun la gyi nang/ sman pas kyi rnam sko / spyad pa nang spyong pa rnam pa
158b7(phal chen): pasangs su byung ba sgra dang / spyod pa yongs su zhugs par byu ba'i sgong las kyin dang / las dang ma gal rlo las
158b8(phal chen): ma ba du bya tshochomanyam pa'ilam ngas su ma ma nga ya pa mas lanan tan du byung na dang / las la nga gyu nang/ 
159a1(phal chen): par spyad pa'i sgodang / legs par rung ba yang dag par byung ba'i sgo dang / ting nge dzin gyi sgo dang / ting nge dzin gyi khong du chung bar bya ba'i sgo dang / ting nge
159a2(phal chen): la rnam par sbyad pa'i sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin spyod yul gyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i sgo dang / sems rgya mtsho'i sgo dang / sems kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo
159a3(phal chen): dang / sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi thobs po snang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems kyi mtsho dang bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sems 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems rnam par rgyu
159a4(phal chen): ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi kun nas nyon mongs rgyu ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i ngag chags kyi sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sbyor ba'i sgo dang / mos pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi
159a5(phal chen): spyod pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang 'jig rten 'byung ba'i sgo dang / sems can gyi bsam pa'i sgo dang / sems can gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa'i sgo
159a6(phal chen): dang / phyogs kyi sgo dang chos kyi phyogs kyi sgo dang // snying rje chen po'i sgo dang / byams pa chen po'i sgo dang / zhi ba'i sgo dang / ngag gi lam gyi sgo dang / tshul gyi sgo dang / khong du chud par bya ba'i sgo dang
159a7(phal chen): rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang // yang dag par 'du ba'i sgo dang // chags pa med pa'i mtha'i sgo dang / kun gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sgo dang / nyan
159a8(phal chen): thos kyi chos kyi sgo dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sgo dang // 'jig rten 'byung ba'i chos kyi sgo dang // 'jig rten 'jig pa'i chos kyi sgo dang / 'jig rten kun nas
159b1(phal chen): gnas pa'i sgo dang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang 'jig rten gyi khams su kun nas nyon mongs la rnam par
159b2(phal chen): dag pa'i sgo dang 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu
159b3(phal chen): rnam par dag pa'i sgo nga 'jig rten gyi khams gzhi mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ba'i sno dang 'jig rten gyi khams sbrel zhi'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi spyi
159b4(phal chen): rmugs su rgyud 'i sgo dang mig 'phrul du 'jug pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud kyi sgo dang / gnas kyi 'du shes kyi rnam par gyur pa'i sgo dang // phra ba rgya chen por 'ong
159b5(phal chen): du chud bar bya ba'i sgo dang / rgya chen po phra bar khong du chud par bya bsgo dang / sangs rgyas mthong bar bya ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'od zer
159b6(phal chen): gyi dra ba rnam pa tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor
159b7(phal chen): lo tha dad pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo tha mi dad pa'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i nges pa'i tshig gi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba kun tu
159b8(phal chen): 'khor ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyi sgo dngasangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba'i sgo dang
160a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi stobs snang ba'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / 
160a2(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul bapa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sbyong ba'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sgo dang / 
160a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi sems can pha rol gyi sems thugs su chud pa'i sgo dang sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i sgo dang dga' ldan gyi po drang na bzhugs pa'i sgo nas/ yongs
160a4(phal chen): su mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pa'i bar gyi sgo dang / sems can gyi ngon tshad med pa mdzad pa'i sgro dang / chos zabamo'i tshul gyi sgong chos sna tshogs kyi tshul gyi
160a5(phal chen): sgo dang byang chub kyi sems kyi chos kyi rnam pa'i sgo da byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i chos kyi sgo / byang chub kyi sems kyi tshogs kyi rnam pa'i sgo dang // sngon
160a6(phal chen): lam gyi rnam pa'i sgo dang / spyod pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / mngon par shes pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / gzungs rnam par dag pa'i sgo dang / ye/ 
160a7(phal chen): shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / shes rab yongs su dag pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / byang chub tshad med pa'i rnam pa'i sgo dang / dran pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam
160a8(phal chen): pa'i sgo dag ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'i rgyud dran pas kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di shes par zad na// kho mos byang chub sems dpa'
160b1(phal chen): nam pa'i dbyings dang mnyam pa rna zas chos kyi dbyings ltar yangs pa rgyud bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis brtan pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa// 'jig rten
160b2(phal chen): gyi chos yongs su mi rgyu ba/ ye shes snang ba'i mig rang rib med pa rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad mun pa med par khong du chud pa// blo na mkha' lha'i tshad med pa dang ldan pa
160b3(phal chen): dmigs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i mig can// chags pa med pa'i sa snang ba'i snying po dang ldan pa// chos thams cad kyi don rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pa zil gyis gnon la/ 'jig rten kun
160b4(phal chen): gyis zil gyis mi non pa// 'jig rten gyi spyod pa'i tshul rnam par spyod pa// 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad na kha na ma thob med pa/ 'jig rten gyi don byed pa la brtson pa/ 'gro ba thams
160b5(phal chen): cad kyi ngag gi tshul dang rnam pa la mkhas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du gnas pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhi/ na du rnam par dmigs pa ston pa/ dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad
160b6(phal chen): la dbang sgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul mig gsum pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong blta na sdug pa
160b7(phal chen): zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang
160b8(phal chen): kyis/ bu mo byams ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bu mau byams mal lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te bu mo byams
161a1(phal chen): ma'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rnam par spyod pa zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings
161a2(phal chen): kyi gzhi zab mo khong du chud par bya ba rjes su bsam pa dang / sems can gyi ye shes shin tu phra zhing zab pa rjes su bsam pa dang / 'jig rten gyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa zab mo rjes su bas mi pa
161a3(phal chen): dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / sems kyi rgyud kyi dbyings zab mo rjesu bsam pa dang // rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang / 
161a4(phal chen): rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang // 'gro ba thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa'i bden pa'i dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang chos kyi dbyings brgyan
161a5(phal chen): ba'i rgyan gyi dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa dang // lus kyi 'khrul 'khor shugs kyis 'khor ba'i dbyings zab mo 'i rjes su bsam pa dang / las kyis sna tshogs kyi
161a6(phal chen): dbyings zab mo rjes su bsam pa byed cing / mthar gyis yul mig gsum pa gang na ba der phyin te// yul gyi 'khor dang grong khyer gyi 'khor dang // tshong 'dus kyi 'khor dang // grong rdal gyi
161a7(phal chen): 'khor dang yul gru'i 'khor dang / lhas kyi 'khor dang // drang srong dge ba sbyong ba'i gnas kyi 'khor dang / yul dang phyogs kyi 'khor dang / chu'i rgyud kyi 'khor dang / ri'i sal sul gyi
161a8(phal chen): 'khor dang / nags tshal chen po'i 'khor dag tu/ dge slong blta na sdug pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las// des dge slong blton sdug pa/ nags tshal sdug pa zhig na gzhon zhing ngar la bab pa/ 
161b1(phal chen): gzugs mdzes shing sdug lang ldan yid du 'ong ba/ sgra mngon ting g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa/ mgo gdugs ltar 'jug pa// gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can 'bral ba yangs pa/ 
161b2(phal chen): mig dkar gnag 'byes shing ril la rdzi ma pa'i rdzi ma ltar 'dug pa/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la/ ra bar mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ mchu mtshal ltar mdog bzang
161b3(phal chen): zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa so mnyam zhing thags bzang la shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu chung ba dang ldan pa/ 'gram pa'i lhang seng ge ltar 'dug pa/ mkhur ba shas gang zhing
161b4(phal chen): rgyas pa/ smin tshugs gcu ltar 'dug cing ring la/ shin du mdzes pa mdzod spu'i zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thig le can rma shal ring zhing lhong bar 'byung ba zla
161b5(phal chen): ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing shin tu bzang ba/ mgu la zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa snying ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan pa/ ro stong seng ge'i stong lhar 'dug pa
161b6(phal chen): thal gong shin tu rgyas pa dpung mgo'i lhun legs shing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can rkang lag 'khor los brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon la
161b7(phal chen): shas rgyas pa bdun shin tu mtho ba/ rked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa// lus che zhing drang ba/ brla zlum pa/ pho mtshan gsang ba'i sbubs na 'dug pa// byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i byin ltar
161b8(phal chen): 'dug pa sor mo ring ba rkang pa'i rting pa yangs pa// 'od 'dom gang ba dang / mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa/ ba sU re ra nas g.yas phyogs su gyen du 'khyil pa/ shing n+ya
162a1(phal chen): nga rgyal ba lta chu ga ma nga sa shin tu can pa/ dgasul stsa ga mdzangs/ 
162a2(phal chen): gnas pa ri'i rgyal po la ba can ltar rtsa dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang shing bran sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ blo shin tu yangs pa/ ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / yul la dzu
162a3(phal chen): pa med pa/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan gyi sgra lta bu dang ldan pa/ g.yo ba dang rlom sems dang g.yeng ba dang spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi snong dul
162a4(phal chen): ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po'i snang ba thob pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dadang gdul ba'i nges ma pa'i rgyun mi 'chang ba snying rje chen
162a5(phal chen): po'i dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs pa skyes pa de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi ye shes snang ba yang dag par
162a6(phal chen): bskyed pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul rjes su dran zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du 'chag pa la zhugs te drag dal med cing bad ral med la shin tu mdzes par
162a7(phal chen): 'chag pa gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i gos dang ldan pa lha dang klu dang // gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang / lha ma yin dang // na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin
162a8(phal chen): dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // dge slong bltan mdzes pa de 'chag pa'i tshe phyogs mngon du gyur pa'i phyogs kyi/ 
162b1(phal chen): lha rnams phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su sgrub par byed do// rkang gis 'gro'i rnams rin po che bang mos gom pa 'dor ba'i tshe yongs su drangs 'byed do// me'i lha sdang ba'i dkyil
162b2(phal chen): 'khor zad mi shes pa rnams kyang mun pa dang / rab rib rnam par sel to// 'dzam bu rgyal mtshan gyi nags tshal gyi lha rnams kyang / me tog mang po'i char mngon par 'bebs so// 
162b3(phal chen): sa'i lha mi g.yo ba'i snying po can rnams kyang rin po che'i 'byung gnas mang ba stan to// namakha'i lha kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang ldan pa rnams kyang rnam pa'i dbyings yongs su brgyan
162b4(phal chen): pa byed do// rgya mtsho'i lha dpal kun nas 'byung ba rnams kyang / rin po che dam pa mang pos mngon par 'thor ro// ri rab kyi lha dri ma med pa'i snying po can rnams kyang thal mo sbyar
162b5(phal chen): cing phyag 'tshal lo// rlung gi lha thogs pa med pa'i stobs can rnams kyang spos dang / bdug spos dang / me tog 'thor ba'i rlung rab tu 'gyed do// mtshan mo'i lha
162b6(phal chen): gnas par byed pa lus shin tu brgyan pa rnams kyang / lus shin tu btud cing phyag 'tshal lo// nyin mo'i lha rtag tu sad par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor can rnams kyang nor bu rin po
162b7(phal chen): che phyogs snang bar byed pa'i rgyal mtshan thogs shing snang ba bskyed pa'i phyir na mkha'i dbyings la 'khod do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge slong blta na sdug pa gang na ba der phyin
162b8(phal chen): nas dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la spyi bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa'i bol gnyis la bzhin sbyar te/ legs par
163a1(phal chen): khyis nas mdun du 'dug ste/ rnal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa padag ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
163a2(phal chen): rmus nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba yongs su tshol bzhin lags te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ga mas dgadang rjes su bstan pa mang do nas
163a3(phal chen): bdag gis thos na 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi bar dag la bshad du gsol/ nges
163a4(phal chen): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni/ ches btob na dang la ba dbang rab tu byung bas btang nagasar du zhugs pa ste/ darigs kyi bu li zas ni/ che 'dra ba gcig gis// de bzhin ga shes
163a5(phal chen): pa chu klung gang gsum cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi drung du tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zham ring du ni nyin gcig tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do// 
163a6(phal chen): la lar ni nyin zhag bdun du/ la lar ni zla ba phyed du/ la lar ni zla ba gcig tu/ la lar ni lo gcig tu la lar ni lo brgyar/ la lar ni lo stong du// la lar ni lo brgya
163a7(phal chen): phrag stong du/ la lar ni lo bya bar/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrig du/ la la 'ani lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par/ la lar ni bskal ba bar mar/ la lar ni bskal pa phyed du/ 
163a8(phal chen): la lar ni bskal bar/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la ma'i gas ring du ni bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ bskal pa bgrang ba'i tshul
163b1(phal chen): 'datsa kyis/ de bzhin/ shegs thathams cad las chos brnyan pa thos te/ gdams ga dang / rjes su bstan pa yang dag par nungs sa/ smon lam kyi rgyan mongs su rgyas
163b2(phal chen): so// yang dag par bsgrub pa'i yul la zhugs so// spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su sbyangs so// pha rol tu phyin pa rgya mtsho yongs su rdzogs par byas so// mngon par rdzogs par/ 
163b3(phal chen): 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par byas so// de dag gis chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba phan tshun ma 'dres pa dag kyang yongs su gzung ngo // de dag gi stobs mnyam pa nyid kyang khong
163b4(phal chen): du chud par byas so// de dag gi bstan po yang dam pa'i chos zad pa'i mthar thug gi bar du yongs su bzung ngo // // kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon
163b5(phal chen): lam rnams kyang / smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin mngon par bsgrub pa'i stobs kyis rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par
163b6(phal chen): bsgrubs so// kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams kyang spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rang gi spyod pa yongs
163b7(phal chen): su dag par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs so// kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'ang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas 'byung ba'i
163b8(phal chen): stobs kyis mngon par bsgrubs so// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho bo 'chags 'di na 'chags pa'i tshe/ phyogs kyi rgyud kyi sgo thams cad kyang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i ye shes kyi sgos
164a1(phal chen): mngon 'gyuraro// 'ag rten gyi mas kyi chung gyi sgrubams pang sngon la ma chen po ngo nga d+has pa gyung kyis sems bskyed pa gas/ 
164a2(phal chen): la'ajig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa 'ang zhing yongs su dag par bye ba'i phyir rnam par 'grub par 'gyur ro// sems kyi na cig gcig la/ sems can
164a3(phal chen): spyod pa'i tshul gyi sgo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis
164a4(phal chen): stobs bcu'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mthong ba rnam
164a5(phal chen): par dag pa dag kyang snga phyi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
164a6(phal chen): nga'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed la/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs
164a7(phal chen): pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char rnams kyang chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis chos
164a8(phal chen): kyi tshul grangs med pa rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir bsam pa la mngon par 'bab bo// sems bskyed pa gcig la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pargya mtsho brjod du med
164b1(phal chen): pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa nig 'phrul lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams
164b2(phal chen): cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gca
164b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yang dag par 'du bar bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir
164b4(phal chen): mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la dbang po nga rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang dran pa'i mthar phyin pa'i dbang po thob par bya ba'i smon lam
164b5(phal chen): mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis/ dbang po'i 'khor la dang / dus kyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi rjes su 'bra nga bar bya ba'i phyir mngon par 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa
164b6(phal chen): gcig la/ dus kyi 'khor lo brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang / sems can zad mi shes pa zad par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis dus thams cad du
164b7(phal chen): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i phyir mngon du 'gyur ro// sems bskyed pa gcig la/ dus rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa thams cad kyang dus gcig tu rnam par dgod pa'i tshul
164b8(phal chen): / khong du chud pa'i ye shes snang ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum rnam par dgod pa'i phyir mngon sum du 'gyur te// rigs kyi bu kho 'is
165a1(phal chen): ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shin tu zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje
165a2(phal chen): lta bu dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba/ srog gi dbang po la rgyun 'chad pa med pa ye shes kyi sgron ma zhi bar 'gyur ba med pa mi shigs mi phyed pa'i
165a3(phal chen): lus dang ldan pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i gzugs shin tu grub pa// rgyu'i chos dang mnyam pa'i yan lag dang nying lag du ldan pa'i lus can 'gro ba rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba
165a4(phal chen): bzhin du rnam par dmigs par byed pa'i lus dang ldan dpa 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng yongs
165a5(phal chen): su ston pa me mdag dang me lce dang / dug dang mtshon gyis mi tshugs pa'i lus dang ldan pa rje ltar sra zhing khor yug ltar thub pa med pa'i lus can// bdud
165a6(phal chen): dpas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyi stobs kyi stobs med par byed pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ri bo dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams
165a7(phal chen): cad du rnam par dmigs pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ sgo thams cad du rnam par dmigs shing thos par 'gyur ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis ngor blta ba/ chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi 'byung gnas su
165a8(phal chen): gyur pa'i/ phyogs kun du rnam par snang ba/ sgrib pa'i rithams cad rnam par gtor bas/ bltan mongs pa/ mi dge ba'i chu ba thams cad shin tu dpa'abar snang ba// dge ba'i dra ba rgya chen po
165b1(phal chen): rgyuchu thun pa las byung bas bstan dga' ba 'byung bar shin tu dka' zhing dkon pas me tog u dus par lta bu de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am yon tan brjod par nu skan song rigs kyi
165b2(phal chen): bu lho phyogs kyi rlud 'di nyid na/ yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na zong khyer sgo bzang po zhes bya ba yod do/ de na khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i'adug gis de'i gan
165b3(phal chen): du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
165b4(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang / nan tan rnam par dag par bya ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dang 'i stobs snang bas/ sems shin tu snang bar gyur pa byang
165b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub cing brgal thag chad pa'i snying dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems/ dpa'i smon lam gyi go cha bzang pos sems zhum pa med pa/ byang
165b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa' bsam pa brtan pas/ kun tu gnas shing yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ba la brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i sprin gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa'i bsam pa dang / byang
165b7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su mi ngoms pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad la 'jug pa'i smon lam mngon du gyur pa// 'gro ba thams
165b8(phal chen): cad kyi kha lo sgyur bas/ yongs su sdud par bdag nyid yongs su gtong bar 'dod pa 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mthi' dgon pa pa chen po las bzla bar 'dod pa dge
166a1(phal chen): pa'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang / mnyan pa dang / bsnyen bkur bas/ yongs su ma ngoms pas/ chos kyi rim gro chad med pa skyed pa dang ldan pa
166a2(phal chen): des/ dge slong blta na sdug pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong blta na sdug pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ 
166a3(phal chen): dge slong blta na sdug pa'i drung nas song ngo // / 'phags pa sangs rgyas ngal po che zhes bya ba// / bam po dgu cu rtsa bzhi pa/

166a5(phal chen): pa dang / so sor rnam par sgom pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / rjes su ba sam pa dang / mngon par 'jug par bya ba dang / bkur ba dang / 
166a6(phal chen): khong du chud bar bya ba da yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba dang / yang dang yang bzlas pa dang / shin tu rtogs par bya ba dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / snang bar bya ba dang / rjes su rnam par
166a7(phal chen): blta bar byed cing lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor dang bcas pa de mthar gyis yul dge sbyong gi dkyil 'khor gyi grong khyer sgo bzang po gang na ba der phyin te khye'u dbang
166a8(phal chen): de'i dbang phyug yongs su tshol tshol ba las de'i steng gi bar snang las/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis bos pa rigs kyi bu khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug ni chu klung gi
166b1(phal chen): chu 'dus dang nye bzhig na byis pa stong phrag bcu bram gyis bskor te/ bye ma la rtsebs pa zhing 'dug go// zhes nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer sgo bzang po dang nye ba'i
166b2(phal chen): chu klung gi chu 'dus gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang // dus khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug byis pa stong phrag bcu tsam gyis bskor cing / bye ma la tse bas tse ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khye'u dbang po'i
166b3(phal chen): dbang phyug ga na ba der song ste/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos dag 'tshal nas/ khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas

166b6(phal chen): la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyong ba la bslab par bgyi ba dang /

166b8(phal chen): te/ bzo thams cad mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgor bcug go// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni 'jig rten na yig ge dang ming gi rnam pa dang / grangs dang / rtsis dang /

167a2(phal chen): dang brjed byed dang / 'byung po'i gdon gyis btab pa gso ba dang grong dang grong khyer dang // tshong 'dus dang / bza' shing gi ra ba dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / gnas rnam par

167a8(phal chen): ngag la sems can yongs su gzud par byed do// rab tu dgod pa byed do// yongs su gzhog par byed do// slob du 'dzud do// sbyong du 'jung ngo // brtan par byed do// lhur len par byed
167b1(phal chen): rdzogs par byed do// yongs su sgrub par byed do// yongs su spyod par byed do// gsal bar bstan pa byed do// rnam par 'phel bar byed do// mtshan mar byed do// mthar

167b3(phal chen): bu kho bos/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsis kyi tshul shes pa de gang zhe na/ brgya stong phrag brgyan bye ba'o// bye ba bye ba na khong khong khong khong khong khong na thang dgu'o// thang dag
167b4(phal chen): zad dgum khrig khrig go// khrig khrig khrig khrig naHsa su thams so// gathams thams thams thams namang mying // myud kying myang myi nag pa'o// gang mi gang yan pan rgya //

168a1(phal chen): gsum lam thum nasalalam ma// mam maman la sal mthal tshul lo// khral thul thal rgyal ma dung thu // thung thung chung zu na pas mamyong //

168a5(phal chen): yal yal yal na bgrang yas so// bgrang yas bgrang yas na thug yal lo// thug yal thug yal na shangashang ngo // shang shang shang shang na yag yag go//

168a7(phal chen): yal gzhal yal na gzhal med do// gzhal med gzhal med na gzhal 'khor to// gzhal 'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo// gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo//

168b1(phal chen): gzhal zhigazhal zhin 'phyo 'gyur ro// 'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro// nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag byig go// phyag byig phyag phyog na bal tshul lo// thal zul thal tshul na sal
168b2(phal chen): sal lo// sa la sa la sal sa la na g.yo ldeg go// g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no// lan phun phan phun na brnang ya'o// brnang yang rnang yan rem 'drol lo// 
168b3(phal chen): rim 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngang // rdzi ngang rdzi nga na rdzi rdul to// rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo// phun yol phun yol nang da ngang ngo // ngang ngang ngang ngang na bgrang brtsil
168b4(phal chen): bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsin zab bgrang ngo // zab bgrang zab padamang na dga' rkyang ngo // dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gsung 'dal lo// gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug byang ngo //

168b6(phal chen): bgrang yas bgrang yas na khyim 'byo'o// byim 'pho byim 'phyon ya me'o// ya me ya me na bsnyal yas so// bsnyal yas bskal yas na lngab ldeb bo// lngab ldeb ldab
168b7(phal chen): ldeb na 'ban chad do// 'ban chad 'ban chad na pang phung ngo // pang phung phang phung na khye'u cung ngo // khye'u cang khye'u cang na zhung zung ngo // zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo// 
168b8(phal chen): mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rdul to// mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so// yun 'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo// bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo// 
169a1(phal chen): lam mam 'am lasan sna mas so/ bska pas bzlang mas na lang ri nga / 'ang tshang la yadan lnga byu po// lnga bats+tsha ldab
169a2(phal chen): na mi brtsal to// mi brtsal mi brtsal na 'byam yas so// 'byam yas 'byam yas nang 'grang ngo // nga 'grang nga 'grang na smos yal lo// smos yal smos yal na bkra chal
169a3(phal chen): lo/ bkra chal bkra tshal na lo rgyas so// lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib bo// 'bum rdib 'bum rdib nag ma gum mo// gamagum ga mgum na la lo'o// la lo la lon bgrang
169a4(phal chen): 'phyos so// bgrang 'phyos bgrang 'phyos na bgrang 'phyos la dbasgres pa'o// 'grang 'phyos la bsgres pa/ bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa na/ dpag yas so// dpag yas dpag
169a5(phal chen): yas na/ dpag yas la bsgres pa'o// dpag yas la bsgre sa pa dpag yas la bsgres pa na yal phyong ngo // yal phyong yal phyong na yal phyong la bsgres pa'o// yal phyong
169a6(phal chen): la bsgres pa yal phyong la bsgres pa na/ mu yal lo// mu yal mu ya la na mu yal lang sgres pa'o// mu yal la bsgres pa/ mu yal la bsgres pa na// bgrang yol lo// bgrang yol
169a7(phal chen): bgrang yol na// bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o// bgrang yol la dgres pa dgrang yol la bsgres na/ mi 'jal to// mi 'jal mi 'jal na/ mi 'jal la bsgres pa'o// mi 'jal
169a8(phal chen): la bsgres pa/ mi 'jal la bsgres na/ bsam phyod ngo // bsam phyod bsam pyong na/ bsam pyod la bsgres pa'o// bsam phyod la bsgres pa/ bsam phyod la bsgres na// mtha' 'bya mo// 
169b1(phal chen): mtha' 'byam mtha' 'byam na// dang gzag go// dang gathag dpa ga thag na// dang gzug la bsgres pa'o// dang ga thag la bsgres pa/ dang gzag la bsgres na// brjod du med pa'o// brjod du med/ 
169b2(phal chen): pa/ brjod du med pa na// brjod du med pa la bsgres pa'o// brjod du med pa la bsgres pa/ brjod du med pa la bsgres na// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o// 
169b3(phal chen): de'i mdun na bye ma'i phung po chen po// dpag tshad du ma'i tshad dang ldan pa zhig 'dug 'dug pa las 'di la bye ma'i 'bru 'di snyed cig yod do// zhes bya ba nas bye ma'i 'bru brjod du med
169b4(phal chen): ba'i yang brjod du med pa la bsgres pa/ 'di snyed ci/ yod do/ zhes rab tu phye nas bgrangs brtsis ste grangs su bcang ngo // des bye ma'i lung bi de rgyas kyi brdar
169b5(phal chen): bstan pas shin tu bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang pa'i tshul 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas
169b6(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa kun na'ang yod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag kyang bgrang zhing rtsi'o// de zhin
169b7(phal chen): du lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang // nub byang gi phyogs
169b8(phal chen): mtshams dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs su'ang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag bgrang zhing rtsi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
170a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'dzin phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mong du bya ba/ gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa thams
170a2(phal chen): cad na'ang yod do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bgrang zhing rtsi'o// ji ltar
170a3(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan tu yod pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i bskal pa'i ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan tu yod pa dang // sangs
170a4(phal chen): rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu brgyud pa bstan tu yod pa dang / chos kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa sems can gyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod
170a5(phal chen): pade/ las kyi ming gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan du yod pa kun la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa rnams kyi bgrang ba'i tshul 'di nyid ni/ phyogs btsun ming du
170a6(phal chen): bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan tu rung ba ji snyed pa thams cad la'ang 'jug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul 'dis phyogs bcu na ming gcig nas gcig tu
170a7(phal chen): brgyud pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang / bgrang zhing brtsi'o// de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes sna tshogs chos thams cad shes par bya ba'i bzo mngon
170a8(phal chen): bar shes pa dang ldan pa/ 'di shes par zad na// kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa chos kyi tshul thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ dus gsum
170b1(phal chen): gyi grangs la zhugs pa sems can thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ chos kyi phung po thams cad kyi grangs la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi
170b2(phal chen): grangs la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad kyi ming gi 'khor lo dbang sgyur ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ spyod yul smos pa 'am/ yul brjod pa'am/ stobs
170b3(phal chen): bsngags pa'am/ bsam pa bstan pa'am// tshogs yongs su brjod pa 'am// smon lam bshad par bya ba'am// spyod pa yongs su bstan pa'am/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa mngon par
170b4(phal chen): brjod pa 'am/ yang dag par bsgrub pa yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan pa'am// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par smos pa'am/ ye shes snang ba khong du chud par nus re skan/ song rigs
170b5(phal chen): kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na// grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis// de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub
170b6(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig thos nas sru
170b7(phal chen): g.yos te/ dga' ba chen po'i shugs skyes nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i mi dang ldan par gyur pa ngo mtshar gyi bsam paran po che rab tud kon bathob pa/ 'gro ba mang po la
170b8(phal chen): phan pa'i sems dang / bsam pas byung ba// sangs rgyas skyes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud par 'gro ba la dbang sgyur ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i blo gros la rten pa thams cad
171a1(phal chen): da rjes su song ba'i rigs pa rnam par bye bas 'byung ba bstan pa la brtson pa dus gsum gyi dungs su ma 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dang ldan pa
171a2(phal chen): bsod nams mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dbang sgyur ba khams gsum gyi khyim du sdud pa'i sgo shin tu gcog pa des khye'u dbang por
171a3(phal chen): dbang phyag gi nang pa gnyis la skyo bos phyog 'tshal nasakhye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug la lan rgya stong du mar gsas phyogs su bskor ba byas nasayang dang yang bltas te/ 
171a4(phal chen): khye'u dbang po'i dbang phyug gi drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams dgag sman gyi char yongs su 'dzin pa byed tsang
171a5(phal chen): gangs chen mtsho ltar sgron chen po'i char gyis ngoms mi shes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi nyi ma'i ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis/ dge ba yongs su smon par byas pa'i sa gzhi las dbang
171a6(phal chen): po'i myug gu 'thon cing skyes pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i gdams ngag gi 'od zer gyi drabs lus dang sems shin tu tshim par byas pa/ dpyid kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis gang
171a7(phal chen): pa'i ridags kyi tshogs gas la zhing bsil ba'i gangs chul 'thung bar 'dong pa ltar dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyi gangams dgag tshul 'byung bar 'dod pa/ zung ba mang po 'aSha nang ldang bas rgyas
171a8(phal chen): par gyur pa'i dang mo dang ldan pa'i dang mo'i mtsho ltar dge bo'i ba shes gnyen gyi gdams ngagagis sems kyi ma tog punang rig 'byeb rin po che sna tshogs kyis man/ 
171b1(phal chen): su rgyas pa'i rin po che'i gling ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam/ sa ngag rin po che 'phel ba'i snang bas sems shin tu snang bar byas pa/ 'dzam du'i shing chen po me tog dang 'bras bu
171b2(phal chen): tshogs chen po dang ldan pa ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su gyur pa/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ 
171b3(phal chen): dbang po chen po rtsed mo dam pas rtse ba las byung ba'i namakha'i sprin chen po ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag thos pa'i tshogs su gyur pa'i bang shin tu che ba sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i
171b4(phal chen): 'jig rten gyis brgyan pa'i sna tshogs kyi sgo ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung ba'i chos drim med pa sna tshogs brtsegs pa'i sgor gyur pa/ sum cu
171b5(phal chen): rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor gyis bskor ba'i brgya byin lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i tshogs rab tu 'joms ba ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag las byung
171b6(phal chen): ba'i yon tan dri ma med pa'i tshogs kyi yongs su bskor cing zil gyis mi non la gzhan la zil gyis gnon pa de mthar kyis grong khyer rgya mtsho brtan pa gang na pa
171b7(phal chen): der phyin te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ de la skye bo mang pos bstan te/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba de/ grong khyer gyi dbus
171b8(phal chen): kyi rang gi khyim na 'dug go// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i gnas gang ba der song ste/ thal mo sbyar nas/ sgo gang na sdod sdod pa dang / des dge
172a1(phal chen): brten ma thul du byung ba'i khyim de shin tun chel yangs shing / rin pa che bas yongs su bsko ba/ phyogs bzhi nas shin du mdzes pa rnam par
172a2(phal chen): / rin po che chad med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa// bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa mthong nas/ de khyis der mdzo// kun tu bltas nA/ 
172a3(phal chen): drinam thul du / drugs shin ldan/ thog ma dngal pa pa/ gas na nga mdzes la bstan drug kha gangs bzim 'o// shin tu rgyam pa
172a4(phal chen): ldan pa/ ska phyi ma ba dag pa/ lus la rgyan med pa gos dang / smad gsogs dkar po bgos pa/ po che khril 'dug pa 'thod ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
172a5(phal chen): sems dpa' ma gtogs par de'i lum sas/ dmas kyi dang ngam// gzi brjid ngam// kha dgags pal sa mnon pa'i sems canam khyim de na gang yang med do/ 
172a6(phal chen): 'am mi'ang rung ste/ sems can gang gis dge bsnyen ma dul du byung ba mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / dge bsnyen ma phul du drang ba la ston pa'i 'du shes su bsam bzhig/ 
172a7(phal chen): rin po che'i khril 'jug pa mthongango // gzhan yang khyi mngon// stan lnga rdzas dang / mi'i rdzas las shin tu 'phags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i las rnam par smin pas yongs su
172a8(phal chen): grub pa bye stong phrag bcu bting ba dang / mdun du phrub gcig cig padag pa las/ khabs dang / skom gyi bgags// gos dang / rgyan gyi longs spyod kyi dag gzhan ci'ang mi sdang
172b1(phal chen): ngo// bud med stong phrag bcu rtsam zhig mdun na 'dug par mthong na'ang / de dag thams cad kyang lha'i bu mo'i kha dog dang ldan pa lha'i bu mo'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i
172b2(phal chen): tshul dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i spyod pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i longs spyod dang ldan pa lha'i bu mo'i tshul du shis pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos yid bzhin du gyon pa/ lha rdzas
172b3(phal chen): kyi lhab lhu kyis shin tu klubs pa/ lha'i bu mo'i skad lta bu'i dbyangs snyan pa dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i chu zheng mdzes pa dang ldan pa sha stag ste/ de'i 'khor gyi bud med kyang / des ci bsgo
172b4(phal chen): ba bzhin byed cing mdun na 'khod do// rim gro byed do// bkur ngo sti byed do gdong du lha'o// ci bsgo ba nyan cing gnas so// rje sar 'khod do// yongs su lta'o// rnam par lta'o// 'dud do// 
172b5(phal chen): rab tu 'dud do// phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gi lus las spos kyi ngad ldang bas ni// grong khyer de'i 'khor thams cad du/ dri zhim pos khyab par 'dug ste/ sems can gang gis dri de tsher
172b6(phal chen): bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang gnod sems med pa'i sems dang // shar gnyer med pa'i sems dang / 'tshe ba med pa'i sems dang / phrag dog dang / 'jungs pa dang bral ba'i sems dang / sgyu
172b7(phal chen): dang g.yo med pa'i sems dang / chags pa dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / zhum pa dang gzeng mtho ba med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / sdom pa la
172b8(phal chen): gnas pa'i sems dang / gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la re ba med pa'i sems su gyur te/ gang gis de dag gi skad thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / 
173a1(phal chen): dul ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang gis de dag mthong bar gyur pa de dag kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba tsam du rang rang gis shes par 'gyuro// 
173a2(phal chen): de ltar mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu na bzangs kyis dge bsnyen maphul du drung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la skyibos phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong
173a3(phal chen): mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nasamadun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
173a4(phal chen): chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sem des dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la dbaslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal
173a5(phal chen): te/ 'phags moni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na// 'phags mdze ltar byang chub sems
173a6(phal chen): dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par
173a7(phal chen): thar pa/ bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ni phru ba gcig po 'di las mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kha zas ci la dga' ba bzhin du/ tsheng
173a8(phal chen): ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha zas sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs kyis tshim par byed de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni phrub gcig po 'di las ci la dga' ba'i kha zas kyis sems can
173b1(phal chen): brgya'ang yongs su tshim par byed do// sems can stong dang / sems can dargya draphrag sdong dang / sems can bye ba dang / sems can bye ba phrag brgya dang / sems can bye ba phrag stong dang / sema?
173b2(phal chen): can bye ba brgya phrag skyong dang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mos pa sna tshogs can rnams kyang ci la dga'
173b3(phal chen): ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshims par byed do// yongs su stobs par byed do// yongs su dga' bar byed do// yongs su mgu bar byed do// yongs su spro bar byed do// shin tu tshim
173b4(phal chen): bapar byed do// yid bde bar byed do// 'on kyang phrub da'adi las 'god par 'gyur ba med de/ 'grib pa med do// / dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// zad par mi 'gyur ro// 
173b5(phal chen): 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro// sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro// mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// mur thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhung de dang 'dra bar sems can
173b6(phal chen): 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / de bzhin du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis
173b7(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra bskyed dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nasasems can mas pa sna tshogs can/ sangs rgyas
173b8(phal chen): kyi nang brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pa'i rdul shin tu bra ba snyed cig sa kya tshal dga' ba'i khabs tshod sa tshogs pa rasna tshogs dang / dri rje tshogs kyis yongs su rgyam
174a1(phal chen): bar byed do// yongs su dga' bar byed do// nyams bde bar byed do// shin tu tshim par byed/ ming shin tu bde bar byed // 
174a2(phal chen): 'on kyang phrub 'di las 'god par 'gyur ba med de/ 'grib pa med do// dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// zang por mi 'gyur ro// sa mtshams yod par mi 'gyur ro// mthar/ 
174a3(phal chen): drug par mi 'gyur ro// mur thug par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bugs te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can mos pa sna tshogs can dang/ 
174a4(phal chen): bsam pa sna tshogs can thams cad 'ong bar gyur na yangade dag thams cad cil dga' ba'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas yid bde bar bya ba'i bar du byed do// 
174a5(phal chen): kha zas snga tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du babyung ba rnam pa sna tshon/ sa de rongs pa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / bzhon pa sna tshogs
174a6(phal chen): dang / gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang 'phreng ba snga tshogs dang spos sna tshogs dang / bdug spos sna tshogs dang / drug pa sna tshogs dang / byem sna tshogs dang / rin
174a7(phal chen): po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i shing rta sna tshogs dang gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul
174a8(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byed pa nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na/ nyan thos
174b1(phal chen): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ma ma 'dzin pa gang ji srid gcig btsugs pa de dag thams cad kyang ma khams las gsal tshang nan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub
174b2(phal chen): 'bras bu ba skyes par mdzad po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gciganaji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams kya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams myong dang // 'jig rten/ 
174b3(phal chen): gyi khams pacu drug stong dang 'jig rten gyi khams byeb dang 'jig rten gyi khams bye bajug rgya 'jig rten gyi khams bye badrug song da / 'jig rten gyi
174b4(phal chen): khams bye ba rgya drug kyang dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ba khrag khrig rgya drag stong dang / 'jig khams 'angam du'i gling gi rdul shin tu tha ba sted dang / 
174b5(phal chen): bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdum shin tu phra ba snyed dang stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu dra ba snyed / 
174b6(phal chen): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nasade bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang / brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed/ 
174b7(phal chen): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas sku'i tha ma 'dzin pa'i snyid cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo'o kha zas las gsol nyan thos
174b8(phal chen): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bur skyes par mdzad do// shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lnga ba de bzhin du lce phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang sha
175a1(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang
175a2(phal chen): steng gi phyogs na ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams cig tu tshi gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed
175a3(phal chen): cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i kha zas las gsol cing snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mdzad de/ 
175a4(phal chen): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'jig rten
175a5(phal chen): gyi khams brgya dang / 'jog rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 
175a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stong dang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul
175a7(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed dang gling bani pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnyed dang stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gnyis kyi 'jog
175a8(phal chen): rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba bsnyed dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
175b1(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin 'a phra ba snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nabyang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang
175b2(phal chen): me'i kha zas gsol cing snying po byang chub la bzhugs nas bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par mjed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// 
175b3(phal chen): shar phyogs na bzhugs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang byang shar gyi phyogs mchims dang / shar tshwa
175b4(phal chen): phyogs mtshams dang lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og gi phyogs dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig
175b5(phal chen): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa dz+ra snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang me'i kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs
175b6(phal chen): bdud sde dang bcas pa 'o ba tuphas par mdzad nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya'o// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gcig na
175b7(phal chen): banags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brgya drag stong da // 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba dang
175b8(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba stod dang / 'jig rten gyi khams byed brgya phrag stong dang / 'jig rten gyi khams bye khrag khrig brgya drag stong dang / 
176a1(phal chen): rten gyi khams 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin du dra ba snyed dang / stong gi 'jig rten
176a2(phal chen): gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed nas
176a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa
176a4(phal chen): ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang / kho mo kha zas las gsol cing / snying po byang chub tu bzhugs nas/ bdud sde dang bcas par pham par mdzad
176a5(phal chen): de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon bar 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kha rme 'khor bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ smras pa
176a6(phal chen): 'phags ma bdag gis mthong ngo // smras pa// rigs kyi bu bud med 'di dag la sogs pa brgya stong grangs med pa drag bcu kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par spyod pa// smon lam gcig pa
176a7(phal chen): dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig pa/ 'byung ba'i rgyan gcig pa mos pa'i lam rnam par dag pa gcig pa kho mo dang skal ba mnyam par dran pa rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par blo rnam
176a8(phal chen): par dag pa skal ba mnyam par blo tshad med par gyur pa// skal ba mnyam par dbang po rab tu thob pa/ skal ba mnyam par sems kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ skal ba mnyam par spyod
176b1(phal chen): yul gyi yul dang ldan pa skal ba mnyam par chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa/ skal ba mnyam par don nges par rtogs pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi don ston pa/ skal ba mnyam par
176b2(phal chen): gzugs rnam par dag pa/ skal ba mnyam par stobs tshad med pa/ skal ba mnyam par brtan pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ skal ba mnyam par chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ skal ba mnyam par
176b3(phal chen): dbyangs rnam par dag pa/ tshang med pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas rnam par spyod pa// thams cad la skal ba mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam par smin pa la kha na ma tho ba med cing / rnam
176b4(phal chen): par dag pas skal ba mnyam par las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa// skal ba mnyam/ bar byams pa chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa 'gro ba thams cad yod/ 
176b5(phal chen): su smin par byed pas// mi skye ba'i phyir/ skal ba mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gengs pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i lus yongs su
176b6(phal chen): ston pas// skal ba mnyam par lus kyi las rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha snyad la skal ba mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
176b7(phal chen): du skal ba mnyam par 'dod pa// sangs rgyas la mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam par rgyu ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du chud par bya ba la skal ba
176b8(phal chen): mnyam par mngon sum du gyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la skal ba mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa sha stag gcig kyang yod de/ rigs
177a1(phal chen): kyi bu bud med stong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la/ zhal zas
177a2(phal chen): yongs su dbul ba'i phyir// phyogs bcu rgyas par 'dong ngo // phrub 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing srid pa 'tham pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul
177a3(phal chen): ba'i phyir phyog bcur rgyas par 'dong ngo // phru ba 'di nyid nas kha zas blangs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ yi dgas kyi tshogs thams cad kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// rigs
177a4(phal chen): kyi bu de ltar kho man grub 'di nyid nas/ lha rnam das ni lha'i khams kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// klu rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/ gnod sbyin rnams ni gnod
177a5(phal chen): sbyin gyi kha zas kyis/ dri za rnams ni dro za'i kha zas kyis lha ma yin rnams ni lha ma yin gyi kha zas kyis nam mkha' lding rnams ni nam mkha' lding gi kha zas
177a6(phal chen): kyis/ mi'am ci rnams ni mi'am ci'i kha zas kyis/ lto 'phye chen po rnams ni lto 'phye chen po'i kha zas kyis/ mi ma yin pa rnams ni/ mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs
177a7(phal chen): su tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon tu 'gyur ro// dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta ste/ dge snyen ma phul
177a8(phal chen): du byung bas sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas sems can grangs med pa zhig shar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du
177b1(phal chen): byung ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas// sems can grangs med pa zhig/ lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur te/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag
177b2(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshong ma sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang
177b3(phal chen): ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so// yongs su bstabs pas byas so// yongs su dga' bar byas so// yongs su mgu bar byas so// yongs su spro bar byas so// shin tu tshim par
177b4(phal chen): byas so// yid bde bar byas so// kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ro dam dpa sna tshogs dang / stan sna tshogs dang / mal cha sna tshogs dang / 
177b5(phal chen): bzhon pa sna tshogs dang // gos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshog sa dang / phreng ba sna tshogs dang / spos sna tshogs dang / 'dug spos sna tshogs dang / byug pa sna tshogs dang / phye ma sna tshog
177b6(phal chen): dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / rgyan sna tshogs dang / rin po che'u shing rta sna tshogs dang / gdugs sna tshogs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang / lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang / yo byad kyi yul rnam
177b7(phal chen): pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas so// klu dang gnod sbyin dang
177b8(phal chen): za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang // mi ma yin pa'i kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas// yid
178a1(phal chen): bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// 'on kyang phru ba de las gong par gyur pa med/ 'gribs pa med dmas pa med/ zad par gyur pa med/ 
178a2(phal chen): sa mtshams su gyur pa med/ mthar thug pa med/ mur thug pa med do// de nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu
178a3(phal chen): kho mos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtsho mi/ 
178a4(phal chen): zad pas/ mi zad pa'i bsod nams dang ldan pa dbasod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po shin tu bsags pas nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon
178a5(phal chen): lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge kha'i rtsu ba yongs su srung bas/ bsod nams chen po'i khor yug
178a6(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad du rin po che snyim pa nas char lhar 'thor bas/ bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed pas/ bsod nams chen po'i mdzod
178a7(phal chen): la mngon sum du lta ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi phongs pa'i mun pa sel bsabasod nams chen po'i sgron mar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan// song
178a8(phal chen): rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
178b1(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
178b2(phal chen): dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i drung nas blta bas ngoms bzhin
178b3(phal chen): du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ bsod nams rgya mtsho de la ni rjes su sems/ 
178b4(phal chen): bsod nams kyi nam mkha' de la ni kun tu lta/ bsod nam sa kyi phung po de ni yongs su 'dzin bsod nams kyi ro bo de la ni mngon par 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyi tshogs de ni/ 
178b5(phal chen): yang dag par sdud bsod nams kyi chu bo de la ni yod/ sa su 'bog/ bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni rab tu 'bab/ bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs
178b6(phal chen): su sbyong bsod nams kyi gter de la ni yang dag par lta/ bsod nams kyi tshul de la ni rjes su dran par byed/ bsod nams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'dzin/ bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni yo
178b7(phal chen): su sbyong ba byed cing / mthar gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na ba der phyin nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing // dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas bsgos pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang
178b8(phal chen): dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyis byin gyis brlabs de'i bsam pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pa med pa'i sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya bas/ skyong
179a1(phal chen): med pa'i brtson 'grus dang / dge ba' bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par gyur
179a2(phal chen): nga'i bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyen rim gro bya ba la mkhas
179a3(phal chen): pa dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i
179a4(phal chen): dbang po dang / yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad dang / yang dag par 'phel ba'i smon/ lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / shin tu yangs par 'gyur
179a5(phal chen): ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyu rabar yang dag par mdzong nas// sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas// chos
179a6(phal chen): kyi snang ba yang dgang blang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing / khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer gyi dbus// lam
179a7(phal chen): gyi gzhi mdo zhig na/ rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs ngu zhig la/ rin po che grangs med pa las byas pa'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rje dang / in dra nI la sna tshogs kyis
179a8(phal chen): sbas pa dkye ba/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi drabs legs par blangs pa/ nor bu rin po tsheche dri ma med pa'i snying po can rin po che lnga brgya tsam gyis// gzugs legs par brgyan pa/ lba
179b1(phal chen): rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs bting ba/ gam yonas/ wA rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / bad na mang po bsgreng ba/ rin po che du ma drabs kun nas log pa/ rin po che b+ha chen ba zlas
179b2(phal chen): blanas gser dang ran pa tsha ma tog gi lnga'i mang pa'i bye banag 'dug cing 'jam bu chu byung gi gser gyi gdugs su 'drim med pa/ bedUr+yams byas pa ni drung nas bsgreng dang / 
179b3(phal chen): bzung gnag rnga dri ma med pa'i rdul yab ngang ba'i rgyal po lta bus ni legs par g.yab/ spos kyi rim gro yo byang sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs shing bsrungs rol mo brdungs
179b4(phal chen): ba dang dkrol ba lnga rdzas kyi dbyings las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsam ni g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrol grong khyer 'drung ba chen po na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams
179b5(phal chen): shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi// char ni kun nas 'bab par gyur pa/ g.yog sro/ ga chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon dge ba'i rtsa bskal ba mnyam par
179b6(phal chen): spyod spyod pa ngag nyan cing ci dga' bar byed pa lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan kyis shin tu brgyan pa byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su grub pa/ lha dang mi'i gzugs
179b7(phal chen): las shin tu 'das pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyims bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag
179b8(phal chen): mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces
180a1(phal chen): smras so// 'phags pa bdag ni 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba la dgod par
180a2(phal chen): sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtshonas mngon par gdon pa dang sems can thams cad chos rin po che'i gling du yang dag par bskyal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sred pa'i rlan
180a3(phal chen): shin tu bskam pa dang sems can thams cad kyi snying rje'i rlan yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang / sred pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 
180a4(phal chen): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing bsgrub par bgyi ba dang / sems can thams cad 'kho dar ba'i dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang / sems can thams
180a5(phal chen): cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang chos la dga' zhing mos/ pa yang dag par bskyed pa dang / sems can tha mas cad khams gsum gyi grong brdal nas gdon pa dang / sem
180a6(phal chen): can thams cad cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzung bar/ sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byung
180a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do nas
180a8(phal chen): bdag gis thos na 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar bslabs na byang chub sems dpa'
180b1(phal chen): rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba ba dag la bshang du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang / khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras// 
180b2(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
180b3(phal chen): byang chub tu sems bskyed cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang dge pa'i bshes gnyen lta bas mi ngoms pa dge 'i ba shes gnyen gyi
180b4(phal chen): drung du 'grobs mi skye bo dang / dge bo'i ba shes gnyenal rim gro byabs sgying lug pa med pa dang / ye/ dba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yang mi bde ba mi skyed pa dang / 8
180b5(phal chen): pa'i ba shes gnyen btsal ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang / ba'i bshes gnyen la mos shing dang pa'i yid lasarnam par mi ldog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta
180b6(phal chen): ba las phyir mi zlogs pa dang dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi tshul la zhum pa med pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ro mgro dang bsnyen dkur bya bas mi skyo ba de lta buni shin tu dkon na/ 
180b7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong mod smras pa/ 'phags pa mthong ngo smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag kun kyang kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
180b8(phal chen): sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho ngos pha rol tu phyin pas bstud de/ gsol ba'o// 'di dag ni kho bos
181a1(phal chen): chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnams par bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos
181a2(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog pa'o// 
181a3(phal chen): 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la btsud pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du lhung ba las yongs su bzung ba'o// 'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya// 
181a4(phal chen): ba la dkod pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung
181a5(phal chen): ba'i bsod nams mang po thob pa ste// de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// btung pa 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang // ro dam pa 'dod pa rnams la
181a6(phal chen): ro'i dam pa dang / bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba dang / bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang / blag pa 'dod pa rnams la blag pa dang / mur ba 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang / gos 'dod
181a7(phal chen): pa rnams la gos dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang / 
181a8(phal chen): byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang // phye ma 'dod pa rnams la phye ma dang / rgyan dang lhab lbub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lhab lhub dang / rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin po che dang
181b1(phal chen): gser 'dod pa rnams la gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la dngul dang / mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang / rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang / stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang / 
181b2(phal chen): mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad 'dod pa rnams lan pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la banon pa dang / dga'
181b3(phal chen): ba 'dod pa rnams la dga' ba dang / glang po dang rta dang shing rta dang / b.lang dang / bong bu dang / ma he dang lug 'dod pa rnams la/ glang po dang rta dang shing rta dang / ba lang dang
181b4(phal chen): bong bu dang ma he dang / ra lug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan 'dod pa rnams la/ rgyal mtsha na dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / bran po dang bran mo 'dod pa
181b5(phal chen): rnams la/ bran po dang bran mo dang // 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnam sa la 'khor gyi byis pa dang / bud med 'dod pa rnams la bud med dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'dod pa rnams la gzhon nu dang / 
181b6(phal chen): cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la// cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che dang / thor bag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la// thor dag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po
181b7(phal chen): che dang / sku mthon ting dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la/ skra mthon ting dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la yang / yo
181b8(phal chen): byang sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro// de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pa des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la// 
182a1(phal chen): sems can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha dad pa dang / yul dang gnas tha dad pa dang // grong
182a2(phal chen): khyer tha dad pa dang / grong rdal tha dad pa dang / tshong 'dus tha dad pa dang / ljongs tha dad pa dang / 'od gyi grong tha dad pa dang / khyim tha dad pa dang / sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang / 
182a3(phal chen): sems can gyi rigs tha dad pa dang / sems can rnam pa mi mthun pa tha dad pa dang / lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang // gnas kyi rnam pa dang / ming du bya ba tha dad pa nas// sems can skye mched rnam
182a4(phal chen): par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer bu/ kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba gtsang ba 'dod pa dang / sha 'dod pa dang / kha
182a5(phal chen): zas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba// lam gyi rgyud/ rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras can dang / sran can
182a6(phal chen): dang / khur ba dang / skyo ma dang / nya dang / sha la sogs pa/ khams kyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don tu gnyer ba dang / mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad na/ rnam
182a7(phal chen): par spyod pa dag las kyang / kha zas dang btung ba sna tshogs don tu gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rje'i sgra dang byang chub
182a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur te/ 'ongs nas kyang / khyim bdag mkhas pa la slongs mo 'debs so// gdong du lha'o// sdong ngo // gsol ba 'debs/ 
182b1(phal chen): so/ de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas lung tsam du bsams ste/ nam mnga' la bltas pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings nas la zas dang / 
182b2(phal chen): btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ongs par gyur to// des de dag
182b3(phal chen): yongs su blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus pa'i spongs mo ba/ mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod pa'i zas dang / bdung ba'i rnam pa dang / yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyis yongs
182b4(phal chen): su tshim par byas so// ci 'dod pa yongs su byin no// darab tu dga' bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so// // dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so nyams shin tu bde bar byas so// 
182b5(phal chen): yid rab tu dga' bar byas so// de ltar de dag shin tu tshim bar byas nas/ des kyang mchog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags
182b6(phal chen): pa'i rgyud yongs su brjod de chos bstan to// phongs pa thams cad 'byung mi spong ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / skying pa chen po yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi ye shes
182b7(phal chen): kyi tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su
182b8(phal chen): brjod pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byang bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa'i lus 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / thub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i thob pa'i byung ba'i rgyu
183a1(phal chen): yongs su brjod pa dang / blan med pa'i khabs yongs su shes pa 'thob pa 'byung bab rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang / bdud kying ngung thams cad da
183a2(phal chen): du 'jom pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs mi zad pa rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'ang yongs su brjod pa bya sgo chos bstan to// des kha zas ngon du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la rnam pa'i dbyings nas kha
183a3(phal chen): zas rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang / mdog dang / stobs dang / bde ba dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan
183a4(phal chen): to// des btung ba don tu gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yid da shin tu dga' bar byed pa/ de dag gis tshim par byas nas/ 
183a5(phal chen): de dag la 'khor bas sgom zhing 'khor ba la dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ji sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir chos
183a6(phal chen): bstan to// des ro'i mchog don tu gnyer zhing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dang rab dang // skyur ba dang / lan chadang / tshab dang / khab dang / bska' ba rnam patha
183a7(phal chen): dad pas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan na// des banon pa don du gcer zhing phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs
183a8(phal chen): nas 'ongs pa rnams la bzhin pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pas yongs su bsrud de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par byang 'i phyir chos bstan to// des gos don tu gnyer cing phyogs sna tshigs
183b1(phal chen): nas 'ongs pa kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te/ nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang / na mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs sngon po dang ser po dang
183b2(phal chen): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ kha dog sna tshogs can kha dog du mar rnam par dag pa dag 'thon cing lag pa'i mthil du
183b3(phal chen): 'ongs pas des de dag gi slongs mo pa de dag la yongs su bsdud nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang / mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu
183b4(phal chen): thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis// ji ltar da'ongs pa'i slongs mo pa rnams la bskud byas nas ci rig
183b5(phal chen): su chos bstan to// de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
183b6(phal chen): la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa'i yo byad la dbang thob pa
183b7(phal chen): rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par byas shing sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyirade bzhin
183b8(phal chen): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che'i kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa de bzhin du rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang cod pan kha dog sna tshos
184a1(phal chen): kyi smin dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dog snga tshogs kyi snron dang / na batha' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sgron dang lha rdzas kyi rol mo brdung ba dang
184a2(phal chen): dkrol ba dang / glu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs snyan pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dang / me togs kha dog sna tshogs kyi sgron dang spos kha dog sde tshogs kyi sprin dang / bdug spos dang phreng
184a3(phal chen): bdang / drug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad mchod pa'i \u0f7f
184a4(phal chen): char dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang / sems can
184a5(phal chen): thams cad yongs su smin pa dang / gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa sa pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ rnam par 'phrul pa bstan
184a6(phal chen): par nus re skan// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na// grong khyer seng ge'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de/ ngan chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan
184a7(phal chen): du seng la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs ste/ ma
184a8(phal chen): zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshul bstan te/ de'i byon gyi brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad thob
184b1(phal chen): par 'gyur bar yongs su blta zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / de la rag lus par blta ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dben par sems rgyun mi 'chang par bstan pa dang dge
184b2(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems dang ljon par bstan pa dang / dge ba'i bshas gnyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'drang bar bya ba nga dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
184b3(phal chen): gdams ngag dang tshig mnyan par bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i dang ba'i dbang po la bsam pa byed cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis btams te btang bas dge ba'i
