210b7(phal chen): bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas su phyin par skyel bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o// dge ba'i
210b8(phal chen): ba shes gnyen rnams ni bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la 'phags pa'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston
211a1(phal chen): pa'o/ dge bar ba shes gnyen rnams ni bdag gi dkar ba'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel baphyeskyed pa'o// nas de ltar byad
211a2(phal chen): sngags 'don pa'i tshe namakha'i dbyings la 'khod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing yang dag par bskul ba dang sangs rgyas kyi pho nya lta
211a3(phal chen): gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad 'dzer to// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni sangs rgyas bco
211a4(phal chen): ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shin tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig dang mi 'gal bar ma/ danas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni thams cad
211a5(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid du'ang shin tu bsnyen pa yin de/ ba'i bshes gnyen gyi chog la the tsom mi za ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang
211a6(phal chen): bar sten pa yin dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' la ni don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyis rigs kyi bu rgyal po'i pho brang brtan
211a7(phal chen): paradage bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song shig dang de las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ting
211a8(phal chen): nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba las langs nas mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba gang na ba der song nasadage bsnyem
211b1(phal chen): ma mi g.yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmed rmed pa las de la 'gro mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni rang gi khyim na pa ma dang 'grog/ 
211b2(phal chen): shing gzhon nur gyur pa ste rang gi gnyen bshes kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing skye bo'i tshogs chen po la chos ston to// de nas tshong dpon gyi
211b3(phal chen): nor bzangs dga' ba chen po dang mos shing spro bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pa de dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas dge bsnyen ma mi
211b4(phal chen): g.yo ba'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa'i tshe des khyim thams cad 'od lus dang sems shin tu bde bar byed pa gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab cing
211b5(phal chen): gsal bar gyur nas 'od des tshong dpon gyi dru nor bzangs la phog par gyur ma thag tu tshor ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / 
211b6(phal chen): zhi ba'i gnas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang 'gro ba thams cad dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang kun tu lta pa'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang / 
211b7(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te yongs su skyes so// de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste
211b8(phal chen): 'di ltar dper na / thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta buste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gnon par skyes par gyur to// des drinam pa nag chor na
212a1(phal chen): yang / don lha la yang med/ lha'i bu mo la yang med klul yang med/ klu'i bu mo la yang med// gnod sbyin la yang med/ gnod sbyin
212a2(phal chen): gyi bu mo la yang med dri zal yang med/ dri za'i bu mo la yang med// lha ma yin la yang med/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo la yang med/ namakha' lding la yang med/ nam kha' lding gi bu mo la/ 
212a3(phal chen): yang med/ mi 'am ci la yang med/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo la yang med/ lto 'phye chen po la yang med lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo la yang medami la yang med/ mi'i bu
212a4(phal chen): mo la yang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim po tshor bar gyur to// bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu da'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'ong kha dog
212a5(phal chen): dang mdog de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog dang kha dog dang byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba'i kha dog dang / mdog ma gtogs par de'i kha dog dang
212a6(phal chen): mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lhag las 'od/ lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs de lta bu'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i khrun chu zheng dang / dbyibs dang
212a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' dbang skur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs ma gtogs par de'i lus kyi chu zheng dang / dbyibs su mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na// lhag
212a8(phal chen): pa lta ga las 'ong 'od kyi rgyan de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi rgyan dang / byang chub sems dpa' dbang skur ba thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma rtogs par de'i 'od kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa
212b1(phal chen): phyogs bcung 'jig rten med na blag paltag las 'a/ del ba'ang byadranam po dang mnyam pa'adri la bu mang phyogs bcu 'jig ce kyi lha gnas samaklung du gnang byas
212b2(phal chen): dang / dr-in / lham mamang rnam kha' rjong dang / ma'am ci dang / lho 'a phyi chen po dang // ming ngamam man pa'i gnas na medan/ lhag pa lnga ga las 'ong
212b3(phal chen): gyi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyong dang byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur bathob pa'i longs spyod ma gtogs par de'i khyim gyi rgyan dang longs
212b4(phal chen): spyod du mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag palta ga las 'ong / g.yog 'khor phun sum chog das pa de lta bu yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor phun sum
212b5(phal chen): tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par de'i g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang mnyam pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na
212b6(phal chen): lhag pa lta ga las 'ong ste/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems can de lta bu yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ris na
212b7(phal chen): med do// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag tu nyon mongs pa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi ril na med de
212b8(phal chen): 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs pa chen po stong brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba la ni// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams mi rgyu'o// de bzhin du dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yang mthong ma thag tu/ 
213a1(phal chen): sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa mi rgyu'o// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu yang / shes rab kyis ngos
213a2(phal chen): pata ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ros na med do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa da/ 
213a3(phal chen): gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sa'i gzhi dang / grong khyer dang / rin po che thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od gzer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
213a4(phal chen): sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab pa sgrub pa mthong ste/ spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim po tshor nas// 'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyim dang
213a5(phal chen): gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mo 'phrogs pa mthong nas/ yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa khong du chud de// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod do// khyod kyis
213a6(phal chen): rtag tu tshul khrims dri med yongs su bsrungs te/ bzod pa shin tu yangs pa'ang yongs su bsgom mdzad cing / brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs pas na// ri bo'i rgyal po lta bur 'gro bar 'phags
213a7(phal chen): shing 'bar// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba la tshigs su gcad pa des mngon par bstod do// 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
213a8(phal chen): pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
213b1(phal chen): gdams dag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na// 'phags mji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par dgyi ba dang de ltar nan tan du gyi
213b2(phal chen): bdag la bshang du gsol// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yongs byang chub sems dpa'i ngag 'jam ning yid du 'ong la nyams su bde bas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
213b3(phal chen): la dga' bar 'gyur ba jig tu brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi de ltar khyod kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs legaso// 
213b4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu ma na byang chub semam dpa'i rnam par bangs chu paM 'ang sa shes kyi spang bathos / byang sems dpa'i stodang po sgo mong ma brten pa la slob pa
213b5(phal chen): chas thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyim gardungs kyi sgribab pa'o// kham na spabs pa'i ye shes snga sa kyogazhibs sa sdang bar brjod patho pa'o// maman
213b6(phal chen): chos thams cad yongs su bcal bas ma myong ba rgyan myoting nge 'dzin gyi ma thobapa'o// smras pa 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par bar bathung bar dgar ba'i ye shes kyi snang bar yum
213b7(phal chen): ngos bunam mtsha'angam la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sbyang pa sru chos thams cad mnyam pacing kyis gargyas kyi slong chos kyi ga
213b8(phal chen): cang rdza ma ma pa thas rnang tsam 'dis su tshal bas ma byang brgyan gyi cing 'dun bya ga su do ga du na ma/ smras pa/ rigs
214a1(phal chen): 'di ni yid ches par dga'o// smras pa 'angags ma bstan du gsol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na ming
214a2(phal chen): lha ches par mchi zang rtogs pa dang 'tshal ba dang / rnam par rtogs pa dang / rjes su rtogs pa dang / rig pa dang dmigs su khebs pa dang / goms pa dang / mi 'gal ba dang
214a3(phal chen): rnam par mi rtogs pa dang / sgo 'dogs pa ma mchis pa dang / mnyam par bgyid par yang mchis grang / de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yobs/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// 
214a4(phal chen): rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus shig na dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bskal bra la de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rta/ na du byung ste/ kho mo yang de'i tshe rgyal po glog gis byin pa'i bu
214a5(phal chen): cig ma zhig tu gyur nas de'i tshe nub mo mo nyil tsam zhig na rgyal po'i sgo yang bcad pa dang ma yang nyal/ skyes pa dang bud med dag kyang gnyid kyis log/ rol
214a6(phal chen): mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra yang ni lhan cig spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhig na kho mo mal gyi steng na 'dug cing nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i
214a7(phal chen): tshogs kyi 'phreng ba rnam par 'khod pa la blta blta ba las/ steng gi bar snang la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab
214a8(phal chen): tu brkyang ba ri'i dbang po ri rab ltar/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mang pos bskor ba
214b1(phal chen): rgyu mas dpa tsha las med pas sa sa gas nga kyi rlogs pa mengs rgyas klu gas pa / 
214b2(phal chen): bde'i baspu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang drinam po rnam pa 'di lta du byung ste/ des la ma'i lus dang sems shin tu bde bar gyur ming shin tu dga' bar gyur te/ mal gyi steng nas langs
214b3(phal chen): nas/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar tes la babs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba de la phyag 'tshal to// de'i smyig drug la bltas na yang mtha'
214b4(phal chen): thug par ma rung / g.yas gzhan gyi chang kyang zin par/ mdzu/ mtshan dang dpe byang can su mtshogs pa la/ dngas ma nam ngoms par ma chu// ri'i tshe la chos 'du sa
214b5(phal chen): dubyam mam so// las de lta bu ni gtus na// lus dun su ma tshogs pa 'dis buni sring por 'gyur/ mdape byang bdang po phun su mchags pa'i myimar 'gyur/ 
214b6(phal chen): rgyas sus su ma tshugs pas gru 'ang bdun du ma chags pa ni gru par gyur/ yid kyang can kyi gas dang / ngas cung chu chu tshogs pan ma gyur/ 
214b7(phal chen): rnams sun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ ye shes bran sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par gru ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par phrul ba bsam gyis mi khyad ba phun sum chags pan yang dag pa
214b8(phal chen): 'gru pa tsugasum phun chu ma tshogs pa na mas su rdzogs par byung blangs paldan su ma tshogs pan pa gyur rnas pa dang / rigs kyi khris
215a1(phal chen): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu brkyang ba des kho ma'i bas ma 'thugs sa chud nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs
215a2(phal chen): pa thams cad gnom pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad bskul ba'i phyir pham pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ chos zab mo'i tshul khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum
215a3(phal chen): ba med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sems can bsam pa mi bzad pa dang ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i glong du lhung bas mi sgul ba'i sems skyed cig/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mchod
215a4(phal chen): du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos brgyun mi gtsang pa'i phyir ngoms mi shes pa'i sems skyed cigasangs rgyas thams
215a5(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung po'i phyir chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nges par rdzog
215a6(phal chen): pa'i sems skyed cog de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzungs pa'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes
215a7(phal chen): par bya ba wA la ci spos kyi chung ngun brdar byas pa tsam la yang 'khrul pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ bu mo khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam paji lta ba bzhin du chos rin po che rnam par
215a8(phal chen): dbye 'a byor/ rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed cig ces zung ste/ de ltar rigs kyi bu khe mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byas
215b1(phal chen): rab tu btung ba lasachos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur stobs bcu'i rang bzhin la
215b2(phal chen): ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar dga' sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni
215b3(phal chen): yongs su bsgrub par dga' sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum
215b4(phal chen): tshogs pa la ni mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par dang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par
215b5(phal chen): mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems
215b6(phal chen): nyon mongs pa thams cad dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mi phyed mi tshugs pa skyed de rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus
215b7(phal chen): bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig tu yid kyi dgu las kyang 'dod pa la spyad par mi dran na gnyis kyi gnyis 'du ba lta ci smos rigs kyi bu de nas zhe
215b8(phal chen): bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang khong khro ba'i sems cig ma bskyed na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can mnyes pa gzhan lta la ci smos de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun
216a1(phal chen): chang du/ bdag tu lta ba dang / ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig cam yang bskyed par madran na/ de ma yin pa yo byad gnan la bdag gar byas te/ 
216a2(phal chen): mngon par chags pa lta sa smos/ shi 'pho dang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe'ang / sems rmongs po'am// 'du shes sna tshogs sam/ lung dum bstan pa'i sems kyang zung ngu mi dran no
216a3(phal chen): legs par bsams shing lta ci smos// bskal pa de snyed cig tu sangs rgyas gcig kyang chung ngun/ rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rjes su mi dran na/ byang chub sem
216a4(phal chen): dpa'i tshig bcus mthong bar gyur pa sa sngos// de nas dbang chu ba chun mang du bzhin na shegs pa thams ca/ kyi chos kyi ston mang dag par 'dzin kyang chung ngun mong du
216a5(phal chen): rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang / yi ge gcig kyang dpar midran na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i namamadzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar nga zung ba tshun chab
216a6(phal chen): / chos kyi rgyamatsho snyed cig 'drung 'thung yang / chung ngun 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la chog 'ga' yang ma khasamam brtags par mi dran no// de nas par jung ba chung chad drung
216a7(phal chen): ma rgyas tshul rgya mtsho las nga chung dun 'jig rten pa'i bze'i rnas da tshul ya r+b+ha ste/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang ma meng / kha mos ting nge 'dzin mngon par ma bstsu
216a8(phal chen): bde lta bu med do// de nas nye par badrung ba chun ca du/ de bzhin gi shegs pa de snyed kyi'i kho la brdzu yang/ ji gang yongs su chung las/ sems can 'dul pa'i bang du byangs
216b1(phal chen): gtogs par chung ngu rjes su brgyad pa'i rgyus tsam gyi tshig dang mi ge 'ga' yang bor bar mi dran no// de nas nye bar brdung ba chu chad du/ sangs rgyas rgya mchod snyed cig mthong yang chu/ 
216b2(phal chen): dun sprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ smon lam 'ga' yang kho mos sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do// de nas
216b3(phal chen): nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtshod snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par
216b4(phal chen): bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ sems can dgang kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma
216b5(phal chen): bskul ba de lta bu gcig kyang mig lam du 'ongs par mi dran no/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa
216b6(phal chen): gcig kyang mngon par sbubs su mi dran no// rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du/ bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig lon yang / tshig dang yi ge 'ga' la yang
216b7(phal chen): the tsom bskyed pa'am/ gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/ rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam// rab kyi 'du shes sam/ bzang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/ 
216b8(phal chen): sdug me sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du mi dran no// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma bral lo// byang chub
217a1(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams dang ma thal lo// yang dag pa'i dge ba' ba shes gnyen rnams dang mabral lo// sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thos pa dang ma
217a2(phal chen): bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ye shes snang ba'i tshul
217a3(phal chen): thos pa dang ma bral lo// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa'i mdzod dang gter thos pa thob pa dang ma bral lo// mtha' dang dpung mod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi drapal 'jug cing / 
217a4(phal chen): khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral lo// mtha' dang dpung med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu/ sa pa thob pa dang ma dral lo// 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs
217a5(phal chen): pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i ye shes snang ba dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byung ba'i rgyu'i ye shes thob pa dang ma bral lo// 
217a6(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dang ba dang ma bral lo// 
217a7(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di dang / chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di la
217a8(phal chen): snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi ngas la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis 'di dang / spobs pa'i
217b1(phal chen): shes snang ba'i sgo chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na/ rigs kyi bu khyod mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam/ 
217b2(phal chen): smras pa 'angags ma 'tshal lo// de nas dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo bde na de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi stong pa la sogs pa dang / 
217b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yongs su btsal bas mo skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang ting 'dzin gyi sgo don yod pa 'di dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la sogs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo spobs
217b4(phal chen): bcu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod las sogs pa// ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcul rnam
217b5(phal chen): par blta ba dang / rnam par spyad pa dang / rjes su 'jugapa dang / nges par rtogs par byas so// de ltaradage bsnyen ma mi g.yo bsgoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ tshong dpen
217b6(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa dang / bai DUr+ya yongs su dag
217b7(phal chen): pa'i rgyu las gyur par gnas par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i gling bzhi pa bye ba brgya brgyan de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste/ la la ni
217b8(phal chen): dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa nas la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo // de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin de dag yongs su
218a1(phal chen): dag cing slob pa med pa phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas 'od gzer dang / 'od kyang dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings thams
218a2(phal chen): cad du rgyas par khyab par mnga' ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho yang mthong bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de
218a3(phal chen): dag ro'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor mo thams cad brjod pa sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grag pa'ang thos par gyur to// de nas dge bsnyen ma mo ga ma ba/ 
218a4(phal chen): nge 'dzin de las yangs nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mtho nga ngam thos sam shes sam/ smras pa 'phags ma mthong / 
218a5(phal chen): thos so// rig go// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi ma brtan pa la slob cing chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi ting nge
218a6(phal chen): 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po la gnas nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs khong du chud
218a7(phal chen): pa dang / spobs pa'i ye shes snang ba chos kyi gni thams cad snang bar brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na
218a8(phal chen): mos byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa namakha'i dbyings la mdab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa nam mkha' lding gi
218b1(phal chen): dbang bachen po sar mongasas tshun pa byang chub sems dpa gdon bar byur sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtshol 'jug pa chong pa ltar spobs bcu'i ye shes ra
218b2(phal chen): patsha mngon par 'dod cing thams cad margyan pa zhing kyirin po che grong du mthu dang ldan pa'i na ba ltar med du 'ong ba'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i lag pa
218b3(phal chen): sred pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par mngon par gdon pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par rgyab lha'i dbang po ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po gdul ba bzlog pa'i/ 
218b4(phal chen): phyir/ khams gsum gyi gnas yongs su bkang ning rnam par rgyu ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sem sa can gyi sred pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shin du bskam
218b5(phal chen): bo'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i dbyings la yang dag par 'phags pazla baH zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mud rnam pa
218b6(phal chen): dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha' la mngon par shar ba sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i dbang po'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir byams mi byams dang
218b7(phal chen): mthon dman med para'ajig rten na mnyam par gnas pa rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i shong dang shing phran gyi nags tshal dang
218b8(phal chen): kun dga' rtsa ba nas gdon pa'i byor chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba'akhor los bsgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po'i yo byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams
219a1(phal chen): cang yongs su bsdub 'byor 'jig rten na rnam par spyod pa de dag gi sbyong pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus ra
219a2(phal chen): sman/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul dga' 'dzin tshad med pa na grong khyer dag ra ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'tsho
219a3(phal chen): bzhes bya ba 'dug gi/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du byang dris shig
219a4(phal chen): nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor rangs kyis/ dge ba ste/ nam mi g.yo ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal dge bsnyen ma mi g.yob la lan brgya stong du mar
219a5(phal chen): g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltasadage bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i drung nas song ngo // nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge bsnyen ma mo gso
219a6(phal chen): ba mngon du byas te dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing / dge bsnyen ma ma g.yo bas bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa
219a7(phal chen): dang / bshad pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par brjod pa dang / bzhag pa dang // rnam par phye ba dang / smos pa dang rgya cher bstan pa de dag thams cad la gdon mi za bar yid ches shing / 
219a8(phal chen): rjes su 'drang bar bya ba dang / rjes su bsam pa dang / khong du chud bar bya ba dang / bsgom pa dang / yongs su bsgom pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / rtogs par
219b1(phal chen): bya ba dang / snang bar bya ba dang / mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dang / yul nas yul du bsgyus te rgyu zhing song song nas yul dga' 'dzin chad med pa gang na
219b2(phal chen): bder phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmed cing tshol tshol te nyi ma nub du cha ba zhig na grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin par phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nang
219b3(phal chen): du song ste/ grong khyer gyi bani mdor dbus shig tu phyin nas srang gi sgo nas srang gi slongang las myo bani mdonas/ lam gyi ba ni mdo dang / grong phrag nas/ grong
219b4(phal chen): phrag tu kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshol zhing rmed rmed pa drang mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i byang phyogs logs na ri shin tu mod
219b5(phal chen): pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'i rtse mo rtsa dang gel ba dang sman sna tshogs dga' dga' ltar skyes pas brgya/ nab/ 'od chen po dang ldan pa nyi ma shar ba lta bur gnas pa
219b6(phal chen): mthong ngo // des snang ba de mthong nas/ dga' ba'i shug sa chen po skyes te// 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar
219b7(phal chen): 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/ grong khyer de nas byung ste/ re shin tu mod pa gang na ba der phyin pa dang / ri shin tu mod pa de la 'dzegs nas ri'i rtse mo snang ba chen po can gang na ba der
219b8(phal chen): phyin pa dang / rgyang yang ring po zhig nas kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs pa chen po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa dpal gyis shin tu 'bar ba zhig/ tshangs
220a1(phal chen): bslong drug bcus kun nas bskor te/ 'chags na 'chag tsang 'dug pa mthong nas/ de'i drung du phyin te/ rkang pa gnyis la sto bos phyag 'cha
220a2(phal chen): nas/ de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang
220a3(phal chen): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal
220a4(phal chen): te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams lag/ dadams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub
220a5(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshang du gsol/ smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med
220a6(phal chen): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa legs so// legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba te// thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod/ 
220a7(phal chen): pa la gnas pa'o// sgo thams cad du rnam par spyod pas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / dngos po med pa la gnas pas/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang
220a8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhing thug par thal pa'i shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho ba na sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud
220b1(phal chen): thams cad dang sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang sems can shi 'pho'i sgo thams cad dang sems can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang srid pa'i/ 
220b2(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang / skye bo'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad bdag gi sems can kha dog dang dbyibs dang / chu zheng rnam/ 
220b3(phal chen): ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ skye ba kun tu 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ mos pa sna tshogs can 'di lta ste/ lha'i
220b4(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / klu'i lam gyi rgyu da du gtogs pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / dri za'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang
220b5(phal chen): lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / nam mkha' lding gi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / 'am ci'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lto 'phye chen po'i
220b6(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du
220b7(phal chen): gtogs pa dang / mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa dang
220b8(phal chen): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa da // theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang / ye shes kyi tshul dang sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis byed de/ 'di
221a1(phal chen): ltar sems can la la la ni bzo'i rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzungs snang bas 'jig rten gyi bzo sna tshogs bslabs shing don byed do// 
221a2(phal chen): sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyi don byed do// sems
221a3(phal chen): can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i ye shes kyi sgo snang ba yongs su bskyed pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par brjod cing don byed do// sems can
221a4(phal chen): la la la ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sa bon chud mi za bar brtan zhing yongs su bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su brjod cing don byed do// sems can la
221a5(phal chen): la la ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cadayongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir// 
221a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ ngan du spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa dang 'thun pa'i rgyus sems can dmyal
221a7(phal chen): ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor bar myong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas/ skyo ba yongs su bskyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
221a8(phal chen): pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur bar brjod pas dga' ba chen po bskyed cing don byed do// sems can la la la
221b1(phal chen): ni 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / sku la mngon par mos pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon
221b2(phal chen): tan dang bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ mi zlog shing lhun gyis grub pa dang / rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'phron las
221b3(phal chen): nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni 'di lta ste/ 
221b4(phal chen): chus zil gyis gnon la/ phas zil gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa ba sred pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen po yongs su
221b5(phal chen): brjod cing don byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho kho ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di yi bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dang / srang thams cad dang / lam gyi sum
221b6(phal chen): mdo thams cad dang / grong mtshams thams cad dang / khyim thams cad dang / 'thun par 'dus pa'i rdul thams cad dang / grong thams cad dang / grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa
221b7(phal chen): ji ltar tshogs shing 'dus pa'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang // khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / sbyor ba ji lta ba dang / mthu ji lta ba dang / rnam par spyod pa ji lta
221b8(phal chen): ba bzhin du de dag dang 'thun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shing chos ston kyang / sems can de dag gis de sus bstan pa dang / de galas 'ongs pa mi shes te/ 
222a1(phal chen): gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med pa'ang ma yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na zhags pa 'thub pa lta
222a2(phal chen): ba rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa dgu bcu rtsa drug 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyi nang du yang sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
222a3(phal chen): thams cad dang 'thun par gnas te/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar kho bo grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa 'di na sems can gyi don byed cing / 'dug pa de bzhin du// 'jam bu'i gling gi grong
222a4(phal chen): dang / grong khyer dang // ljongs dang yul dang khams dang / ngargyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na yang sems can gyi/ don byed do// 'dzam bu'i gling na ji lta ba de bzhin du gling ba ni
222a5(phal chen): ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang // de bzhin du skong dang stong gnyis pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i
222a6(phal chen): 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi gzhir bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams su bya
222a7(phal chen): ba'i ming du gtogs pa thams cad dang / sems can yongs su rgyu ba thams cad dang / sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang / sems can rgya mtsho gnas pa thams cad dang / sems
222a8(phal chen): can gyi rgyud gnas pa thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya ba thams cad dang / sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad/ 
222b1(phal chen): rlung bas sna tshogs dang / tshul sna chags dang / sgo sna tshogs dang / rigs pa sna tshogs dang / drang ba snga tshogs dang / thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang / d+hab sdu rtogs kyis sems cas nA/ 
222b2(phal chen): kyi don byed do// gzugs dang pa dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan cing mos par bya ba dang / tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos
222b3(phal chen): ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su song ba 'di shes par zad na/ khobs byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i yum dang ldan pa
222b4(phal chen): bdag dang sems can gyi lus sro tha mi dang ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob rab 'dul ba'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa dalam gyi rgyung thams cad du khyab pa 'jig rten gyi skye
222b5(phal chen): thams cad rang gi lus la rjes su spyod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis bltan dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i/ 'khor lo la brtson pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi rigs dang rlung dong / 
222b6(phal chen): cher skye ba rab tu ston pa bskul pa thams cad du gnas pa la thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'khor lo dang ldan pa/ mig 'phrul lta bu'i spyod pa rnam par bye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa// 'gro ba
222b7(phal chen): thams cad kyi don byed kyang gos pa med par gnas pa la brtson pa/ dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud ba/ ye shes kyi dbyings bdag med pa dang ldan pas sdang
222b8(phal chen): pang byam pa'i slong rdzi na mtha' las par spong ba nga ldan pa/ 'grob sas cad kyi dge pa'i bya ba yongs su byed pa'i mngon par brjod par dgag sbyong ba shes pa ma/ mnatan spong ba du ma
223a1(phal chen): skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la zhes
223a2(phal chen): bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor
223a3(phal chen): bzangs kyis kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang
223a4(phal chen): yang bltas te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas so// ngango // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang sro gal mi lta/ srid pa'i longs spyod dang / yongs su zin pa dang / 
223a5(phal chen): nye bar blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la na mi lta/ sems can gyi yul gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thas
223a6(phal chen): cad la ni mi lha/ g.yog 'khor dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyad pa thams cad la ni mo lha ste/ rgyal srid dang / dbang phyug gi dbang gi bde ba thams cad la ni mi lha la/ sangs rgyas kyi
223a7(phal chen): zhing bla na med par yongs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang yongs su dag par bya ba la blta ba/ mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur
223a8(phal chen): dang rim gror bya bas mo ngoms pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la blta ba dang / rang bzhin med pa yongs su shes pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i byor chos thams cad la blta ba yon tan rgya
223b1(phal chen): mtsho thams cad kyi don du nan tan bya ba las nyam pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan thams cad la lta ba dang / bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang
223b2(phal chen): dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam chen po la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho tham cad du 'jug par bya ba la lta ba
223b3(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo re rer/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med pa thams cad gzud pa la rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams
223b4(phal chen): cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par gzung bas/ mi ngoms par bya ba'iphyir chos kyi ye shes snang ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la/ lta ba de/ 
223b5(phal chen): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni// de dag thams cad kyi 'byung / 
223b6(phal chen): gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing mthar kyis yul khams chen po gang na ba der phyin nas// spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pal yongs su rmed cing chol tshol ba las// mthong
223b7(phal chen): nas spos 'tshang gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la gang na ba der phyin te/ drung du song nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong
223b8(phal chen): dpon longs spyod ud pa la la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pa la'i mdun du 'dug te thal mo sbyar nas/ 'di
224a1(phal chen): da ces smras so// 'phags pa bdags sa rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i mi shes 'tshal te/ sangs rgya sa thams cad kyi sngun gyi ma/ 
224a2(phal chen): lam gyi kyil 'khor mongs su rdzogs par dgyi bar yang dka'// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yongs su grub par bgyi bar yang dga' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes sku
224a3(phal chen): yongs su 'chal bar bgyi bar yang dga' byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga' byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor
224a4(phal chen): thams cad snang bar dgyi bar yang dga' byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtan dbar yang dga'/ sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam
224a5(phal chen): par gtor bar yang dga'/ ning gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ 
224a6(phal chen): ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na/ byang chub sems dpa'
224a7(phal chen): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma 'tshal to// smras pa rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ legs so legs
224a8(phal chen): so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni spos thams cad shes te/ spos sbyar ba thams cad dang bdug spos thams cad dang / bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang / drug pa thams cad dang / 
224b1(phal chen): byug pasbyang ba thams cad dang bye ma thams cad da byem sbyar thathams cadad spos dang drug pa dang / bye ma'i rnam pathams cad kyang shes te/ lnga'i spyos kyang shes/ 
224b2(phal chen): so// klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldong dang mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i spos kyang shes so// nang gso ba'i spos dang
224b3(phal chen): yod mi bde ba bskul ba'i spos dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang / nyon mongs pa ni bar bya ba'i spos dang / 'dus
224b4(phal chen): byas kyi dga' ba dang bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / 'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyed pa'i spos dang / bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad yongs su
224b5(phal chen): sel ba'i spos dang // sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i rgyud yang dang / par 'byung ba'i spos dang / chos kyi tshul khong du chud b.rabye ba'i spos dang / 'phags pas spyang pa'i spos dang / byang
224b6(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spos rnam pa tha dad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i spos kyang shes te/ kho bos spos de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu'ang rab tu shes so// 
224b7(phal chen): 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / 'grub pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / yongs su spangs pa dang / rab tu sbyar ba dang / yongs su spyad pa dang / yul
224b8(phal chen): dang mthu dang las dang / rgyu yang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu mo'i 'jig rten na spos glang glang po'i snying po zhes bya ba/ klu yongs su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/ ri lu til gyi 'bru
225a1(phal chen): tsam gyis kyang yul khams chen po thams cad spros kyi sbyin gyi ba shin tu sdug pas/ kun nas khebs par gyur te/ nag bdun du smos
225a2(phal chen): chu'i rgyun shin tu phra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo// de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam/ gos la spos chu'i rgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang // me tog gser gyi kha dog
225a3(phal chen): tu 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pa'i gos dang lus su 'gyur ro// khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang me tog gser gyi
225a4(phal chen): kha dog lta bus rnam par brgyan par gnas so// sems ca ngan khyim gyi nang na gnas par gang gis/ spos kyi sgron gyi dra ba de la rlung gis mngad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams
225a5(phal chen): cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang / mos pa chen pos yongs su rgyas par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la bder/ dang / dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag
225a6(phal chen): gi lus la yang khams 'khrugs pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med de/ sems kyi sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba yang mi 'byung ngo // 
225a7(phal chen): 'jigs pa'am/ sdang ba'am/ bag cha ba 'am/ yid 'khrug pa'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad nag bdun du dga' ba dang bdi skyes te gcig la gcig byams
225a8(phal chen): pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bul po ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang / nyams bde bskyes pa rnams la/ bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ ci nas kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs
225b1(phal chen): ba'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu rim la ya las byung ba'i can danas stengs dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskus na mo'i 'obs su mchongs
225b2(phal chen): kyang tshig pa med do// rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spos gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhes byang yod de/ des rnga'am drung la bslus na/ de'i sgras gzhan gyi 'khor thams cad
225b3(phal chen): pham par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu mtsho ma dros pa'i ngogs nas 'byung ba'i a ga ru nag po pad mo'i stong po zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i rol lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dros kyang / 'dzam bu'i
225b4(phal chen): gling thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can ga dgas spos kyi dring tshor ba de dag thams cad nga/ sdig dpal smod cing / sdom pa'i sems rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
225b5(phal chen): rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal po la ba can las/ 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dro tshor nasems can de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ 
225b6(phal chen): kho ba nid dgal ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos ston to// rigs kyi bu srin po'i 'jig rten nas 'byung ba'i spos kyi rnam pa rgya
225b7(phal chen): rlung ba zhes bya ba mdza/ don 'khor los bsgyur ba'i 'angs sgrod kyi don du 'byung ste/ des bdugs ma thag tu tsha mas pasgyu nga'i rgyal ba' dang na mnamag tshan pa
225b8(phal chen): rnam ma pa'i dbyings la gnas// rigs kyi bu lnga'i 'khor tshis pa dang po nas 'byung ba'i smos kyi rnam pa rnam par byed pa zhes pa yang / des bdugs mthag tu ma rnams sangs
226a1(phal chen): rgyas kyi dro zhim po dran par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i gnas naspos kyi rnam bdag pa'i mdzod ces bya ba
226a2(phal chen): yod de/ des bdugs mthag tu mtshe ma'i lha'i bu thams cadalha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma'i drung du 'dong ngo // de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i rgyal po rab mchems chos kyi gtam bya'o// 
226a3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na spos kyi rnam pa sa 'du bar zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i spos kyi drung ba byang chub sems dpa' che gcig gis thogs pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun
226a4(phal chen): du byung na/ spos kyi sprin chen pos chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par gang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'kho ra gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa
226a5(phal chen): spos kyi sprin chen po'i char rab tu bab bo// rigs kyi buSh+TAn/ rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na/ spos kyi rnam pa yid 'phrog pa zhes bya ba yod/ des lha'i rgyal po rab
226a6(phal chen): 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'dab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni spos sbyar ba de shes su dang na/ kho bos
226a7(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas gyen du 'phags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dang bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad
226a8(phal chen): las shin tu 'das pa/ ye shes sgyu ma'i rnam pa dang // gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa// 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ chags pa med pa'i ngang mub can// sgrib pa med pa'i ye
226b1(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi stong yum dang stsal du ldan pa/ kun ga na'i gnas thams cad la ma gnas par srid pa'i kun gnang da nga gnas thams
226b2(phal chen): cad du rgyub rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa'am/ gnong / 
226b3(phal chen): par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi rgyud bstan par nus re skran// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid ni// grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den
226b4(phal chen): mnyan ba dpa' banas bya ba 'dug gos/ de dus / dza sa chub sems dpas/ byang byamams nga'i sto sa la sgru ba par byu dang / daltar mnatan du bya/ 
226b5(phal chen): drim shig/ de nas tshang dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pala'i rkang gnyis la spyobos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshang gi tshong
226b6(phal chen): dpon longs spyod ud pa la la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bsdus te/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ud pal drung nas song ngo // 
226b7(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer khang pa brtsegs par 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug pa'i tshe/ lam gyi gyen thur dang / lam mnyam pa dang / lam gyi thag drug dang / lam rdul yod pa dang / 
226b8(phal chen): 'amajus med pa dang / lam dang / lam ma nga / yang dag pa / 'amagags sa pa dang / lam 'jug pa dang / 'am 'dug pa da pa pa rnas pa byud / 'asus sa
227a1(phal chen): snyam du bsams so// 'di ltar bdag dge ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro 'don/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyonan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// ba rom/ 
227a2(phal chen): tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad byams sdang dang / mthon dman du gyur pa'i g.yangs/ 
227a3(phal chen): las rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad mi mnyam pa'i nan tan las bsgyur ba dang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rab tu ni par bya ba dang / sems can
227a4(phal chen): thams cad kyi mi dge ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sdong dum dang tsher ma dang / rgya mo dang / gseg ma bsal ba dang / chos kyi dbyings bsgribs pa med pa la gnol bar bya ba dang / thams
227a5(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa'i pho drang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyur 'gyu ra ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// dge ba'i
227a6(phal chen): bshes gnyen la ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rag lus so zhes de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa der phyin nas/ 
227a7(phal chen): mnyan pa dpa' bo yongs su rmed cing chol tshol ba las grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgo rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs na mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshong pa brgya phrag stong tsam dang srog chags
227a8(phal chen): brgya stong dum gtam sna tshogs nyan par 'dod pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la/ 
227b1(phal chen): ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya
227b2(phal chen): stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
227b3(phal chen): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub
227b4(phal chen): sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ma dzad do// zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
227b5(phal chen): pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// smras pa rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu semra
227b6(phal chen): bskyed de/ ye shes chen po 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dro ba dang / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gling gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / 
227b7(phal chen): dbyer med pa'i theg pa chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung bas 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
227b8(phal chen): gyi sgo dang rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i ye shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyod pa'i smon lam rgya shing rta'i 'khor lo thogs
228a1(phal chen): pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dpa' rlabs kyis/ rnam
228a2(phal chen): par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang / tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / chos kyi phyogs dang sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha'i lam 'byung ba dang
228a3(phal chen): rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i lam 'byung ba dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bo
228a4(phal chen): ni rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su sbyong zhing gnas te// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling
228a5(phal chen): gi sems can phongs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi don du dka' ba spyod de/ de dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// 
228a6(phal chen): chos kyi longs spyod kyis de dag yongs su tshim par bya'o// de dag la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi lam man ngag tu bstan par bya'o// ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par spel bar bya'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
228a7(phal chen): stobs yongs su spel bar bya'o// byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o// snying rje chen po'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam
228a8(phal chen): par zhi bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i stobs shin tu bstan par bya'o// sems can rgya mtsho bsdu ba la 'di dag sbyar bar bya'o// yon tan rgya mtsho'i nan tan gyi sgo la dgod par
228b1(phal chen): bya'o// 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong bar bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshol
228b2(phal chen): yang 'di dag gzung bar bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang / yid la byed pa la brtson par kho bo rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so// rigs kyi bu kha bo na de ltar
228b3(phal chen): 'gro ba la phan pa dang bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen po'i ron pa che'i gling thams cad kyang shes so// rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad dang rin po che'i rigs thams
228b4(phal chen): cad dang rin po che'i gtos thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// klu'i gnas thams cad dang klu 'khrug pa thams cad dang gnod sbyin gyi gnas
228b5(phal chen): thams cad dang / gnod sbyin 'khrug pa thams cad dang srin po'i gnas thams cad dang srin tha'ajigs pa thams cad rab tu ni bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams
228b6(phal chen): cad dang / 'byung ba'i bar chad rnam pa re zhi bar bya ba yang rab tu shes te/ klong yod pa thams cad dang // klong thams cad bkol ba dang / dpa' rlabs chen po yongs su spangs pa dang / chu'i kha
228b7(phal chen): dog rnam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so// gnyi zla dang / gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang / nyin zhag dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam dang / thang gcig kyang rab tu shes so// 
228b8(phal chen): phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums dang / bde mi bde dang / gru'i 'khrul 'khor brtan par bya ba dang / gru bzur ba dang / gru phul ba dang / rlung brdo ba dang // rlung bskyed pa dang / gru bsgyur zhing / 
229a1(phal chen): bzlog pa dang // grubartod pa dang / gru gtang ba'ang rab tu shes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho ba ni shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pas/ rtag tu sems
229a2(phal chen): can gyi don dang dgos pa byed de/ tshong ba'i tshogs grubartan pos lam pa zhing nye zhir mi 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang / spro ba bskyed cing bsam pa ji lta ba
229a3(phal chen): bzhin du rin po che'i gling du phyin par byas nas/ de dag rin po che thams cad kyis chog ste phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / phyir yang 'dzam bu'i gling du 'gyed 'gyed kyang / rigs kyi
229a4(phal chen): bu kho bo'i gru ni nam yang thub pa'am/ nye nor gyur ma myong ste/ sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang gis kho bo'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang
229a5(phal chen): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye nor 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa'i ye shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// 
229a6(phal chen): sred pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur te/ dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyin
229a7(phal chen): yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rnyog pa dang bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro// zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir
229a8(phal chen): brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro// phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgang ba las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho tha dad pa'ang khong du chud par 'gyuraro// 
229b1(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi stong pa rgyamacha rjes su'ang 'brang bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba bsam brgya ma tshangs babazhin du 'ang gzugs panan 'byung bab gyur ro// rigs kyi thu ngan
229b2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang // zos pa dang // 'grogs pa dang / rjes su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes bya ba thob par bden/ kho bas byang chub sems dpa'
229b3(phal chen): 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu srin gyi 'jigs pa dang / 
229b4(phal chen): bral ba/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi las rnam par rgyub 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu ba'i dngos pos de yongs su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa
229b5(phal chen): nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa// sems can gyi mngon par chags pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu srub pa// dus rgyamatsho thams cad dang tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa// 'gro ba
229b6(phal chen): rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbus las mi 'da' ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan
229b7(phal chen): song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na grong khyer dga' ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug gos/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems
229b8(phal chen): dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i
230a1(phal chen): rkang ba gnas pa smrabs byas sa nasamanyan pa dnga' bol la nab slong dums galas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang / 
230a2(phal chen): dang yang bltas nas gdong mchims bkang sde ngu zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta bas ngoms bzhin du mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas song ngo // dam pa
230a3(phal chen): dgu bcu bdun pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje chen po'i rlan gyis mngon par brlan pa
230a4(phal chen): rgyud can bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyu ngan shin tu bstsags pa/ nyon mongs pa'i rdul dang / mun pa dang / dri ma dang / 'das thams cad dang bral ba/ chos mnyam bzhin
230a5(phal chen): khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyen thur med/ ba la zhugs pa// dge ba'i chos tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ mi dge ba thams cad kyis mi shigs pa'i brtson
230a6(phal chen): 'grus brtan pa'i mthu sngon du 'dor ba dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu byung ba// rgya chen po'i bde ba thob pa shes rab kyi nyi ma'i 'od gzer snang bas ma rig pa'i
230a7(phal chen): mun pa ma lus par bskul pa/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhing bsil bas blags pa'i ye shes kyi me tog gis rgyas pa/ smon lam chen po'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi tshul dang 'thun pa/ 
230a8(phal chen): chos kyi dbying thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang du thogs pa med par 'gro ba la mngon du gyur pa/ byang chub
230b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos bde grong khyer dga' ba'i phreng ba gang na bder phyin te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba'i dam pa yongs su rmed cing tshol tshol ba la grong khyer dga' ba'i
230b2(phal chen): phreng ba'i shar phyogs logs kyi 'dab gcig na shing a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na khyim bdag stong phrag du ma zhig gis
230b3(phal chen): bskor te/ grong khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su bgro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gnom pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad yongs
230b4(phal chen): su gtang ba dang / dngos por 'dzin pa thams cad rab tu spang ba dang / mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gzhig pa dang / srid pa'i 'ching ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang / 
230b5(phal chen): lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang / wecom dang / yid gnyis dang / nem nur gyi rab rig thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang / gso sgra'i rnyog pa shin tu gdang pa
230b6(phal chen): dang / phrag dog dang ser sna'i dri ma yongs su sbyangs pa dang sems kyi mtsho shin tu gsal bar bya ba dang / sems rnyog pa med la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / dad pa
230b7(phal chen): rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de/ sangs rgyas blta bar mos pa bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blangs pa dang byang chub
230b8(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par bstan cing byang
231a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/ byang chub tu sems
231a2(phal chen): bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis gtam de'i rjes chad chad du bsdad nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i
231a3(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ ring mo zhig tu btud nas chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'phags pa bdag ni nor bzangs nor bzangs
231a4(phal chen): shes bgyi ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs dasu tshol na ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa 'i spyod pa la slob par 'gyur ba dang / bslabs nas
231a5(phal chen): kyang ci nas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang / gdul ba'i don la mngon du mos par 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba las mi 'phang
231a6(phal chen): ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thos par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzung ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
231a7(phal chen): chos kyi tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems
231a8(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag
231b1(phal chen): par mnod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam
231b2(phal chen): pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// 
231b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su
231b4(phal chen): sbyong ste/ de ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs dasu dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams
231b5(phal chen): cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mtshe ma'i lha'i gnas thams cad dang / dga' lnga na gyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i
231b6(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogs pa thams cad dang / 
231b7(phal chen): lha'i gnas thams cad dang / klu'i 'jig rten thams cad dang // klu'i gnas thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang / srin po'i
231b8(phal chen): 'jig rten thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas thams cad dang // grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / yi dag
232a1(phal chen): kyi gnas thams cad dang / dri za'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / lha ma yin
232a2(phal chen): gyi gnas thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang / nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang / mi'am ci'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi 'am ci'i gnas thams
232a3(phal chen): cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad dang / mi'i 'jig rten thams cad dang / mi'i gnas thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyen
232a4(phal chen): dang grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / khams dang / rgyal po'i dapho brangs 'khor dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i nga sems can gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ni ston to// chos
232a5(phal chen): ma yin pa ni bzlog go// rtsod pa ni zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa ni/ rnam par zlog go// 'khrug pa ni nye bar zhi bar byed do// g.yul du lhags pa ni rnam par bzlog go/ shags
232a6(phal chen): 'gyed pa ni zhi bar byed do// mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to// bcing ba thams cad ni yongs su gcod do// btsonar thams cad ni mngon par 'dral lo// 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog
232a7(phal chen): go/ mi dge ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do// srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par bzlog go/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas logs par g.yem pa dang
232a8(phal chen): brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zhe gcod pa dang // tshig kyal ba dang / chags sems dang / gnod sems dang / logs par lta ba las ni sems can rnam par zlog go/ mi bya ba
232b1(phal chen): thams cad ni byed du ma 'jug go// dge ba'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'jug go// sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob du 'jud de/ 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / 
232b2(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / zhags pa 'thub pa thams cad la gong ma'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad
232b3(phal chen): rnam par bzlog pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod cing bstan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to// rnam par 'god do// 
232b4(phal chen): rab tu gastsal bar byed do// rjod do// de bzhin du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams cang zil gyis ma nan te chos ston to// stong
232b5(phal chen): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de dran na du phyogs bcur yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang
232b6(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag bu chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston
232b7(phal chen): to/ sems can dmyal ba yang snyan to// sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can gyi mi bde ba'ang ston to// khyol song gi skye gnas kyang ston no// 
232b8(phal chen): byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyung tha dad pa dang / byom song gi skye gnas kyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang / byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to// gshin rje'i 'dzin
233a1(phal chen): rten yang ston to// gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug sngal yang ston to// mtho ris kyi 'jig rten/ 
233a2(phal chen): yang ston to// mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' bar spyod pa dang / long spyod kyang ston to// mi'i 'jig rten yang ston to// mi'i 'jig rten gyi
233a3(phal chen): lam gyi rgyud du 'gro ba'i lam dang // mi'o 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston to// 'jig rten
233a4(phal chen): kun 'byung ba dang // 'jig rten na nub par 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba dang / 'jig rten nas 'byung ba yang ston te/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam
233a5(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang / srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba
233a6(phal chen): dang / sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag par bstan pa dang / sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang / 'jig rten rgyu ba'i bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang / 'jig rten 'byung ba dang / ldog/ 
233a7(phal chen): pa'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad gnas kyi ming du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa
233a8(phal chen): dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shin tu brjod pa'i phyir chos ston to// rigs kyi bu kho
233b1(phal chen): bon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes pa
233b2(phal chen): zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par shes pa zhing gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ kun tu lta ba'i ye/ 
233b3(phal chen): shes kyis rab tu thob pa tshig gi lam dang / sgra thams cad rnam par dmigs pa la shin tu gzhol ba'i rna ba dang ldan pa/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la dbang rab
233b4(phal chen): tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i ye shes la dbang gis dbang bsgyur ba'i skyes bu dpa' bo sems can tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
233b5(phal chen): du rnam par dmigs par bya ba la ma 'dres pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyi/ 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yangs shing srab la yid du 'ongasab dang ldan pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i
233b6(phal chen): yid du 'ongs pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sgyu ma lta bu dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam/ 
233b7(phal chen): gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum thams cad du rjes su 'brangs pa'i ye shes kyi lus dang ldan pa/ namakha'i dbyings ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dngag
233b8(phal chen): tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shum phyi ma'i mtha' na grong khyer ka ling da'i
234a1(phal chen): nags tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
234a2(phal chen): sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis
234a3(phal chen): la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i drung nas song ngo // 
234a4(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs mthar gyis yul shum phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
234a5(phal chen): yongs su tshol zhing sems can kun la rmed pa'i tshe/ gang / nas gang du song ba de dang der rogs pa brgya phrag du/ ma dang / bu mo brgya phrag du ma zhig srang dang / lam gyi
234a6(phal chen): bani mdo dang lam gyi sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo // skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bud med brgya phrag du ma zhig gis kyang / rigs kyi bu 'di re/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam
234a7(phal chen): par bsgyings pa ni/ grong khyer ka ling ka'i nags tshal 'di nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra ba chen po// rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byin pa nyi ma'i mdog na/ sems can tshad med pa'i don du chos ston cing
234a8(phal chen): 'dug go zhes bstan to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs bza' shing gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te// bltas na// bza' shing gi ra bden// shing zla ba
234b1(phal chen): shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'od sna tshogs kyi kha dog can 'od kyi mdog dang ldan pa/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyon tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par so/ 
234b2(phal chen): pa mang po dang / lo ma'i shing yongs su 'gebs pa zhes bya ba/ gdugs kyi rnam pa dang / dbyibs su 'dug pa'i mdab mas kun nas khebs pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i sgron gyi/ 
234b3(phal chen): mdog dang ldan pa mang ba dag pa shogag gis tog gi mdzod ces bya ba ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog mi zad pa'i char rab tu
234b4(phal chen): 'bebs pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba dang / sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu ma dpo dang / shing tog gi shing rtag tu smin pa'i ro// dpe med
234b5(phal chen): pa'i 'bras bu'i tshogs shes bya ba / gser gyi ri bo'i lhun ltar 'dug pa rtag tu shing tog phun sum tshogs paraganas pa mang po dang / rin po che'i rgyal po'i shing rnam par
234b6(phal chen): snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / se mo do dang / rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba
234b7(phal chen): ltar phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che kha dog grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang / gos kyi shing dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi
234b8(phal chen): tshogs rab tu 'gyed cing 'phyang bas shin tu brgyan pa mang po dang / rol mo'i shing dga' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mang po dang / spos
235a1(phal chen): kyi shing kun tu zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ phyogs thams cad du thogs pa med par/ rnam pa thams cad du yid du 'ongs pa'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ba mang po dag kyang yod/ 
235a2(phal chen): par mthong mtshe'u dang / lu ma dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu rin po che bdun gyi pha gus mtha' brtsigs pa/ phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang 'thun
235a3(phal chen): ba'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pos bskus pas kun nas bskor ba gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po bai DUr+ya sngon po las legs par blangs pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa
235a4(phal chen): chu/ lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ongs pa can gyis yongs su gang ba/ rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pa la dang / ku mud dang / me togadapun da ri ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas chu
235a5(phal chen): kun nas yog pa/ bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ sgra snyan pa 'byin cing brjod pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing / 
235a6(phal chen): gi phreng ba legs par bkye bas yongs su bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang/ rin po che'i seng ge'i khri sna tshogs yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ rin po che
235a7(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa du mas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan rin po che sna tshogs 'brel bar bting ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang / bdag spos kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa/ lnga
235a8(phal chen): rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin po che mngon par sbyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re bkye ba/ rin po che sna tshogs dang / 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nas bres pa/ rin po che'i
235b1(phal chen): dril gyi dra ba yid du 'ongs zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pos brgyan pa/ 'khor du lha rdzas rin po che'i stan brgya stong phrag dus bting zhing bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la la ni se
235b2(phal chen): ge'i khri rin po che'i pad mo snying po can bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che spos kyi rgyal po'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri
235b3(phal chen): rin po che'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge'i bya la'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong / 
235b4(phal chen): la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i pad dmos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la la dar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang
235b5(phal chen): ba'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i rje rje'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // 
235b6(phal chen): la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ongs pa'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // rin po che'i shing drung la lar ni seng ge'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po mdog
235b7(phal chen): dkar po'i pad mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo // bza' shing gi ra ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhing rgya mtsho chen po ltar rin po che'i gling gis
235b8(phal chen): yongs su gang ba mthong ngo // bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dam pas spras te/ rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i phyogs ka tsa lin da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam yang / gom pa bor zhing bteg pa'i
236a1(phal chen): chen/ mthong man med pa rdo rje rin po che'i mchog gi pad mo dri yid du 'ong bar nim zhing reg na bde ba'i sil ma kun tu bkram pa/ dang ngur dang / rma bya dang / 
236a2(phal chen): khrung khrung dang / kun la dang / ka la bing ka dang / ko ki la dang / 'ji ba na 'dzi ba kasgra sman cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin pa mang pos gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal
236a3(phal chen): shin tu legs par 'grigs pas mdzes par brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad mo'i sprin gyi char dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad pa'i char rgyun tu 'bab pa/ 'bres pa'i nags
236a4(phal chen): tshal las kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu rtsegs ma rgyan par dkod pa'i nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug spos ran thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim
236a5(phal chen): pa/ lha'i 'dun sa chos bzang po'i rgyan las kyang lhag pas brgya/ na pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna tshogs kyis kun tu bres pa/ mu tig rin po che'i me
236a6(phal chen): tog gi 'phreng ba dang / lnga ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/ rin po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gser gyi dra ba 'bar bas kun nas dkrigs pa/ rol mo'i shing dang /
