236a7(phal chen): rin po che'i ta la las dril bu'i dra ba/ rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'ongs pa'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byung ba dang ldan pa/ dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po'i lha mo dpe tshul shin tu bzang ba rnam
236a8(phal chen): kyis/ glu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba blang ba/ lha rdzas kyi yid bzhin gyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas rnam par mdzes pa/ rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang / mdog sna
236b1(phal chen): tshogs su ldan pas bstan gtang ma thab/ khang pa brtsegs pa mtshan pa cha'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ brgya stong grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i po zang ltar bstan pa'ang ba// 
236b2(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs rnam par byebs rnam pa thams cad du brgyan pa'i gdugs shin tu legs pa rnam par bsgreng zhing bkram pas/ kun nas bltan mdzes pa// dbang po chen pa'i 'jig rten ltar shin
236b3(phal chen): tu mdzes pa'i de'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i 'od snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang ltar/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid/ 
236b4(phal chen): du 'ong ba'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste/ bza' shing gi rab chen dpo nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam dpar bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang / byin gyi
236b5(phal chen): rlungs tshe da ngas ma gyis ma khyab pas// 'jig tan gyi'ang/ sagrangs med pa'i gnas sa mu pa'i rnam pa'i dbyings/ rasang mi shing cha med de// rgya chen pa dang ldan par mthong ngo // 
236b6(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bangangs kyis/ de ltar yon tan chad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshogs pa'i baba' shing gor nga'i rgyan byang chub sems dpa'i las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su grub
236b7(phal chen): ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsab rgya chen po las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cing / rim gror byas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las byung ba/ 'jig rten gyi kham
236b8(phal chen): thams cad na yod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bus grub pa/ dge ba'i bsod nams dri ma med pa rgya chen pos grub cing byung ba/ 
237a1(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang / rgyu 'thun pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis byung ba nyan thos
237a2(phal chen): dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa/ mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa/ bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis
237a3(phal chen): mi tshugs pa/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med par mthong ste/ shing sna tshogs de dag gi drung gi seng ge'i khri chen po de dag la 'ang / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
237a4(phal chen): ba lus shin tu mdzes pa/ spyod lam zhi ba/ dbang po/ zhi ba/ yod zhi ba/ shin tu dben pa// dbang po thul ba/ kla dbo ltar shin tu dul ba/ mtsho ltar dngas zhings gsal la rnyog
237a5(phal chen): pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa/ pad mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mgos pa/ seng ge
237a6(phal chen): lhar 'jigs pa dang / skyi g.ya'ab med pa/ mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas ri'i dbang po chen po ltar mi skul ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas/ yid du 'ong ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar
237a7(phal chen): 'gro ba'i sems tshim par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sman gyi rgyal po ngaltar na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar
237a8(phal chen): byed pa/ chu'i lha'i nags pa ltar bltan yod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dang sems kyi bag yangs bde ba bskyed pa/ tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang
237b1(phal chen): dang / gang mug gi kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ rin po che'i rgyal po nang dbu chu 'dang ltar nyon mongs pas rnyog pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dngas par byed pa/ zhing na shin/ 
237b2(phal chen): ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'dug par mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan de dag la 'du 'khor sna tshogs 'khod par mthong ste/ 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po chen po
237b3(phal chen): las sogs pa gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rnam par thar pa mi zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa
237b4(phal chen): zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi/ stan la la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong ba las sogs pa tshang ngas pa'i ros su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing // dge
237b5(phal chen): slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ dbyangs kyi dkying/ 'khor rnam par dag pagazhi kun nas 'byedapa/ zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi
237b6(phal chen): stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur las sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang / bcas pa dag 'khod cing dge slong
237b7(phal chen): ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pasachos kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi
237b8(phal chen): stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' las sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings
238a1(phal chen): bas/ chos kyis chos thams cad dgebs rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi sman ma malan sla rgyal ba sa/ 
238a2(phal chen): dga' ldan las sogs pa dka' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i / lha'i bu ma'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi/ 
238a3(phal chen): sgongarang gi sems kyi mdzodzad kyi slong zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mdzong // 'khor gyi snyan la la la na lha'i rgyal po rab mchis la sogs pa lnga dulha'i bu ma 'khor dang
238a4(phal chen): bcas pa rnams 'khod cing/ dge slong ma seng gen dam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo rgyan mthar mas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi snyam
238a5(phal chen): la la la ni lha'i rgyal po brgya byin la sogs pa sucu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu/ wA'i bu mo'-i'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma
238a6(phal chen): gi rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo skyo ba'i sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi snyan lal la ni bu'i rgyal po gangs chen ma tsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'od brgya ba dang / dag
238a7(phal chen): / ga ga ba dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / gas ldan dang / mdzes pa la sogs pa/ klu'i du ma'i 'jor sa pachu rgyas pa'i 'dza cas pa rnams 'thod nga
238a8(phal chen): slongs meng ge rnam par myongs pas/ chos kyi gyis sa rnam kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / yum gyi do sa rgyan ces byab sang dag par btsun pa mang ngo // bang gyi blanarnapa la man
238b1(phal chen): po chen po ngal bso po la sogs pa na na da sbyin gyi bu mo dang / gnod sbyin gyi byos pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas// chos
238b2(phal chen): kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po la sogs pa/ dri za mang po dri za'i bu mo
238b3(phal chen): dang / dri za'i byos pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo dga' ba mi zad pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa zhes bya ba
238b4(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la dal ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yaM ngan gyi bu mo dang lha ma yin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
238b5(phal chen): 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul rgyashugs kyis brgyan pa shes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 
238b6(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan la la la ni namakha' lding gi dbang po shugs 'dzin chen po la sogs pa/ namapa lding gi dbang po/ namakhara' lding gi bu mo dang / namakha' lding gi byos pa'i 'khor dang bcas
238b7(phal chen): pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sring pa'i rgya mtshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bskrun pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi sman la la la nim
238b8(phal chen): 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po la sogs pa mi'am ci'i dbang po// mi'am ci'i bu mo dang / mi 'am ci'i byis pa'i 'khor dang btsas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng gi rnam par bsgyings
239a1(phal chen): pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni// lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po khwa
239a2(phal chen): gnyer gdong la sogs pa/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo dang / lto 'phye chen po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sku
239a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas la dga' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang bu mo brgya stong mang po 'khod cing / dge slong ma sa
239a4(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pas// chos kyi sgo khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni srin po'i dbang po rtag tu mdangs 'phrog sdong po'i
239a5(phal chen): rgyal po la sogs pa/ srin po'i dbang po// srin po 'bru mo dang / srin po'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la/ da cing // dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi
239a6(phal chen): sgo snying rje 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ sems can nyan thos kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma song ge rnam par bsgyings
239a7(phal chen): pas/ chos kyi sgo ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi sman la la la ni// sems can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'dod
239a8(phal chen): cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya chen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni// sems
239b1(phal chen): can theg pa chen po la mos pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba'i sgo kun tu sgo zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 
239b2(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sangs rgyas
239b3(phal chen): thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phung po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing
239b4(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge na gyi sgo rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub
239b5(phal chen): sems dpa' sa gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cingadage slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa
239b6(phal chen): mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen
239b7(phal chen): pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge
239b8(phal chen): rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sa drug pa la
240a1(phal chen): gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam par snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa/ 
240a2(phal chen): mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni// byang chub sems dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgos kun
240a3(phal chen): nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba/ yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni// byang chub sems dpa' sa brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing / dge slong ma seng ge rnam
240a4(phal chen): par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par ba bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni// byang
240a5(phal chen): chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo mi dmigs pa'i stobs kyi gnas kyis bstan pa zhes bya ba
240a6(phal chen): yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas
240a7(phal chen): ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // 'khor gyi stan la la la ni/ lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khod cing / dge
240a8(phal chen): slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pasachos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo // de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad
240b1(phal chen): kyi sems can du gdags pa dang / sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyed pa de dag gi sems can yongs su smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/ snod du gyur pa ji snyed cig bza' shing gir ba der 'ongs shing / 
240b2(phal chen): 'khor gyi stan la so sor 'khod pa/ bsam pa tha dad pa/ mos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa/ dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/ dge
240b3(phal chen): slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ci nas kyang thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na
240b4(phal chen): de ni dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa des/ kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa la sogs pa
240b5(phal chen): dang chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi tha dad pa la sogs pa dang sgrib pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i sems yang
240b6(phal chen): dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang / khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa dang / chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi snying po la sogs pa dang // chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa dang / sems
240b7(phal chen): kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang / kun tu mos pa mngon par sgrubs pa'i snying po la sogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa non pa'i phyir te/ bza' shing gi re ba nyi ma'i
240b8(phal chen): mdog der/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la blta ba dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / 
241a1(phal chen): sngon dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas dge ba'i chos yang dag par drangs pa la shin tu dkod pa nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
241a2(phal chen): byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du byas pa sha stag go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
241a3(phal chen): nags tsha la phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang 'chags phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang / 
241a4(phal chen): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam pa ngar 'phrul ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum
241a5(phal chen): tshogs pa rnam pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'ang thos nas/ chos kyi sprin gyi char chen pos/ sems mngon par brlan pa de'i yid la/ dge slong ma seng
241a6(phal chen): ge rnam par bsgyings pas/ bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byas kyis/ da ni g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma zhig du bya'o snyam pa dang / de'i mod la dge slong ma seng ge rnam
241a7(phal chen): par bsgyings pas/ bza' shing gi ra ba dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du bcas pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams
241a8(phal chen): nas/ skor ba byed pa'i tshe/ 'khor thams cad na'ang dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa 'dug pa mthong nas/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phagra
241b1(phal chen): ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan/ 
241b2(phal chen): tan du bgyi ma 'tshal te/ 'phags sa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad de nas bdag gis thos na/ 'phags mji ltar
241b3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu la
241b4(phal chen): mon byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba/ rloms rnams thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa
241b5(phal chen): rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul dzim bu zhig mchis// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ye shes snga ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan sems skad cig gi cha shas/ 
241b6(phal chen): la rnam par dmigs pa'i rang bzhin no// smras pa/ 'phags ma ni ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes snang ba 'di la sgrub pa dang / yongs
241b7(phal chen): su sgrub pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis phyogs bcu thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
241b8(phal chen): thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa/ dga' ldan gyi po brang na bzhugs pa thams cad re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin
242a1(phal chen): tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pasangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 
242a2(phal chen): 'di ltar lha'i lus dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang // lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i dbang po lus me
242a3(phal chen): tog gi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / bdug spos kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / 'phreng ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byug pa'i sprin
242a4(phal chen): yongs su 'dzin pa dang / phye ma'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / na bza'i sgron yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gdugs kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rgyal mtshan gyi sgron yongs su 'dzin
242a5(phal chen): pa dang / ba dan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang // rin po che'i lhab lhub kyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gnam yol
242a6(phal chen): gyi rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i rgyan gyi sprin yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rin po che'i gdan gyi sprin yongs su
242a7(phal chen): 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro'o// dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sku tshe gcig gis thogs pa rnams la/ mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin
242a8(phal chen): du/ yum gyi skur gshegs pa dang / bltam pa dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag
242b1(phal chen): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shing / snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / de bzhin
242b2(phal chen): dulga'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang // mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas na bzhug
242b3(phal chen): ba nas/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang bsam pa yongs su tshim par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar de dag thams cad la'ang / yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus
242b4(phal chen): rnam pa de lta bu dag gis rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro'o// // sems can gang gis kho mo sangs rgyas mchod pa dang // rim
242b5(phal chen): gro byed pa'i las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag
242b6(phal chen): thams cad la yang kho mo ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/ rigs kyi bu kho mo ye shes kyi mig gis/ sems can thams cad la
242b7(phal chen): blta'ang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed la rlom sems kyang mi byed do// 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho yang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pas
242b8(phal chen): rlom sems su byed pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'ang med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
243a1(phal chen): pad kyi 'khor mayongs su mang chos kyi rang bzhin yong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// sems kyi sang cig re re la chos kyi dbyings
243a2(phal chen): thams cad rgyas par 'gengs kyang chos nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khong du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ rlom sems
243a3(phal chen): thams cad yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dpung med pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas
243a4(phal chen): kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas bar 'gengs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang / skad cig gcig
243a5(phal chen): gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong ba/ lus la sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad 'byung zhing / rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod
243a6(phal chen): du med pa spu'i nyeg ma gcig gcig gis sbams shing mngon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'dra ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa
243a7(phal chen): yongs su ston pa/ skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa/ skad cig gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang
243a8(phal chen): brjod du med pa'i bskal par 'khod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul bgrod dka' ba na
243b1(phal chen): zong khyer rin po che'i rgyan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na bcom pa ma lnga'i bshes gnyen sa zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'i gan du song la// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
243b2(phal chen): la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bangs kyis/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te
243b3(phal chen): dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bsdus te/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i drung nas song ngo // 
243b4(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs shes rab kyi snang ba chen po des sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye she des snang ba de la ni sems chos nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi stobs snang
243b5(phal chen): bde la ni yang dag par rjes su lta/ sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam par dmigs pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
243b6(phal chen): cad kyi chos kyi 'khor mo yang dag par 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul de ni shin tu rgya che bar byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stobs de ni nye bar rton chos tham/ 
243b7(phal chen): cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs de la ni rab tu rtog/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gengs pa'i smon lam yongs su
243b8(phal chen): dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'drang/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi 'od na shin tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
244a1(phal chen): rnam par phye ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/ byang chub sems dpa'i las dang dran pa thams cad nye bar
244a2(phal chen): blangs pas brtsams pa mthar byung ba'i smon lam de ni yongs su rdzogs par byed cing mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom
244a3(phal chen): ba ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang / de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la/ ye shes kyi spyod yul gyi tshul la mi mkhas
244a4(phal chen): ba'i mi ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ mi da'adi de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan la/ de ltar shes bzhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul pa med cing // de ltar yid
244a5(phal chen): 'khrug pa med la// de ltar gnya' shing gang tsam du lta ste/ de ltar gnod pas mi tshugs shing / de ltar mtshan mar mi 'dzin la gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la g.yeng
244a6(phal chen): ba med pa'i mig dang / ldan te yin la brel ba med cing / bsam bzab la mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtsho ltar 'dug cing // sems mi nyam mi 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas
244a7(phal chen): ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod chags la dga' ba med de/ sems phyin ci log dang ldan yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyu ba med de/ 'di lta bu
244a8(phal chen): ngag ni 'dod pas 'khol kyang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi yul
244b1(phal chen): la chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med de/ mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do
244b2(phal chen): snyam mo// gang yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i yon tan gyi khyad par mngon par shes shing ye shes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzer to// 
244b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la yongs su dri bar sems pa ni/ khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste/ leg so legs so// khyod ni nges par
244b4(phal chen): sangs rgyas su smon pa'o// khyod ni bdag nges par se dmas can thams cad kyi gnas su bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o// / khyod ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi/ 
244b5(phal chen): zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o// khyod ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gtor bar 'dod pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'dir ro// bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma ni grong
244b6(phal chen): khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs logs shig na rang gi khyim na 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis tshig de thos nas/ dga' rangs ste mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing / 
244b7(phal chen): yid bde ba skyes nas bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ de'i khyim che zhing yangs la rin po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/ rin po che'i ta la'i
244b8(phal chen): 'phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba 'obs spos chus gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad mo dang / ud pal dang / ku mu da dang / me tog pun da
245a1(phal chen): kas chu yongs su khengs pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma 'dal ba/ spos yid du 'ong ba dang 'dres/ 
245a2(phal chen): ba'i chu dri zhim pas gang ba rin po che sil ma mang pos shin tu brgyan pa/ rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / khang
245a3(phal chen): ba brtsegs pas rnam par dkrigs shing / ba ga ma dang / rta babs dang / skar khung gi shar bu dang / zla gam dang / seng ge'i shing thags dang / snang ba'i rgyal mtshan la sogs pa/ rin po che
245a4(phal chen): sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i dgar bai DUr+yas spras pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi spos
245a5(phal chen): zhim po thams cad kyis/ 'khor thams cad nas bdugs shing bsangs pa/ a ga ru nag po mchog gi bdugaspos kyis dri zhom par bdugs pa/ spos kyi byug pas 'khor
245a6(phal chen): kun nas byugs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lan kan gyis/ rtsig ngos kun tu bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pas kun nas bka' ba/ 
245a7(phal chen): gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod cing 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa 'byung ba/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi sprin sil ma kun tu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan
245a8(phal chen): ba/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas sgo shin tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba mu med par brjod du yod pa/ rin po che byer ru'i sdong po
245b1(phal chen): dang rdo rje dang man shel la sogs pa'i gter brgya stong kun gyis shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa/ bza' shing gi rab chen po bcus brgyan pa mthong ste/ de na
245b2(phal chen): bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma/ gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa/ gya nom pa'i kha dog dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i mdog can
245b3(phal chen): skra mthon 'thong du 'dug pa lus kyi yan lag dang nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam par grub pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi thams cad las 'phags pa'i
245b4(phal chen): kha dog dang gzugs dang / dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan tshangs pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la/ 
245b5(phal chen): mkhas pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong ba'idabyangs can/ rnam par thar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'orgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzo dang gtsug lag
245b6(phal chen): thams cad la mkhas par byung ba/ chos kyi ye shes sgyu ma la mkhas par bslabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa/ rin po che'i lhab
245b7(phal chen): lhub sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba 'od shin tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin
245b8(phal chen): po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhab grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pas lus shin tu 'bar ba nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/ rin po che bai DUr+ya'i 'phreng ba mdo/ 
246a1(phal chen): dungs rdo rje na po che sna tshogs dang / nor bun po che seng ge mdzes pa sna tshogs dkye ba mgul nathogs pa dge ba'i chu ba spyad pa la
246a2(phal chen): bskal ba mthun pa dang / smon lam gcig pa'i 'khor mang po gzhan gyis mi phyed cing yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs chen po'i gter mo zad
246a3(phal chen): pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag thams cad dang / rin po che'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad kyang rang gi lus las byung ba'i
246a4(phal chen): 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sim bskyod pa / sems khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
246a5(phal chen): bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la smra bos phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med
246a6(phal chen): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'cha
246a7(phal chen): te// 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / 
246a8(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol// des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral
246b1(phal chen): ba'i mthar phyin pa zhes bya ba thob ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams lha mo'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang // rnam/ 
246b2(phal chen): par dag pas ci las mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// de bzhin du klu dang / gnod sbyin dang // dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi
246b3(phal chen): dang mi ma yin pa rnams la yang bud med kyi gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas ci la mos pa bzhin du snang bar byed do// sems
246b4(phal chen): can gang 'dod chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang nga ldan pa dag kho mo'i drung du 'ongs na yang / de dag tha ma sa cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir/ 
246b5(phal chen): chos ston te/ de dag gis chos de thos nas kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu
246b6(phal chen): 'thob bo// la la ni kho mo mthong ma thag tu 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dga' ba dang / ldan pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni gtam
246b7(phal chen): byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chags pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni la gnas bzung ba tsam
246b8(phal chen): gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba' thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la nig kyi
247a1(phal chen): tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dral bas snang ba
247a2(phal chen): zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni bltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi pa'i rnam par
247a3(phal chen): rgyan ces bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni glal pa tsam gyis/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phas kyi rgol ba rnam par
247a4(phal chen): 'thor ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni mig dbatsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyuradar te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi
247a5(phal chen): yul snang ba zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// la la ni pang du khyad pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyur/ te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad
247a6(phal chen): yongs su sdud cing migatong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang rab tu thob bo// la la ni 'o byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba
247a7(phal chen): thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la reg par byed pa zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'thob bo// de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cig kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub
247a8(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa chags pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do// smras pa
247b1(phal chen): 'phags ma khyod de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ phrin las ni ji lta bu zhig bsugs/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das
247b2(phal chen): pa'i dus shog na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang nabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med
247b3(phal chen): bar skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste// de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu
247b4(phal chen): mtho bar gshegs pa de/ sems can rnams la thugs dbartse ba'i sku don du rgyal po'i gnas sgo bzang po zhes dbya bar gshegs nas/ sgo'i them pa la zhabs kyis non pa'i
247b5(phal chen): che grong khyer de thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas// yang sa shing rgya tshal/ rin po che du ma las byas par yongs su grub par gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang / rin po che
247b6(phal chen): mang po'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgra rab tu 'byung ba dang / lha'i lus kyi sprin tshad med par rgya che
247b7(phal chen): bas khebs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe/ tshong dpon gyi chung ma zhig tu gyur te blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o// de nas kho mo cho 'phrul gyis yang dag par bskul nas/ khyim thab
247b8(phal chen): dang lhan cig tu dong dong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa grong bar gyi srang du gshegs pa la dad pa rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos rin po che'i dril bu gcig gcig phul lo// de'i tshe 'jam dpal
248a1(phal chen): gzhon nur gyur pa yang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu mtho bar gshegs pa'i zham 'dring na 'dug ste/ des kho mo bla na med pa
248a2(phal chen): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang
248a3(phal chen): chub sems dpa' thabs dang / ye shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ bsod nams rgya che zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ ye shes kyi yul la thub pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa
248a4(phal chen): 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan// song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag nan khugs
248a5(phal chen): shes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten can dan gyi khri 'phang can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gis de'i gan du song la// ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems
248a6(phal chen): dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
248a7(phal chen): 'tshal te bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas ste/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song/ 
248a8(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis grong khyer dge ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khug kyi khyim ga na ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos
248b1(phal chen): phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub
248b2(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams
248b3(phal chen): ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan
248b4(phal chen): du bgyi ba/ 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste// rigs
248b5(phal chen): kyi bu kho bo'i sems kyi rgyud las ni 'jig rten gyi khams tha/ mas cad nas kyang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
248b6(phal chen): cad nas kyang shin tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med do// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur
248b7(phal chen): ba med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang gi sgo 'byed pa ste/ kho bo mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed 'byed pas/ byang chub sems
248b8(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin// sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid la sems kyi skad cig skad cig tu mnyam par gzhog ste/ 
249a1(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa dum rab tu 'thoba'o// smras pa/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin de'i yul ji lta bu dan/ 
249a2(phal chen): mchis/ smras pa rigs kyi bu kho bo ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas cig tu brgyud pa/ bsod skyabs las/ 
249a3(phal chen): sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gser thub dang / log par dad sel dang / thams cad mnga' ba dang // gtsug tor dang / rnam par gzigs dang / rgyal dang // rdzogs
249a4(phal chen): mdzad dang / grags mchog dang / pad mo'i bla las sogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig
249a5(phal chen): tu brgyad pa/ rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du ma// thong ste/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas brgya 'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang
249a6(phal chen): mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag stong yang mthong ngo // de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang
249a7(phal chen): sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang / sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang / sangs rgyas bye ba thams cad tha dad pa dang / sangs rgyas bye ba khrags khrigs dang / de'i 'og ma
249a8(phal chen): sems kyis/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi
249b1(phal chen): rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi ning brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ 
249b2(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tsho gas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la 'jug go// thugs dang po bskyed pas thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la'ang 'jug go// smon
249b3(phal chen): lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la'ang
249b4(phal chen): 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la'ang 'jug go// bzod dab brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go// bdud kyi dkrug
249b5(phal chen): ma rnam par 'thor ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jugago/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la'ang 'jug go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam
249b6(phal chen): par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug go// 'khor kun nas 'dus pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// 'od kyi
249b7(phal chen): dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mtshogs gi mthu phyung ba la'ang 'jug go// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang
249b8(phal chen): cho 'phrul la'ang 'jug go// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa'ang shin tu rnam par gsal ba dang / ma 'dres par dran te yang dag par 'dzin to// dran pas yongs su bcangs so// / 
250a1(phal chen): rigs pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed do blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed
250a2(phal chen): do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa byams pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig la sangs rgyas rgya'ang mthong ngo // de'i 'og ma'i sems
250a3(phal chen): kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pasangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhi
250a4(phal chen): gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go// de bani na gshegs pa de dag gis chos bstan pa yang shin tu gsal
250a5(phal chen): ba dang / ma 'dres pa rjes su dran te yang dag par 'dzin to// dran pas yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do// 
250a6(phal chen): blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mthar gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas
250a7(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud pa mthong zhing shes pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi de
250a8(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa/ thams cad kyang shes shing mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi thugs dang po bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
250b1(phal chen): b.la'ang 'jug // sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig byung pa del 'ang rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / mi dad pa dang / dad pas shes par bya dang / byang chub sems dpa' ba rtson nus
250b2(phal chen): dang / ne non pas khong du chud par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang / 'jog rten thams cad da / nyan thos dang / ra
250b3(phal chen): sangs rgyas thams cad dang / de'i yul la ma zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par shes shing khong du chud par byed do// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa da ltar
250b4(phal chen): drung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham das na bcugs pa/ gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa tham ngas cad kyang mthong zhing shes te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig
250b5(phal chen): la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mthong zhing shes so// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas spong yang mthong ba nas// de'i ga ma'i sems kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi
250b6(phal chen): zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi bar du'ang mthong ste/ nam de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshe'ang de bzhin du mthong ste// sangs
250b7(phal chen): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bstan pa dang / bstan pa mdzad pa dang / bstan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang thos so// thos nas kyang 'dzin to// dran pas yongs su
250b8(phal chen): bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par byed do// blos rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang
251a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam pa sarab yongs su mya rnams mi 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par bdan kho ngos byang chub sems dang 'dus
251a2(phal chen): gsum skad cig gcig tu shes pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gi cha shas la ting nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba/ rtog pa
251a3(phal chen): dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa/ bdag dang sems can dang sangs
251a4(phal chen): rgyas mo gnyis par spyod pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gengs pa
251a5(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang mi 'gal bar/ rnam par spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du/ rnam par rtogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ 
251a6(phal chen): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i ye shes kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu
251a7(phal chen): lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ ri gru 'dzin ces bya ba yod de// de na byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gis// de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub
251a8(phal chen): sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig ces nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis smras so// song shig
251b1(phal chen): nor bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal dpung zhig na// mkhas pa rnams kyi rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod// rin chen rgyus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang // bza' shing rab rjid
251b2(phal chen): dang chu bran 'bab par ldan// ri mchog de la brtan pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don tu rnam par spyod// de gan song dang nor bzangs khyod la mgon
251b3(phal chen): po yi// yon tan rgya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston pa byed// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim
251b4(phal chen): bdag nan lugs la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas khyim bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas song ngo // 
251b5(phal chen): / bam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang / sa/ khyim bdag nan lugs kyi gdams ngag rjes su sems
251b6(phal chen): shing / byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul gcig nas
251b7(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud po'i stobs ni yang dag par 'dzin sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khong du chud par byed// rnam thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag gi ni rjes
251b8(phal chen): su 'brang / sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas mngon par
252a1(phal chen): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la ni yod ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa
252a2(phal chen): de ni mngon du byed cing / mthar kyis ri gru 'dzin gang na ba der 'ongs nas/ ri gru 'dzin gyi steng du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yongs su
252a3(phal chen): rmed cing tshol tshol ba las/ nub phyogs logs kyi ri'i sman ljongs mtsho dang / mtshe'u dang / 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa/ bai DUr+ya sngon po'i dkyil 'khor lhar
252a4(phal chen): sngo zhing 'jam la gnon pa'i spang nags tshal chen po'i mthong sa na 'dug pa zhig na/ rin po che rdo rje'i rdo rtags/ shigs la skyil mo krung bcas te/ 'dug cing
252a5(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo rtags la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med pas kun nas bskor chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'gro ba thams cad
252a6(phal chen): yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba yang dag par ston cing 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ 
252a7(phal chen): mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas shing mi 'dzums pa'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dang ldan pas
252a8(phal chen): sems mi 'khrugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'dzin pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i chos kyi smon thams cad yang dag par gzung ba'i
252b1(phal chen): 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang / nan tan thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa shin tu dga' bar sems pa/ 
252b2(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che 'byung zhing 'thob par 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las ye shes snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i
252b3(phal chen): 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan padage ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad
252b4(phal chen): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yang dag par ston pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po la 'jug pa yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/ dge
252b5(phal chen): ba'i bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yongs su skyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang
252b6(phal chen): po gang na ba der phyin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ring zhig nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas smras pa/ chur shog/ dpe
252b7(phal chen): med pa'i theg pa chen po yangs shing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtses shing bskyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su
252b8(phal chen): bskyabs pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'das ste/ dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje chen pos byin
253a1(phal chen): gyis brlabs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyabs pa'i blo gros can blta na kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la mngon tu bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i kya
253a2(phal chen): 'khor yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin yongs su gzung bar mos pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas ngoms mi shes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa
253a3(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la yang dag par zhugs pa 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thob par bya ba la mngon
253a4(phal chen): du bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba dang shugs rab tu thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sngon gyi char yang dag par gzung ba la/ mngon par mos pa'i sems
253a5(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas mthong bas dga' ba dang mos pa 'i shugs kyis yid rab tu bde bar gyur pa leg sa par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs
253a6(phal chen): kyis mngon par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ yon tan la nan tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad
253a7(phal chen): mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan la yongs su bstan pa'i bsam pa can snying rje chen po'i shugs mnyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
253a8(phal chen): shes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongs pa legs so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po
253b1(phal chen): gang na ba der song nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs la lan brgya stong du
253b2(phal chen): mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems/ 
253b3(phal chen): bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dngos/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi bdang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi bam 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems
253b4(phal chen): dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes su bstan pa ma/ dad zhes bdag gis thos na// ji ltar byang chub sems dad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / 
253b5(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la ba shang du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ mdog 'jam bu chu thung gi gser gyi
253b6(phal chen): dog tu 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od gzer sna
253b7(phal chen): tshogs dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa rab tu skyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo la bzhag ste 'di skad
253b8(phal chen): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa leg so legs so// rigs kyi bu nga ni// byang chub sems
254a1(phal chen): / dpa' spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i snga grags pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ rigs kyi bu nga'i byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i no// nong rje chen
254a2(phal chen): pa'i mthags pa med pa na 'grob thams cad la da ba med par sems can 'angs smra smin par bya ba dang 'dul ba la zugs pa nokun nas pas shing rnam par dag par 'gyur sa
254a3(phal chen): sems can yongs su bsdu ba dang gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo// snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa la gnas pas
254a4(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/ sems can thams cad kyi dgos pa'ang ste'o/ na du gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do// 
254a5(phal chen): ngag snyan pa dang / don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud do// gzugs kyi lus rnam par ba snyan pas kyang / sems can yongs su smin par byed do// 
254a6(phal chen): dog dang / dbyibs dang / gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba dgye bas kyang / sems can rab tu sim par byed cing yongs su smin par byed do// 
254a7(phal chen): babasam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang / tsa la dga' ba'i spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul 'thun par chos bstan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam 'phrul pa
254a8(phal chen): rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dge ba'i chos bstsags par bag mi byed pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang / bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sna tshogs tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa
254b1(phal chen): dang rigs sna tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang skal ba 'thun pa'i gzugs yongs su bstan pa dang / gnas gcig tu 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdus
254b2(phal chen): shing yongs su smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo// snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyangs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad rab tu
254b3(phal chen): rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pazhi par bya ba dang / sems can thams
254b4(phal chen): cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bcings pa'i 'jigs pa yong ngas su cad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab
254b5(phal chen): par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi yo byad kyis 'ongs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe ba med par
254b6(phal chen): 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bzlab dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba
254b7(phal chen): dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'khor du dag cha ba'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzla ba dang / sems can thams
254b8(phal chen): cad kyi na song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad kyilam mun pas nyam nga nga phyir mi ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar byang dang / sems can thams
255a1(phal chen): cad kyi skal ba mo mnyam pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa shin tu bsal pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa dgag
255a2(phal chen): bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang sems can thams cad lus la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang / sems
255a3(phal chen): can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba
255a4(phal chen): thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa 'di byas so// sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jig rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byin
255a5(phal chen): gyis brlabs so// sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/ rang gi ming gi 'khor lo'ang / 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs par byas so// dus ji lta ba
255a6(phal chen): bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'i lus kyang byin gyis brlabs so// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni thabs
255a7(phal chen): 'dis sems can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su bkrol zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi
255a8(phal chen): ldog par byed do// rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo// snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na// ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas
255b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud par rtogs pa dge ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gco
255b2(phal chen): pa'i rgyu dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyud la rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa bskal pa thams cad du gnas shing spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyung
255b3(phal chen): dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad kyi tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi grong yongs su 'khyil pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa sems
255b4(phal chen): can thams cad kyi ma dge pa'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa'i rlung dang ldan 'a sems can thams cad kyis/ dnga'i sems yongs su 'angal ba'i drud dang ldan du bas
255b5(phal chen): can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyun las byar ldog par byed pa'i drung du ldan pa de dag gi spyong pa shes pa'am yon tanan rjod par nus renan/ del 'di skad ces bya'o// gas
255b6(phal chen): phyogs su mor sa byas te sum par bdu brjo nas/ nor bangs shin dul ba phyugs rgyud byus // spyan ras garigs dpang drang drong cing rjenam spyod pa// rin chen nga'i dul naganas
255b7(phal chen): pa sa kyang mthong // rin chen gyi tshogs rdza papa'i snyan ldangan// pa ma 'amyong ba ma 'i'i khril brtan du/ lha nga yon nga dran pa ma
255b8(phal chen): tsha ma /  sa ma pa'as ma rgyas zu/ na ma phyi la mas// sa
256a1(phal chen): pa bdag gis 'thob 'gyur bar// 'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol// bsod nams brgya pas brgyan pa'i
256a2(phal chen): dri med lag brkyang ste/ 'od sprin dra ba rgya chen bzang po rab rton pas// nor bzangs spyi bor banag ste sems can rnam dag pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po mkhas pas tshig 'di smras/ 
256a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes// ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes sdug/ 'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir byung // kun tu bdag nyid rang la byams
256a4(phal chen): pa bzhin du rgyu// 'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun da las skyob// gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang // lus la gzer cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang / 
256a5(phal chen): nga yi ming thos bcing shing bzung ba thar bar 'gyur// rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g.yon byas gsad spangs pa// de tshe dag nga yi ming yang dran 'gyur na// mnga' 'phangs de'i lus la
256a6(phal chen): log par mi 'gyur te// mtshon rnon btab kyang de dag mi 'jug rgal bar 'gyur// dbang po'i 'khor du phyin dang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa// dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur/ 
256a7(phal chen): grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur// nga la ming drin de dag thub pa med par 'gyur// gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran byas pa// de dag rkun pos 'jigs
256a8(phal chen): dgas dmas 'jigs nags byin te// seng ge dam gdagagasan pa gal gnang sbrul ging yang // dgra rnams na las rgyal zhi rdzogs pa ma par 'gyur// gang rnams lams
256b1(phal chen): nga'i ming zhig dran byas na// sdang ba'i sems kyis ri chen ljongs su por gyur tam// sol ma dag lci med rab tu 'bar bar por gyur kyang // me rnams pad mos gang ba'i chu'i gter du gyur/ 
256b2(phal chen): nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na// rgya mtsho'i chur bor de'i nang du 'chir mi 'gyur// chu bos mo khyer me'i dbus su 'tshig mi 'gyur// don med kun tu mi 'gyur ngos
256b3(phal chen): / rnams 'grub par 'gyur// shing sgrog dbyig bcings lcags sgrog de bzhin lhung rnams dang brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin brid cing bslus pa dang / spyos shing bsngags te
256b4(phal chen): gshe dang smra phab rnam pa las// nga'i ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob// gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lnga ji snyed dang // gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi
256b5(phal chen): snyan rjod pa'i rnams// nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par/ rjod par 'gyur// mthong ba tsam gyis mod la bya ma sa pa'i sems kyang skye// nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis
256b6(phal chen): dran byas na// gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang byang byed pa'o// dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zil gyis non par 'gyur// ma lus dug gis de'i lus la mi tshugs so// la las
256b7(phal chen): gang gis nga yi ming tsam dran byas na// klu dbang srin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang // grul bum srul po 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang / mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi
256b8(phal chen): lam 'ong ba'ang zhi bar 'gyur// nga yi ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang // pha dang ma dang gnyen gshes mdza' ba kun dang yang // 'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin
257a1(phal chen): man// nor bang mi 'gyur 'ongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro// ngami mang gi rjes sum ma dran byed na// 'dzi nas shi 'jos man med sems/ 
257a2(phal chen): dmyal mi 'gro ste// byol song skye gnas yi dgas mi khom gnas su min// sems can dag pa lha dang mi'i gnas su skye// nga yi mngani la la gang gis dran byas na// dmus mang/ 
257a3(phal chen): zhar ba 'on pazha bor mi 'gyur te// theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mang por dbang por kun ldan 'gyur// la la gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes dran na// 
257a4(phal chen): sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'phos phyogs bcu'i// 'ja ga rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur// 
257a5(phal chen): 'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis// 'gro ba sems can nga 'dul gzhal dang zad mi nus// sa ngas rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgom ste// yon
257a6(phal chen): tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba zhes bya ba/ shar phyogs nas nam pa'i dbyings las 'ongs ste mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
257a7(phal chen): khams kyi khor yug gi rtse mor 'dug go// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams khor yug gi rtse mo la rkang pa gnyis bor ma thag tu/ 
257a8(phal chen): mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te rin po che du ma'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des/ nyi mang
257b1(phal chen): zla ba'i 'od thams cad zim gyis non pa dang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / rnamapa' lding dang / mi'am tsha dang sgo phye chen pa
257b2(phal chen): dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po dang / me dang / rin po che dang / glog dang / skar ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis non pa de lta bu'i 'od lus bkye ste/ sems
257b3(phal chen): can dmyal ba chen po dag kyang snang bar byas/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thibs po thams cad kyang snang bar byas ste/ ngan song gi sdug
257b4(phal chen): bsngal thams cad kyang de ma thag tu ni'o// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'ang nyams su mi gnod par rgyu dar to// mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang / sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyang
257b5(phal chen): rtse zil bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad du'ang/ rin po che'i sprin gyi char phab ste/ me togadang / spos dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa
257b6(phal chen): dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin gyi char yang mngon par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das
257b7(phal chen): gang na ba der song ngo // de'i lus de'i gzugs brnyan ni// sems can thams cad kyi gnas su snang ba ste/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sim par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas// ri
257b8(phal chen): gru 'dzin de la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung du'ang phyin par snang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nos/ 
258a1(phal chen): bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
258a2(phal chen): 'dir phyin pa mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa mthong ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
258a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs
258a4(phal chen): kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po la da lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas
258a5(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i drung na sa song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i
258a6(phal chen): ye shes kyi gting ma rnyed pa'i sems kyis/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bltas pas kyang mngoms bzhin du bsgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba gang na
258a7(phal chen): ba der song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa
258a8(phal chen): bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / 
258b1(phal chen): ji ltar nan tan tu bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na ji ltar byang chub
258b2(phal chen): sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol// des smras pa/ 
258b3(phal chen): rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas/ byang chub
258b4(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba 'di brnyes/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji srid cig na mchis 'jig rten gyi khams de nas bzhud nas ni rje
258b5(phal chen): srid cig lags/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/ 
258b6(phal chen): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus mi ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'phrog pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes
258b7(phal chen): gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bstsags pa/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po ma thob pa// shes
258b8(phal chen): rab kyi mig dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis thos pa'am/ yongs su gzung ba 'am/ yid ches pa'am/ khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so// smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dge ba'i
259a1(phal chen): shes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis da pa dang mos par brgyan 'phags pas bdag la bka' ma sul tam/ des smras pa/ rag
259a2(phal chen): bung ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang la kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi nong nas 'ongs te/ de bzhin gshegs
259a3(phal chen): pa dang la kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba 'di thob bo// rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po dang / 
259a4(phal chen): ldan pa de nas nga song nas ni bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig 'das te/ sems bskyed pa re re ning
259a5(phal chen): yang gom pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig bor ro// gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba
259a6(phal chen): snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad
259a7(phal chen): la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bla na med pa yid kyi rang bzhin chos nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dga'
259a8(phal chen): ba yongs su bskyed pas mchod pa byas so// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na/ sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ste/ de dag thams cad kyi
259b1(phal chen): sems rgya mtsho'ang khong du chud do// de dag thams cad kyi dbang po'i 'khor lo yang yongs su shes shing bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan to// 
259b2(phal chen): chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su bkye'o// yo byad sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pas kyang nye bar bsdud do// rang gi lus kyang de dag la byin gyis
259b3(phal chen): brlabs te/ don yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i sbyor ba rgyun mo 'chad pa'i phyir ro// shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'ongs pa de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / 
259b4(phal chen): byang phyogs dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtsha mos dang / sha lho'i phyogs mchims dang / lho rlob kyi phyogs mtshams dang / nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi
259b5(phal chen): phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bungs ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba shes par zad na// ngas byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs kun tu
259b6(phal chen): mngon par gnal pa ma da pa'i ma shes kyi la nga na tshas kyi dbyings thams cad du smras rnam par kod pa/ sems casathams cad kyi bsam pa dang / mos bangs
259b7(phal chen): du 'thun par spyod pa/ zhing thams cad lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs pa chos thams cad kyi rlud kyi rjes su song ba/ dus gsum gyi drung mnam pa nyid du gyur ba chos kyi d+hung / 
259b8(phal chen): dang mnyam pa nyid du myur ba'i yum dang ldanapa/ 'gro ba'i rlung thams cad du rnam par sna de bzhin gshegs de'i chung thams cad sa rnam par dag pa med pa/ ma
260a1(phal chen): med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa gnas med pa'i rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'am/ yon tan brjod par yang nus re
260a2(phal chen): skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na lha lha chen po zhes bya ba'i lha 'dug gis de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
260a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i
260a4(phal chen): rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sem das dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.ya das su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang blta ste/ byang chub
260a5(phal chen): sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa
260a6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can mngon par shes pa chen po// mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul la yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba brtson 'grus
260a7(phal chen): brtan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba'i khyad par thob pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rtse ba'i rjes su song ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon
260a8(phal chen): tan gyis la ni nan tan du byed ting nge 'dzin gyi sa la ni rnam par spyod gzungs kyi sa la ni rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa la ni 'jug par byed/ tha dad
260b1(phal chen): pa yang dag par shes pa'i sa la rjes su slob stobs kyis ni yongs su sgrub cing mamar gyis zong khyer sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lhalha chen po kun tu dris pa dang // 
260b2(phal chen): la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa rigs kyi bu 'dire/ lha lnga chen po grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mngonabadag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug
260b3(phal chen): go/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lha lha chen po gang na ba der song ste lha lha chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo
260b4(phal chen): sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu so dmas bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang
260b5(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / rjeltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang / rjes
260b6(phal chen): su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang / ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba 'phags pas
260b7(phal chen): bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas lha lha chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shin tu myur ba'i shugs kyis chu blangs te/ bdag gi gdong
260b8(phal chen): bkrus nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba rangs la gser gyi me tog gis gtor te 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar shin tu dka' ba ste/ 
261a1(phal chen): thos par yang rab tu dka'o// skyes bu mchog gi me tog pun 'da' rika ni 'jig rten gyi phul du bya ba yin pas/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung
261a2(phal chen): ba yin te 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o// 'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o// sems can rnams la snang ba chen po 'byin pa'o// lam rmongs pa rnams la lam bde ba ston pa'o// 
261a3(phal chen): chos kyi tshul du gzud pa la mgon du gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen po gyur pa ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub
261a4(phal chen): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ming ni sems dri ma med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan s+ho/ na cing / lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par
261a5(phal chen): snang ba dang / ngag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gnon par byed pa dang / bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur
261a6(phal chen): bar gnas pas lta ba ngan pa 'jom pa yin par bsams so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sbyin gyi dra ba thob pa'o// smras pa/ 'phags pa byang
261a7(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ sprin gyi dra ba de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis de nas lha lha chen pos tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi mdun du ri chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung po dang / 
261a8(phal chen): dngul gyi phung po dang bai DUr+ya'i phung po dang / shel gyi phung po dang / mu sa ragal ba'i phung po dang / a sma gar ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che ngang gis snang ba'i
261b1(phal chen): phung po dang nor bu rin po chedri ma med pa snang ba'i phung po dang nor bu chen po che rnam par snang ba'i phung po dang / nor du rin po che phyogs kun tu mngon pa'i phung po dang / gdun
261b2(phal chen): gi nor bu rin po che dang / cod pan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi se mo do'i phung po dang / dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang / rna cha'i rgyan gyi phung po dang / gdu
261b3(phal chen): bu'i phung po dang / ska rags kyi phung po dang / rkang gdub kyi phung po dang / mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phung po dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi phung po dang / yan lag
261b4(phal chen): dang nying lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung po dang / nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i phung po dang / me to/ ga thams cad dang / spos thams cad dang / bdug pa thams
261b5(phal chen): cad dang // phreng ba thams cad dang / byug pa thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad dang / gos thams cad dang // gdug sa thams cad dang // rgyal mtshan thams cad dang / lha'i ba
261b6(phal chen): dan thams cad dang / rol mo brdung ba thams cad dang / rol mo dkrol ba thams cad dang / 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang / bu mo bye ba brgya stong grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/ tshong dpon
261b7(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyer la sbyin pa mang po ni byin cig bsod nams mang po ni gyis shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni mchod
261b8(phal chen): cig sems can mang po ni sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdus te/ gtong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la khod cig/ 'jig rten na sbyin pa la slobs shig/ gtang
262a1(phal chen): bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba ni ston cig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la kho bos ji ltar yo byad kyi rnam pas bstud pa 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i
262a2(phal chen): bsam pa dang ma bral ba'i sems can tshad med pa dag gis bsam pa'i rgyud kyang gtong bas yongs su bsgo ba byed do// sangs rgyas dang // chos dang / dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems
262a3(phal chen): dpa' dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan
