288a4(phal chen): su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrib pa thams cadad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang
288a5(phal chen): gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'gru sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag
288a6(phal chen): pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ lus sna tshogs kha dog dang / dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul
288a7(phal chen): pa'i smon 'thon te/ thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par
288a8(phal chen): smong pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrogs pa dang dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags
288b1(phal chen): pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i
288b2(phal chen): yul thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug
288b3(phal chen): pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la/ nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems
288b4(phal chen): dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yo/ dngas su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon dbar shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi
288b5(phal chen): mthu byung ba yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems can tham sa cad kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / 
288b6(phal chen): yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang / bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang / lus
288b7(phal chen): kyi bde ba yongs su skyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams
288b8(phal chen): cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te/ zhing thams cad kyi khongasu chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du
289a1(phal chen): 'gro bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas
289a2(phal chen): skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su gzungs pas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang / 
289a3(phal chen): sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang // rang
289a4(phal chen): bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos tha mas cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongs su ston pa dang / se mas can thams cad kyi dri ba dang / the tsom rgya mtsho rnam par
289a5(phal chen): sel bas/ shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang // sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'jom/ pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad
289a6(phal chen): cig gcig dang / ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing / sems can thams
289a7(phal chen): cad kyi dga' ba yongasu skye bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad
289a8(phal chen): dang / mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sgron 'thon te/ bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongasu sbyang ba bstan pas/ 
289b1(phal chen): 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs
289b2(phal chen): su bston pa dang / khams sum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang / lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan
289b3(phal chen): pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongasu bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / 
289b4(phal chen): rim gror ma byas pa la/ byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa da'i sgo la gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi
289b5(phal chen): gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / snying po byang chub tu song zhing ma ngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyan mi 'chad pa yongs su ston
289b6(phal chen): pa byed cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin pa byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra
289b7(phal chen): ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su brjod pa dang / 
289b8(phal chen): chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs
290a1(phal chen): su dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su
290a2(phal chen): brjod pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la/ chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad rdul
290a3(phal chen): shin tu phra ba snyed kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chang ba yongs su ston pa dang zhing thams cad du phyi mo'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing // thams
290a4(phal chen): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyilam rnam par dag par bya bar yongs su ba rjod pa rgyun mi 'chang ba yang dag par ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs
290a5(phal chen): pa'i stobs la 'jugs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par brjo/ dbang / dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / 
290a6(phal chen): zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongs su bstan pas sems
290a7(phal chen): can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // baspu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin
290a8(phal chen): mang po 'thon te/ sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi stobs mu med pa yongs su ston pa dang / thams cad mkhyen
290b1(phal chen): pa'i sems kyi stobs mi dang pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / chud mi za ba'i chos can yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i stobs phyir ma
290b2(phal chen): ldog cing phyir mi ldog la/ thug pa med pa dang / rgyun med pa dang / bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad
290b3(phal chen): kyis mi gos pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs
290b4(phal chen): pa thams cad kyi dri mas nye bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongs su s+ho/ na pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stob sa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba yongs su
290b5(phal chen): ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang
290b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su bskyod cing bskul bas/ sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa yongs su ston pa dang / byang chub sems
290b7(phal chen): dpa' rnams kyi stobs bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po/ 'jig
290b8(phal chen): rten du rab tu brjod pa byed cing / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul pa
291a1(phal chen): / rgya mtsho la dog mtha' yas pa 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i smin phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi khams
291a2(phal chen): su rgyas par 'gengs pa 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa yongs
291a3(phal chen): su ston pa dang / sems can gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs
291a4(phal chen): su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho la 'jug
291a5(phal chen): pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / chos kyi
291a6(phal chen): dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas par 'gengs pa'i ye shes
291a7(phal chen): yongasu ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang / dbyibs dang / rgyan
291a8(phal chen): rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te spyan sngar phyin nas mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo'i sngon
291b1(phal chen): yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa byed cing de ltar ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' bskyed pa dang / sems dang bar byed pa dang / 
291b2(phal chen): rab tu dga' bskyed pa dang / mos pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / ling mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / sems rnam par sbyong ba dang / sems skyon med pa skye bar byed pa
291b3(phal chen): dang / dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang / mos pa'i stobs yongs su skyed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byed pa mthong ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa
291b4(phal chen): spyod pa yongasu bstan pas 'jig rten du ji ltar sems can yod/ ngas su smin par gyur pa mthong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i tshul gyis
291b5(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i thog ma sems bskyed pa'i tshogs dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i thabs dang
291b6(phal chen): bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing mchod pa dang rim gro byas pa'i tshul dang / dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas
291b7(phal chen): gtang bar dka' ba yongs su btang ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i thabs dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po dang / 'khor mang po dang
291b8(phal chen): longs spyod kyi dbang chen po yongs su btang ste mngon par byung ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyod pa brtul zhugs dang dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod
292a1(phal chen): pa mngon nga bsgrubs 'jisnyed tshig song pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i brtum zhugs yang dag par drangs pa'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya badz+ra snyed ca
292a2(phal chen): yod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sang ma brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi zhes byas dang / ngan du smra ba dang / nyes par spyod pa thams cad bgal na bar byed pa'i sbyor
292a3(phal chen): ba dang / lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / chos thams cad 'jog pa med pa'i chos nyid la bzod pa dang / chos thams
292a4(phal chen): cad la yid ches pa'i bzod pa dang / chos thams cadad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyed cig yo dad pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i
292a5(phal chen): brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cog yod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin po'i spyod
292a6(phal chen): pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa rnam
292a7(phal chen): par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug par rngo snyed
292a8(phal chen): cig yod pa nga/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji skad pa cig yong ba dang / byang chub sems
292b1(phal chen): dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab chen po'i sprin yongs su 'du ba'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / shes rab tu
292b2(phal chen): gter chen po'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang / sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i
292b3(phal chen): tshul gyi sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / thabs chen po la mkhas pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi
292b4(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su grub pa ji snyed cig/ yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod
292b5(phal chen): baji snyed cig yod pa dang / smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i
292b6(phal chen): tshogs chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rkyen tu gyur pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji snyed cig
292b7(phal chen): yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / ye shes kyi
292b8(phal chen): pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i tshul ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs
293a1(phal chen): ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
293a2(phal chen): 'byam klas pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gnol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rnam par
293a3(phal chen): dmigs par byang ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgyas par 'gengs
293a4(phal chen): pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgya chen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lhun ji snyed cig yod pa dang
293a5(phal chen): shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su grub par bya ba dang ldanaba'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rab tu phye ba la
293a6(phal chen): 'jug pa 'byung bar yongs su bsgrub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i tshul dang ldan pa'i chos rnams dang / chos yongs su bsdu ba
293a7(phal chen): dang / chos kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / las kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / zhing gi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / bskal pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'bring ba
293a8(phal chen): dang / dus kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'drang ba dang / byang chub
293b1(phal chen): sems dpa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems yongs su 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dgod pa'i ye shes kyi rjes
293b2(phal chen): su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems
293b3(phal chen): dpa'i smon lam gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i ye
293b4(phal chen): shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'o / chos rgya mtsho'i tshul gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos gangs chen mtsho'i ye shes kyi
293b5(phal chen): rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i' chos kyi rgyud kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi gter gyi ye shes kyi rje su 'brang ba dang
293b6(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lugs kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
293b7(phal chen): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' dang dpung med pa'i dmigs pa can de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas mngon par 'thon te/ sems can gyi lus
293b8(phal chen): kyi sgon kha dog sna tshogs can du mngon par mched cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ 'og min dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom
294a1(phal chen): snang bdang / madros pa dang / mi cheda'i gtsang ma gnas kyi sbru lnga bu'i lus kyi spyan du mngon par rtson cing sems can yongs su sun
294a2(phal chen): bar byed pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang / sprin dang bral ba'i sbrulta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thon cing sems can mongs su smin par byung / 
294a3(phal chen): mthong ngo // dge rgyas dang / tshad meng dge ba dang / dge bachung ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'dzin cing sems can yongs su mun par byed pa mthong ngo // kun snang ngang bdang / 
294a4(phal chen): chad mang snang bang/ snang ba su dza sum dzul lus na du mngon pa dzin ci sems can yongs su ldan pa byed pa mthongango // mangs nanang/ chings na
294a5(phal chen): / mas padun masams kyi sa kyi sbyin dum na cing / sems pan sangs su sun pa byu nga // sa m+b+ha \u0f7fnga rgyal pa/ 
294a6(phal chen): tshogs dang lta'i bung bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par dzin cing sems can yongs su smin pa byung pa mthongango // mang rgyal po nga 'phrul dga'i rdzu ma tshogs dang
294a7(phal chen): du dang bcas pa lta su sus kyi sngon du mngon par dzin cing sems can yongs su smin pa dbyed pa mdzod do/ rab dag 'a ldan gyi m+b+ha'i rgyal po s+thAm tshigs pa
294a8(phal chen): dung bcas pa su bu'i lus kyi sprin du mi ngon par dzin cing sems can yongs su smin pa pyod pa tshang // ras mche me'i 'i rgyam po sgo ma'i tshogs dang /  nga
294b1(phal chen): bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mdzong ngo // lha'i rgyal po brgya byin lha mo'i tshogs dang / lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus
294b2(phal chen): kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // dri za'i rgyal po gnas srung po dang / dri za'i bu dang / dri za'i bu mo lnga bu'i lus kyi skyon du mngon par
294b3(phal chen): 'dron cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang / grul bum gyi bu dang / grul bum gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sbyin du
294b4(phal chen): mngon par 'dzin cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang dang / klu'i bud dang / klu'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing / 
294b5(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // gnod sbyin gyis rgyal po chen po ngal bso bo dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi bu mo lte bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon
294b6(phal chen): bar 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po dang / mi 'am ci'i bu dang / mi 'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems
294b7(phal chen): can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros bzang po dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu dang / lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing
294b8(phal chen): sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // na mkha' lding gi dbang po shugs drag stobs chen dang / na mkha' lding gi bu dang / na mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par/ 
295a1(phal chen): 'dzin cing sems can yongs su sbyin par byed pa mthong ngo // lha ma yin gyi dbang po skra gcan dang / lha ma yin gyi bu dang / lA ma yin gyi bum
295a2(phal chen): lha bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje dang / gshin rje'i bu dang / gshin rje'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi
295a3(phal chen): sprin du mngon par 'dzin cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // mi'i dbang po dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du
295a4(phal chen): mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa de'i sems can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par
295a5(phal chen): 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong tham sa cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'then cing sems can
295a6(phal chen): yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rlung dang / chu dang / me'i phung po'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // rgya mtsho dang / chu klung dang / 
295a7(phal chen): ri dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog dang / sman dang / shing dang / sa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo // bza' shing gi ra ba dang
295a8(phal chen): grong khyer dang / snying po byang chub dang / nyin par dang / mtshan mo dang / nam mkha' dang / phyogs dang / rkang gis 'gro dang / lus kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du
295b1(phal chen): mngon par 'gron cing sems can yongs su smin par byed mthong ba nas/ de bzhin du lagan rdo rje lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'dzin cing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ chos kya dbyung / 
295b2(phal chen): kyi tshul 'byam klas pa thams cad du/ sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig
295b3(phal chen): 'gro ba rnam par snang ba'i sems thog ma bskyed pa'i tshogs la sogs pa/ sngon gyi tshe rabs la yongs su bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji/ 
295b4(phal chen): steng pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyod pa'i bsngags pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing mdab chags pa dang shi 'pho dang / skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas
295b5(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / lus ma/ sa su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mngapa chags pa dang // maung gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu
295b6(phal chen): rgyud cing mad ba chags pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / sangs rgyas byung ste bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas
295b7(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / chos kyi chog dang yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi
295b8(phal chen): sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / ting nge 'dzin thob pas
296a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / zhing mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par bkang ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
296a2(phal chen): cing mdab chags pa dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo mdab chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu
296a3(phal chen): brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtshor gtogs pa'i sems
296a4(phal chen): can pha rol gyi shi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig/ tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / lha'i rna ba yongasu dag pa rtogs par byed pa'i shes pa gcig nas gcig tu
296a5(phal chen): brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta zhing dbyangs la 'ju gas pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags
296a6(phal chen): pa dang / thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam par dmigs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / 
296a7(phal chen): thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing
296a8(phal chen): mdab chags pa dang / thog ma dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas te/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i rkyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / rdzu 'phrul chen/ 
296b1(phal chen): po'i rnam par gnon pas phyogs rgyas par 'gengs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing
296b2(phal chen): mngab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang byang chub sem
296b3(phal chen): dba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mngab
296b4(phal chen): chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ming du bya ba gcig nas
296b5(phal chen): gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab
296b6(phal chen): tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes shin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing mdab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas
296b7(phal chen): sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon te// sems can rnams la chos 'chad pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yongs su ston pa dang / rje su brjod
296b8(phal chen): pa dang / rab tu 'byed pa dang / shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang / 'grang ba dang / nges par ston pa dang / rnam par rig par byed pa dang / nye bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/ la la la ni rlung gi
297a1(phal chen): dkyil 'khor shin tu 'khrugs pa'i skaskad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo // lal la ni chu'i phung po rab tu ba pa'i sgra skad kyis// lal la ni ma'i
297a2(phal chen): shin tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni rgya mtsho'i 'drug gi sla skad kyis/ lel la nis yongs su gsos pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la nor chen po phan tshul thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra skad kyis/ 
297a3(phal chen): ma la la ni m+ba'i grong khyer g.yos pa'ing ro snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni lha'i gzhal med khang thug cing 'khrol ba'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo // la la la ni lha'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ 
297a4(phal chen): la la la ni klu'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni dro za'i dbang dpo'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis// 
297a5(phal chen): la la la ni na mkha' lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni mi'am ci'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la nima'aphye chen po'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni mi'i dbang po'i
297a6(phal chen): skad kyis/ la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha mo'i klu dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni lha rdzas kyi rol mo legs par blangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni nor bu rin po
297a7(phal chen): che'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skad sna tshogs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul/ sems
297a8(phal chen): can rnams la rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sngon gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad sna tshogs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul sku'i sprin
297b1(phal chen): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul// thog
297b2(phal chen): ma sems bskyed pa dang bcas/ yongs su byung ste grub cing yang dag par 'dus pa dang bcas/ rnam par thar pa'i rnam par rtse ba dang bcas pa/ sems can thams cad la rnam par
297b3(phal chen): dmigs par byed pa mthong ngo // de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang / sems kyi skad cig re re la/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang
297b4(phal chen): brjod du med pa rnam par sbyong ba mthong ngo // sems canadamatsho mtha' yas pa dag kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel pa mthong ngo // sems can gyi khams
297b5(phal chen): mtha' dang dpung med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa dag kyang 'khor ba rgya mtsho las gyen du spyod pa
297b6(phal chen): mthong ngo // sems can rgya mtshomatha' dang dbung med pa dag kyang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo // sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can rgya mtshomatha'ang
297b7(phal chen): dpung med pa dag kyang / stongs bcu'i ye shes kyisar 'dzud pa tshong dpon gyi bu nor bu bzangs kyis mthong ngo // thos so rnam par dpyad do zhugs so khong du chud ngo // nges par rtogs so// 
297b8(phal chen): rjes su shes so// rjes su 'brangs so// rjes su zhugs so// mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/ de ni mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/ 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang
298a1(phal chen): chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa/ kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba dang khyu
298a2(phal chen): mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i byin dang sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi byin du brlab pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
298a3(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur pa'i phyir ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs drag po gangs chen mtsho snang ba chen po rab tu thob pa
298a4(phal chen): phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa des/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba 'i mig/ 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug ste/ 
298a5(phal chen): thal mo sbyar nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig/ 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 
298a6(phal chen): rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab// de la khyod kyis bskal pa tshad med bslabs// bsam pa ci bzhin gzugs rnams kyis// 'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten rim pas bstan// 
298a7(phal chen): bdag med mgon med log pa yi// 'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas// rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma yis// lus dang dbang phyug ston mdzad 'gro ba 'dul// 
298a8(phal chen): shin tu rims bral rab tu ni// chos sku gnyis med rnam par dag pa mnga'// 'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa// sprul pa'i sprin sgra 'brug gis rnam par 'dul/ 
298b1(phal chen): phung po khams dang skye mched la// khyod ni nam yang mi gnas mi rten te// yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang // dbang phyug yongs su bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul/ 
298b2(phal chen): dang nang las rnam par grol// gnyis las byung ba'i mtsho las 'phags gyur kyang // 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i// gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud tu rab tu ston// khyod
298b3(phal chen): la g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// nam yang rlom sems g.yo ba'i spros mi mnga'// 'jig rten spros mos byis pa rnams// chos kyi rang bzhin bstan cing 'dul ba mdzad// ting nge 'dzin
298b4(phal chen): rgya mtsho kun spyod pas// bskal pa mang por rtse gcig / thub bzhugs kyang // phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs mchod don du// spu rnams rtse las sprul pa'i sprin kyang
298b5(phal chen): 'gyed/ sangs rgyas stobs la 'jug pa'i tshul// skad cig re rer mtha' yas thugs su chud// sems can bsdu ba'i sbyong ba rnams// so so'i rkyen bzhin go bar bgyi/ 
298b6(phal chen): bas bstan// khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag/ las kyi rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing // chos kyi sgrib pa med pa'i lam bstan te// sems can kun kyang rnam
298b7(phal chen): par sbyor ba mdzad// khyod sku mtshan bris rnam dag kyang // kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dam pa yis// sems can bsam pa'i dbang tshul du// khyod ni lha mo'i sku gzugs ston// 
298b8(phal chen): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la// tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod de/ 
299a1(phal chen): 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags// lha mo khyod kyis
299a2(phal chen): byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di thob nas ni// ji srid cig lags// de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo
299a3(phal chen): rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de smras pa// dran pa bskal pa mang 'das pa// zhing gi rdul snyed de'i snga rol na/ 
299a4(phal chen): zhing ni rin chen mdog bde byung // de'i bskal ba zhi pa'i dpyang sa shes bya// gling bzhi bye ba khrag khrig ste// brgya stong phrag bcu rnams kyis yongs su gang // tshad med
299a5(phal chen): rin chen ri bo 'dra// gleng bzhi'i bar ma bzang po rnam pa/ ra bkram// rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya// stong phra/ ga bcu rnams yongs su tshang ba ste// rgyal po'i pho brang
299a6(phal chen): mdangs dga' ba// dbus na gnas pa'i spos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od// der ni phyogs kyi dbang po sa'i bdag/ 'khor los bsgyur ba mngon par gzugs bzang byung // mtshan rab sum
299a7(phal chen): cu gnyis dang ldan// de'i lus kyang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan// pad+mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung // gser gyi mdog bzang 'od 'byung lus dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan thams
299a8(phal chen): cad du// mkha' las 'gro zhing 'od kyis de 'gengs so// de'i bu ni steng nang ste// kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan// blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang / 'dzangs shing
299b1(phal chen): yid gzhungs bye ba shin tu mang // btsun mo bye ba phrag bcu chang // lha mji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul lam ngas// de dag pa na sems pade sems kyis// rgyal po de la nye ba'i ming du gnas/ 
299b2(phal chen): rgyal po de ni sa chen de// ri dang khor yug kun gyi mtha' klas pa'i// gling bani phun sum tshogs pa dag/ kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyis gnas par byed/ kho mo 'khor los bsgyur
299b3(phal chen): ba yi// btsun mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lus// gser gyi mdog 'chang dri med 'od// dpag tshad stong du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gengs// nyi ma nub par gyur nas kyang // rgyal
299b4(phal chen): po sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur nas// rol mo'i dpya dngas kyang zhir gyur te// kho mo mal na bde bar nyal nyal na// nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la// sangs
299b5(phal chen): rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur// de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste bstanapa mdzad// rgyal ba'i 'od gzer rgya mtsho des// 
299b6(phal chen): zhing gi rdul snyed 'jig rten khyab par gyur// rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad ma lus rgyas par bkang // sa rnams ri dang bcas par g.yos// 
299b7(phal chen): rgyal ba byung zhes sgra yangs yongs su brjod// lha dang lha min mi dang klu// kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'// sangs rgyas pa spu'i sgo kun nas// sprul pa'i rgya mtsho mang po
299b8(phal chen): mngon par byung // des ni phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas// 'jig rten bsam pa bzhin du chos kyang bstan// rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag kyang // rgyal bas thams cad
300a1(phal chen): bdag gi rmi lam bstan// zab mo'i 'drug sgra thos gyur nas// khong du chud pas kho mo dga' ying gyur// mtshan mo'i lha mo stong snyed kyang / 
300a2(phal chen): kho mo'i steng gi bar snang mkha' gnas shing // rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas nas// kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod// lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs// khyod kyi rgyal po'i khams
300a3(phal chen): rgyal ba skyes// bskal pa rgya mtsho brgya dag tu// de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag dgon// kho mo dgar gyur sad par gyur// 'od gsal dri med rnam dag mthong // 'od
300a4(phal chen): bzang de ni g.yas blta blta na/ byang chub shing rgyal drung dgi rgyal ba mthong // mtshan nyid sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan// ba spu kun nas 'od gzer rgya mtsho ba kye// ri
300a5(phal chen): rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags// rgyal ba g.yas g.yo sa kun tu'ang de bzhin no// mthong nas kho mo rab dag 'a ste// de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongs su bskyed// 
300a6(phal chen): sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yang mthong nas// kho mos smon lam shin tu rgya chen btab// kho mos rgyal po bzhes su gsol// de'i 'khor dang bud med tshegs kyang bslang // sangs rgyas 'od
300a7(phal chen): yang mthong gyur nas// kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur// rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu// gzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig gis// yongs su bskor te dpung bcas pa// rgyal
300a8(phal chen): ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dong // lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang // kho mos rgyal ba de la mchod bkur byas// rin chen bdun yang yon du phul// rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang
300b1(phal chen): gsol/ mdo sde rgya mtsho yon tan sbyin// smon lam mtsholas yongs su byung ba'i rgyan// kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung // bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan/ 
300b2(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed cig/ de tshe snying brtser kho mos phan bstan pa// de 'drar gyur te myos bsal zhes// kho mos mos pa yongs su skyes par gyur// kho mo'i smon lam de
300b3(phal chen): 'dra'i sems// thog ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsha gnas pa'i tshe// srid pa'i rgya mtshos de ni nig ma gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la/ 
300b4(phal chen): kho mos dad pa bskyed de mchod pa byas// 'khor ba'i lha dang / dmi dbus su// yul gyi dga' dang bde la mngon parasmon// rgyal ba'i dang po dpal gyi mtsho// de'i
300b5(phal chen): 'og ma yon tan sgron ma ste// rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen dpal// sangs rgyas bzhi pa na mkha'i na sa rab bo// rgyal ba lnga pa me tog mchog/ rgyal
300b6(phal chen): ba drug pa chags med zla ba'i blo// rgyal ba 'od rgyal chos kyi zla// brgyad pa ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba'o// rin chen 'od 'phro sgron te// rgyal ba dgu pa de tshe byung bar gyur/ 
300b7(phal chen): bcu pa dus gsum 'od dbyangs te// de dag kho mos dad pas mchod// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi'i dbang po dam pa kun mchod de// tshul gyi rgya mtsho 'dir
300b8(phal chen): zhugs pa'i// mig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur// de 'og zhing gi mtshams sbyor ba// rin chen thams cad 'od ces bya ba byung // bskal pa lha'i dpal zhes bya// 
301a1(phal chen): sangs rgyas lnga brgya de la byung bar gyur/ thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor drung // gnyis panyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par skyes// sdang ba'i rnal
301a2(phal chen): mtshan sangs rgyas gsum// de'i 'og tu rin chen riba'o// me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron// me'i dpal dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog/ snang ba'i rgyal po 'od kyi dpal// bcu pa ye shes
301a3(phal chen): kun snang rgyal ba'o// bcu bo de la sogs pa dag/ mi'i dbang po de dag kho mo yis// phung po'i gnas la dang dga' ning // gnas med chos la gnas kyi blos mchod do// de 'og de'i mtsham
301a4(phal chen): sbyor ba// 'jig rten khams bzangs byung bar gyur ba ni// bad+mo sgron ma sprin gyi dpal// de tshe bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ce sa bya// de la rgyal ba tshad med de// de dag 'khor dang
301a5(phal chen): bcas par kho mos mchod// rgyal ba de dag thams cad la sa// rim gro chen pos kho mos chos kyang thos/ rgyal ba'i dbang po rin chen ri// de'i 'og ma yon tan rgya
301a6(phal chen): mtsho ste// rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal// chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o// chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi 'od// chos stobs 'od dang na mkha'i blo gros te/ 
301a7(phal chen): chos 'od ri bo spo mthon dang // de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sprin dpal lo// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi'i dam pa de dag kun mchod de// rgyal ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i
301a8(phal chen): chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur// de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs// nyi ma'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya// zhing ni sangs rgyas yod pa ste// de la bskal pa zla ba'i dpal
301b1(phal chen): byung ngo // de la stobs bcu drung ba ni/ bye ba brgyad cu yongs su chang ba ste// de dag kun la'ang mchod pa'i sgo// rgya che mtha' yas yid 'ong du ma byas// thog mar byung badri za'i rgyal/ 
301b2(phal chen): de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas shing rgyal te// rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ri// de'i 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so// rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od kyi rgyan// chos kyi rgya mtsho sangs rgyas
301b3(phal chen): gzi brjid dang la// 'jig rten dbang po 'od bzang dpal// kun gyi tha ma chos 'od rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs de dag thams cad mchod byas kyang / 
301b4(phal chen): chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yi// ye shes kho mos thob pa dar ma gyur to// de'i 'og tu zhing dag pa// rdo rje'i rang bzhin mi phyed gzi brjid brtan// kun tu 'od sbyin ming
301b5(phal chen): ldan byung // rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o// de la sems can dag pa mang // nyon mongs dri mas nyon mong shin tu nyung // bskal pa rab zhi blo gros
301b6(phal chen): 'od// sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan// rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug/ gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga'i mtshan ldan pa// rgyal ba chos dbyings gzugs brnyan
301b7(phal chen): dang // phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma gsal ba'i bdag/ rgyal ba lnga pa thugs rje'i 'od// rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o// bde gshegs bzod 'khor sgron ma dang // brgyad po chos
301b8(phal chen): kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba ste// snang ba rgya mtshos brgyan pa dang // de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi'i dam pa de kun kho mos mchod// chos nyid na mkha' mnyam
302a1(phal chen): pa 'di// rang bzhin yongs su kun nas dag paste// de la gnas shing zhing gi rnams// 'byam klas kun tu spyod spyang mdag go// de'i 'og/ 
302a2(phal chen): tu mdangs dga' ba'i// zhing ni spos sgron sprin gyi dpal zhes bya// kun nas nyon mongs yongs su dag/ de'i bskal pa legs par byung zhes bya// rgyal ba bye ba de cha byung // de dag kun gyis
302a3(phal chen): de tshe bskal pa brgyan// mgon po de dag chos gsung ba// kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongs su bzung // rgyal ba'i dang po grangs yangs ste// chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dpal
302a4(phal chen): gyi rgyal// chos dang rgyal po yon tan smin// chos kyi dpal dang lha'i cod pan no// ye shes 'od 'phro gzi ba dad dpal// rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no// rgyal
302a5(phal chen): ba brgyad pa na mkha'i dbyangs// dgu pa kun tu 'byung ba'isgron ma ste// de dag tha ma'i sangs rgyas ni/ mdzod spu'i dpal gyi 'od kyi blo gros te// rgyal ba mi mchog
302a6(phal chen): de dag la// mchod pa byas kyang chags med de ma sbyangs// de'i 'og ma rgyan rab can// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste// 'jig rten rnam par phye ba'i mtha'// 
302a7(phal chen): rin chen rgyal mtshan blo gros mchog/ de tshe bskal pa'i snying po'i tshogs// de la sangs rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste// rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing // rang byung de dag
302a8(phal chen): / thams cad kho mos mchod// thog ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor// zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi bdag/ mtshan gyi sprin sgra dbyangs
302b1(phal chen): shes bya ba dang // chos dbang rgyal po yon tan bdag/ bsod nams ri rab zhi ba 'od kyi rgyal// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ rgyal ba de dag kun kyang kho mos mchod// rgyal ba'i
302b2(phal chen): lam ni der sbyangs te// de la rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag gzhol// 'on kyang dadung rgyal ba yi// tshul 'dir 'jug pa'i bzod pa ma thob bo// de 'og yid 'ong 'od ldan pa// yongs su dag pa'i
302b3(phal chen): 'jig rten khams byung ste// zhing dbyangs phreng ba'i blo gros can// sems can nyon mongs nyung ba'i gnas yin no// bskal pa bde zhing mngon dga' ste// de la sangs rgyas bye ba brgyad cu byung // mi mchog
302b4(phal chen): de kun kho mos mchod// rgyal ba mchog gi lam yang rnam par sbyangs// rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs// rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog/ lha dbang gtsug pud rin
302b5(phal chen): chen gtso// gser gyi ri bo rin chen brtsegs pa dang // chos kyi rgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal// de dag kun gyi tha ma ye shes blo// bcu po de la sogs pa dang // lha dang mi gcod
302b6(phal chen): dag kho mos mchod// de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing 'byung ba// sprul pa bzang po'i rgyal mtshan sgron ma ste// bskal pa stong gi dpal zhes bya// de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug/ ni
302b7(phal chen): ba'i rgyal mtshan zhi gnas dpal// zhi ba'i sgron ma sprin gyi rgyal po'i dpal// snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang // rnam par smin mched nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang // chos kyi sgron ma dpal gyi ri// 
302b8(phal chen): 'od 'phro'i dpal dang lha'i snying po'i dpal// de dag tha mar byung ba ni// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs mkhas pa sgron ma'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs zla ba de dag kho mos mchod// 
303a1(phal chen): 'on kyang tshul mtsho 'dir 'jug pa'i// bzod pa kho mos thong bar mgyur to// de 'og mtshams sbyor nang byung ba// kun du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba ste/ 
303a2(phal chen): bskal pa gnas med rnam par brgyad// de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum cu drug/ dang po yon tan kun tu smin// de'i 'og ma sangs rgyas namapa'i thugs// sangs rgyas legs byung rnam brgyan dang / 
303a3(phal chen): rgya mtsho'i chos kyi sprin sgra sgrog pa'i dbyangs// rgyal ba chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang // sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mnga' dang // sangs rgyas phyogs kun gzi brjod dang // chos
303a4(phal chen): kyi rgya mtsho yongs byung sgra dbyangs dang // yon tan rgya mtsho pal gyi ston// rgyal ba'i nyim dgu pabyung bar gyur/ de dag kun gyi tha ma ste// rin chen dpal smon yon tan dpal mchos
303a5(phal chen): rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal// rkang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// kho mo lha mo zla bzhin te/ mi'i dam pa byung tshe mchod pa byas// rgyal ba des ni kho mo la// 
303a6(phal chen): mdo sde smon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i rgyan// gnas med rgyan kyang rab tu bshad// thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis bzung // kho mos mig yangs der thob ste// ting 'dzin ni dang gzungs
303a7(phal chen): kyi stobs kyang thob// skad cig re rer zhing brgyud pa'i// rgyal ba rgya mtsho mang po'ang kho mos mthong // byams tshul kun tu snang ba'i sprin// byang chub sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste/ 
303a8(phal chen): snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa yang // sangs rgyas stobs kyi chang du yangs par skyes// 'gro ba phyin ci log gyur te// rtag dang bde dang gtsang dang bdag zhen pa// gti mug mdongs gyur ma rig
303b1(phal chen): bslongs/ rten mongs 'khrugs shing sog par 'du shes pa sapa'i rnam par sdug pa spyod/ las kyi 'am rgyud dum dang sred par gyur// rnam pa snga tshogs kyi brag tu// mas rgyas/ 
303b2(phal chen): rnam par bris pas kur byung ba/ 'gro rgyud kun kya shi 'pho'i sgor// skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu skyer gyur cing // skye dang rgo shi gnod pa rnams// lus dang sems kyi rnams su myong gyur pa/ 
303b3(phal chen): nas de dag pan pade'i byor// zhing rnams 'byam klas thams cad kyi// stobs bcu gang las byung ba yi// blan med pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed// de las smon lam smin byung ba
303b4(phal chen): bkun la bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog/ tshogs rnams 'byung ba mtha' yas dang // lam tshul rgya mtsho rtogs pa 'ang de nas byung // 'jug pa'i sprin yangs thob gyur pa/ 
303b5(phal chen): lam rgyud kun tu sgrogs la shugs ldan te// pha rol byin gyi sprin yangs pa'ang // chos dbyings 'byam klas kun tu rnam par 'gyed// sa gnon shugs drag yangs ldan dang / 
303b6(phal chen): dus gsum rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis rnams pa// chags pa med par spyod par gyur// skad cig gcig gis rgyal bkun dru 'gro// gzhan yang rgyal sras kho mos ni// spyod pa kun tu
303b7(phal chen): bzang po yongs su gnon// chos dbyings bye brag bcu rnams kyi// rgya mtsho'i tshul la'ang kho mos rtogs par 'jug/ rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 
303b8(phal chen): rgyal po 'khor los bsgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun mi gcod pa la zhugs pa mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni rigs kyi bu de
304a1(phal chen): ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa ni/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po ma'i bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba/ sangs rgyas
304a2(phal chen): kyi rigs rgyud mi gcad pa la zhugs pa'o// kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan mo'i lha mode ni byang chub sems dpanga'akun tu bzang pos sprul pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ 
304a3(phal chen): che de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo/ bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba byung ba de/ gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni de ltar mi blta ste
304a4(phal chen): kho mo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i btsun mo dbud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya bar gyur te/ kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mo des sad par byas nas sangs
304a5(phal chen): rgyas blta ba la yang dag par bskul to// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems de srid cig nas bskyed de/ de ltar kho mo sems
304a6(phal chen): bskyed pa de'i mthus/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed du/ nam yang ngan song log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la rten
304a7(phal chen): cing / thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba dang ldan par gyur to// tha mar kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
304a8(phal chen): chen dpal gyi sgron ma yon tan rgyal mtshan mthong ba tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing / dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi
304b1(phal chen): rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di thob ste/ de thob pas kho mo sems can yongs su ston par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du rnam pa 'di sa bus snga gon du gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu
304b2(phal chen): kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba rgya chen po'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
304b3(phal chen): kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'khod cing sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgya mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la
304b4(phal chen): sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam chen po rgya mtshos 'a 'jug pa rab tu thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la phyi mi'i mtha'i bskal
304b5(phal chen): par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa spyod pa re re la yang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa// 
304b6(phal chen): lus re res kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa la mkhas pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can
304b7(phal chen): rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus rnam par dmigs pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa zhing thams cad du'ang zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa
304b8(phal chen): rgya mtsho mtha' dang dpung med pa la 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgyas par 'gengs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la
305a1(phal chen): 'jug par mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sngon gyi mtha'i bskal pa la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa/ yang
305a2(phal chen): dag par bsdus pa la 'jug par mkhas pa de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu yangs pa yang dag par blangs pa dang / yongs su gzung ba la mkhas pa/ dus
305a3(phal chen): gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par mkhas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs
305a4(phal chen): kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyi/ ral 'khor 'di nyid na/ kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig/ na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi
305a5(phal chen): brjid dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis gan du song la/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas/ byang chub sem sa dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug par bya ba dang / 
305a6(phal chen): ji ltar yongs su sbyong bar bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag
305a7(phal chen): 'tshal te/ mtshan me'i lha mo 'gro ba rnam par snang ba la/ lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba rnam par
305a8(phal chen): snang ba'i drung nas song ngo // 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po brgya tham pa/ de nas tshong dpon
305b1(phal chen): gyi bu nor bzangs// mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med/ 
305b2(phal chen): pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par bya ba dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / rtogs par bya ba dang / shes par bya ba dang / yid ches par bya ba dang / rab tu
305b3(phal chen): gzhol bar bya ba dang / rgyas par dgod pa dang / rjes su shes par bya ba dang / rjes su dran par bya ba dang / rjes su gzhol bar bya ba dang / bsgom pa byed cing
305b4(phal chen): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya rab dang / gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa la bar chad med par bya ba'i phyir/ mtshan me'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba mig
305b5(phal chen): 'gro bar rnam par snang bas 'gro kar btams pa rjes su dran pa byed cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i rjesu sems dpa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor dang / dge ba'i bshes
305b6(phal chen): gnyen mthong ba thob par bya ba la yang dag par spyod pa phyogs kun tu mngon par bltas pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar yid la bya ba nga rgyal thams cad dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i
305b7(phal chen): bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i mthu tshogs chen po yongs su bsgrub par zhe non pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes
305b8(phal chen): gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad la bsam pa mi phyed pos zhugs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pa yongs su 'phel bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po rgya
306a1(phal chen): mcho sangs su skyes pa/ bskal ba thams cad du dge ba'i bshes gnyen mnam nga nyid khong du chud pas gnas par byanga'i sgon lam dang ldan 'de/ 
306a2(phal chen): mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung du song ngo // de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis/ byang chub
306a3(phal chen): sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'jig rten thams cad mngon tu gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu lhung ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ mtshan dang pe byad bzang
306a4(phal chen): bos yongs su grub pa'i lus bstan te/ mdzod spu nas 'od gzer ye shes kyi 'od kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa'i mang dngas kyi rgya mtshan zhes bya ba 'od gzer gyi mtha' dang dpung med pa
306a5(phal chen): dang ldan par bkye'o// nges 'jig rten thams cad snang da byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bor 'dug ste lus thams cad du khyab par gyur to// tshong dpon gyi bu nor
306a6(phal chen): bzangs la 'od gzer des reg par gyur ma thag tu de nyid kyi mong la ting nge 'dzin shin tu rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor thob par gyur to// de thob pas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i
306a7(phal chen): mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba dang / mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gnyis kyi bar gyi lam na sa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa de la me'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ 
306a8(phal chen): chu'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ sa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ rdo rje'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po dam pa sna tshogs kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ 
306b1(phal chen): metog dang spos dang / phye ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ rgyan thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba'am/ dmigs pa thams cad kyi rdul shin tu zla baji snyed cig yong
306b2(phal chen): nga'i rdul shin 'a phra ba de dag thams cad la phra mo ri shing yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi ning gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed chu'i phung po dang bcas ma'i phung po dang bcas/ 
306b3(phal chen): rlung gi drung po dang bcasasa'i phung po dang bcasa'ajig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams dang bcasagan dang bcas/ rten dang bcas pa dudubs
306b4(phal chen): chags casagazhi rnam pa pa dad pa chogs dang ldanari 'bor sna tshogs ca mam+b+ha dang / mtsho sa tshogs kyis brgya
306b5(phal chen): mtshasna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor ba/ lA rdzas sa khyim sna tshogs kyi rgyun ldan pa/ shing snga co/ sa kyis yongs su grang / rnam pa dbyangs kyi
306b6(phal chen): tshogs can/ lha'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ chu'i grong khyer gyi khyim kyi rgyan dang bcas pa gnod sbyin gyi mong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan ngasacaso pa/ rdo ra
306b7(phal chen): grong byer kyi khyis kyi rgyan du bcamapa/ snum pan gyi mong byer cican nga bas / ma 'dzung pazang khyer gyi khyis cing ca da bcas pa/ rimatsho'i mong bya ma ra
306b8(phal chen): byi na par grang byed kyi rgyas kyi rgyan mam dzadu kyi kyis rgyan phyi tsugs mas mas ma ma
307a1(phal chen): pa'i sems canathams cad kyi yong byer gyigasas dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gyi ma dang / ma sangag skye gnas ci 'jig rten lum / 
307a2(phal chen): gshin rje dzag rten gyi ma dang / ming tsam yin pa'i las kyi rgyu kye shi'i bo daskye pa'i tshul dang bas pa/ skyeb cwa tshogs kyis ma dres pa rlu mtha gam pa byi nags sas su/ 
307a3(phal chen): gas pa rnams 'du 'jig sa gyur pa 'thong // 'jig rten gyi mas de ga kyang rnaMs pa tshogs su mcho / 'ag can gyi khams lal ni kun nas tsan mongs par mdzong / 
307a4(phal chen): lal na yongs su dag par mthong ngo // mal ni shin nas non mongs par mthong // la la ni las rlung yongs su dag pa mdzangadzo // lal ni kun nas thon mo sa
307a5(phal chen): pal yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni rnam par dag tu kun nas nyon mongs par mthong ngo // la la ni shin ratu yongs su dag par mthong ngo // la la ni gni mnyam par mthos
307a6(phal chen): ngo// la la ni spyi'u tshugs su gnas par mthong ngo // la la ni snrel zhing 'dug par mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud dang / sems can gyi skye gnas
307a7(phal chen): thams cad na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu myongs pa'i gzi brjid deng la/ sems can so so nas 'dul ba'i rkyen bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la ma 'dres par yongs su
307a8(phal chen): bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur bar gnas par mthong ngo // sems can tshe'i tshad rnam pa ji la bu dang ldan pa dang / mos pa'i spyod sul rnam pa sna tshogs
307b1(phal chen): can dang / lus rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / ngag rnam par phye ba dang / nges pa'i tshig gi 'du byed kyi tha snyad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang / sbyor ba'i rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang
307b2(phal chen): dbang gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad la ma 'dres par mngon sum du gnas pa mthong ngo // de yang 'di lta ste/ 
307b3(phal chen): sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes
307b4(phal chen): pa'i sems can rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres
307b5(phal chen): pa dang / skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang klu'i 'jig rten gyi la ma gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi klu'i sdug
307b6(phal chen): bsngal dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal dang / 'jigs pa rnam
307b7(phal chen): par bzlog pa dang / mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gis chod pa'i mun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang / 
307b8(phal chen): mi snyan pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang / tshogs su bcad pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi grags pa ma yin pa dang / bsngags pa
308a1(phal chen): ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'khor gyi 'jigs par lhung ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'khor du dag cha ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par rjo/ 
308a2(phal chen): ba dang / 'chi bas 'jigs shing spangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / ngan seng gi g.yang sas 'jigs shing spangs pa'i sems can rnams kyi ngan song
308a3(phal chen): gi g.yangasas 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'tsho ba med pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zos
308a4(phal chen): kyis 'jigs shing / bag che ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlo dag pa dang / byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs shong bag
308a5(phal chen): tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi/ byang chub kyi sems nyam sa kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems
308a6(phal chen): can rnams kyi sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral gyis dogs shing / bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes
308a7(phal chen): gnyen dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung gis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs
308a8(phal chen): rgyas kyisar lhung ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams kyi 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal
308b1(phal chen): gyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / sems can sprul pa mi mnyam pa dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tshab rnams kyi sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par
308b2(phal chen): bzlog pa dang / dus mi bzad par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag che ba rnams kyi dus mi bzad par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang rigs ngan par skyes kyis 'jigs shing
308b3(phal chen): bag tsha ba rnams kyi/ rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang sdig to'i las byas kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sdig to'i las byed pa'i 'jigs
308b4(phal chen): pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrub pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang / 
308b5(phal chen): 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang / 'ching bas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa/ sna tshogs kyi gnas dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par
308b6(phal chen): bzlog pa dang / sems can thams cad la so sor mngon tu gyur par gnas pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ sgong las skyes pa'i sems can dang / mngal nas skyes pa dang / drod gsher
308b7(phal chen): las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs yod pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes yod pa'ang ma yin/ 'du shes med pa'ang ma
308b8(phal chen): yin pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskyabs pa'i smon lam gyi stobs mngon par sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs drag po dang / rnam par gnon pa shin tu yangs pa'i
309a1(phal chen): stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po stobs dang mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam mngon par
309a2(phal chen): bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho'i shugs drag po shin tu skyes pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i byams pa chen pos rgyas par dgang ba dang / sems can tham/ 
309a3(phal chen): cad kyi bde ba yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i ye shes rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i
309a4(phal chen): rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyam chog gi mthu phyung ba dang ldan pas zhing thams cad yongs su dag/ par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa gnas par mthong ngo // chos
309a5(phal chen): thams cad kyi rgyus shes par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gror bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa
309a6(phal chen): yongs su gzung ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bstsags pa la mngon du gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang
309a7(phal chen): sems can thams cad kyi sems la sgrib pa med par mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin par bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang / sems
309a8(phal chen): can thams cad kyi mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang ba la mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos rnam par bzlog pa la mngon du gyur pa dang / sems can
309b1(phal chen): thams cad kyi ma shes pa'i mun pa rnam par bsal ba la mngon du gyur cing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba yongs su bskyed pa'i don du gnas pa mthong ngo // de nas tshong dpan gyi
309b2(phal chen): bu nor bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul
309b3(phal chen): bab 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas shing / 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de lta bu mthong nas rab tu dga' bo skyes te/ spro ba chen po'i shugs drag po rgya
309b4(phal chen): mtsho rab tu thob nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas nas ngor gyen tu bltas so// de nas mtshan mo'i
309b5(phal chen): lha mo sems can kun skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang / mtshan rnam par dag pa de mi snang bar byas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo'i
309b6(phal chen): gzugs su byas nas/ rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad 'byin cing 'dug par gnas so// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyos/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi
309b7(phal chen): brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// khyod kyi sku yangs mtshan rab rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu bzang zhing mdzes pa bdag gis
309b8(phal chen): mthong // nam mkha' skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhin// dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa mthong // 'od kyi 'khor can sku bzang dam pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas zhing gi rdul khams mang po snyed
310a1(phal chen): kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa'i dpe tshul du// phyogs rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab par gang // 'od gzer dra ba mang po 'gro sems mnyam// khyod ni ba spu'i sgo
310a2(phal chen): nas 'gyed pa mdzad// 'od gzer sgo la pad+mo yang 'ong gnas// khyod kyi sprul pa 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// spos kyi na bun sprin du chags pa 'gyed// 'gro ba'i gzugs su gnas te kun nas
310a3(phal chen): mdzes// me tog sgo rnams kun nas dgye mdzad pas// chos dbyings bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba kun tu khyab// khyod kyi phrag pa'i lhun yangs 'phags pa ni// rin chen 'od 'phror bo ri rab 'dra// 
310a4(phal chen): dri med de ni 'gro ba kun tu gsal// gti mug mun nag rnam par bzlog pa mdzad// khyod kyi dri med bzhal mdog pa/ zang po las// na bun sprin dang nyi ma yangs pa 'byung // 
310a5(phal chen): khyod kyi nyi ma'i 'khor 'dra 'od bzang ba// rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa 'byin// khyod kyi spyan nas zla skar 'od 'byung ba// rtag tu dri med sprin ltar mang ba ste/ 
310a6(phal chen): dag phyogs bcur bkang zhing 'gro ba rnams// rab tu snang byed 'jig rten rab rib sel// khyod kyi mtshan las 'gro ba'i lus mnyam pa'i// sprul pa rgya mtsho phyogs su khyab par 'gro// 
310a7(phal chen): de dag chos dbyings yang par rgyas 'gengs shing // sems can tshad med tshogs rnams yongs su 'dul// khyod kyi sku ni 'byam klas phyogs su snang // 'gro ba kun la mngon
310a8(phal chen): gyur dga' ba skyed// rgyal po med pa rkun po chus bskyed pa'i// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam sel zhi bar mdzad// gang tshe khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag btang nas// yon tan rnam pa
310b1(phal chen): sems shing nyer phyin pa// de tshe 'od gzer dri med 'khor bzang po// khyod kyi zhal gyi smin mtshams gseb nas 'thon// phyogs rnams rgya mtsho brgya mang snang mdzad nas// 'jig rten
310b2(phal chen): snang ba rgya che yongs bskyed de// rnam 'phrul rnam pa mang po rnams bstan nas// de tshe bdag gi lus kyi gseb du na// gang tshe 'od kyi 'khor gyis bdag reg pa/ de tshe bde ba rmad byung yangs
310b3(phal chen): pa myong // gzungs dang ting 'dzin brgya mang yongs su non// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag yas mthong bar gyur// gom pa rnam por gyen tu bteg pa la'ang // rdul phran grangs snyed tshul ni
310b4(phal chen): bdag gis rig/ rdul phran shin tu phra ba gcig la yang // zhing gi rdul snyed zhing rnams mthong bar gyur// rdul la gnas kyang rnam pa tha dgu ste// zhing mang brgya ni shin tu nyon
310b5(phal chen): yang mongs// de'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal nyams su myong // cho nger ngu zhing smre sngags yongs su 'don// zhing mang la la kun nas nyon mongs dag/ de na sdug bsngal mang zhing / 
310b6(phal chen): bde ba chung // rgyal ba thugs rje can yang der skye ste// rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin no// zhing tshul la la yongs dag nyon mongs ste// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang mang pos brgyan
310b7(phal chen): skyes pa bud med yongs brgyan blta na sdug/ skyon meng rgyal ba'i gdung yang rgyun mi 'chad// zhing rnams rgya mtsho yangs shing dri med pa// rdul la gnas shing mnyam pa'i gzhi dang ldan// de
310b8(phal chen): dag bskal pa brgya mang sngon gyi che// rnam par snang mdzad spyod mdzad yongs su sbyangs// zhing rnams 'byam klas kun na rgyal ba dag/ shing dbang dam pa'i drung du gshegs pa ston/ 
311a1(phal chen): rnam par 'phrul zhing byang chub 'chang yang rgya// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing 'dul ba ston// rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa la// khyod
311a2(phal chen): kyang kun tu rjes su bzhud par mthong // mchod pa stong phrag tshad med khrag khrig gis// rgyal ba kun la mngon par mchod mdzad mthong // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// tshigasu bcad
311a3(phal chen): pa de dag smras nas// mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de/ de lta bur zab pa ni ngo mtshar che na// 
311a4(phal chen): rnam par thar pa de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi// de khyod kyis brnyesanas yun ni ji srid cig lags// byang chub sems dpas ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na rnam par thar pa de yongs
311a5(phal chen): su dag par 'gyur// smras pa rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas/ yid ches par dka' ba
311a6(phal chen): ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen
311a7(phal chen): bo lhur len pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la zhugs pa/ mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa/ 
311a8(phal chen): sangs rgyas kyi ning thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa bla na med par bya ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun ma
311b1(phal chen): gcad pa la zhugs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su bzung ba la zhugs pa/ bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba'i smon
311b2(phal chen): lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa// chos rgya mtsho thams cad la bsgrib pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba rnam par sbyang ba la zhugs pa/ skad cig re re zhing dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad du ye shes
311b3(phal chen): snang bas rnam par gnas pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi yul te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi
311b4(phal chen): zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed cig gi pha rol tu// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya bar / bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba byung ste/ 
311b5(phal chen): bskal po de la sangs rgyas ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che thams cad
311b6(phal chen): sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ rdo rje las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dang / gnas kyis yongs su mdzes par byas pa'o// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i gzhi ni rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med
311b7(phal chen): pa'i 'od kyi rgya mtsho las blangs pa ste/ lhun dang lus ni nor bu rin po che spos thams cad kyi rgyal po las gyur pa'o// de ni dbyibs kun tu zlum pa ste/ rnam par dag cing
311b8(phal chen): kun nas nyon mongs pa lhab lhub thams cad kyi sprin gyi bla res kun nas khyab pa rin po che'i khor yug rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ rim pa stong gis yongs su bskor ba// gling
312a1(phal chen): bani pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis shin tu brgyan par brgyan pa ste/ de la gling bzhi pa la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/ sems can kun nas nyon
312a2(phal chen): mongs pa'i las dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so// la la ni kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam par dag pa ste// sems can las 'dren ma dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so// la la ni rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa
312a3(phal chen): ste tesems can yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyongs pa kha na ma tho ba nyung ba rnams kyi gnas so// la la ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' dag pa rnams
312a4(phal chen): kyi gnas so// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjed dpal zhes bya ba de'i shar phyogs kyi khor yug gi mtsham sa na/ gling bzhing rin po che me tog sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan
312a5(phal chen): zhes bya ba rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa marmo sa ma skyes pa'i 'bras la yongs su spyod pa sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
312a6(phal chen): gnas dang gzhal med khang la yongs su spyod pa/ 'khor kun nas yid bzhin gyi shing gis 'khor ba/ spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las spos kyi sprin rgyun mi mchad par 'byung ba
312a7(phal chen): 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyi shing las 'phreng ba'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba/ me tog sna tshogs kyi shing las me tog kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin gyi char rgyun ma 'chad par
312a8(phal chen): 'bab pa phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi shing gi lhun las spos rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi phye ma'i char rgyun mi 'chad par 'dab rin po che'i shing sna tshogs las
312b1(phal chen): rin po che'i 'bru mang po 'brul pa'i kha dog snang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi shing las sil snyan sna tshogs kyi snron rlung gis bskyod cing na mkha'i dbyings las
312b2(phal chen): sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/ nyin mtshan gyi bde ba nyi ma dang zla bas dbyung ba/ nor bu rin po che kun tu snang bas gzhi byas byas pa'i sa rab tu mnyam par gyur pa ste/ gling
312b3(phal chen): bani pa der rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung bar gyur te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de dag re re zhing yang chu klung stong gis yongs su bskor ba'o// chu klung de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas
312b4(phal chen): kyi me tog sel mas gang ba'o// lha rdzas kyi rol mo dang klu'i sgra skad snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'o// chu 'gram rin po che'i shing yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa'o// 
312b5(phal chen): rin po che sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa'i grub na tshun du rgyu ba'o// bde ba sna tshogs ci dga' bar yongs su sbyang du yod pa'o// chu klung gi mtshams kyi
312b6(phal chen): gni re re dag na yang grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas gnas pa ste/ grong khyer de dag re re zhing yang grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi 'khor gyis yongs su
312b7(phal chen): bskor ba'o// grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal de dag thams cad kying lha rdzas kyi bza' shing gi ra ba dang gzhal med khang dang khang pabye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag
312b8(phal chen): stong gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor ba'o// gling bzhi pa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na// rgyal po'i pho brang dbu ma rin po che'i me tog smon ma zhes bya ba yod par gyur te// de ni
313a1(phal chen): skyid cing longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la rtag tu lo legs shing bde de'i rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'o// lha dang mi mang pos yongasu gang ba'o// 
313a2(phal chen): sems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma zhes bya ba de na// rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug pungad
313a3(phal chen): snying po zhes bya ba 'khor los bsgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba/ pad+mo'i snying po la rdzus te byung ba/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa// chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che
313a4(phal chen): bdun dang ldan pa gnas par gyur to// de'i bu dpa' zhing rdul pod la yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa gzhan gyi 'khor rab ra tu 'jom pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su tshang ba'i yan lag
313a5(phal chen): dam pa dang ldan pa stong tshang bar byung ngo // de'i btsun mo'i 'khor/ gyi bud med kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod par/ gyur te/ de dag kun kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i skal ba dang
313a6(phal chen): mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba 'thun par spyod pa/ rin po che'i rgyan dang 'khrungs su byung ba/ dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo dang khyad par med par 'dra ba'i gzugs can
313a7(phal chen): 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa'i lus can/ lus kyi ba spu las lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshogs 'byung ba/ lus las lha rdzas kyi 'od dri zhim po dri ma med pa rab tu
313a8(phal chen): 'gyed pa sho stag go// do'i blon po bye ba phrag bcu blung sa blon po rin po che la sogs bdag go/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug
313b1(phal chen): phung snying po de'i btsun mo dam pa bud med rin po che dpal gyi bzhin yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing sdug la blta na yid du 'ong ba kha dog bzang po
313b2(phal chen): shin du rgyas pa'i dam pa dang ldan pa sgra mthon mthing du 'dug pa mig dkar gnag 'byes pa/ mdog gser gyi kha dog du 'dug pa/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa// lus
313b3(phal chen): las 'od rtag tu 'byung ba/ 'khor kun tu dpag tshad stong gi tshad du/ 'od la dog dum dang ldan pa lha rdzas kyi dri zhim po can 'gyed babyung ngo // rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal gyi bzhin
313b4(phal chen): yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba de las/ bu mo pad+mo bzang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba// yan lag thams cad tshang ba/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa// bstan
313b5(phal chen): yid du 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltan mi ngoms pa byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na// 'khri ra los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po la blta na su yang ngoms par mi 'gyur
